http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Semi-industrial test on dry wheeled granulation for blast furnace slag
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A 600 kg/h dry wheeled granulation semi-industrial test for blast furnace slag was carried out and the wheel granulator and slag vertical cooler has also been redesigned. The effects of changes in key parameters such as the speed of the granulation device, the flow rate of cooling water on the results of particle diameter distribution, sphericity coefficient and vitreous content of granulated particles were studied. The results showed that when the speed of the granulation device was controlled at 1 400 r/min, the flow rate of cooling water was 40 L/h, there was a good sphericity of the blast furnace slag, 94% or more of the particle size was less than 5 mm and the vitreous content was more than 95%.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 梅钢三烧结节能环保生产实践
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Ironmaking Plant, Meishan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Nanjing 210039, Jiangsu, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Production practice of energy saving and environmental protection in Meishan Steel′s No.3 Sintering Plant
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Meishan Steel′s No.3 Sintering Plant was put into operation in 2004. With the increase of its operation time, its original equipment conditions and technical level gradually do not meet current requirements of energy saving and environmental protection. In recent years, combined with its own development needs, by upgrading its technical equipment and adopting new energy-saving and environmental protection technologies, such as main exhaust fan inverter technology, vertical cooling furnace technology, circulating fluidized bed desulphurization technology and ozone oxidation denitrification technology, the energy-saving and environmental protection level of the No.3 Sintering Plant got greatly improved. The energy consumption level was reduced to 45.6 kg/t. The emission index of sintering flue gas after treatment was less than 35 mg/m, NO concentration was less than 50 mg/m, and dust concentration was less than 10 mg/m, meeting the requirements of ultra-low emission index.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 250 t钢包RH精炼脱碳动态控制实践
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LIU Bin, CHEN Yong-hong, YANG Long-chuan, TANG Hai-ming
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Hanbao Steelmaking Plant of HBIS, Handan 056000, Hebei, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 摘要 为了提高RH脱碳效果,缩短RH精炼周期,从热力学和动力学理论上对RH脱碳进行分析,从实践上对RH脱碳处理进行动态控制工艺优化。吹氧加铝升温工艺优化后,超低碳钢成品碳合格率从94%左右提高到100%,RH处理10 min即可把碳脱到0.002%左右,与工艺优化前对比,成品碳质量分数从0.001 5%～0.002%降低到0.001%～0.001 4%。研究了压降对脱碳速率的影响,结果表明,压降速度越快,脱碳速率越高,预抽真空可以提高脱碳效率和获得更低的终点碳含量。研究了脱碳结束时氧含量与脱碳终点碳含量的关系,结果表明,脱碳结束时氧质量分数在0.025%～0.035%范围内,能满足脱碳终点碳质量分数小于0.002%的要求。
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Dynamic decarburization control practice for 250 t steel ladle RH refining
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to improve the decarbonization effect of RH and reduce the refining cycle, the RH decarburization was analyzed from the thermodynamics and dynamics theory, and the dynamic control process optimization of the RH decarbonization process was carried out in practice. After the optimization of oxygen blowing and aluminum heating process, the carbon qualified rate of ultra-low carbon steel products was increased from about 94% to 100%. The carbon can be removed to about 0.002% after 10 min of RH treatment. Compared with the process before optimization, the carbon mass fraction of finished products decreased from 0.001 5%-0.002% to 0.001%-0.001 4%. The effect of pressure drop on the decarburization rate was studied. The results showed that the faster the pressure drop, the higher the decarbonization rate. Pre-vacuum can improve the decarburization efficiency and obtain a lower end carbon content. The relationship between the oxygen content and carbon content at the end of decarburization was studied. The results showed that the decarbonization end oxygen mass fraction was within 0.025%-0.035%, which could meet the requirement that the decarbonization end carbon mass fraction was less than 0.002%.
keywords_en: oxygen at the end of decarbonization
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 刘彬, 陈永洪, 杨龙川, 汤海明. 250 t钢包RH精炼脱碳动态控制实践[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(5): 70-75. LIU Bin, CHEN Yong-hong, YANG Long-chuan, TANG Hai-ming. Dynamic decarburization control practice for 250 t steel ladle RH refining[J]. China Metallurgy, 2020, 30(5): 70-75.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHANG Li-guo1,2, FAN Zhen-fu2, LIU Bao-kui2, SHAO Si-wei2
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
1.Steel Research Institutes, Ansteel Group Corporation,Anshan 114009, Liaoning, China;
2.General Ironmaking Plant, Ansteel Co., Ltd., Anshan 114021, Liaoning, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Optimization practice of Ansteel new No.4 blast furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the problem of high fuel consumption in Ansteel No.4 BF,the ternary basicity is established, and the differential distribution method is adopted for the rational charging, implementing a central oriented and moderately loose edge distribution mode to improve the reduction effect of furnace burden. The lower adjustment focuses on controlling the air flow, adopting a pressure matching mode to operate the blast furnace, and optimizing the calculation of the blast kinetic energy and the area of past tuyere to obtain an appropriate raceway of the swing zone to activate the hearth. At the same time, different measures such as reasonable control of slag skin thickness, soft melting zone form and slag basicity are adopted. On the basis of controlling a reasonable operation of furnace typere, different visualization methods are applied and data platforms are constructed. It strengthens the monitoring of the running state of BF to a great extent and achieves a good effect of increasing daily output by 476 t/d and decreasing fuel consumption by more than 20 kg/t. It also realizes the purpose of increasing production and increasing efficiency of No.4 BF.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 含硫易切削模具钢高温热塑性行为探讨
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: CHEN Deng-guo1, LIAO Sang-sang2, XU Li-jun1,3, QIU Sheng-tao3, FENG Xiao-ming2
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Discussion of high temperature ductility behavior of sulfur-containing free-cutting die steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the high temperature hot plasticity, the microstructure evolution and transformation point under different cooling rates for free cutting die steel were investigated using a dilatation equipment to draw CCT curve. The high-temperature tensile fracture behavior was carried out using a Gleeble-3800 hot simulation testing machine. Combined with the fracture morphology, the hot ductility rules were investigated. The experiment results showed that there were three zones for the hot ductility curves, which were the Ⅰ brittle zone, the hot ductility zone and the Ⅲ brittle zone, respectively. The tensile property for the experimental steel deformed at 950-1 150 ℃ was best, which was in the hot ductility zone. Below 950 ℃, it was the Ⅲ brittle zone. The fracture morphology was dimples and cleavages. With the increase of temperature, the dimple quantity increased and the ductility turned better. Until to 950 ℃, the fracture morphology was whole dimples. When the temperature range was above 1 300 ℃, it was the Ⅰ brittle zone, the elongation rate decreased with temperature. Increasing the cooling rate, the stress formed in the austenite during cooling increased, which caused the elongation decreased compared to the lower cooling rate.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Selective leaching behaviour of calcium and magnesium from steel slag
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Steel slag with high amount of alkaline oxides is potentially raw material for CO2 mineralization. The effects of slag particle size, leaching temperature, leaching time, solid-liquid ratio and acetic acid concentration on the dissolution behavior of calcium, magnesium, iron, and silicon in steel slag were investigated, and acetic acid was used as extractant. The results showed that the reduction of the particle size of steel slag and the increase of acetic acid concentration could promote the leaching of calcium and magnesium ions effectively. Meanwhile, it was found that increasing the leaching time would lead to a decrease in the leaching rate of iron and silicon ions. Under the conditions of acetic acid concentration of 1 mol/L, leaching temperature of 80 ℃, leaching time of 90 min, and solid-liquid ratio of 1∶20, the selective and efficient leaching of calcium and magnesium ions from steel slag can be achieved, and the maximum leaching rate reached 92% and 52%, respectively, while for iron and silicon ions, it was 29.5% and 15.9%, respectively. The phase analysis of the leaching residue indicated that the main phase was RO phase. It was suggested that the acetic acid leaching not only efficiently extracted calcium and magnesium, and its leaching solution could be used as raw material for carbonation. The filter obtained after leaching was rich in iron-containing phase and can be further recovered as a high-grade ironmaking raw material.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: NING Xiao-zhi1, XING Chang-jun1, YONG Qi-long1, WENG Jian-yin1,2

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence of hot drawing process on cracking of high nitrogen nickel free austenitic stainless steel wire rod
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：During developing a high nitrogen and nickel free austenitic stainless steel wire rod, a large number of cracks appeared on the surface of the hot drawn wire rod. The cracking reasons were studied by means of optical microscopy, scanning electron microscopy and energy dispersive spectrometer. It was found that the surface cracks of the wire rod were basically perpendicular to the drawing direction. The cracking occurred on the surface and then developed into the inner. A lot of Cr-rich and N-rich nitrides separated on the surface of the wire rod. The precipitated phase along the grain boundaries would lead to the formation of voids, which could connect each other to form microcracks. After that, the intergranular cracking and fracture occurred. By lengthening the heating zone and increasing the drawing speed, the surface temperature of the wire rod was ensured, the surface cracking was avoided. The high nitrogen nickel free austenitic stainless steel wire rod with high quality was manufactured. Finally, the recommended hot drawing process was given.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 宁小智, 邢长军, 雍岐龙, 翁建寅. 热拔工艺对高氮无镍奥氏体不锈钢线材开裂的影响[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(5): 47-50,75. NING Xiao-zhi, XING Chang-jun, YONG Qi-long, WENG Jian-yin. Influence of hot drawing process on cracking of high nitrogen nickel free austenitic stainless steel wire rod[J]. China Metallurgy, 2020, 30(5): 47-50,75.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 超快速加热对冷轧IF钢组织和力学性能的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: HAN Jian-sheng, WEN Peng-yu, LUO Hai-wen
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of ultra-fast heating on microstructural evolution and mechanical properties of IF steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Ultrafast heating (UFH) process has attracted a wide attention due to its high efficiency and economic advantages. To investigate the influence of UFH on the microstructural evolution and mechanical performance of the cold-rolled IF steel sheet, two types of UFH processes, i.e. the direct UFH and a preheating stage were performed. Compared with the conventional continuous annealing (CA) process at 870 ℃ for 270 s, the direct UFH process at 200-500 ℃/s to 870 ℃ could effectively refine the grain sizes. In particular, the UFH at 500 ℃/s could obviously improve the yield strength, for example the tensile strength approximately reached 300 MPa, while the total elongation remained 43%. Compared with direct heating, the grains can be further refined after the introduction of 400 ℃ preheating section, and the recrystallization temperature can be significantly increased due to the recovery consumption of storage. However, the preheating stage also caused {110}<110> texture appear and the weaker texture strength, leading to thinning in the process of stretch deformation, which resulted in the necking advance, thus reducing the plasticity.

Effect of ultra-fast heating on microstructural evolution and mechanical properties of IF steel[J]. China Metallurgy, 2020, 30(5): 42-46,69.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 热轧带钢残余应力相关板形缺陷机理分析及攻关措施
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZAN Xian-liang1,2, WANG Feng-qin1, LIU Zi-ying1, LI Fei1, GUO Wei1, MIAO Cheng-liang3
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Mechanism analysis and research measures of residual stress-related plate shape defects in hot rolled strip
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The residual stress-related plate shape defects are summarized and classified into two categories: buckling and warping according to the production mechanism, camber and C warp were typical representative defects of buckling and warping. It was found that the wave and the camber had a corresponding relationship. By analyzing the current situation of the visible wave shape and the invisible wave shape, it was found that there was a manual modification of the target crown setting value. A three-dimensional finite element model of the temper mill was established, and the stress distribution of the different strip crowns after rolling was compared and analyzed. By adopting the "small crown + non-rolling through the temper" measure, the average value of the camber defects was reduced from 15.2 to 4.97 mm. Due to the lower support roller transmission, the presence of the rolling zone in the strip deformation zone leaded to different stresses in the upper and lower surface of the strip, which caused the occurrence of C warp defects. This phenomenon was further verified by dynamic explicit finite element analysis. The process parameters were compared and analyzed, and the Design of Experiment (DOE) was carried out to further optimize the process parameters, and the mean value of the warping defect was reduced from 27.6 to 10.5 mm.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 昝现亮, 王凤琴, 刘子英, 李飞, 郭薇, 缪成亮. 热轧带钢残余应力相关板形缺陷机理分析及攻关措施[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(5): 35-41,64. ZAN Xian-liang, WANG Feng-qin, LIU Zi-ying, LI Fei, GUO Wei, MIAO Cheng-liang. Mechanism analysis and research measures of residual stress-related plate shape defects in hot rolled strip[J]. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LI Xiao-yuan, SHI Jie, SUN Ting
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Institute for Special Steels, Central Iron and Steel Research Institute, Beijing 100081, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effects of finish rolling temperature on microstructure and mechanical properties of high nitrogen austenitic steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Mn18Cr18N steel plate with nitrogen mass fraction of 0.59% was obtained by pressurized metallurgy and controlled rolling technology. The effects of finish rolling temperature on microstructure and mechanical properties of high nitrogen austenitic steel were investigated. After recrystallization zone rolling and finish rolling at 970 ℃, the steel plates consisted of equiaxed austenite and some twins, with lower strength, higher ductility and impact toughness. After finish rolling at 910 ℃, the steel plates consisted of most deformed austenite and some recrystallization grains. The strength increased, the ductility and the impact toughness decreased with the decrease of finish rolling temperature. After non-recrystallization zone rolling and finish rolling at 780 ℃, the steel plates consisted of severe deformed austenite, with the highest strength, the lowest ductility and impact toughness. The precipitation CrN formed along grain boundary which could be found in all plates. The quantity of precipitation CrN increased with the decrease of finish rolling temperature and cooling rate after rolling.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 李晓源, 时捷, 孙挺. 终轧温度对高氮奥氏体钢组织和力学性能的影响[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(5): 29-34. LI Xiao-yuan, SHI Jie, SUN Ting. Effects of finish rolling temperature on microstructure and mechanical properties of high nitrogen austenitic steel[J]. China Metallurgy, 2020, 30(5): 29-34.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: YANG En-jiao, JIANG Min, HOU Ze-wang, WANG Xin-hua
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing, 100083, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Improvement of internal quality for continuous casting slab by heavy reduction at solidification endpoint
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The influence of the heavy reduction of the single-roller solidification end on the internal quality of continuous casting slab was discussed. The microstructure of Q345D continuous casting slab under different drawing speeds was analyzed and the quantitative measurement of the porosity of the slab center was carried out. The results showed that the internal quality of the continuous casting slab can be effectively improved by using heavy reduction. When the pulling speed was 0.70 m/min, the center porosity volume was significantly reduced at a 1/2 position and a 1/4 position of the slab width when the heavy reduction was 15 mm. The center porosity volume at the 1/2 and 1/4 position of the slab width on the condition of soft reduction was 1.73×10-7 cm3/g and 2.68×10-7 cm3/g, respectively. The center porosity volume at the 1/2 and 1/4 positions of the slab width at a heavy reduction of 15 mm was 5.33×10-8 cm3/g and -1.84×10-8 cm3/g, respectively. Under the soft reduction, the maximum value of center carbon segregation was 1.176, and under the heavy reduction of 15 mm, the maximum value of center carbon segregation was 1.282. A slight negative segregation occurred at 15 mm under a heavy reduction, and the maximum negative segregation value was 0.916.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 杨恩蛟, 姜敏, 侯泽旺, 王新华. 连铸板坯凝固末端大压下改善铸坯内部质量[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(5): 23-28. YANG En-jiao, JIANG Min, HOU Ze-wang, WANG Xin-hua. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Control of oxide inclusions in high quality spring steel during refining process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The influence of technologies as appropriate deoxidation, slag, alloy and inclusions control was studied on the cleanliness of molten steel when lean narrow window control technics route of LF-VD-CC was used. The results show that high quality spring steel of total oxygen mass fraction less than 0.000 8%, titanium mass fraction less than 0.001 8% and acid aluminum mass fraction less than 0.002 2% can be produced, and the oxide inclusions with low melting point and deformability can be obtained effectively when the mass fraction of Al2O3 in refining top slag was controlled to not more than 5%. The oxide inclusions of melting point under 1 600 ℃ isotherm grow up ceaseless and be removed by floatation during refining process, and the remaining oxide inclusions in steel not only have low melting point and good deformability, but also have thin size, and have little influence on fatigue properties.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 钢包保温层优化及应用
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHANG Li-min1,2, ZHU Li-guang2, ZHANG Li-jun3, XIAO Peng-cheng1,2, LIU Zeng-xun1,2
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 原复合反射绝热板热导率系数值较大,钢包包壳温度较高,在使用过程中钢水温度损失大;而新型气凝胶绝热板是以纳米材料为主,主要材质为SiO气凝胶,具有导热系数低、耐高温、密度小、抗压强度高等优越性能。某钢厂120 t钢包保温层用新型气凝胶绝热板替代原复合反射绝热板的效果表明,钢包包壳表面温度平均下降59～73 ℃;通过两种钢包包壳温度计算得出,在生产中,钢包每周转一次,可节省钢水温损9.88 ℃,钢水温降速率降低0.11 ℃/min;通过实测LF炉软吹结束钢水温度及铸机开浇时钢水温度,钢水温降速率降低0.12～0.13 ℃/min,实际钢水温降速率与钢包包壳节省温度计算的钢水温降速率基本吻合,成本下降2.7元/t(钢),取得了良好的试验效果,为新型气凝胶绝热板在钢厂其他保温设备上的应用提供了重要的参考价值。
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Optimization and application of steel ladle insulation layer
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The thermal conductivity coefficient of the original composite reflective adiabatic plate is large, the temperature of the ladle is high, and the temperature loss of the molten steel is large during the use. The new aerogel thermal insulation plate is mainly composed of nano materials, and the main material is SiO2 aerogel, which has the advantages of low thermal conductivity, high temperature resistance, low density and high compressive strength. The effect of replacing the original composite reflective adiabatic plate with a new aerogel adiabatic plate for the 120 t ladle insulation layer in a steel plant showed that the surface temperature of the ladle cladding decreased by an average of 59-73 ℃. According to the calculation of the two kinds of ladle shell temperature, the steel temperature loss of 9.88 ℃ can be saved and the steel temperature drop rate can be reduced by 0.11 ℃/min per ladle turnover in production. Through the actual measurement of LF furnace soft blowing end of molten steel temperature and casting machine cast starting temperature of molten steel, the steel temperature drop rate reduced by 0.12-0.13 ℃/min, the actual steel temperature drop rate of molten steel is basically consistent with the temperature drop rate of molten steel calculated by saving the temperature of the adding, and the cost is reduced by 2.7 yuan/t, which has obtained the good experimental effect. It provides an important reference value for the application of new aerogel insulation panels in other thermal insulation equipment of steel plants.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 张利民, 朱立光, 张利军, 肖鹏程, 刘增勋. 钢包保温层优化及应用[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(5): 11-16. ZHANG Li-min, ZHU Li-guang, ZHANG Li-jun, XIAO Peng-cheng, LIU Zeng-xun. Optimization and application of steel ladle insulation layer[J]. China Metallurgy, 2020, 30(5): 11-16.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 废弃SCR脱硝催化剂资源化利用研究进展
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LI Qiang1,2,3, CHEN Tie-jun2,4, LI Qi-yong1,3, WANG Ming-zhu1, LI Shi-long1
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research progress on resource utilization of waste SCR denitration catalyst
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Waste SCR denitrification catalyst is a kind of hazardous waste and contains several valuable components. Through the analysis of the main methods, principle, approach, advantages and disadvantages on the resource utilization of waste catalyst at home and abroad, the effective method which can fully recycle vanadium, tungsten and titanium resources is as follow: leaching waste SCR denitration catalyst-recycling vanadium and tungsten from leaching solution by purifying and separating-recycling titanium from leaching residue by pickling and calcining, in which the alkaline roasting and water immersion method is more suitable for the leaching process, the chemical precipitation method or solvent extraction combined with chemical precipitation method is suitable for purification and separation process of leaching solution. In addition, the research direction of resource utilization of waste SCR denitration catalyst is prospected.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 李强, 陈铁军, 李奇勇, 王明珠, 李士龙. 废弃SCR脱硝催化剂资源化利用研究进展[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(5): 1-10. LI Qiang, CHEN Tie-jun, LI Qi-yong, WANG Ming-zhu, LI Shi-long. Research progress on resource utilization of waste SCR denitration catalyst[J]. China Metallurgy, 2020, 30(5): 1-10.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 基于干法除尘灰返回转炉的应用实践
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WANG Shao-jun1, ZHOU Chao-gang2,3, JIANG Chao-min2,3, WANG Shu-huan2,3, AI Li-qun2,3, CHEN Hu4
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application practice of dust returning to converter based on dry dedusting
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to improve the utilization efficiency of the cold-bonded pellet return to the converter and reduce the cost of the smelting raw material, the three parts of the dust ash raw materials and production process, the production of cold-bonded pellets and the application practice of cold-bonded pellets in the converter were analyzed. The results showed that the dry dust removal ash had a high iron content, and the highest iron mass fraction of coarse ash can reach 89.94%. The starch glue was used as the binder for producing cold-set pellets. One of the keys to cold-bonded pellet formation was to add appropriate amount of water for digestion. In actual production, the amount of water added should be controlled to 5% to 7%, and the digestion time should be 8 to 12 h. It has been proved by practice that the cold-bonded pellets had obvious cooling effect and slag effect after being added to the converter. The research on the use effect of cold-bonded pellets showed that cold-bonded pellets can reduce the consumption of auxiliary materials and increase the utilization rate of metals, which can increase the benefits by 49.036 4 million yuan a year.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 王少军, 周朝刚, 蒋朝敏, 王书桓, 艾立群, 陈虎. 基于干法除尘灰返回转炉的应用实践[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(4): 74-78. WANG Shao-jun, ZHOU Chao-gang, JIANG Chao-min, WANG Shu-huan, AI Li-qun, CHEN Hu. Application practice of dust returning to converter based on dry dedusting[J]. China Metallurgy, 2020, 30(4): 74-78.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 邯钢烧结机冷却系统改造与余热发电效果提升
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHAO Jun-kai, HOU Jian, JIANG Lin
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Hansteel Company, HBIS Group, Handan 056015, Hebei, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Improvement of cooling system and waste heat power generation effect of sintering in Handan Iron and Steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The problems existing in the waste heat power generation of the 435 m2 sintering machine of Handan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd. are analyzed. It is pointed out that the air leakage rate of the ring cooler is high and the residual heat recovery rate is low, which is the key factor that restricts the operation effect of the waste heat power generation system. Through the water seal modification of the ring cooler, the full seal transformation of upper flue gas hood, the direct heat collection of the material receiving point, the moving forward of the hot spot, the optimization of the waste heat air volume, and the improvement of the sealing material, the waste heat generation rate is increased by 25%, the air leakage rate of the ring cooler is reduced from 35% to 5%. When the annual new power generation is 14.4 million kW·h, the additional efficiency is more than 800 million yuan. The results show that it is an important means to improve the residual heat generation rate by strengthening the seal of the ring cooler and optimizing the air volume configuration.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 赵军凯, 侯健, 姜林. 邯钢烧结机冷却系统改造与余热发电效果提升[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(4): 69-73. ZHAO Jun-kai, HOU Jian, JIANG Lin. Improvement of cooling system and waste heat power generation effect of sintering in Handan Iron and Steel[J]. China Metallurgy, 2020, 30(4): 69-73.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 无取向电工钢热轧楔形问题分析与控制
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
1. School of Mechanical Engineering, Shandong Jiaotong University, Jinan 250357, Shandong, China;
2. CISRI New Metallurgy Engineering Design Co., Ltd., Beijing 100081, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis and control of strip wedge of non-orientation electrical steel in hot rolling process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
High quality of the strip profile of electrical steel is demanded. Large wedge of non-orientation electrical steel strip in hot rolling process have brought serious difficulties to the cold rolling and other subsequent processes, and has become an important factor restricting the quality of electrical steel products. The strip wedge of electrical steel was analyzed by means of the measurement statistics of the strip profile of the intermediate slab, the observation of infrared thermography and the measurement of the worn rolls, etc. Then the effects of inlet wedge, uneven wear of rolls, inhomogeneous temperature distribution of the plate in mono-phase region and double-phase region on the wedge after rolling were investigated by a finite element (FE) model based on the actual material model of electrical steel. The calculation results indicated that the wedge existed in the slab can be decreased but it was difficult to be eliminated during afterwards rolling. The effect of work roll slant wear on the wedge was greater than that of backup roll. The slant distribution of transverse temperature had a leading effect on the strip wedge, and the smaller transverse temperature difference could cause the huge wedge. Especially, the wedge generated in double-phase region was larger than that in single-phase region with the same temperature difference. Based on the above investigations, the control measures were put forward to reduce the strip wedge and their effects were analyzed.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Design and implementation of energy management system in centrifugal casting process of superalloy
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to improve the energy management level and energy utilization efficiency of centrifugal casting enterprises, the research of the energy management system for the superalloy centrifugal casting production process was carried out. By analyzing the energy consumption characteristics of the superalloy centrifugal casting production process, a four-layer energy management system was proposed, which included data collection, data storage, data analysis and data application. Based on the analysis of the collected data, the corresponding energy consumption data acquisition hardware configuration scheme and real-time data acquisition scheme were proposed. At the same time, the unit energy analysis of the melting furnace, the energy balance analysis of key processes, etc. were carried out, and the corresponding energy-saving data energy-saving optimization scheme was proposed. Based on these analyses, the functional structure of the energy management system was designed, and the energy management system was developed and applied based on the B/S functional architecture, which realized the data collection, monitoring and energy consumption optimization of the superalloy centrifugal casting production process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WU Hai-lin1, FAN Lei1, YANG Jian-hong2, QIAN Xue-hai1, WANG Bi2, LUO Jing1

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effects of M23C6 precipitated phase on surface crack of cold-rolled low-nickel austenitic stainless steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to find out the causes of surface cracks of cold-rolled low-nickel austenitic stainless steel strip produced by Liuzhou Steel, the surface cracks were detected and analyzed by the optical microscope and the scanning electron microscope, and analyzed and calculated by combining with heat treatment test and thermodynamic software JMatPro. It was found that there were a large number of precipitated phases at the grain boundary of the cracks, and accordingly, it was presumed that the precipitated phase was the main cause of surface cracks on products during cold rolling. The heat treatment test was carried out by simulating the continuous annealing process. The results showed that the normal annealing process cannot completely eliminate the large amount of precipitated phases accumulated at the grain boundary of steel coil during hot rolling process. The equilibrium phase diagram of austenitic stainless steel under this composition system was calculated and studied by combining with energy spectrum and TEM diffraction spot analysis. The results showed that the precipitation temperature of M23C6 carbide ranged from 500 to 925 ℃. When the steel coil cooled down slowly from high temperature, MC carbide would be precipitated out, and the peak precipitation temperature was about 850-900 ℃. The possible measures to reduce the amount of MC carbide precipitates in steel coil were put forward based on the actual process flow.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Study on gradual voltage and current electroslag remelting process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the influence of gradual voltage and current electroslag remelting(ESR) process on the structure and properties of ingots, No.45 steel was used as the experimental material to obtain the differences of solidification structure and properties on the traditional ESR process and parameter gradual changing process. The samples were analyzed by means of low power corrosion, optical microscope(OM), scanning electron microscope(SEM) and tensile mechanics test. It was found that the voltage was gradually reduced to a certain value and then the current was gradually reduced until the melting was finished. This process can reduce the angle between the ingot columnar crystal structure and the axis of the ingot, make the solidification structure be more inclined to directional solidification structure and improve the tensile strength of ingot in the axial direction. In addition, the amount of ferrite in the solidification structure decreased and the structure of pearlite middle lamellae was refined obviously.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 胎圈钢丝中间热处理的工艺参数优化
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: JIA Chun-yang1, CHU Shao-jun2, ZENG Guo-zhen3
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Technological parameters optimization for intermediate heat treatment of bead steel wire
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to reduce the breakage of bead wire in the production process of drawing and improve the processing performance and final product quality, the effects of heating temperature, lead bath temperature and quenching speed on the properties of bead wire were studied. The results showed that when the heat treatment linear velocity of φ3.5 mm steel wire was 18 m/min and the wire outlet temperature was about 940 ℃, a uniform austenite structure could be obtained, and it could be further decomposed in the lead tank treatment to obtain the required sorbite structure. At this time, the middle pass wire reached the maximum tensile strength, which was beneficial to reduce the phenomenon of wire breaking during drawing in the subsequent passes. After the steel wire under this process was drawn, the grains did not continue to grow after the austenite was homogenized, which not only ensured the uniformity of the steel wire structure, but also prevented the reduction of the tensile strength of the steel wire.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 贾春扬, 储少军, 曾国镇. 胎圈钢丝中间热处理的工艺参数优化[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(4): 41-45. JIA Chun-yang, CHU Shao-jun, ZENG Guo-zhen. Technological parameters optimization for intermediate heat treatment of bead steel wire[J]. China Metallurgy, 2020, 30(4): 41-45.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 铝合金平轧过程中端部自动剪切方法的开发和应用
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: XU Lei1, JIANG Ting2, CHEN Wei-jia3
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development and application of automatic end shearing method in aluminum alloy flat rolling
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the flow rule of metal, when aluminum alloy ingots are rolled to the thickness of 100-150 mm, "mouth opening" will occur at both ends of the head and tail, which needs to be removed at the heavy shears. At present, heavy shearing operators rely on visual results to determine the length of shearing, so the shearing efficiency is low. When the shear length is not appropriate, it will cause a great waste. A mathematical model is established by using side image signal, metal detector and rotary encoder signal captured by an industrial CCD camera, and then the corresponding rotary encoder readings are calculated when the two ends of the rolled piece are cut off. Finally, the rolled piece is automatically transported to the pre-calculated position for end cutting by controlling the speed of the conical roller table. The automatic control method can not only improve the shearing efficiency, avoid secondary shearing, but also precisely control the shearing length and improve the yield.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 许磊, 蒋婷, 陈卫嘉. 铝合金平轧过程中端部自动剪切方法的开发和应用[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(4): 37-40. XU Lei, JIANG Ting, CHEN Wei-jia. Development and application of automatic end shearing method in aluminum alloy flat rolling[J]. China Metallurgy, 2020, 30(4): 37-40.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 电磁场对连铸保护渣流变特性的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LIU Ke1,2, ZENG Yi-jun2,3, HAN Yi-hua1,2, YANG Fan1,2, ZHU Li-guang1,2
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of electromagnetic field on rheological properties of continuous casting mould flux
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The rheological properties of mould fluxes with and without magnetic field were studied experimentally by using a self-made device for viscosity measurement of mould fluxes in electromagnetic field and a HF-201 viscometer, and the microstructure of mould fluxes with and without magnetic field was studied by Scigress molecular dynamics simulation, and the relationship between the rheological properties of mould fluxes and the microstructure was analyzed. The results showed that the viscosity and turning temperature of mould fluxes increased, and the Si-O bond length of mould powder did not change, which was 0.162 5 nm, but the bonding ability of Si and O increased under the action of the electromagnetic field. After the magnetic field was applied, the content of four-coordinated Si, bridging oxygen and complex structural unit Q3 in the slag increased, and the degree of polymerization of slag network structure increased, which was complex and stable.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Thermodynamic of inclusion formation in non-tempered steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：To investigate the evolution and formation condition of inclusions in non-tempered steel, and achieve the precise control of inclusions, the evolution of morphology and composition of inclusions during the whole smelting process were revealed. The initial inclusions were mainly MgAl2O4 spinel inclusions. More CaO-CaS-containing inclusions were detected during refining process. Meanwhile, MnS was precipitated in steel. The equilibrium relations of Al, Ti, Mg, Ca and O in steel on the condition of single deoxidation, and the stability diagram of Mg-Al-O, Al-Ti-O, Al-Ca-O, Mg-Al-Ca-O system in non-tempered steel were thermodynamic calculated at 1 873 K, which can be theoretical direction for the addition of deoxidizer, control of oxygen content and different kinds of inclusions in non-tempered steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 含硼矿粉制备球团矿的特点及应用方法
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: TIAN Yun-qing, QING Ge-le, ZHANG Yan, ZHAO Lu-yao, YANG Tao
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Institute of Iron and Steel Technology, Research Institute of Technology, Shougang Group Co., Ltd., Beijing 100043, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Characteristics of pellet preparation with boron-containingconcentrate and application method
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the application of boron-containing concentrate in pellet, the characteristics and application methods of boron-containing concentrate in pellet were studied through a series of experiments. Research results showed that the micromorphology of boron-containing concentrate was suitable for pelletizing, and the green ball performance index was high. Duo to the obvious endothermic reaction between 550 and 700 ℃, the compressive strength of preheated pellets decreased with the increase of the proportion of boron-containing concentrate. It was necessary to increase the preheating temperature and prolong the preheating time to reduce the ring formation of rotary kiln which was caused by the fragile preheated pellets. The compressive strength of boron-containing pellets decreased with the increase of the proportion of boron-containing concentrate. It was necessary to select a suitable roasting system according to the proportion of boron-iron concentrate to ensure the quality of pellets. The metallurgical properties of boron-containing pellets were excellent.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 某钢厂常用4种铁矿粉烧结基础特性
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: TIAN Shuo, WANG Yi-ci, LUO Guo-ping, REN Qiang, CHAI Yi-fan, SONG Wei
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: School of Materials and Metallurgy,Inner Mongolia University of Science and Technology, Baotou 041010, Nei Mongol, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Basic characteristics of four iron ore fines commonly used in steel plants
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to improve the quality of sinter in a steel plant, the high-temperature characteristics of iron ore fines, which have a great influence on the quality of sinter, were studied. The liquid phase and liquid phase viscosity index of iron ore fines at 1 280 ℃ and alkalinity of 3.0 were calculated by FactSage 7.1 thermodynamics software. The TSJ-2 infrared fast high temperature sintering furnace was used to test the basic characteristics of four kinds of iron ore fine based on the thermodynamic calculation. Experiment on the determination of the basic characteristics of iron ore fines. The experimental results showed that the assimilation temperature of the two types of iron ore powders A and D was higher, the assimilation was poor, the assimilation of the C type iron ore fines was better, and the assimilation of the B type iron ore fines was the best. When the experimental temperature was 1 280 ℃ and the alkalinity was 3.0, the liquid phase flow index of the two types of iron ore powders A and D was lower, the liquid phase flow index of the C type iron ore powder was better, and the liquid phase flow index of the B type iron ore powder was the best. According to the calculation of FactSage 7.1 thermodynamic software, the A iron ore powder liquid amount of the four types of iron ore powders A, B, C and D was 51.46%, 77.8%, 66.64%, and 70.66%, respectively. And the viscosity of the four types of iron ore powders A, B, C and D was 0.031 Pa·s, 0.032 Pa·s, 0.035 Pa·s, and 0.044 Pa·s respectively. The results according to the fluidity index formula were consistent with the experimental results.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: MA Chao1,2, LI Dong-tao1,2, ZHAO Peng1,2, GUO De-ying1,2, LIU Yang1,2, XU Rong-guang1,2

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence of coking coal and fat coal ratio on performance of top-charging coke and stamping coke
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to understand the difference between top-charging coke and stamping coke in terms of performance indexes, the influence law of different ratio of coking coal and fat coal on the performance of top-charging coke and stamping coke was studied by using the 300 kg test coke oven. The conclusions can be drawn: when the ratio of coking coal and fat coal increased from 30% to 60%, stamp coking can improve the cold and hot strength index of coke and the improving effect was weakened. The content of the coke mosaic structure was increased gradually, while the content of the isotropic structure was decreased. The average coke pore diameter was increased and porosity was decreased gradually. Coke strength after reaction showed an increasing trend with the increase of mosaic structure content, while reactivity was gradually increased with the increase of isotropic structure. Under the same condition of coal blending composition, the average pore diameter of the stamping coke was lower, the thickness of the pore wall was increased, and the porosity was lower to about 20%.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en:
Current Status and Development Trends of Steels
——A European Perspective
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Currently more than 2200 steels are listed by the German Iron and Steel Institute VDEh, many of them have been developed in recent years. Regarding the variety of different materials the question may rise whether new steels are required for future demands and what should be the focus of new steel development. This paper discussed the question from the European perspective, that is the perspective of countries with a well developed infrastructure and with stagnant or even decreasing population. The future oriented steel industry needs to understand its main customers, requirements. New steels will be developed using the options of different metallographic phase and a sophisticated understanding of alloying. Modeling techniques will accelerate and support the introduction of new steels and processes.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The using effect of Flow Control Mold Electromagnetic Brake(EMBR) at 2# continuous caster in Meishan Steel was studied.It shows that with increasing of the current strength,the magnetic field intensity is intensified and the flow field in mold is changed.The magnetic field intensity in lower mold is 0.34~0.45T when the current of lower coil is 800~850A. When the current of upper coil increases to 400 A from 200 A, the magnetic field intensity in upper mold increases to more than 0.3T from 0.2T .With the using of EMBR, the height variation of molten steel in mold is decreased obviously,the temperatrue of molten steel in mold increases about 10℃,the inclusion amounts in molten steel are less and their diameters are smeller,the biggest diameter is under 20 um.But slag entrapment still occurs,so EMBR controlling technology should be studied further.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Establishment of Landing Point of Burden in Blast Furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：adial distribution of burden is determined by the position of particle landing during charging in blast furnace. In practice, the landing points of particles are not the same because of their different density, size and shape. In published papers, there are some problems such as: neglecting the drag force of gas, choosing the improper density and using irrelevantly the drag force formula, so the difference between calculation and practice is large. In this paper, the grain gravity, buoyancy and gas drag force are considered. In addition, the mathematical model is developed and the movement trajectory of a particle in free zone is computed. According to charging radius variation with different burdens in their range of grain diameter and the size of drag force, the influence of gas drag force is important when computing the burden trajectory for achieving the optimal burden distribution.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 由温室气体引起的全球气候变化已成为国际社会关注的焦点。2005年2月16日正式生效的《京都议定书》虽暂时对中国无直接的压力，但中国的温室气体排放总量仅次于美国，居世界第2位，居发展中国家的首位，这使中国在相关国际谈判中面临很大压力。2001年中国人均二氧化碳排放量为2.43 t，低于世界人均水平（3.88 t），但温室气体排放呈急剧增长趋势。中国钢铁行业的二氧化碳排放量约占发展中国家钢铁工业总排放量的30%，在国内工业二氧化碳排放量在工业二氧化碳排放中仅次于电力、建材（水泥），居第3位。介绍了相关的国际动态和对我国钢铁行业温室气体排放现状分析和减排措施的研究工作。

China will face great pressure on the relevant international negotiation.In 2000, the average emission of CO2 per person in China is 2.53 t, but it appears a trend of rapid increasing of emission of GHG in China. The emission of CO2 in Chinese steel industry is at the third position next to the power generation industry and cement industry.Some relevant international action and our research work in aspect of emission and mitigation of GHG in Chinese steel industry are introduced.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Numerical Modeling of Temperature Rising Characteristic Curve for CarbonContaining Chromite Fines in Microwave Field
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：During the process of microwave heating, the temperature distribution in a material submitted to microwave radiation is governed by interaction and absorption of radiation by medium, which accompany processes of transportion due to the dissipation of the electromagnetic energy into heat. A series of important factores which affect temperature-rising characteristic of carbon-containing chromite fines in microwave field are analysed in the paper. First of all , structure of resonance cavity for heating and multi permatron coupling mode affect the distribution of microwave field, combining with the variety of heat and physical properties such as specific heat and dielectric properties. The relationship between dissipation power of microwave and temperature can be solved by calculation, then the temperature-rising curve fitting of carbon-containing chromite fines can obtain by it. It is valid for temperature-rising characteristic of metallurgy material for microwave in similarity field structure with different material, proportioning and volume.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 转炉钢渣中的磷是影响钢渣在钢铁企业内部循环的主要因素之一。研究显示，如文献中对缓冷钢渣的研究结果一样，工厂稳定化处理后的转炉钢渣中的磷主要以磷酸三钙与硅酸二钙形式的固溶体存在。该固溶体在钢渣中呈不规则颗粒状，在钢渣的其它矿物相中没有发现磷元素。其实验结果与利用Factsage软件进行的热力学平衡计算结果相一致，说明对钢渣样的分析具有代表性。此结果为转炉钢渣中磷的综合利用和转炉钢渣在钢铁企业的再生利用打下良好基础
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Phosphorus Distribution in Converter Slag
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：It is phosphorus that limited the converter slag’s recycling in steel making process. Based on analysis of factory converter slag, predominate phosphorus was found concentrated in a solid solution of dicalcium silicate and tricalcium phosphate, as reported in some research about slow cooled converter slags. No phosphorus was found in other phases in our factory slag sample. A thermodynamic calculation using Factsage was introduced with the same results, which suggest that the sample along with analysis given was reliable. Based on the present results, a scientific basis could be established for phosphorus recycling and converter slag reuse in steel making process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：If product suffers heat concussion, it will appear heat stress. If heat stress is enough stronger, the product will produce crack. The crack occured in silica brick generally includes surface crack and layer crack. Surface crack includes horizontal, vertical and reticulate crack. Usually, layer and vertical crack are caused by moulding, and horizontal and reticulate crack are caused by sintering. The main influence factors of crack formation are sintering and moulding, but the other factors relate to producing crack are not to be neglected.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 摘要 以转炉渣为原料，采用熔融法制备转炉渣微晶玻璃。利用XRD、SEM和EDX等方法研究了不同热处理时间对转炉渣微晶玻璃析晶行为的影响。随热处理时间的延长，晶体中铁的原子分数逐渐增加而镁逐渐减少，晶体析出量也逐渐增加，晶相为Ca(Fe，Mg)Si2O6和Ca1.018(Mg0.733Fe0.293)((Si1.67Fe0.304)O6)；热处理时间75 min时体积密度达到最大值，为3.912 g/cm3，而微晶玻璃的显微硬度变化不大

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Glass ceramics using converter slag as a raw material were prepared by the melting method. The effects of heat treatment time on crystallization behavior of glass ceramics were studied by XRD, SEM and EDX. The crystal phase is Ca(Fe,Mg)Si2O6, Ca1.018(Mg0.733Fe0.293)((Si1.67Fe0.304)O6). As the heat treatment time increases, the atom fraction of ferrum in crystals gradually increases, and the atom fraction of magnesium decreases, and the content of crystal increases; when the heat treatment time is equal to 75 minutes, the maximum volume density is 3.912g·cm-3 and the microhardness of glass ceramics has no apparent changes.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of Liquid Metal Nucleation Stirred by Vibration onSolidification Structure of Zinc
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to increase proportion of equiaxed grain of billet and homogeneity of solidification structure, a great many liquid metal nucleation stirred by vibration experiments were carried out with zinc. The results show that liquid zinc would nucleate and grow up rapidly on the surface of crystal nucleus eradiation equipment with cooling system when the vibrant equipment was inserted into zinc solution. Under the high frequency vibrating action, the crystal grain formed on the surface of the crystal nucleus eradiation equipment would be broken and peeled off, thereby ejected to zinc molten pool continuously and served as crystal nucleus source of equiaxed grain during solidification. The proportion of equiaxed grain of zinc will be increased up to 65% and 80% respectively after it is treated nucleation stirred by vibration with water-cooled and air-cooled crystal nucleus eradiation equipment.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Deformation in railway wheel for heat treatment was analyzed with finite element method, in which the coupling of temperature, phase transformation and stress was considered. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Central segregation and internal crack decrease the properties of slab and rolling plate badly. In this paper, on the basis of production records for some steel corporation, an improved BP algorithm with the additional momentum term is put forward, which is used to develop a BP neural network model to predict the central segregation of continuous casting slab. The results showed that, prediction accuracy of central segregation model is 90%, which meet the demand of prediction of central segregation well. The main reasons for prediction errors include excess hidden layer numbers in the neural network structure, excess sample numbers of central segregation defect at 1.0 level and noise samples being not eliminated absolutely.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the mass balances of blast furnace, typical slag basicity was calculated and analyzed in different zones of the blast furnace. Analysis results show that, under large pulverized coal injection, the conventional burden induces the fluctuation of basicity of slag along the blast furnace height, the decrease of threephase zone and the permeability of lower part of blast furnace. To solve the problem, injection of limes into the blast furnace instead of charging from the top could be a good solution. Once the charging of limes from the top is replaced by injection via the tuyeres, the smooth operation and increasing productivity of the blast furnace can be obtained, besides the decreasing bosh slag volume, the proper basicity of slag, the higher location of cohesive zone, the extending of threephase zone, the increasing of permeability and pulverized coal combustibility.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：FEM simulation and analysis of hot rolling process were carried out in order to solve surface defect problem at rolled piece corner. Deformation of rolled piece in three flat rolling passes and two edge rolling passes, especially the turning phenomenon of elements from corner to top surface, were analyzed. The results show that the spread and side turn of rolled piece happens mainly in flat rolling passes, while the corner elements fall under tension state, which may lead to defects in all probability. On the contrary, the corner elements in edge rolling passes are in press condition, which is benefit to repair little defects. So it may be anther good method of optimize reduction schedule of edge rolling passes to amend rolling defects. Corresponding location of meshes in rolling ingot and rolled piece can be gained definitely from the model results, which is significant to analyze and reduce surface defects of rolled products.

Abstract：
Linear defects is one of the common surface defects of cold-rolled sheet. It influences cold-rolled sheet quality and function seriously, while "black line" defect is one of the two linear defects. The smelting process is simulated by C programming language, the results show that nonequilibrium thermodynamical model can describe the variation of temperature and component of host elements. The model offers the actual converter steelmaking process for new theory and means.

Study of Mineralogical Constitution of Mold
Fluxes at Different Temperature
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The mineralogical constitution of mold fluxes was investigated at the different temperature by TEM and XRD. The results shown that with increasing of experimental temperature, the crystallization ratio of mold fluxes was decreased both during cooling and heatingup, the major crystal phase of mold fluxes were cuspidate, wollastonite and melilite. The crystallization ability of cuspidate was the best at 1000 ℃ and 1200 ℃, but it couldn’t be precipitated at 1300 ℃. Wollastonite with perfect crystal texture was only precipitated at 1000 ℃. Melilite presented obvious the optical properties and developed crystal at 1300 ℃, however it was the small grain crystallite because of slow crystal growth at 1000 ℃ and 1200 ℃. At same experimental temperature, the solidification structure of mold fluxes was dense that had the higher crystallization ratio and small crystal size during heatingup, in addition the crystal growth of mold fluxes was better that had stronger crystal during cooling.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Using white fused alumina and fused magnesia as main raw materials, calcium aluminate (80%Al2O3)cement as binder, microsilica and α-Al2O3 micropowder addition agent, the influence of MgO powder content on slag resistance of Al2O3-MgO castables was discussed deeply. The results showed that: adding appropriate quantify of MgO powder in Al2O3-MgO castables, the alumo-magnesia spinel can formed in high temperature, thus the slag resistance of Al2O3-MgO castables can be improved, the slag resistance property is good with magnesia powder addition between 2%～6%.

Numerical Simulation of Molten Flow in MediumFrequency SoftContact
Electromagnetic Continuous Casting Mold for Round Billets
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Using finite element method, the effect of mediumfrequency electromagnetic field on molten flow pattern in electromagnetic softcontact mold was simulated. Besides, the effects of some parameters on the molten flow, such as electric current and frequency, were discussed. The numerical results show that the electromagnetic force can enhance the stirring intensity and form distinct circumfluence in upper part of mold. Moreover, the electromagnetic force can decrease molten penetration depth. Increasing electric current can enhance the steel stirring intensity and circumfluence in the mold, at the same time, aggravate free surface fluctuation of molten, but the molten penetration depth is decreased. The magnitude of electric current has an optimal range. The molten penetration depth is not changed with increasing of frequency, but the turbulent energy and molten velocity are increased in the vicinity of meniscus. the frequency about 2500 Hz was suggested in this research.

on Q370qE Steel Plate
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：For increasing qualified rate of the ultrasonic flaw detection on Q370qE steel plate, defect position is sampled and analyzed. Result shows that unqualified rate of ultrasonic flaw detection mostly because of nonmetallic inclusion involved in the steel plate, steel plate delamination caused by center severity segragate, protection slags of continue casting and refractory engulfed in moltensteel, continue casting crack. After improving the moltensteel pureness degree, changing the nonmetallic inclusion form, controlling the pouring temperature and pulling speed and so on, the ultrasonic flaw detection qualified rate is improved from 75％ to 97％.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en:
Effects of TMCP on Microstructure and
StretchFlangeFormability of Automobile Wheel Steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of different cooling mode on microstructure and strengthflangeformability of low carbon FB steel used for automobile wheel were analyzed through TMCP(ThermoMechanical Controlled Process) tests. The fracture type and fracture mechanism of FB steel in hole expanding were also analyzed. The results show acicular ferrite(AF) and bainite were gained by continuous cooling. AF decreases the difference of microhardness between ferrite and bainite clearly， which improves the strengthflangeformability of steel. The fracture mechanism of FB steel is gliding fracture through micropore gathering. The results can offer experiment data in order to the applying of lowcarbon FB steel on automobile wheel.

1.Ironmaking Plant of Panzhihua Iron and Steel Co., Panzhihua 617024, Sichuan, China;

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en:
Experiment on Influence of FeO on Sinter Property
Under High Basicity Condition
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：FeO is sinter main composition that affects importantly strength and metallurgy properties. As low FeO sintering is being practiced widely, improving reducibility（RI) but not debasing strength is the key for studying FeO. Experiment research on FeO affecting sinter property and FeOs’ influence factors have been accomplished under high basicity about 2.5 condition in Pangang. The result indicates that strength， utilization coefficient and finished product rate all rise， and solid fuel consumption rise like to linear trend along with FeO rising, but after FeO attaining certain value, the indexes achieve maximum which have typical secondary curve characteristic. Along with the FeO rising, reducibility（RI) become bad， low temperature breakdown index improve. Controling FeO at 7.248.44% can give attention to indexes such as produce quality, consumption, metallurgical property in the best scope. Under fixing fuel proportioning condition, any one factor rising of basicity, mixture moisture, SiO2, Al2O3 and return fines will cause FeO to descend, then affects production technique index, so amount of adding carbon need to be increased properly.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation:
蒋大军1 ，何木光1 ，甘勤2 ，何群2. 高碱度条件下FeO对烧结矿性能的影响[J]. 中国冶金, 2008, 18(11): 14-14. JIANG Dajun1,HE Muguang1,Gan Qin2,He Qun2. Experiment on Influence of FeO on Sinter Property
Under High Basicity Condition. China Metallurgy, 2008, 18(11): 14-14.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The comments and discussion on inhibitors in the process of slab reheating with high, moderate and low temperatures were conducted in consideration of production technology and the trends in development of high magnetic induction grainoriented silicon steels. MnS and AlN are the main inhibitors for the high reheating temperature process. While AlN is the main inhibitor and MnS and Cu2S being supplementary inhibitors for the moderate reheating temperature process. AlN is considered to be the main inhibitor for low reheating temperature process, in which a limited nitrogen amount is necessary to be diffused into the strip to obtain aluminum nitride before secondary recrystallization. Nb(C，N) is likely to become a new kind of inhibitor for the low reheating temperature process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：With the development of iron and steel industry, the requirement of ironmaking and steelmaking trocessing for silicon content of hot metal is much more strictly. Decreasing silicon content in hot metal is not only the development of blast furnace processing, but also the inevitable requirement of modern steelmaking processing. in this paper, origin and reduction of silicon in the blast furnace are analyzed，present state of low silicon in home and outside is generalized and the methods of low silicon smelting of BF is put forward.

Application and Development of Mathematical Simulation

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to meet the increasingly strict requirement for steel quality, mathematical simulation, as a new researching method, is becoming more and more important. But now, when used for studying the ladle injection system, these mathematical equations are based on a lot of assumption, which lead to some deviation from the exact results. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Institute of Recycling Economy, Beijing University of Technology, Beijing 100022, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en:
On Relationships Among Iron Resource Efficiency, Environment
Efficiency and Steel Scrap Index
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The three indices of steel manufacturing process are given, i.e. iron resource efficiency, iron environment efficiency and steel scrap index, to define the degree of saving nature iron resources, environmental condition and availability of steel scrap for steel manufacturing process respectively. Based on the conservation of mass, relationship among the iron resource efficiency, environment efficiency and steel scrap index was formulated. When steel scrap index is certain, the higher the iron environment efficiency of the steel manufacturing process, the higher will be its iron resource efficiency. And the maximum value of iron resource efficiency is determined too. Taking the data of a steel manufacturing process as example, analyzing the influence of steel scrap index in the steel manufacturing process on the relation curve between iron resource efficiency and iron environment efficiency. It is pointed out that steel scrap index of BFBOF process is not improved to some extent, and its iron resource efficiency and iron environment efficiency are not improved to some extent too. To improve the situation, it is necessary to develop EAF process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on actual production data and parameters, the smelting effects of 08Al steel in a 90 t topbottom combined blowing converter were studied. The results showed that CO reaction at smelting endpoint deviated away from the balance and the molten steel was peroxided severely. When the alkalinity of final slag were about 4.5, the partition coefficients of both sulfur and phosphorus between the slag and steel were maximum and desulphurization and dephosphorization effects were the best. Increasing TFe content of the slag benefited dephosphorization and was unfavorable to desulphurization and increasing remainder manganese of molten steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the low carbon design theory, industrial trials of offshore platform plate E40-Z35 were conducted on 4300mm heavy plate mill. It was suggested that E40-Z35 had weak toughness and CTOD because of coarse ferrite grain in the center. Grain growth could be suppressed through increasing cooling capacity and reducing finish cooling temperature. And then difference in thickness direction could be decreased. The results shows that low carbon offshore platform plate exhibits high impact toughness, good weldability and excellent anti-lamellar tearing performance.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The calcium and/or barium alloys deoxidation and nonmetallic inclusion controlling technology of molten steel are researched in a MoSi2 resistance furnace at 1〖KG-*9〗873 K. The results show that the mean length of nonmetallic inclusions are less than 8 μm for all experimental heats and Al2O3 inclusion can be found in all. For the heats using CaBa alloy deoxidation, the nonmetallic inclusion of bariumbearing isn’t found, the main nonmetallic inclusions are CaOAl2O3 compound inclusions and the total oxygen contents are higher than 50×10-6. While using AlMnCa deoxidation, the CaObearing nonmetallic inclusions are less, the total oxygen content is 37×10-6 and the amount of the nonmetallic inclusions longer than 20μm are 1.2 percent of total nonmetallic inclusions amounts.

Study and Application of GCr15 Secondary Cooling Based

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The thermal mechanical character of bearing steel GCr15 specimens was tested by Gleeble3500 thermal stress/strain testing machine. The original secondary cooling scheme was optimized and a new secondary cooling scheme, which is suitable for continuous casting metallurgical criterion of bearing steel GCr15, was drawn up. In this paper, a solidification and heat transfer model to describe the solidification process of continuous casting bloom was established, and the model was validated by pinshooting experiments. Based on the credible solidification model, a dynamic secondary cooling control method was developed. Production applications shows that the quality of continuous casting bloom has been improved by the characteristic casting speed control method.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Feasibility of Nb(C，N) as Inhibitors in Oriented Silicon Steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In niobium microalloyed high strength steels, niobium can increase the nonrecrystallization temperature so that controlled rolling and controlled cooling can be realized. Meantime, niobium precipitation strengthening is utilized to further improve the strength and toughness of the steels. In this paper, the feasibility of Nb(C，N) as inhibitors in oriented silicon steels was analyzed in consideration of the characteristics and requirements of inhibitors. Nb(C，N) can be used as promising inhibitors in oriented silicon steels due to its good features and superiority such as lower solubility temperature and smaller precipitate size, compared with conventional inhibitors.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：When the preheated pulverized coal is injected, its cooling effect on hot blast is alleviated and its combustion is accelerated, consequently its utilization ratio is increased. The effect of the preheated Lu′an pulverized coal on its combustion rate under different preheating temperatures is discussed and the aim is to research the rules of combustion rate. The results show that: the combustion rate and its increased extent are increased with the increasing of the preheating temperature. Simultaneity, one steelworks adopt the hot blast stove waste heat to preheat the pulverized coal and the preheating temperature can reach 150～200 ℃. When the preheated pulverized coal is injected, it can increase coal rate, decrease coke and fuel rate and bring distinct socioeconomic benefits.

Study on Direct Alloying of Nickel Oxide in Converter

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：On the basis of the condition of one local steelmaking plant, thermodynamics analysis for the possibility of making weathering steels by direct alloying with nickel oxide in the converter was conducted.The results showed that［C］，［Si］，［Mn］and［Fe］ can reduce NiO and making weathering steels by direct alloying with nickel oxide both in the hot metal and the converter are possible. At the end point of converter (T=1960 K, w（［C］） =004%), the reducing ability of ［C］ is stronger than ［Fe］ and the yield of nickel is more than 999%. And the relative kinetics experiment was carried out. The results of kinetics experiment showed that, under the condition of hot metal (w（［C］）=3%, T=1573 K) the rate of reducing nickel oxide is very fast, which can be basically completed in 15 min.

FCaO is the main component affecting the volume expansion ratio of BOF slag. In present study, different ratio of BF slags are added into smelting BOF slag. The microstructures of the slag product are analyzed with SEM method, meanwhile the stability of BOF slag before and after the reaction are measured and compared with steam test method. Results show that when adding BF slag into melting BOF slag,the stability of the slag can be increased obviously, and the cooling way affects the structure of the product but it has a little effect on the expansion ratio of slag.This method gives evidence for application of BOF slag.

Abstract：

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 保护渣高温特性对板坯表面裂纹影响的研究
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: 林晏民，  欧阳民，  廖美华，  姚铁梅
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: 广东省韶钢集团公司技术质量部，广东 韶关 512123
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn:
摘要 
以Q235B钢种为例，对保护渣高温特性对板坯表面裂纹影响进行了研究，发现铸钢的碳当量（∑C）、结晶器液态保护渣的粘度值（η）、拉坯速率平方（v2c）与板坯的表面裂纹之间有一定关系，即随着ηv2c /∑C值的增大，板坯出现表面裂纹的几率增大；如果η v2c /∑C值控制在3.1以下，则板坯一次合格率显著提高。另外，如果结晶器液态渣是长渣（指熔化区间△T≥70℃），而且是熔化速度比较快（指1 300 ℃下，v≤60秒），则出现表面裂纹的概率较大。

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 摘要 通过对攀钢高炉粉尘利用的分析研究，提出了采用含碳球团直接还原焙烧法处理高炉瓦斯泥的工艺。在本工艺条件下，得到了高质量还原矿和副产品氧化锌粉。实验研究表明，还原矿中全铁 （TFe）达52%～54%、金属铁(MFe)为51%～53%、金属化率(Mη)＞95%；氧化锌粉达到：w(ZnO)94%～96%、w(PbO)2%～5%、w(Fe2O3)微量。初步实现了高炉瓦斯泥的高效利用。

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：By analyzing and researching utilization of BF dust, a technology of dealing with the BF gas slime adopting the containing carbon pellet direct roasting reduction method was put forward. Under the experimental condition, the high quality deoxidized mineral and byproductzinc oxide powder was got. Laboratory research results indicate that total iron(TFe) in deoxidized mineral is 52%54%, the metal iron ( MFe) is 51%53%, metallization ratio(Mη) is more than 95%,and zinc oxide powderZnO is 94%~95% ,PbO is 2%~5%, Fe2O3 is little. The efficient utilization of BF gas slime is achieved.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Tech. Centre， Ma'anshan Iron & Steel Co.， Ltd.， Ma'anshan 243000， Anhui， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Trial Production of HRB400 Ribbed Bars by Nb-Microalloied and Controlled Cooling
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
HRB400 ribbed bars that had low cost advantage was developed by synthetic using technology of Nb-Microalloyied and controlled rolling, controlled cooling. Technologic thought, chemical composition design, produce route, smelting process, continuous cast process and rolling process were recommended in this paper. Φ12～25mm HRB400 ribbed bar could be mongline rolled , adding 0.008～0.028% Nb into it; Φ28～32mm HRB400 ribbed bar could be mongline rolled, Φ16～20mm HRB400 ribbed bar could be slit rolled, adding 0.021～0.036% Nb and 0.010～0.027% Ti into it, in the base of chemical composition of 20MnSi. Temperature of colling bed should be controlled in the range of 810-870℃ at the time of rolling. Microstructure of ribbed bar was F+P, or F+P+B(small). There was not self tempered structure on its surface.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the disadvantage of unable to modify the individual difference of plate of long and short term self learning of rolling force， dynamic modifying model of gap between passes is built. Aiming at the changing rule of parameter of deformation resistance, author brings up the two dimensional smooth exponential method， which uses the smooth exponential method to do the longitudinal smooth exponential with the parameter of plate basing on the rolling sequence, and at the same time, dispose with the deviation between the deformation resistance parameter of former passes of the rolling plate and the longitudinal smooth exponential parameters, so that insure the deformation resistance parameter of the behind passes, carrying out the dynamic correct. Application of the model in a certain plant of 3000 mm mill indicates that 90 percent of plate’s exit gauge deviation can be controlled in 0.15 mm，it has pretty high practical value.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on solidification process of carbon steel in continuous casting mold and considering the contact behavior between the strands and mold, a fully thermo-mechanical coupled 3D static thermoelasticplastic FEM model was established using ANSYS software. The thermo and mechanical states in continuous casting mold were obtained, including temperature and stress distributions of strands, gas gap formation, and temperature field in the mold. The results show that the outer shell is compressed, and the inner shell is stretched. The stress of the out and inner shell are 3.11 MPa and 2.79 MPa, repectively. The stress of solidification interface is about 3MPa belonging to range of ultimate strength, which maybe result in cracks. The taper mold favors heat transfer. In contrast with no taper mold, the 0.7%/m taper mold can decrease the gap about 42%.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of processing parameters such as coiling temperature and cooling rate on MA islands and mechanical performances of high strength weathering steel were studied by thermomechanical simulation experiments and industrial production. The results show that with other parameters remaining constant, the fraction and the size of MA islands decrease gradually with an increase in the coiling temperature; when the coiling temperature remains unchanged, the MA islands are distributed more dispersedly and the fraction of the MA islands increases slightly with an increase in the cooling rate; when coiled at between 600 ℃ and 610 ℃, the yield strength of the trialproduced strip reaches a peak value, whereas the elongation of strip increases with the increase in the coiling temperature.
