Analysis of Contact Angle and Curvature During Roller
Leveling Process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The principle of contact angle and curvature during the roller leveling process was investigated, as well as the effects of angle and some special points on curvature and the effects of curvature on the angle. The results show that the contact angle has an accumulating effect. Bigger the roller pitch of leveler is, smaller the accumulating effect of angle is. The methods of decreasing angles are increasing the curvature difference integral value and decreasing intermeshes. The angle increases with the increasing of curvature. The accumulating effect of curvature has a bad impact on the residual curvature. For some plates of the bigger accumulating effect, it is necessary to adopt the bigger tilting value. The cross point and contact point have a large influence on curvature results. The cross point value is fixed correspondingly. It increases gradually. The contact point value is proportional to the angle.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Optimization study on basicity and FeO content of sinter is carried in order to improve metallurgical property of sinter for Ansteel. Technical index of sintering with diferrent basicity and FeO content, low-temperature reducible disintegration, reducibility and softening-melting property of sinter are all investigated in this paper. The results of study show that the optimum basicity of sinter is 2.0~2.1, the optimum FeO content of sinter is 8.0~8.1% by according to all kinds of influence factor under the condition of Ansteel. The energy consumption of sintering is lowest, the strength and reducibility of sinter are best, the cohensive zone of blast furnace is thinnest and the smelting strengthen of blast furce can be increased if the conclusion of above study is adopted.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 两流非对称中间包流场准对称化的数学物理模拟
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHAO Yan, LEI Hong, CHEN Hai-geng, HE Ji-cheng,  SUN Zhong-qiang, XING Guo-cheng
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn:
摘要 
通过水模型实验和数值模拟，研究了不同湍流控制器下两流非对称中间包内流体流动特性。数值模拟结果表明：湍流控制器几何结构对两流非对称中间包流体流动特性有明显影响。圆形湍流控制器内流场涡心靠近底部，出口处流体流速垂直向上；中间包流场涡心靠近长水口，涡心高度与挡墙高度基本同高，中间包表面波动大，容易发生卷渣现象。不对称长方形湍流控制器底部为不对称波浪形，流场涡心靠近出口，流体以一定角度从湍流控制器出口流出；其右侧出口面积大于左侧，水口右侧流体流量大于左侧；由于增大了出口面积，出口处流体速度减小，中间包表面平稳。水模型结果表明采用不对称湍流控制器中间包两流之间的平均停留时间差比圆形湍流控制器中间包减少1/4，算术平均值增加5.3%，说明非对称湍流控制器增强了中间包去除夹杂物能力且能有效缩小两流之间流体流动的差异。
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Mathematical-Physical Simulation for Quasi-Symmetric Flow Field in a Two-Strand Asymmetric Tundish
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Water modeling and the numerical simulation were applied to study the fluid flow in a two-strand asymmetric tundish. Mathematical simulation results showed that the geometric structure of turbulence inhibitor is a key factor to affect the fluid flow in the tow-strand asymmetric tundish. In the case of the circular turbulence inhibitor, the vortex center of flow field is near the bottom of the turbulence inhibitor, and the fluid flows vertically at the exit the of the turbulence inhibitor. The vortex is near the shroud, and the vortex center has the same height as the dam, so there is greater surface vibration, and sometimes slag entrapment occurs. The bottom of asymmetric square turbulence inhibitor has the wave form, and the vortex center is near the exit of the turbulence inhibitor, and the fluid flow obliquely at the exit the of the turbulence inhibitor. Because the exit area at the right side of the turbulence inhibitor is greater than that at the left side, the fluid flow rate at the right side is greater than that at the left side. And the larger the exit area of the turbulence inhibitor, the less the exit velocity of the fluid, and the more stable the free surface of the tundish. Water modeling showed that the difference of the average residue time between two strands in the case of asymmetric turbulence inhibitor is only 3/4 in the case of circular turbulence inhibitor, and the arithmetic mean of the average residue time increase 5.3 percent. All these facts indicated the asymmetric turbulence inhibitor can get rid of the inclusions effectively and decrease the difference of fluid flow between two strands.

Study on Microstructures and Mechanical Properties of a Hot
Rolled High Manganese TRIP/TWIP Steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A hot rolled high manganese TRIP/TWIP steel was developed by TMCP technology. The effects of processing parameters of TMCP on microstructures and the relationship between the microstructure and mechanical were studied. The results show that this high manganese TRIP/TWIP steel could be produced by hot rolling. Meanwhile it exhibits high ultimate tensile strength (940 MPa) and elongation (40%) at strain rates of 10-3s-1. The influences of TMCP parameter, such as cooling rate and coiling temperature, are not very notable on mechanical properties of this high manganese steel. Its excellent mechanical properties are attributed to TRIP/TWIP effects. The high manganese steel shows ductile rupture after tensile test, then the cracks always initiate and expend along the grain boundary between austenite and martensite.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Technique and Estimation of Direct Reduced Iron Production Under the High Temperature Dust-removing of the Untreated Gas and Iron Ore Granule Bed
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
In the condition that, the melting point of soot is higher than the DRI reduced temperature of 200℃, the three step continuously dust removal technique is mainly use the DRI shaft furnace as the removable grain bed dust remover, it can directly product DRI to use the raw gas sensible heat. The Sensible heat of untreated coal gas to take up about 13% of the coal gasification heat, estimate this co-generation technology to produce the DRI could make the utilization efficiency of sensible heat up to 70%, compare with the existing technique of use the waste heat boiler of raw gas to generate electricity, the coal thermal efficiency will improve about 2 times, the DRI energy consumption is 303kg（C）/t.Fe, it achieve the DRI production zero emission, cut emission of CO2 about 1.7t/t.Fe. It could solve the problem of high temperature dust-removing of untreated gas and at the same time it would not reduce the chemical heat energy （H2+CO）in this co-production technique.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Material and metallurgy school， Inner Mongolia University of Science and Technology， Baotou 014010， Inner Mongolia， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research on Harmful Elements in the Dust Eliminated From   Blast Furnace Gas of Baogang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The granularity levels of blast furnace dust eliminated and environment ash were measured and particle size distribution was gained with laser particle size analyzer. By chemical analysis methods， the contents of Na2O, K2O and other non-ferrous metal oxide， Zn、As、Pb and Sn in gravity ash， whirlwind ash， bag ash and environment ash were analyzed. The distribution of harmful elements in dust eliminated and environment ash is researched. Results show that: the gravity ash granularity is the biggest in which harmful elements content is the least， taking up only 1.94%； the bag ash granularity is the smallest， in which harmful elements content takes up the most percentage， about 15.79%. Compared with all the ash eliminated， the environment ash granularity turns out to be the smallest， with harmful elements content being 1.02%， which shows that the smaller the granularity of blast furnace gas dust eliminated is， the more harmful elements it contains. Removal of the harmful elements in the bag ash is one of the important methods for disposal and recycling of the harmful elements.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The mechanical properties, microstructure, grain orientation and precipitates of the pipeline steel X100 with two different chemical compositions were investigated by means of metalloscope, SEM and TEM, etc. Experimental results showed that the X100 pipeline steel made from high niobium+ molybdenum chemical constitution design was prone to obtain balance between strength and ductility. The X100 pipeline steel developed through TMCP had optimal structure consisting of granular bainite, acicular ferrite and less lower bainite, and the ferrite grain size was 3μm approximately. In addition, nanometer precipitates and high-density dislocation in pipeline steel also hardened the parent material actively.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of the Raceway Boundary Using Fractal Theory
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The raceway boundary can be precisely defined based on fractal theory. A three-dimensional semicircular cold model was established and the particle motion information was also obtained by using high-speed photography method to track the trace particle motion. The particle velocity scalar field was obtained through processing the large amount of particle motion information, and finally the irregular degree of raceway boundary defined by isolines under different particle velocity was discussed. The results show that the fractal dimension which is close to Euclidean dimension 1 remains unchanged in the cavity zone. The fractal dimension with the dimension of 1.4 also remains unchanged in the stagnant zone. The fractal dimension increases gradually from cavity zone to stagnant zone. The velocity obtained under the fractal dimension of stagnant zone can be used as the criterion to define the raceway boundary, then the shape and size of raceway can be precisely obtained and the internal surface area of raceway can be calculated by using the law of additive codimensions. And then it can provide precisely boundary conditions for macro dynamic calculation of raceway and numerical simulation.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: The Practice of Reducing Energy Consumption of Production Processes of ShouGang JingTang Sinter
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The paper sets out actual design of ShouGang JingTang sinter plant, introduces the Specific measures of the JingTang Sinter plant’s energy detaily; a series of measures of decreasing solid fuel consumption、electricity consumption、gas consumption and water consumption such as adopting deep bed sinter、controlling the particle size of raw material、fuel and dolomite、stabilizing sintering process、promoting low temperature sintering process、intensifying sintering by calcium oxide、preventing air leakage、controlling ignition temperature, introducing recycle the heat of sintering at the same time. Since producing in May 2009，which walks up the right path step by step, sinter bed thickness is about 780mm, then the solid fuel consumption is lowered from 50.11kg/t since producing to 42.65 kg/t at current and the obvious economical benefit is obtained.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Analytical techniques such as metallographic examination、image handle instrument were applied to distinguish non-metallic the inclusions in 82B steel produced in Xuanhua steel works. Meanwhile the mechanical property of 82B wire rod was detected. The test results showed the greatest harm to steel comes from those large nondeformable alumina inclusion and the average extension rate of finished product was 8.1%. Some optimizing measures were carried out to controlling inclusions and improve rolling effect . The optimization test results showed break phenomenon caused by nondeformable inclusion was reduced, sorbite proportion was achieved to 85%～90% and average extension rate of was 11.6%.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The article describes the development history of the coilbox for the hot strip mill; It empasizes on the main equipment configuration and operating principle of the mandrel-less coilbox; The main technical features of coilbox are discussed with regard to less temperature drop at the head and tail of transfer bars,constant speed rolling,shorter distance between roughing mills and finishing mills,higher product yield and better product quality. According to the actual production achievement of some domestic 2250mm hot strip mill for stainless steel rolling, the mandrel-less coilbox is favorable in limit size rolling for the stainless steel, increasing rolling stability of thin strips and improving edge and surface qulity,etc.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Acid Sinter Production and BF Smelting Effect in Jigang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
In this paper, the measures of burden structure optimization were introduced at iron plant of Jinan Iron and Steel Group, according to market situation and internal production conditions, and the effect of sintering and BF smelting was evaluated. The redundant sintering capacity was effectively utilized, by producing acidic sinter. In practice, the acid sinter quality and the metallurgical properties could meet the need of iron production.Using the optimized burden structure, the total FE was decreased, and the slag volume was increased, whereas the economic and technical indexes of BF were improved, the average utilization coefficient increasing 0.095  t/(m·d), fuel ratio reducing 19 kg/t. The economic benefits were achieved, by means of the measures.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Process of waste heat recovery and utilizationf or sinter in vertical tank
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
he recovery and utilization of waste heat resources in sintering process is one of the effective ways to reduce the energy consumption of sintering process. Because there are many inadequacies such as air leakage, the grade and efficiency of waste heat recovery are low etc in the traditional cooling machine, which are difficult to overcome. Borrowing ideas from the structure and craft of dry quenching furnace in the CDQ(coke dry quenching) technology, the structure and craft of waste heat recovery and utilization for sinter in vertical tank are proposed, and the three key problems are clearly showed about the technology.the research shows：the recovery and utilization in vertical tank is a new way for high efficiency of recovery and utilization for sinter waste heat resources, the high efficiency of recovery for sinter waste heat resources is not only realized,but also the grade of heat-carrying agent that are hot air becomes higher, which is good for the follow-up utilization of waste heat. whether it is feasible it base on the three key problems such as the resistance character of layer, gas-solid heat transfer of layer and the influences of the cooling way for the sintering metallurgy performance. the three key problems need to be studied.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The causes of cavity defects on W600 hot-rolled intermediate billet produced in the one iron and steel company were analyzed by metallographic analysis from the band thickness and the size of the oxidized round spots, metallographic microstructure, the thickness of desilication band near the crack and the high-temperature mechanical property of the electral steel. The results comfirm that the cavity defects of the intermediate billet of the electral steel result from the microcrack which are rooted in all sorts of stress in the slab, the microcrack is oxidized further by the heating process and enlarged further by the rough rolling process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The electric power is an important energy in iron and steel enterprise. In this paper， the iron and steel en- terprise's power source and production are analysed in detail on the background of national power policy. For exam- ple of an integrated iron and steel enterprise，“purchase of coal only but electricity” are discussed. The measure of peak-load shifting for iron and steel enterprise power is proposed， which can save the electricity cost and reduce the production cost of enterprise.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Technical Analysis of Clean Energy Metallurgy
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Development of metallurgy technology is extremely dependent on energy technology，clean energy metallurgy will promote metallurgy technology comprehensive、profound changes, in the future, there will be a type of Ultra-short process clean energy Steel Plant, whose major process is clean energy-induction furnace- Casting. Clean energy can provide not only enough energy used for metallurgy, but also electron to produce hydrogen and electrolysis. Metallurgy energy must satisfy new conditions: the first point is immense consumption both power and total energy; the second point is continuously stable energy supply, so generate electricity、energy storage and energy supply of clean energy are important technical questions which should be researched and exploited.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Automobile gear steel is mainly estimated by its cleanliness， hardenability and grain size. The total oxygen （T［O］） content is the main index for measuring the cleanliness of the steel. In Fushun Special Steel Company of Dongbei Special Group， high-level automobile gear steels with carbon content less than 0.25% and T［O］ content less than 15×10 -6 were produced by adjusting the deoxidation system， employing the reasonable slag system and manufacture process of EAF with ultra-high-power+LF+VD+CC， whose non-metallic inclusion totally met the re- quirement of the specification for a foreign user.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research on Pulverized Coal Combustion in Blowpipe With Double Coal Lances
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The combustion of pulverized coal in blast furnace blowpipes is carried out within a limited space，and is restricted．In order to promote the combustion of pulverized coal in the blowpipe，a two-dimensional model is used to study the effects of coal properties and blast conditions on coal burnout in blast furnace blowpipe．The results confirm that notable improvements in final burnout can be achieved for coal with smaller particles size．Higher volatile matter and higher oxygen enrichment can also improve the final burnout．High blast temperature can increase coal burnout，but the further increase in blast temperature over 1200℃ has little effect on final burnout．In addition，the volatile，temperature and gas composition distribution are also compared，in order to better understand the impact of the operating conditions of the combustion of pulverized coal．

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 高炉设计的新体系
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: XIANG Zhong-yong, OUYANG Biao, ZOU Zhong-ping
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: CISDI Engineering Co., Ltd.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: A New Design System of Blast Furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
With development of oxygen enrichment and PCI technology, it will not render an applicable methodology to design blast furnace on basis of its hearth combustion intensity and volume combustion intensity. To that end, China’s blast furnace design needs to be systemized for its own in responding to the time. Furnace design has to satisfy its intensified production whenever required. The present thesis takes advantage of modern gas kinetics to analyze, in a scientific way, the factor in furnace intensified smelting process, that is, bosh gas index. It is to provide a guideline for blast furnace design in interest of establishing a new furnace design system.

1. 马鞍山钢铁股份有限公司第一钢轧总厂

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn:
摘要 
本文针对马钢CSP轧机的工作辊不均匀磨损严重影响出口板形质量的问题，对CSP轧机F3~F4不均匀磨损严重进行了分析，指出了使用高速钢轧辊的必要性。对高速钢轧辊的使用情况进行了大量的试验研究，并通过现场实际数据分析了高速钢轧辊情况下轧制力、轧辊温度、氧化膜情况，在大量现场试验的基础上制定了马钢CSP高速钢轧辊的使用工艺，并实现了工艺条件的长期稳定使用，通过现场实绩表明，使用高速港轧辊大大改善了机组的不均匀磨损，提高了机组的板形质量。

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Residual Manganese Content in Molten Steel of End-Point of BOF and Its Influencing Factors
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Through the statistical analysis to the production data of end-point of BOF and the contents of molten iron, the factors affected end-point residual content of manganese of BOF and its law have been researched, which has illustrated that the end point carbon content of BOF and initial silicon content of molten iron are the key factors for end-point residual content of manganese and its yield rate. It’s disadvantageous for raising the basicity and FeO content of end slag of BOF to end-point residual content of manganese and its yield rate. Raising the manganese content of molten iron could increase the residual manganese content at end-point of BOF, but decrease its yield rate. The end temperature of molten steel in BOF is unessential to the yield rate of manganese in the condition of high catch carbon operation.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The energy consumption of ironmaking system accounts for more than 60% for that of an integrated steel plant. One of the most effective ways to solve these problems is to improve the energy efficiency of the ironmaking system. From the view of material flow and energy flow, the resources and energy consumption status of ironmking system are analyzed in this paper. And then, the CO emissions caused by carbon energy of Tangshan steel is calculated.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: The Cracking Analysis on atmospheric corrosion resistant Steel B480
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The cracking reason of atmospheric corrosion resistant steel B480 was investigated by using macroscopic observation、metallographic technology、energy spectrum analysis and EBSD technology. The results show that in the middle of the thickness of the steel there exists some ferrite streaky structure, which has orientations of <111>, <001>//ND.The segregation of element P was found in these ferrite streaky structure and its percentage composition was quite above the normal level.The rising hardness and the brittleness of the ferrite streaky structure were caused by the reasons mentioned above eventually let cracking event happen because of the deforming inharmony.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the fundamental of auto gauge control, combined with the characteristics of reversible single stand cold rolling mill, the project of gauge control system is brought forward. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083 China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en:
Influence of Asymmetric Flow to the FluxSteel Interface
in Mold for Continuous Slab Casting
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The control of fluxsteel interface in the mold is an important process in the continuous slab casting operating. In order to investigate the flow dynamic behavior of the fluxsteel interface, an airfluxsteel three phase model was established. Using reynoldsstress model and Inhomogeneous mixing model, the flow field of the three phases in the mold have been simulated, the shape and position of fluxsteel interface were ascertained by volume fraction method. Asymmetric flow field will emerge when the SEN is not posited in the centre of mold, through investigation, it is found that the fluxsteel interface fluctuation is much higher in asymmetric flow field than in symmetric flow field of the same operating parameters, and biased flow or even vortex phenomenon will happen in asymmetric flow field, which will do serious harm to mold operating.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Hydrogen metallurgy is one of the effective methods to reduce CO2 emissions in iron and steel industry. Now large-scale hydrogen production was still depended on fossil fuels, therefore, the total CO emissions is not obvious reduced even if hydrogen metallurgy is used in iron and steel industry. It can provide a source of hydrogen for hydrogen metallurgy and can reduce the CO emission that hydrogen may be produced gas in iron and steel enterprises or "Gas Hydrate" by water gas shift. In the paper, the hydrogen metallurgical idea under low temperature was proposed, the key technology was studied. Carbon - hydrogen smelting reduction process was also researched. The theoretical foundation will be established for hydrogen metallurgical technology development.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en:
Numerical Analysis on Blast Furnace Operation With
Reducing Gases Injection
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Fully exploit byproduct gas in the steelworks plays a great role on reducing energy consumption and environmental load of steel industry. A new process was put forth: injection of cold blast furnace top gas, basic oxygen furnace gas and coke oven gas into blast furnace tuyeres. This process is numerically simulated by multifluid model under constant raceway temperature, both gas flow rate and hot metal temperature on slag surface. Model simulations revealed that: in comparison to conventional operation, with the injection of BF, BOF and coke oven gases, the temperature level tends to decrease in the shaft, infurnace CO and/or H2 concentration are evidently enhanced, and the reduction of ironbearing burden is accelerated. Furthermore, the productivity increases while heat efficiency improves under injection of three kinds of reducing gases. The effects of coke oven gas injection are much more remarkable, and less CO2 emission for blast furnace unit is available. If the relevant technologies including commercially manufacturing of process oxygen are feasible, the innovative process of reducing gas injection will possess broad potential for the practical application.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Aimming at the problem of -50℃ impact toughness of Q345EL H-beam fluctuating in wider range and some heats on the low side，by constituting accurate deoxidization system、adding pre-melting synthetic slag during tapping、low temperature control during BOF steelmaking process and the "three constant" steady-state casting such measures in steelmaking process and in the rolling process, by adjusting pass temperature and cooling method such parameters,the low temperature impact toughness has been increased effectively.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The application experiments were done to research the strand quality for high carbon steel 65Mn in EMS (electromagnetic stirring). The results showed that the effect for EMS rolls in side-side installation way is better than that in face-face installation way. The effect for EMS was increased with the increasing of current, and the continuous stirring was better than alternative stirring. The strand inner quality is improved obviously by using EMS. The equiaxed zone ratio for 65Mn could be increased 32%, and the center segregation grade was decreased to C1.0 from B0.5.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
For better prediction of coke behavior in blast furnace,a great many of coke varieties were detected and their relevant data analyzed. The results shuow that the coke reactivity and its strength after reaction have negative relativity. The cold strength of coke and its thermal property was compared. It is suggested that coking enterprise should pay more attention on the thermal property of coke on condition that the coke strength is qualified. According to determination of reactivity and post-reaction strength of cok , the Influence factors H2O content, method of coke quenching, and material’s struture to the properties of Hard Cok is studied in this paper. The result showed that, H2O content of coke maintaining low level can inprove the Metallurgical properties; Dry quenching of coke can noteblely improve the property; Material’s struture and property can ultimately influence the property of coke.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The bonding process is an important nature of bituminous coal, the actual production of coal in a weak adhesive bond index G value greatly influenced by storage period, as the storage period of growth, a weak adhesive bond index G value of coal is decreasing. So stick to the weak coal procurement should be some restrictions: the amount should be based on timely procurement in accordance with procurement plans to ensure that the weak should not be too sticky coal storage period generally not exceeding 15 days usage. In coking coal blending, the blending program by optimizing, with a weak stick into the appropriate not only to reduce the coke of coal ash, sulfur, to ensure the quality of coke, the coke can to reduce costs. Now stuck on weak coal caking index G value decreased to conduct a preliminary study.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn:
摘要 
σ相是一种富Cr、Mo的金属间化合物，它的存在会使钢的强度提高，塑韧性降低，恶化耐蚀性能。主要从成分、组织、性能等方面对S31803、S32750双相不锈钢σ相的析出行为进行研究。结果表明：Cr、Mo增加了σ相析出的敏感性，而且随时效时间的延长，σ相析出的数量不断增加；而且σ相的析出对材料的塑性、耐蚀性都造成不利影响。

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The trend that thin gauge hot rolled strips replace cold rolled strips is expanding gradually, more and more ultra-thin gauge hot rolled strips have been applied in diffirent sub-industry,although these are hard to produce. The following issues have been solved,such as slab centring,wedge deviation,camber,resistance of deformation improved by narrow range of chemistry and temperature control,slab profile check out,and slab temp. homogenization and optimization of process and equipment on CSP line in Zhujiang Steel;The pitting on strip surface has been controlled by means of rational ambience and working ststus of roller inner furnace,cooling adjustment of work rolls and logistic rolling scheme.A patent on rolling mill operating method was applied for reducing cobble and crimping accident and waves defect;The technology package including new pattern, material and convexity of work roll in F6 has been researched and used to solve the problem of cobble accident,collapse and centre waves during ultra-thin gauge check plate production.The above research results have been applied successfully to high ratio of ultra-thin gauge hot rolled strips production at Zhujiang Steel, the proportion of plain steel strips of h＝1.0mm～1.35mm is more than thirty percent, the proportion of check plate of h＝1.0mm～2.0mm is more than seventy percent, including h＝1.0mm～1.8mm check plate of twenty-eight percent.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of Cooling Plate to Recovering Cooling Capacity of Copper Stave
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The temperature of copper stave rises rapidly when the cooling pipes are broken and damaged pipes make the stave damaged quickly. The measure which is always adopted is applying cooling column to recover cooling capacity of stave. The mode of cooling column is point cooling. The cooling area is small and it’s difficult to form the slag skull. However this is easy for cooling plate to form smooth operating profile instead of the broken stave and it’s benefit for stability of blast furnace. The model of cooling plates by the chessboard type is established and the centre temperature of shell furnace, stave hot face and cold face are analyzed from different distances, sizes and water velocities of cooling plate. It turns out that when gas temperature is 1500℃，cooling centre temperature increases about 230℃ while the interval is changed from 200mm to 600mm and cooling centre temperature reduces about 50℃ when water velocity increases 1m/s to 3m/s.The cooling plate is compared with cooling column and it is found that the cooling capacity of plate is better.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analitical Research of Self-Generating Electricity and Outsourcing Electricity by Using the Binary Search Algorithm in an Iron and Steel Enterprise
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Electricity is an important energy in the production process of iron and steel factory, which plays a decisive role in the flow of operation. Electricity mainly comes from two origins, one is self-generating electricity of the enterprise, and the other one is outsourcing electricity. How to reasonably allocate the ratio between them is particularly important. Carrying out scientific and rational power production and analysis is a very important task for production scheduling and reducing economic costs. The power of iron and steel complex was analysed using binary search algorithm, and its principle was expounded. Through the illustration of the application of an example, it shows that the outsourcing electricity accounting for 29.5% is the most cost-optimal condition, which coincides with the actual situation.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Differentiation Analysis for Weld Wire Rod’s Chemical Composition Deviation
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：By way of a test plan which was drew up in advance, it makes the wire rod’s chemical composition as the only basic contrast role, and compares the test deviations of C, Si and Mn compositions between the wire rod and its steel billet, the wire rod and its tundish steel liquid, taking all kinds of random factors into consideration. The normal distribution theory has been introduced into the analyzing process. The composition deviation has been analyzed in detail, and the range of deviation between the two kins of tests has been induced. Based on the statistics results, rules of the subtle composition deviation between the tundish liquid and steel billet have also been induced, providing the reference basis for the accurate control of composition of wire rod.

摘要 
本文简要介绍了工艺润滑的机理，详细描述了工艺润滑在梅钢热连轧精轧前后段轧机上的应用及控制情况，尤其是边部润滑的成功使用。说明了在热轧过程中使用工艺润滑可带来的实际效果，不仅节能降耗，而且能提高带钢表面质量与深冲性能，最后还提出了润滑轧制在使用过程中应注意的问题，从而提高和稳定润滑效果。

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and Development of New Steelmaking Technology in Top-Bottom-Side Blown Converter
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
A side blowing tuyere was applied through the bath side wall in a top and bottom blown converter to form a top-bottom-side(TBS) blown converter. The bath mixing behavior was investigated with physical modeling experiments in laboratory. The metallurgical results in the TBS converter were compared with those in a top and bottom blown converter through industrial experiment. It is shown from the laboratory experiments that the stirring ability in converter bath can be markedly enhanced and the bath mixing time be reduced greatly with top-bottom-side blowing technique. There is a critical side blowing gas flowrate. The bath mixing time hardly changes any more when the side gas flowrate is greater than the critical value. It is found from the results in industrial experiments that consumption of hot metal and scrap can be reduced and lime consumption of a ton of molten steel can be decreased by about 3kg in the TBS blown converter. It can enhance dephosphorization capability and lower oxidization of slag and liquid steel. The average [%C]×[%O] at tap is 0.0025 in the TBS converter, which increases the yielding rate of alloy elements.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
A method used in measuring ultralow carbon in steel was studied, by CS-444LS analyser made by LECO company. Parameters affecting the measurement of ultralow carbon in steel were investigated,such as crucibles, comparison level, the most short analysis time, the amount of fluxing medium, the amount of sample, etc. The experimental results showed that the determination of the results is accurate and reliable, RSD is less than 10%,to meet production requirements fully, under the optimum conditions when the crucibles are burned for two hours at 1200℃ in the presence of oxygen or four hours at 1200℃ absence of oxygen, the comparison level was 3, the best analysis time was 40 second, the amount of fluxing medium was about 1.8g , the amount of sample was 0.6g～1.0g.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The endpoint of surplus manganese content controls the oxidizability of steel and slag when smelting low carbon steel in the converter. The industrial test of improving the endpoint surplus manganese of the converter was studied. The result show that in case of the low manganese content hot metal, putting in slag materials with manganese 5 munities before the end of smelting, the endpoint surplus manganese content can be higher than 0.20%; when the endpoint surplus manganese content improve 0.01%, the w［O］ in the steel can be decreased 0.0006%-0.0008%;The w［FeO］ decreased 5%-7% in the slag when the end point surplus manganese content improved from 0.06% to 0.25%.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the qualitative research to the microstructure and mechanical tissue properties of hot-rolled raw edge, its impact on the rolling edge crack and the trimming quality in the process of cold rolling were described. For the organization that has uneven or mixed crystal grain size, the mechanical properties have a significant difference between transverse and longitudinal, which leads to strip edge crack caused by uneven metal flow in the transverse and longitudinal direction in the rolling process, and can lead to strip broken accident when serious. A new idea for analyzing the quality of cutting edge and the reason of strip broken in the cold rolling process are pointed out.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Experiment on sintering behavior of a Ti-bearing iron sand
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The sintering behavior of Ti-bearing iron sand was investigated by pot grate test, sinter metallurgical property test and morphology analysis. As a result, with proportion of the Ti-bearing iron sand increasing, the sinter productivity and tumbling index decreased; the low temperature reduction degradation index (RDI) deteriorated dramatically while the melting performance was improved with regard to the metallurgical performance of sinter. According to the morphology analysis, one of the main reasons for the deterioration of sinter performance was the decreased superheat of the sinter liquid phase caused by the Ti-bearing ore, which promoted the generation of glass phase and retarded crystallization and precipitation of the SFCA phase. In conclusion, the proportion of the Ti-bearing iron sand in sinter mixer is suggested to be limited within 5%. In order to improve the RDI of iron ore sinter, CaCl2 spraying is also recommended.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Improvement practice for the line scales on surface of 304 stainless steel 2B plate
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：To find out the reason for line- scales defects occurring on the surface of 304 stainless steel 2B plate, the microscopic morphology and the compositions of the defects were investigated using scanning electron microscope (SEM), and inclusions analysis was made among the continuous- casting slabs and hot- rolled plate produced in the same period. The results show that line- scales on the 2B plate surface were caused by the CaO- SiO2- MgO inclusions in the steel. The level of inclusion in steel was improved effectively by controlling steelmaking process in the industry. Furthermore, the line- scales defects in the 2B plate surface were reduced significantly．After the improvement, most of the inclusions size at the edge and the center of 304 slabs are between 5- 10μm; the grade of CaO- SiO2- A12O3 ciliate inclusion and the A12O3- MgO- CaO globular oxide inclusion are all 0.5 and the occurrence rate of the defects 1.35％ lower than before.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The formation and hazard of the carbide band structure for bearing steel were introduced. In order to get the minimal level of bearing steel banded structure, the effects of the bearing steel products annealing procedure on the level of bearing steel banded structure was researched. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Effect of the basic characteristics of mixed ores on RDI of vanadium-titanium sinter was investigated. The results show that the RDI+3.15 of vanadium-titanium sinter decreased with the increasing of the assimilation temperature of mixed ore; it rose at first and then decreased with the increasing of the liquid phase fluidity index of mixed ores; it rose with the increasing of the binding phase strength of mixed ores. It also analyzes the RDI+3.15of vanadium-titanium sinter and basic characteristics of mixed ores by multiple linear regression analysis using SPSS software, and concludes that the multiple correlation coefficient R was 0.861,and the determination coefficient R2 was 0.742.The relevance was high.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
1. The Department of Technology and Quality, Anshan Iron and Steel Group Corporation, Anshan 114021, Liaoning, China; 
2. Technology Centre, Angang Steel Co., Ltd., Anshan 114001, Liaoning, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Experimental Study on Sintering With Addition of Brazilian Southern Fine Ore in Ansteel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
With the supply of locally produced iron ore concentrate decreasing year by year, it is inevitable to expand the amount of imports ore for Ansteel. In this paper, according to the raw materials condition of sintering plant of iron making plant and Western District of Ansteel，the sintering cup tests with addition of southern Brazil powder ore were done in the laboratory. The results are as follows. With the addition of Brazilian ore fines more than 20%, the drum strength of sinter decreased significantly. As the ratio of southern Brazil powder increasing, vertical sintering velocity elevates, vertical sintering velocity improves and fuel consumption increases. Under the same ratio condition, the drum strength of sinter of C ore proportioning is higher than A and B ore proportioning, but vertical sintering velocity is slower, vertical sintering velocity is lower and fuel consumption increases. With the addition of Brazilian ore fines more than 20%, the RDI tends to worse. Under the same ratio condition, the RDI of the sinter of C ore proportioning is optimal. For this theory, when the ratio of southern Brazil powder is less than 20%, the good sintering indexes can be obtained. The B ore matching scheme should be avoided.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
With development of continuous annealing unit R2 level tinplate with high roughness as base, referenced to strip overall sampling and offline measure surface three-dimensional during production, rule of strip surface roughness during double-stand skin pass and rolling operation by using industrial method was researched. Then stepwise regression process was employed to set up prediction model about double-stand skim pass and operational rolling to study strip surface roughness; based on the experimental result of strip surface roughness changes and prediction model drafted, processing strategies, assumed models and technical parameters of continuous annealing during R2 level surface tinplate were set up, which could be formed R2 level surface tinplate roughness control technique. Being used this technique to real production, R2 level surface tinplate was firstly successful developed at home with improved tinplate roughness control accuracy of E level surface, which elementarily eliminates aberration of surface print pattern covered with tin roller and metal deficiency. Huge social and economic interests are created.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The steel-making system is a discrete and continuous process, which includes many types of equipment and is affected by many factors. The key factors to cast in a constant speed are steel temperature, transportation of the steel in converter steelmaking, secondary refining and continuous casting process. The constant casting speed technology is required for good condition equipment, scientific production process and optimized production routine. With the development and application of constant casting speed technology in Qian’an steel company, the constant casting speed ratio is already stable at 97% by optimizing the production process, strengthening the process controlling ability and scientific, stable, efficiency production organization. Research on adding a percentage of dedusting ash to the coal powder in blast furnace shows ash content increase rapidly , Vdaf and fixed carbon content decrease slightly when adding more dedusting ash; melting point of coal powder rise and calorific capacity of coal powder decrease sharply; burning rate of coal powder speed up obviously; Fe in the dedusting ash can recover smoothly, which can recover and utilize dedusting ash effectively, open up a new way on energy saving and emission reduction in blast furnace.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Since a large number of electrical steel were produced by UCM mills in Si-Steel Plant of Masteel, working roll wear was very high and the working rolls replaced frequently, so that the productive organization and products were serious affected. Through long real-time tracking and amount of statistical data analysis, the influential factors of working roll wear were found and the corresponding improvement strategies were put forward. Based on these studies, industrial tests and adjustment programs were conducted. The results showed that: the working roll wear and the number of replaced roll were reduced. Finally it was successful to solve the problem of high roll consumption and to ensure the industrial production smoothly.

Purification Technology of Waste Industrial Gases Containing
NOx and Its Application in Treatment of Waste Gases From
Stainless Steel Pickling Line
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The fundamentals and applications of wet absorption reduction purification technology and selective catalytic reduction (SCR) system which are used for the treatment of industrial waste gases containing NOx were introduced and these two kinds of purification technologies were compared. It was shown that SCR system is properly used for the treatment of continuously emitting and high concentration industrial waste gases containing NOx,but wet absorption reduction purification technology is more suitable for purifying intermittently emitting and lower concentration industrial waste gases containing NOx，especiallyfor industrial waste gases containing other poisonous gases besides NOx. It was suggested that wet absorption reduction purification technology shall properly be used for the treatment of waste gases from stainless steel picking line.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The relationship between parameters of nozzle, blowing condition and penetration depth of bath caused by oxygen was studied. Calculation formula of effect of nozzle angle was summarized. When the oxygen jet is not intersection of intersection rarely, penetration depth of nozzle with many holes can be calculated according to the single-hole nozzle. The penetration depth will increase if the oxygen jet is intersected. The nozzle with interlaced holes is suitable for large converter with high oxygen blowing intensity.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the surface hairline crack defects often occurred in the production of the hot rolling plate BG490CL and galvanized steel sheet St02Z in Benxi Iron and Steel (Group) Co., Ltd. The metallographic structure, high scanning, variation of the inclusions and metallurgical quality were comprehensively detected and analyzed by using the physical equipment such as microscope and SEM and observing the macro characteristics and the microstructure of defects from different angles in detail. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Optimization of the shaking ladle process is a key point of smelting medium and low carbon ferromanganese and ferrochrome. A new method for the production of ferroalloy with the long-and-short leg RH refining furnace is proposed based on the basic principle of RH refining furnace for steelmaking. The basic principle of the RH refining furnace for steelmaking is introduced and the method and feasibility of the long-and-short leg RH refining furnace for mixing slag and metal liquid phase are analyzed. Analysis shows that the long-and-short leg RH refining furnace can not only be used to complete the high efficient mixture and rapid separation，but also be used for the production of clean and pure ferroalloy due to the refining function of the RH refining furnace. Solving the problem of working life of the refractory material is the key problem in the practical application of the long-and-short leg RH refining furnace.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
No.7 blast furnace(3200 m3) in Lianyuan Iron&Steel Group Co.Ltd is the first great scale blast furnace that fully uses tamping coke in our country. In this paper, the outline of the tamping coke oven matching with No.7 blast furnace(3200 m3) in Lianyuan Iron&Steel Group Co., Ltd, the main construction of assorted coal, the quality indexes of the coke,etc,are introduced. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Sintering Characteristics of Brazil and Australian Iron Ore
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The basic sintering characteristics of typical import iron ore used in HBIS Group were determined by mini-sintering method, the relationship between them and sinter quality was analyzed. The results reveal: the Brazilian iron ores have low assimilation and high self-intensity of binding phase, while Australian iron ores have high assimilation and low self-intensity of binding phase. For importing hematite, the liquid phase fluidity increases as its SiO2 content increases and Al2O3 content decreases. The iron ore with high SiO content is easy to produce SFCA. The iron ore has high self-intensity of binding phase, its sinter has high tumbler index. The suitable producing ability of SFCA will lead to high sintering yield; The iron ore has high assimilation, its sinter has high reducibility.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Numerical Simulation of Internal Flow Field and Separation Efficiency of the BF Gas Gravity Duster
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Two technical measures were adopted to increase dust-catching rate of the Blast Furnace (BF) gas gravity duster, installing funnel-type baffle and changing intake manifold from central tube to cone collector with roof intaking in the BF Gas Gravity Duster. The gas flow field and particle trajectory in gravity duster were 3 dimension numeric simulated by using software FLUENT. Similar to dust collector cyclone, simulation results show that it can also produce swirling in gravity duster after changing gas-injecting method; the forming of the gas flow dead-zone avoids emergence of second fugitive dust after setting the baffles, the collisions between dust containing gas and the baffle were the main factor to cause particle segregation. The solid particle trajectory is so complex and stochastic. The calculated separation efficiency was also well fitted the reported experimental data.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Thermal Predictions of Heat Exchanged Two-Step Coke Oven
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Upon the requirement to solve the problems of high energy-consuming and severe pollution in the coking industry， a recuperative two-zone coke oven and its related coking process were proposed in this paper. The regener- ator in traditional regenerative coke oven was to be replaced by recuperator， and a drying and preheating chamber was to be introduced as the upper part of the oven. The preheated-coal coking、efficient cascade utilization of waste gas heat and optimal allocation of energy resources were to be expected. By mass balance and heat balance calcula- tion， energy consumption of recuperative two-zone coke oven was analyzed and compared with traditional coke oven. It was predicted that the new coke oven would be of high productivity， energy saving and environmental protection. It explored a new way for the development of coking industry.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Investigations on CAD/CAE Integration Method for Steel Rolling Heating Furnace Based on Parametric Design Technology
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Based on three sections walking beam furnace, parametric design technology in Visual Basic development environment is used; 3D CAD software Solid Edge and CAE software Fluent is integrated; scheme language is configured for temperature field simulation in furnace. This method is realized by linking dimensions of assembly structure to build closed furnace model; STEP standard model is used as data transfer file between CAD system and CAE system; automatic meshing process is realized by batched file in Dos environment for similar furnace type; the furnace design-analysis platform is built; the objective of improving the efficiency of design-analysis is achieved.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application of Pulse Combustion Technique in Walking-Beam Furnace at TISCO
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Based on 1549 mm strip plant of taiyuan iron four slab reheating furnace with the characteristics of the pulse combustion technology, designed a digital combustion control system based on fuzzy PID control theory. By controlling the switching time of each burner, achieve control of the fuel and air feed rate to control the purpose of the furnace temperature. The fuzzy logic controller based on PID controller, the control action by conventional PID is implemented. Fuzzy control program block, according to the variation of input variables on system observation, expert experience and operation method, on the basis of fuzzy reasoning to make a decision, after setting the PID parameter online Kp and Ki. After the control system was put into operation, has a good dynamic performance, control temperature fluctuation is small, the advantages of saving fuel, has obtained the good use effect.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHOU Han-mei， BAO Yan-ping， LIN Lu
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
1. State Key Laboratory of Advanced Metallurgy， University of Science and Technology   Beijing， Beijing 100083， China;

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of P2O5 on Rich Phosphorus Phase of CaO-SiO2-FetO-P2O5
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
CaO-SiO2-FetO-P2O5 slag was set as the study object in this paper, and the effect that the content of P2O5 has on mineralogical morphology and phosphorus occurrence form were studied by combing theoretical calculation and the experiment. By using equilib section in Factsage software to calculate the polyphase equilibrium of CaO-SiO2-FetO-P2O5 slag from 400-1800℃ and analyzing the experimental results by the method of SEM+EDS and XRD, it can be known that the content of Ca3(PO4)2 in the rich phosphorus phase increases as the content of PO in the slag increases. The general existence form of P in the rich phosphorus phase of steel slag is CS-CP, but when the PO content in the slag is more than 18%, phosphorous in the rich phosphorus phase will exist as Ca(PO) without combing with 2CaO·SiO. The analyzing results of the experiment verified the theoretical calculation results of Factsage further.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 周寒梅， 包燕平， 林路. P2O5对CaO-SiO2-FetO-P2O5渣中富磷相的影响[J]. 中国冶金, 2013, 23(1): 45-49. ZHOU Han-mei， BAO Yan-ping， LIN Lu. Effect of PO on Rich Phosphorus Phase of CaO-SiO-FeO-PO. China Metallurgy, 2013, 23(1): 45-49.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Current Status and Prospectus of Ultra-High Strength Pipeline Steel Development
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
In order to improve the economic efficiency of oil and gas transportion, pipeline steels are developing to ultra-high strength level. The development and performance of ultra-high strength pipeline steels are reviewed and discussed on the view point of chemical composition design, strengthening mechanism, toughness improvement, and production technology. Regarding the combination of high strength and good toughness in conjunction with excellant weldability, the technology difficulties on the development of ultra-high strength steels are discussed. The trend on the production technology and special welding process are outlined.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LI Yong- hua,SHAO Yuan- jing,HE Li- hong

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Annealing process mechanism of hot- rolled austenitic stainless steel strip
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The annealing process mechanism of the hot- rolled austenitic stainless steel strip was analysed in detail. The results show that in order to prevent carbide, σ phase from precipitating and δ- ferrite from being broken, the strip must be heated rapidly between 500- 870℃ in annealing process, at the heating speed from 10- 31℃/s. Then the temperature would remain above 1020℃ for more than 11s. In this process, the strip was recrystallized and became fully soft, the carbide and σ phase also dissolved fully, and the content of δ- ferrite reduced to minimum. After that, the strip was cooled rapidly between 870- 500℃, and the cooling rate was from 38- 100℃/s. This cooling process could effectively prevent the dissolved carbides and σ phase from precipitating again.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The temperature is around 1400℃ in the test; the hydrogen reduction rate constant is calculated under the 0.93～1.03 g（Fe）/（cm·min）. Comparing with the solid carbon， the reduction rate of hydrogen is much faster. To avoid excessive foaming slag， raw materials should be pre-reduced ore. Bottom-blowing hydrogen through smelting reduction pilot is researched for understanding the bottom-blowing case， the safety of hydrogen and process operating parameters are useful for future large-scale process-oriented experiments and the theoretical calculations provide the basis of experience. This article focuses on the exploration of hydrogen metallurgy experiments， kinetic analysis of test results.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Process Tracking of Fast Pacing Rolling of 620mm Hot Strip Mill
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Whole process tracking to hot strip rolling is of great significance to the stability of the hot strip rolling process. Combined the onsite equipment and instrument configuration of GuoFeng 620 mm hot strip line, aiming at the characteristic of narrow strip and fast pacing, the present paper divides the whole line into several logical partitions and proposes the Multiqueue concept in one logical partition, and puts forward a new method of whole process tracking to hot strip rolling. Combined the strip baked system and process automation model setup system, the whole process tracking to hot strip rolling is realized and applied successfully in 620 mm hot strip line. The application result shows that the method this paper proposed ensures the accuracy of the data transfer and can improve the rolling pacing and thereby increased the production efficiency effectively, so it has a good practical application value.

Baosteel ironmaking always strives to become optimization of ironmaking as a goal, and in the context of external conditions deterioration, always focus on the basic principles of stable and smooth running of blast furnace. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: 1. University of Science and Techonolgy Beijing， Beijing 100083， China; 2. Shougang Research Institute of Technology， Shougang Group， Beijing 100043， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis and Prevention of Failure Behaviors of Hot Rolling Work Rolls
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Through systematical summaries on the work roll failures occurred in 2 250 mm hot strip mill of Shougang Qian'an Iron and Steel Company， the roll material defects generated during the manufacturing processes and the contact pressure concentration between rolls are the main reasons. According to the analytical results， preventing measures are given and applied. Higher requirements on roll material was put up forward to avoid the manufacture defects such as excessive retained austenite in work layer， bad spheroidization of graphite in roll core， Cr permeating in binder layer and the core and so on. Roll spalling and breaking failures resulted by roll material defects were elimi- nated thoroughly. For preventing the roll failures from incorrect using， the works of defect detection and inspection were enhanced to avoid using unqualified roll on mill. Roll failure behaviors were avoided effectively after the using management of rolls was strengthened. Roll spalling problems resulted by roll edge contact stress concentration were solved through applying the roll contour technology.

With proportioning 1.55 % economic lump ore, Angang No.2 BF has cut the cost of 3.81 yuan per ton iron. It becomes one of the good methods to reduce cost for Angang. When analyzing the benefit of economic lump ore, it should not only compare the cost of molten iron, but also consider the effect of hot metal quality on the cost of steelmaking process. The careful operation of BF and stable direct motion is the guarantee of the performance of the benefit of economic lump ore.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Detection and research of non-metallic inclusion based on artificial intelligence
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Using the artificial intelligence techniques and neural network technology, the image recognition of each metallographic image photo was conducted. Starting with non-metallic inclusion，proposed a new method to detect non-metallic dot inclusions, overcame the interference term of the image to find out the real non-metallic inclusion, and formulated a kind of computer software model which can detect the non-metallic inclusion automatically. Analyzed the detection method and key technology of the non-metallic inclusion according to the phase diagram of the steel specific operating procedures to observe the test results. Finally, the accuracy of the model was tested to get practical solutions, and made useful attempt on the automatic detection and modular standardized discriminate of the non-metallic inclusion.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: 1.School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering， University of Science and Technology Beijing， Beijing 100083， China; 2.State Key Laboratory of Advanced Metallurgy， University of Science and Technology Beijing， Beijing 100083， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Low Temperature Reduction Degradation Characteristics of Different Types of Iron Ores
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The typical sinter， pellets and lump ore were studied in this work， and the low temperature reduction deg- radation characteristics of different types of iron ores were tested and compared under the reducing gas conditions of two iron making processes. The results show that:① the degradation forms depend on the structure of iron ores. The lump ore and sinter both present the degradation of“cracking”， and the distribution of small grains generated from the cracking is in the range of 0.5 mm and 6.3 mm uniformly. Compared with lump ore and sinter， the pellets present the degradation of“surface stripping” and the RDI -0.5 of the pellets is the highest;②in the same condition of gas and temperature， for the degradation degree（RDI -3.15 ）， the sinter is the highest， the pellets are relatively lower and the lump ore is the lowest;③the temperature plays a important role in the low temperature reduction deg- radation of iron ores whose reduction degradation indexes（RDI） reach the peak at 550℃;④the low temperature reduction degradation degrees of iron ores are extended with adopting the hydrogen-enriched gas with high reduction potential， while the influence extent is discrepant for the different iron ore. Colligating the increase amplitude of grains in three small size fractions， the influence of the reducing gas on the lump ore is the biggest， and next come pellets， and the sensitivity of the sinter on the reducing gas properties change is relatively small.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analytic demonstration of the theoretical design model of 504m2 D-L straight grate
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Jingtang pellet’s quality is finer, process consumption energy is lower, and environmental protection result is better after Jingtang straight grate went into production. But the D-L straight grate was imported from german OUTOTEC, the design basis data such as energy flow and material flow was unknown. The material flow and energy flow process were deduced through analyzing the existing fan, input material and end product, and to appraise its merits and demerits about the design of every zone. The conclusion is that the design capability of Jingtang D-L straight grate is sufficient for roasting magnetic iron ore, while the roasting result need to be proved for roasting hematite ore. Some exploration was undertaken for national straight grate’s design and development.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Study of the Effect of TiO 2 Content on the Quality of Vanadium-Titanium in Sinter
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The different content of TiO 2 of affecting titanium sinter quality was studied by sintering cup test. Re- search shows that in the content range of TiO 2 is 2.8%～4.4%， as the TiO 2 content increased， the sinter drum in- dex， yield reduction， reducing and low temperature reduction degradation index are reduced. The easy reduction of iron-bearing minerals phase titanium hematite， iron acid calcium， strength good mixed corrosion structure reduced with the content increasing of titanium magnetite; the sinter porosity increased， skeleton crystalline titanium hema- tite content increased， sex brittle and do not have bonding effect of perovskite content increase its grain change， fill in the mixed corrosion structure， which is the main reason for the decline in the quality of the sinter.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Progress in Carbon Dioxide Sequestration by Mineral Carbonation
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The greenhouse effect of CO2 has been paid more attention by the environmental workers all over the world. CO2 sequestrated by mineral to form carbonate is an effective way to reduce the harm. The feasibility of this approach, reaction mechanism and affecting factors of carbonation rate are analyzed in terms of thermodynamics and kinetics. Moreover, process routes, costs and the performance and use of products are summarized. Finally, it is suggested that iron and steel industrial waste, slag, should be a promising option for developing mineral sequestration.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Panzhihua Steel Vanadium Ironmaking Plant， Panzhihua 617024， Sichuan， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Control Method of FeO Content in Vanadium-Titanic-Magnetite Sinter
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The factors which affect the FeO content of sinter ore were identified by single-factor test method. The affecting factors include: fixed carbon of mixture, SiO2 content, basicity, TiO2 content, ratio of return fines from sintering, thickness of sinter layer and moisture of mixture. Wherein, the fixed carbon of mixture had significantly impact and showed the strong correlation. The practical production model was built according to the calculation formula of solid carbon of mixture by Excel table. Both mid-value of FeO content of sinter and the solid-carbon of mixture were ensured. The FeO content of sinter controlled stably was realized by adjusting the solid-carbon of mixture appropriately, gradually and timely with the change of raw material structure and the content of sinter. The method of controlling the FeO content of sinter by adjusting the solid-carbon content of mixture has adopted since 2006 by Panzhihua Steel Vanadium Ironmaking Plant. Since then, the stable ratio of FeO content of sinter has increased 5.61%. At the mean while, the carbon consumption, index of tumbler, utilization ratio of sintering machine and other indexes have been also improved.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development and practice of quantitative calculation models of blast furnace hearth activity
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the big inertia of new No.1 BF and in BX steel and other modern huge blast furnaces, two hearth activity quantitative calculation models were put forward based on the analysis and research of traditional hearth activity calculation models, which the blast furnace hearth working activity index optimization model and the blast furnace hearth activity index optimization model. The off- line calculations of the models were realized and practiced in the production of new No.1 BF in BX by the technologies of data acquisition, processing and programming, which can make hearth activity quantitative calculation come true. Practice has proven that the calculation results of the models could truly reflect the hearth activity and effectively help foremen better grasp the blast furnace hearth activity in real time. the hearth activity was becoming declining and abnormal, the foremen could find out it and make the correct operating intervention as early as possible, which could timely avoid all the losses caused by the deterioration of hearth activity. There fore, the models were playing important roles in the aspects of keeping blast furnace good hearth activity and long- term stability.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Structure optimization and improvement of driving roller slideway for heavy slab caster
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Some shortcomings on structure of the driving roller slideway in the segment was found in the No.3 heavy slab caster in a certain steel plant which was used more than half year. The bolts used for mechanical limiting position in the driving roller were always apt to to get loose and the bolts used for fastening and connecting the driving roller slide and segment frame were vulnerable. In order to eliminate the problems of the structure, the structure of the driving roller slideway was optimized and improved based on the research and theoretical analysis on the actual situation, which solved thoroughly the problems, ensured the accuracy of the driving roller gap, increased the steel production of the segment and reduced the equipment maintenance cost.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
MnO2 is a kind of pulverized coal combustion improver which is suited for the Blast Furnace. Collecting unburned coal through simulating combustion conditions of Blast Furnace, analyzing XRD and SEM, microcrystalline parameters of unburned coal increased, Height and diameter of Aromatic slices will increase 0.0010nm and 0.0137nm respectively as MnO joined; Particles size of unburned coal powder reduced 2.65μm by adding MnO, morphological appearance became irregular. Mn(CO) weakened bridge adhesion of Carbon structural units and changed lattice structures, activation energy of pulverized coal was lowered and burn rate was accelerated.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Brief analysis of heat loss calculation in the hot metal transportation
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A mathematical model of temperature drop of hot metal in the transportation was developed to study the heat loss in the transportation of hot metal. The model has a high accuracy, and the results make a good agreement to the statistics in the production. The model was used to do energy efficiency comparison and analysis among the hot metal transportation technologies on the iron-making and steel-making interface, and a series of results about the influence of the different transportation conditions on the energy efficiency were obtained. The results suggest that adding heat insulated agent or insulated cover can reduce the temperature drop of hot metal distinctly, and there is a critical transport distance and critical transport time that make the temperature drop of the torpedo-charging ladle technology and the transportation without reladling technology the same, and the inertial temperature of charging ladle makes an influence on the critical transport distance and time.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Optimization and Application of CVC Work Roll and Backup Roll Contour on CSP Line in Lysteel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Due to some problems of CVC(continuously variable crown) work roll and backup roll on the upstream stands of CSP hot strip mills in Lysteel, for instance, the percentage of shifting stroke of CVC work roll is very low, and the shifting position always reaches the negative capacity, and the backup rolls is worn very badly and non-uniformly. Based on a lot of statistical analysis of practical data, according to the CVC roll contour design method, and introducing backup roll technology of varying contact and anti-CVC(VCRplus), new CVC work roll and backup contour was designed for the upstream stands. Finally, good practical results prove that it is right by industrial test.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Technical research and practice of metallurgical dust recycling in converter
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Thermodynamics and dynamics condition of direct recycling for the metallurgical ferruginous dust in smelting process has been studied in the laboratory. It was concluded that temperature of the C-FeO reduction reaction in working conditions must be controlled above 950℃, and the metallization rate in metallurgical ferruginous dust increased with the increase of heating temperature and the extension of heating time, and it was pointed out that the optimum position adding metallurgical ferruginous dust pellet was converter. At the same time, the industrial proving trials adding metallurgical ferruginous dust pellet into converter have been carried on It was concluded that metallurgical ferruginous dust pellet has no remarkable effect on TFe content in slag at blowing end, and the average metallization rate could reach to about 50%. The economic value of adding metallurgical ferruginous dust pellet was depended on three major factors including the price margin between hot metal and scrap, the quantity of adding metallurgical ferruginous dust pellet and the sulfur content in metallurgical ferruginous dust pellet.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Design parameters of the BF nonmetal miniature modular cooling stave
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The miniature modular cooling stave which is produced by casting unshaped refractories onto parallel arranged cooling water pipes is a new kind of cooling equipment used in blast furnace. The temperature field calculating model of the miniature modular cooling stave was establishedbased on ANSYS and by using this model, the temperature field of the miniature modular cooling stave was calculated under different working condition of gas temperature 1200- 1600℃ and water velocity 0.5- 2.5m/s when thermal conductivity of stave body, the water pipe material, the diameter of water pipe, the water pipe spacing, the stave thickness, the cooling water velocity and furnace temperature varied. The result shows that the miniature modular cooling stave can work safely under different furnace temperatures; the thermal conductivity of stave body, the water pipe spacing and stave thickness have a relatively great influence on the heat transfer performance of miniature modular cooling stave while the influence of water pipe material, the diameter of water pipe and water velocity is limited.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Simulation on the rolling stability of specially shaped section steel for forklift mast rail
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：With the help of finite element analysis software, the asymmetrical splitting caliber process of C160, which was the section steel for forklift mast rail, was simulated, and the stability of head warping, bending, twisting in the rolling process was studied. Based on the analysis of the section contour of strain distribution, deformation and elongation during the rolling process, the production was conducted. The results showed that in the workpiece cross section during the stable rolling process, the deformation and elongation of the lower part was greater than the upper, which caused the head warping, and the left deformation and elongation was greater than the right, which caused the bending to the right. Due to the similar diagonal distribution of the strain and elongation, the twisting of workpiece was not obvious. A method for the research on the rolling stability was provided, which had great significance for guaranteeing the smooth rolling, improving the operation rate and guiding the production.
keywords_en: section steel for forklift mast rail
