http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: In-Depth Discussion of Cooling System of Long Campaign Blast Furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A rational water cooling system is the assurance for long campaign life of blast furnace．The cooling system of blast furnace was discussed from the heat transfer point of view, and the limitation of the heat transfer mathematical model for the blast furnace hearth was analyzed. According to the calculation results of a one-dimensional radial heat transfer model, increasing the cooling water flow rate can reduce cooling water temperature difference, but it has little effect on the cooling intensity of blast furnace hearth. For the given hearth structure, the heat output from the hearth mainly depends on the temperature and the flow state of the hot metal. Analysis of the cooling water for blast furnace hearth plays an important role in preventing the nucleate boiling and film boiling by increasing critical heat intensity, and giving out the judge condition of the crack occurrence of brick lining.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Jigang strip production line of high pressure water descaling pump station has two sets of systems: the old one is chongqing pump group, with large energy consumption, low pressure descaling, incomplete tin oxide removal and high equipment failure rate.The new one is Great pump group whose operation is stable. But the old and new sets of systems were not compatible which restricts the smooth running of production. By applying energy-saving optimization for the Chongqing system, the descaling box, descaling header and line were optimized, and the interface of the two sets of systems and control mode of integration, and the operating mode were optimized. It reduced the energy consumption, improved the pressure of descaling and descaling effect, and ensured the quality of the steel plate surface.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: High temperature mechanical properties of M2 high speed steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The high- temperature mechanical properties of the high speed steel W6Mo5Cr4V2 (M2) were tested on a Gleeble- 3800 thermal simulator with the temperature ranging from 650℃ to 1250℃. As a result, the strength and thermal plasticity curves were obtained. And the microstructure and fracture morphology of specimens were observed at different temperature. The test results showed that the zero plastic temperature (ZDT) and zero strength temperature (ZST) of tested steel were 1220℃ and 1250℃, respectively. The optimum plastic temperature ranged from 950℃ to 1150℃. The brittle temperature varied from 1175℃ to melting point, but there was a weak brittle zone with the temperature from 800℃ to 950℃. The high- temperature mechanical properties of M2 steel were mainly influenced by phase transformation, carbide dissolution and low- melting- point carbide melting.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Pickling process of hot-rolled stainless steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The pickling process is employed to remove the oxide layer and Cr-depleted layer on the surface of hot-rolled stainless steel，passivate the substrates and to improve the surface integrity after rolling and annealing. The composition and structure of oxide layer and Cr-depleted layer on the surface of hot-rolled stainless steel，and its effects on the subsequent pickling process are reviewed. The preliminary pickling methods and the mechanism of different pickling solutions are discussed in detail. The most widely used pickling process of hot-rolled stainless steel in China involves preliminary treatment (shot blasting and electrochemical neutral pickling)，sulfuric acid pre-pickling and the final pickling with HNO3-HF mixtures. The preliminary treatment and pre-pickling contribute to move the major oxide layer and the final pickling removes the Cr-depleted layer and passivates the substrate as well. How-ever，there are some problems for the pickling process of stainless steel in the unstable pickling effect，insufficient Cr-depleted layer removal，local corrosion and the environmental pollution at present. The pickling system and process should be designed based on the property of oxide layer and Cr-depleted layer for different steel grades and annealing conditions. Thus，an environmental-friendly pickling process has a vast development prospects.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Numerical Simulation About the Lumen Magnetic Field and Brow Leakage of MEMS
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
A numerical simulation and experimental measurement were adopted to research the lumen magnetic field and brow leakage of salient pole type and toroidal iron core mould electromagnetic stirring system (MEMS) with the same core height and ampereturns. The comparison shows that the simulated results conform basically with the experimental data. At the inner center of MEMS along the casting direction (along the zaxis), the variation trend of magnetic flux density was accordant between the salient pole type MEMS and toroidal MEMS. Both of them changed gently along the zaxis. While closing the iron core of MEMS, the distribution of magnetic flux density along the zaxis in the salient pole type MEMS was increased firstly, reached the peak value at the end of the iron core with a distance of 150mm to the central plan of EMS, and then decreased sharply. The distribution trends was like the “peaks”. The closer to the core surface of EMS, the more obvious magnetic field distribution trend of brow leakage can be seen. Compared to the salient pole type MEMS, the brow leakage of the toroidal MEMS was significantly smaller. The distribution of magnetic flux density changed gently along the zaxis, only displayed a smaller peak at the end of the coil with the distance about 225 mm, then suddenly reduced and its distribution was like the “cliff”.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Causes of 1215MS Free Cutting Steel Wire Rode Warping
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：There are warping in 4 consecutive batches of 1215MS free cutting steel wire rode .Firstly , the result of investigation on the quality of the other batches of wire rode made from the same cast number billets which the 4 batches belong to excludes the possibility of the whole cast billets with quality problem. Secondly , factors warping concern eg. composition, rimhole, smelt and rolling process are investigated. From which rolling temperature, billets surface quality, inclusion has become the focus of the suspected factors. Thirdly , the main factor is determined by production and research, and confirmed by production finally. The results show that 1215MS free cutting steel wire rode warping is caused by rolling temperature and purity of steel，there is no evident relation between warping and billet surface defects as bin-hole，oscillation mark. Higher rolling temperature can avoid the wire rode warping defect occur.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Process of flue gas circulation sintering based on test
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Under the normal producing conditions，taking the No.8 (360m2) sintering machine in Xinyu Iron and Steel Co. as study object，an idea of the flue gas circulation sintering process based on test was put forward. The test method was opening sampling hole in wind boxes pipe，and through choosing the reasonable measuring location and point，and testing the temperature of sintering flue gases and the volume fraction of O2，SO2 and NOx，the changing regularity was discussed and the reasonable internal and external processes were designed. The results showed that，at the first several wind boxes，the oxygen volume fraction in sintering flue gas is low，but after the No.18 wind box，the oxygen volume fraction grew gradually. With the increase of the gas temperature， the gas density reduced and the flow speed increased，while the gas flow capacity under the standard condition was almost the same. The higher the oxygen content of recycled sintering flue gas， the lower the leakage rate of sintering machine，which can make the circulation rate of sintering flue gas higher. Inner circulation process and outer circulation process all can reduce the solid fuel consumption and clean the production. And the inner circulation process can increase production and be proper for the new project. The outer circulation process can reduce the flue gas emission better and be suitable for the renovation project.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of microstructure and shearing parameter on the edge crack defect in the SPHC steel with lower carbon content during cold rolling process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The reason was studied for the edge crack defect in the SPHC steel with lower carbon content during cold rolling process in Qian’an Steel Company. The result shows that the coarse and mixed crystals in the edge of strip which was caused by excessive temperature drop in the edge during finishing rolling process, and the poor shearing quality which was caused by mismatch of shearing parameters were the reasons for the edge crack defect in the SPHC steel with lower carbon content during cold rolling process. By adjusting the cooling water system during finishing rolling process and matching shearing parameters reasonably, the defect was solved effectively.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Study and application of KR desulfuration comprehensive technology was introduced. Compound desulfurizer was studied to improve the utilization rate of desulfurizing agent. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The content of H2 in gas gives a big influence for convection transfer coefficient and temperature of strip in rapid cooling section of vertical continuous annealing furnace. The situation explains the relation between physical character of gas, transfer coefficient and temperature of strip. The heat transfer character of gas and strip was studied, the change of convection transfer coefficient and temperature of strip was analyzed. It calculates convection transfer coefficient and cooling temperature of strip with different content of H2 in gas, applied relations of equipment configuration parameters, Nusselt number and convection transfer coefficient of gas. The calculating method can offer certain basis for production and designing engineering projects.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of blast furnace slag fall-off
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Slag crust fall-off is one of the production problems of blast furnace. It makes the hot surface temperature of furnace wall and cooling stoves change rapidly and produces very big thermal stock which caused the furnace wall and cooling wall body cracked or erased. The entering of the slag skin into the hearth would cause the furnace temperature fluctuated, or even seriously cold. The heavy peripheral gas distribution is the main reason of formation. Appropriate development of peripheral gas flows can eliminate the slag crust fall-off.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The producing methods and utilization of calcium sulfat whiskers were introduced．The development trend of resolving the second pollution problem in steel plant is to produce calcium sulfat whiskers with desulphurization by-product by analyzing the typical sintering gas desulphurization technologies limestone/lime-plaster. It could desulphurize high-efficiently and cleanly and provide economic benefit by decreasing the SO2 emission without solid waste.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the continuous improvement of the equipment function and accuracy standards，the precision management for equipment function was promote dactively in Shougang Jingtang. Driven by user needs，the precision management system for equipment function was established on the basis of spot check，overhaul and detection from the perspective of the reduce of the internal quality defects and the improvement of product quality. It has improved eliminated the equipment defects，improved the efficiency of equipment，extended the life cycle of the equipment，kept the equipment production capacity，ensured the product quality and maximized the interests of the company.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application of ceramics weld technology in coke oven in Baosteel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The application of ceramic welding technology in coke oven in Baosteel was introduced, which mainly included the preparatory work, the head defects in the wall of carbonization chamber, the method of repairing hole and some processing work after the ceramic welding. By applying the technology of ceramic welding in Baosteel, the blockade of foreign for the maintenance of coke oven was broken, and the defects of the coke side of the chamber and the leakage of the furnace wall were efficiently resolved, which can make the state of the wall of carbonization chamber stable, postpone the time of repairing hole and improve the service life of the coke oven and output of coke.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Process Control and Microstructure and Properties of High Grade Pipeline Steel on 2250 Hot Strip Rolling Line
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The article introduces composition design and process control of X80 pipeline steel produced by 2250 hot strip rolling production line. Mechanical properties, Microstructure and precipitation behavior of X80 pipeline steel were studied. The results indicate that X80 pipeline steel with a thickness of 18.4mm produced by 2250 hot continuous rolling line shows excellent mechanical properties, with an average yield strength of 655MPa and an average tensile strength of 750MPa. The average impact energy is 300J at -20℃, while the average percentage of DWTT shear area is 95%. It is observed that the microstructure of X80 pipeline steel is mainly granular bainite and acicular ferrite. The precipitation distributes homogeneously, with an average length of 20nm.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 添加剂对硅溶胶结合Al2O3- SiC- C铁沟捣打料性能的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Research and Development Center, Zhejiang Zili Co., Ltd., Shaoxing 312300, Zhejiang, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 摘要 以特级矾土（粒径8~5、5~3和3~1mm）、棕刚玉（粒径3~1、≤1和≤0.074mm）、碳化硅（粒径≤1和≤0.074mm）和球状沥青为主要原料，金属硅和碳化硼为抗氧化剂和促烧剂，添加超微粉或焦作黏土，以硅溶胶作结合剂，采用手工捣打成型工艺来制备Al2O3- SiC- C铁沟捣打料。研究了硅微粉、α- Al2O3微粉、焦作黏土和有机防爆纤维对硅溶胶结合Al2O3- SiC- C铁沟捣打料性能的影响。结果表明：添加2%质量分数硅微粉、3%质量分数焦作黏土或0.05%质量分数有机防爆纤维对硅溶胶结合Al2O3- SiC- C铁沟捣打料的体积密度影响不大。含9%质量分数 α- Al2O3微粉的试样和含6%质量分数 α- Al2O3微粉、3%质量分数焦作黏土的试样显示出更好的常温强度。合理的颗粒级配可以提高铁沟捣打料试样的抗高炉渣侵蚀性。含6%质量分数 α- Al2O3微粉、3%质量分数焦作黏土的试样的抗渣侵蚀性最好；含7%质量分数 α- Al2O3微粉、2%质量分数硅微粉的试样的抗渣侵蚀性次之；含9%质量分数 α- Al2O3微粉的试样的抗渣侵蚀性最差。有机防爆纤维提高了捣打料的烘后强度，但使抗渣性能有所降低。硅溶胶结合Al2O3- SiC- C铁沟捣打料试样在1450℃煅烧后质量增加，有利于体积稳定性和抗渣性能。
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of additives on properties of colloidal silica bonded Al2O3- SiC- C iron trough ramming mix
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The Al2O3- SiC- C iron trough ramming mix was prepared using extra grade bauxite (particle size:8- 5 , 5- 3 and 3- 1mm), brown corundum (particle size:3- 1、≤1 and ≤0.074mm), silicon carbide (particle size:≤1 and ≤0.074mm) and ball pitch as main starting materials, metallic silicon and boron carbide as antioxidant and sintering aid, adding ultra- micro powders or Jiaozuo clay, colloidal silica as binder, ramming and shaping. Effect of silica micropowder, α- Al2O3 micropowder, Jiaozuo clay and organic explosion- proof fiber on properties of colloidal silica bonded Al2O3- SiC- C iron trough ramming mix were studied. The results show that: 2% quality score silica micropowder, 3% quality score Jiaozuo clay or 0.05% quality score organic explosion- proof fiber has little influence on bulk density of colloidal silica bonded Al2O3- SiC- C iron trough ramming mix; specimen with 9% quality score α- Al2O3 micropowder, and the specimen with 6% quality score α- Al2O3 micropowder and 3% quality score Jiaozuo clay exhibit better cold strength. Rational particle size distribution could improve the slag resistance of iron trough ramming mix specimen; specimen with 6% quality score α- Al2O3 micropowder and 3% quality score Jiaozuo clay has the best slag resistance; specimen with 7% quality score α- Al2O3 micropowder and 2% quality score silica micropowder has the second place; and the specimen with 9% quality score α- Al2O3 micropowder has the worst slag resistance. Organic explosion- proof fiber can improve the dried strength of ramming mix, but reduce slag resistance. The specimens of colloidal silica bonded Al2O3 - SiC- C iron trough ramming mix have mass increase after fired at 1450℃, which can improve volume stability and slag resistance.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 徐勇. 添加剂对硅溶胶结合Al2O3- SiC- C铁沟捣打料性能的影响[J]. 中国冶金, 2015, 25(07): 46-50. XU Yong. Effect of additives on properties of colloidal silica bonded Al2O3- SiC- C iron trough ramming mix. China Metallurgy, 2015, 25(07): 46-50.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Laiwu Branch, Shandong Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Laiwu 271105, Shandong, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Improvement on the Qualified Rate of Narrow Converter Steel Components
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：It is expounded that the main factors influencing the qualified rate of converter steel narrow-composition: large difference of molten steel oxidizing and weight between before and after heats, non-standard deoxidation and alloying operation, low composition uniformity of molten steel in the primary refining. The carbon qualified rate was improved by 11.16%, silicon by 13.88%, manganese by 12.68% and chromium by 9.8% by formulating converter smelting operation mode, making the ferroalloy recovery reference for every steel grade according to carbon content at endpoint. establishing the intelligent bottom blowing mode and the standard of feeding wire in ladle, standardizing ferroalloy adding operation, maintaining tapping hole dynamically and controlling ferroalloy batch precisely.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Metallurgy and Material College， Jiangsu University of Science and Technology，Zhangjiagang 215600， Jiangsu， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Slag Forming Routes in Liangang 90t Top-Bottom Combined Blowing Converter
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Through the analysis of the experimental data of Liangang 90t top-bottom combined blowing converter, the results show that in order to obtain the optimal dephosphorization effect, the basicity of slag should be controlled at around 4.6, w((FeO)) be controlled at around 16%, and the furnace temperature be controlled at around 1680℃. Through the change channels of actual slag compose in the CaO（MgO）-SiO2-FeO（MnO）fake ternary phase diagrams to compared with the common slag forming routes, it was found that the slag forming routes of Liangang top-bottom combined blowing converter followed the ABC path which is the low FeO slag forming route. The route is mainly applicable to the low phosphorus and sulphur pig iron which is used in steel smelting. By analyzing the advantages and disadvantages of this route, this paper suggests some optimizations in the slag forming process of Liangang.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 基于静态误差的破鳞拉矫机张力设定优化算法
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: State Key Laboratory of Rolling and Automation, Northeastern University, Shenyang 110819, Liaoning, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Optimization algorithm of tension setup in tension-leveler based on static errors
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In the continuous pickling line and tandem cold rolling, elongation and tension were out of the precise control level when tension-leveler flying gauge changed or roll changed, which affected the pickling quality. To solve this problem, a new tension model was proposed, and the steady state error was put into the model to improve the tension-leveler model accuracy. Practical application results show that the average tension deviation of the first coil strip dropped from 4.477% to 1.798% after changing roll, which greatly improved the elongation control level. The generic solution of the steady state error in the tension model was provided. The proposed model was used properly on-line for a long time which was suitable for industrial promotion.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 风量对烧结烟气成分影响的实验研究
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （School of Energy and Power Engineering，University of Shanghai for Science and Technology， Shanghai 200093，China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Experimental study of the ventilation volume’s influence on the composition of sintering flue gas
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：To simplify the sintering process, a small scale fixed test bed for thermal sintering was built and the influence of ventilation volume on the contents variation of combustible rarefied gases (CO，H2 and CH4) was investigated. As a result, the CO and H2 content decreased with the augment of ventilation volume as a whole, and the variation trends of both content with ventilation volume and time were alike, which increased rapidly at first and turned to steady then dropped sharply; the relatively lower combustion ratio ［φCO/(φCO+φCO2)］ at a 100m3/(m2·min) ventilation volume indicated an enhanced efficient utilization of carbon chemical energy. Considering the increase of power consumption and air leakage with the increase of ventilation volume, the optimal ventilation volume in the experiment was 90m3/(m2·min). The CH4 content showed the same trend with various ventilation volume that it increased rapidly and maintained before dropped quickly when close to the burn-through point. The CH4 content reached to the max, approximately 2%, at the 70m3/(m2·min) ventilation volume. The experiment results could provide some reference for energy saving projects such as the choice of ventilation volume in sintering and the recycle of sintering flue gas.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
1. Specialty of Applied Physis, School of Science, Naval University of Engineering， Wuhan 430032， Hubei， China

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis and application of profile and flatness control model of Masteel CSP hot strip
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：To analyze the influence of rolling force, bending force and CVC shifting position on the crown of loaded roll gap, a special simulation model was established by using ANSYS software. According to the shape wave of hot rolled strip between mills, setup parameters of Level 2 profile and flatness control model were optimized to make rolling process stable. Practice had proven that manual intervention to mill load distribution and the shifting position of CVC work rolls, could be better for optimization of upstream stands’ proportion crown and the downstream stands′ strip shape wave, thereby enhancing the hit rate of strip crown and rolling stability.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: WISDRI Engineering Research Incorporation Co.,Ltd., Wuhan 430223, Hubei, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application of IDE flushing slag water system in 5800m3 blast furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Under the current condition of implementing the policies of environmental protection and energy conservation and emission reduction, how to recycling slag to acquire economic and environmental benefits is an important content of slag treatment. An eco- friendly slag treatment method of IDE was introduced, which was reliable, low investment adaptable. Even when the slag volume was greater than 8t/min it can get better quality of water granulated slag with all flushing slag water recycling and almost no waste water and unwanted steam emissionak by using the IDS system. Taking 5800m3 blast furnaces as an example, the process flow of IDE slag treatment system and major equipment and technical characteristics of flushing slag water system were introduced.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of the influence of roll coating technologies and equipments on strip coating quality
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The roller coating technology and equipment in iron and steel industry coating line was introduced. By analyzing some key process parameters which affect the quality of strip steel coating in roller coating process such as roller, roller speed ratio, pressure between rolls, etc, combined with some empirical parameters in the production practice, the causes were analyzed and concluded and the improvement measures were given. At the same time, by analyzing equipment composition form precision and the vibration in the running process of roller coating machine, it was suggested that application of vibration damping measures and vibration testing methods are essential for the design and use of roller coating equipment.

Abstract：
In this paper, the reaction of deep desulphurization by magnesium injection is deeply discuss on theoretic. The principle of resulfurization in hot metal is explained. And some process parameters are optimized in practice produce. Some control methods are put forward, e.g. reduce sulfur content in hot metal at the end of injection, deslag the desulfurization slag. By these ways the effect of desulfurization is improved. The resulfurization content in BOF is lower than 10×10. The batch production of antacid pipeline steel is successed.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Oxidation characteristic of high aluminum bearing double phase steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The scale characteristics and formation mechanism of high aluminum bearing double phase steel were investigated through pickling line tandem cold rolling mill simulation. The results showed that fish scale type red scale defect is prone to generate at the hot rolled strip surface of high aluminum bearing double phase steel and chromatic aberration defect is prone to form at the cold rolled strip surface，which were affected the surface quality. The Al element enrichment was found at the interface between steel base and scale because of high Al mass fraction. A black particle band of Al2O3 with 20% Al was found at the interface between steel base and scale of the sample when simulated at 1300℃. The enrichment extent of Al could be progressively eliminated by decreasing the heating temperature，with thinner effect layer thickness. Based on the previous formation mechanism research，it was proposed to eliminate fish scale type red scale defect by decreasing the tapping temperature and process temperature.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Design features and practice of No.2 BF in Jiyuan Steel Plant
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The design of the No.2 blast furnace in Jiyuan Steel Plant adopts a series of advanced equipments and technologies, such as string-up bucket type bell-less top, thin wall lining, the furnace hearth structure of carbon bricks and ceramic cup bottom, soft water closed circulation cooling system, copper cooling stave in the key parts and dust removal in front of furance, etc. The blast furnace has been put into production for 5 years, and the furnace condition is stable and smooth. The indexes are better than the design indexes. The average utilization coefficient is over 3.3 t/(m3·d), which reaches the advanced level of the same kind of blast furnace. At the same time, the ceramic pad in the furnace bottom is well-preserved. The temperature of the carbon brick center under the cup pad is controlled within 600 ℃. The erosions on the furnace bottom and hearth are small. The blast furnace cooling system is stable. Therefore, the design is reasonable and the production practice has achieved good enough effect.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Experiment of hydraulic model simulating on flow field optimization of tundish based on PXI technology
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Working on experiment platform for hydraulic model of continuous castings based on PXI technology， the 1∶2 tundish water model was applied in studying the influence of weir dam and porous retaining wall on the flow of 180mm×240mm six- strand billet tundish in one steel plant, and the relevant experimental conclusions were made by analyzing the flow field of relevant area and residence time distribution curves(RTD) in different tundishes. Experimental results showed that the uniformity of flow was bad in the injection flow region of tundish without weir dam or porous retaining wall, and its response time(7s) and peak time（224s）were shorter. The flow properties in the tundish became much better after optimization, and the response time and peak time were extended to 99 and 159s, respectively. Besides, the dead volume reduced by 45.71%, and the piston flow volume increased from 12.03% to 25.47%.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The industrial experiment concerning the effects of the bottom blowing gas in BOF on the twisted steel was carried in Fushun New Steel Company. Meanwhile, the performance of the twisted steel under the whole process bottom blowing N2, bottom gas changing over from N2 to Ar and without bottom blowing process condition, respectively, were compared. The results showed that on the condition of the above three processes the performance index of the chemical constituents, comprehensive properties, yield strength, tensile strength and percentage elongation after fracture of rolled metal was equivalent, even the amount of inclusions in steel and microstructure grades were also tantamount. The chemical constituents and performance of the twisted steel reached the national standard by using whole process bottom blowing N2 in the converter.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of silica mass fraction on multifractal parameters of sinter
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the apparent morphology of different silica sinter, the characterization of the fractal parameters of sinter was parsed. It was found that △α and f（α）max represented the number and homogeneity of the Fe3O4 and CaO·Fe2O3, respectively. And with the increase of SiO2 mass fraction, the reducibility of low silicon sinter was getting worse gradually, but the compressive strength was getting better. When the content of SiO2 is 4.8%, multifractal spectrum spectral width △α reached the minimum, and multifractal spectrum maximum f (α) Max reached the peak.This indicated that the calcium ferrite was distributed more uniform in the low silicon sinter and its formation amount was the largest.Therefore, with the increase of SiO2 mass fraction in low silica sinter, the reducibility became poor and the compressive strength gradually got better.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: CFD modelling and application of temperature predictive model on steel ingots
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Temperature field inside steel ingots is one of the most important parameters during heat- treating processes. The conventional methods cannot make sure the accuracy of the temperature measurement in a long run due to the high temperature. Aiming to solve the problem of overheated steel ingots occurs in a certain steel plant, a three- dimensional heat transfer model for steel ingots was established in unsteady state by method of computational fluid dynamics. The parameters in the CFD model were determined with the operation conditions and some data in a certain steel plant. With the model, temperature distribution inside the steel ingot was analyzed. The results provide a guidance for determination and rectification of the one- dimensional temperature predictive model that is in operation to satisfy the requirement of on- line control and higher accuracy.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Concerning the fluctuation of accumulator tension and frequent deviation of strip in Pangang Cold Rolling Mill Factory’s PL-TCM, which limited the set quantity production and badly affected production of the unit. a research has been made on the accumulator tension control system. It states the accumulator static tension setting and dynamic torque compensation algorithms. Besides, the relevant calculation formula is also provided. Through optimization by adopting optimal correction limiting and speed difference torque compensation in the step of accumulator tension control, problems such as the fluctuation of accumulator tension and deviation of strip are solved, which meets the requirements of accumulator tension and set quantity for production process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Energy Efficiency Optimization to Utilization of the Sensible Heat of Raw Material and Fuel for BF
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Through energy efficiency optimization to the producing process of the raw material and fuel used for blast furnace, this paper point out that about above 40kgce/tFe of sensible heat resource was unused and there is a tremendous future to do in the field of energy saving. It’s proposed a new technical method of hot charge the burden to the blast furnace which can reduce the energy consumption about 9%. The method was been analyzed and discussed in detail and pointed out a effective way to resolve the low rate of sensible heat utilization, the high energy consumption of blast furnace and good developed prospect.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effects on regenerator of the flue gas injecting system of reheating furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：When the gas valves of the regenerative furnace is switched to pump the flue gas, the temperature of the burner’s top bricks becomes higher than its allowed temperature in a moment due to the secondary combustion in the burner. Both the high temperature and the iron oxide powder above the bricks will cause the regenerator of the gas burner cracked and deformed andchannels clogged. To resolve this problem, the measure of injecting the flue gas into the gas pipelines was studied. The practical application shows that the system makes the residual gas of the gas burner and the branch replaced into the furnace for burning with low temperature flue gas. This system can effectively control the temperature of the regenerator and extend the regenerator’s service life by preventing happening of secondary combustion in the burner, and greatly decrease the CO content in the flue gas and reduce chemical energy loss and environmental pollution.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 张桂平，张大鹏. 加热炉烟气反吹系统对蓄热体的影响[J]. 中国冶金, 2014, 24(10): 7-10. ZHANG Gui-ping，ZHANG Da-peng. Effects on regenerator of the flue gas injecting system of reheating furnace. China Metallurgy, 2014, 24(10): 7-10.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：With the increase of phosphorus content in hot metal, it becomes more and more difficult to control the phosphorus content of pipeline steel in 250t combined blowing converter of the Hanbao steel-making plant. the thermodynamics and dynamics theory about dephosphorization of converter steelmaking process was analyzed, and the measures were introduced including remaining slag practice to raise the effect of dephosphorization, increasing the slag basicity, application of less slag when the phosphorus content of hot metal preponderate over 0.12%, control of lance movements of 200 mm higher than before, and the application of slag-stopping tapping by slide gate, etc. After application of these measures, the average w［P］ at blowing end-point reduced from 0.0122% to 0.0089%, and the w［P］ at ladle reduced from 0.0135% to 0.0096%. It has provided theoretical basis for Hanbao Steel to produce clean steels such as high-level pipeline steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Preliminary Study on Core Temperature in No.1 Blast Furnace at Shougang Jingtang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Furnace core temperature is one of the important characterization of blast furnace hearth active degree. The heat transfer calculation equation of Shougang Jingtang No.1 blast furnace core is given as a one-dimensional steady-state heat transfer process. The furnace core temperature is studied by calculating and drawing the curves of the furnace core temperature - the hearth temperature and the furnace core temperature - ceramic pad thickness. The suitable furnace core temperature is 310-380℃ at the present stage. The hearth condition is difference and the correlation is weak between the furnace core temperature and the temperature of molten iron when the furnace core temperature is low.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
According to the defects analysis of sulfur ensuring steel strands（300 mm× 360 mm）， it is considered that the inclusions as FeS， MnS easily precipitates out along the grain boundary during solidification process. This leads to reducing the ability for resistance stress at the grain boundary， so it is bring subsurface crack and intermedi- ate crack on applied stress. The reduction of mould coolling water and improvement of mould powder capability can eliminate the subsurface crack and intermediate crack of the bloom casting billet.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：37 type industrial accidents of one Iron and Steel Company from 2012 to 2013 were analyzed by means of statistical analysis method. Histogram method was used to analyze the accidents according to statistical characteristics of the accidents, such as the department, place, categories, cause, injured area, damage degree of the accidents. The steel plant was the department where the incidence of industrial accident was the highest and the accident occurred most frequently was mechanical injury accident in the iron and steel company. Disciplinary violation behavior which was the main reason for the accident happened at a rate of 70.27%.The head and hands injury accounted 65% of the whole injury.Hard working environment, low level of safety management and weak employees’consciousness of safety were the fundamental reasons for the regularity of the accidents. These conclusions found out the regularity and main reasons of the accident and provided The data for accident prevention and management was provided.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Characteristics and generating mechanism of large precipitates in H13 tool steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The characteristics of large precipitates in H13 tool steel were studied and the results were compared with the predicted solidification process calculated by Thermol- calc software to study the generating mechanism. The results showed that three kinds of large phases were existing in the as- cast ingot, which were V- rich (V,Mo,Cr，Fe)C phase, Mo- Cr- rich (V,Mo,Cr，Fe)C phase and manganese sulfide. For the V- rich (V,Mo,Cr，Fe)C phase, the shape of the majority big precipitates was strip and the size could be tens of microns, while a part of ones precipitating on manganese sulfide had an oval shape. For Mo- Cr- rich (V,Mo,Cr，Fe)C phase, the precipitates were irregular phase, the content of Mo was similar to that of Cr and the content of V was slightly lower. The precipitation order could be speculated according to the combining form of complex large phase. Sulfide, V- rich (V,Mo,Cr，Fe)C phase and Mo- Cr- rich (V,Mo,Cr，Fe)C phase were precipitated successively. The calculation results of Thermo- calc were basically consistent with the experimental results combined with the component characteristics of large precipitates.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In circumstances of over production of iron and steel industry，iron and steel companies are facing a challenging situation in not only increasing investment on environment but also reducing production costs. Sintering flue gas recirculation technology is one of the most effective methods，in recent years，which has been successful applied in new and renovation projects on domestic sintering machine. In current situation，considering interests and actual conditions of enterprises，using flue gas recirculation technology by suitable process model can bring benefits for enterprises in protecting environment，tapping potentials and increasing profit and enhancing efficiency，which can effectively promote transformation and upgrading of enterprises and healthy development.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WANG Guang, XUE Qing-guo, KONG Ling-tan
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: State Key Laboratory of Advanced Metallurgy, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Rotary Hearth Furnace Iron Nugget Technology and Its Prospect in China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The steel enterprise’s survival and the sustainable development of iron and steel industry is facing severe challenges due to the shortage of resources and environmental pressure at new historical stage and the development of new ironmaking technology become inevitable. Rotary hearth furnace iron nugget technique is a kind of new nonBF ironmaking technology on coal base developed in the recent years, and has achieved commercial application to some extent. The iron and slag can be separated at fast speed and then the iron nugget of high grade can be got. It has advantages in energy consumption, production cost, environmental protection, raw materials flexibility and so on. The development process, basic characteristics and potential applications of the technology was reviewed in this paper. The significance of the technology in the field of iron and steel metallurgy and resource comprehensive utilization was pointed out according energy conservation, emissions reduction requirements and resources situation of iron and steel industry in our country. Finally, a brief introduction to the related fundamental research of the process was made.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: 5Water Model on Mixing Time in Shaking Ladle Bath
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The relationship between mixing time (Tmix) and shaking speed in the shaking ladle bath was experimentally investigated through a water model, and a new criterion of mixing time was proposed. Water was used to simulate liquid metal and a NaCl tracer was added during the experiments. Two conductivity probes were used, one in the dead zone and the other in the active zone. The experimental results showed that the method of judging wave height in the bath, which was widely used to judge the mixing efficiency, is not exact. A new concept namely optimum shaking speed was proposed based on the relationship between the mixing time and shaking speed. The experimental results also showed that the mixing time was dependent on the tracer injection positions in shaking ladle.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The production practice of sulfide corrosion resistant container plate Q345R (R-HIC) was described. And it introduces the main factors of affecting hydrogen sulfide corrosion resistance, and formulates the corresponding processing plan. It controls the content of harmful elements P and S, to the level of w［P］≤0.012% and w［S］≤0.002%; It also controls the content of non-metallic inclusions, especially A and C inclusion contents to the lowest level. It maintains casting equipment at the same time, ensuring the inner quality of the casting billet. All properties of the trial products meet the standard of GB 713—2008 requirements, and for this type of steel, the experimental properties of resistance to hydrogen-induced cracking of steel (HIC) and stress corrosion cracking (SSCC) also fully meet the requirements of GB/T 8650—2006 and GB/T 4157—2006 standard.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：There are some edge cracks on hot roll strips of boron micro- alloyed medium carbon steel in Tangshan Iron and Steel Company during the process of FTSC thin slab production. Though the study on the high temperature thermo- plasticity of SS400B steel, it is discovered that the thermo- plasticity is the worst with the bend- straighten temperature at 750℃. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Thermodynamic analysis of an air brayton cycle driven by waste heat of BF slag
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on dry slag granulation and heat recovery system of BF (blast furnace) slag, an air Brayton cycle driven by waste heat of BF slag is proposed. A finite time thermodynamic (FTT) model of this cycle is established and its heat recovery performance is studied. The effects of the compressor pressure ratio, the compressor inlet relative pressure drop and the heat recovery temperature on the power, the heat recovery efficiency and the thermal efficiency of the cycle are analyzed by numerical examples. It is found that the maximum power and heat recovery efficiency can be reached by adjusting the compressor pressure ratio and the compressor inlet relative pressure drop; The higher heat recovery temperature, the larger the power, the heat recovery efficiency and the thermal efficiency, and also the larger the permissible range of compressor pressure ratio and the compressor inlet relative drop. Moreover, by taking power as objective, the compressor pressure ratio and the compressor inlet relative pressure drop are optimized. Result shows that the maximum power is 51.46kW, the maximum heat recovery efficiency is 11.98% and the corresponding thermal efficiency is 20.70%.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Simulation study of combution of low concentration of coke and carbon solution loss reaction
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A weight-loss behavior of coke in different particle size was researched through continuous thermal gravimetric device in low concentration of O2 and CO2. The combustion reaction and solution loss reaction of coke was analyzed through this device for simulating coke dry quenching (CDQ) process. The results show that the starting temperature of carbon combustion reaction and the temperature of solution loss reaction were about 550 and 800℃, respectively; with the decrease of the coke particle size and the increase of temperature and O2, CO2 concentration, the coke’s weight-loss amount increased. The kinetic parameters at low concentrations of coke combustion was obtained by analyzing the TG, DTG curves. The reaction process of coke in CDQ at different temperature region, composition of gas phase, combustion of red coke and coke solution loss reaction could be better simulated through continuous thermal gravimetric device. This can provide the theoretical direction of controlling the burning of coke and its effect oonthe coke quality in CDQ for the industry.

By introducing automatic burner system of TS- 3000 to increase the gas burning efficiency and make full use of the surplus oxygen to enrich burning furnace, developing hot blast stove alarm system to reduce the equipment failure rate, utilizing the use of blast furnace gas according to the blast furnace gas temperature and gas utilizing rate, reducing consumption, the goals that gas temperature achieving domestic advanced level and saving gas consumption were achieved at the same time.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of different proportion on grindability index and particle size distribution of mixed coal
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：To solve the grindability problem of pulverized coal injection into blast furnace, the variation of the grindability index of mixed coal, which was obtained by mixing three typical coals in different proportion, was studied and the relationship between grindability index and weighted grindability index was analyzed by Chi- square test. Results showed that there was a liner additive relationship between the grindability indexes of the mixed coal and the two sample coals. But in the condition of the particle size of 0.074mm, the particle size distribution of the mixed coal was not additive according to the concept of the particle size index, which was related to the difference in the grindability indexes of the two sample coals. The experiments indicated that when the coal that was mixed by the two sample coals with significant difference of the grindability index was grinded, the pulverizing mode in a small range of particle size was surfacegrinding, which was due to the promotion effect of the low grindability coal on the high grindability coal.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and application of smelting process of sulfur bearing steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Aimed at the problems existing in the traditional smelting process of sulfur bearing steel，the difficulties of sulfur-containing steel production is introduced. And through studying the slag washing technology with the compound deoxidizer block and steel refining promoter synthetic slag during electric furnace tapping，the slag with low sulfur capacity，the development of sulfur alloying technology，the optimization of Ca treatment technology，the development of VD furnace trapezoidal argon blowing control technology and the optimization of process control technology such as，soft blowing control technology，a new set of mature control technologies for smelting the sulfur steel is formed. It has improved the cleanliness of liquid steel，made the castability of liquid steel good，controlled the sulfur loss no more than 0.005% after VD vacuum processing，and achieved the stable bulk production of sulfur-containing steel，whose product quality is stable and meet the needs of the high-end customers.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of effect factors of smelting temperature of high- titanium- type blast furnace slag
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of the binary basicity and mass fractions of MgO, TiO2 and Al2O3 on the smelting temperature of high- taitaium- type blast furnace slag were analyzed after the mass fractions of TiO2 increased by the increase of the use ratio of vanadium- bearing titanomagnetite. The results showed that on the conditions that binary basicities were 0.9- 1.3, the mass fractions of MgO were 7.00%- 13.00%, the mass fractions of TiO2 were 21.00%- 25.00%, the mass fractions of Al2O3 were 13.00%- 16.00%, and other compositions were invariable, the smelting temperatures of high- titanium- type blast furnace slag increased gradually with the increase of the binary basicity and mass fraction of MgO, increased firstly and then decreased with the increase of the mass fraction of TiO2, decreased slightly with the increase of the mass fraction of Al2O3. Because the binary basicity could change in a ride range, it′s could adjust the smelting temperature of blast furnace slag prominently. It was hard to change the mass fractions of MgO, TiO2 and Al2O3, so the adjusting effect of MgO, TiO2 and Al2O3 on the smelting temperature was not significantly. When the mass fraction of TiO2 was 21.00%- 25.00%, the binary basicity of slag should not be more than 1.15 and the ternary basicity of slag should not be more than 1.60, otherwise the melting temperature of slag would rise significantly.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Discussion on ore- blending principle based on sintering foundational properties of iron ore fines of Qinggang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to provide basis for the batching optimization in the sintering production and give better advice on the sintering production, for 6 kinds of iron ore fines of Qinggang sinter, the high temperature basic properties, such as assimilation property, liquid phase generation characteristics, burning loss and decomposition characteristics of crystal water and so on, were researched, and the microstructure were analyzed. And the evaluation model was used to evaluate the iron ore fines. The result showed that the assimilation temperature of all the iron ore fines were less than 1 250 °C, which can satisfy the condition of low temperature sintering, and the iron ore E has the best assimilation property. At 1 240 °C, the liquidity index was suitable for the low temperature sinter, but at 1 280 °C, both the liquidity index and the amount of liquid phase were high. The burning loss and crystal water of the iron ore E reached high lever, and the content of crystal water of the iron ore F was the highest. The microstructure of the 6 kinds of iron ore fines had great difference, the surface of the iron ore C and D ore were smooth, and the water absorbing capacities were bad. Thus, the iron ore C and D were adverse for the improvement of pelleting. While, the surface of the iron ore A and B were rough, so these iron ores were suitable for pelleting. The iron ore fines were divided into four grades based on the evaluation results.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Technology of microporous multiple tube membrane filter for purifying cooling water in continuous casting process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to achieve energy conservation and emission reduction and reduce water pollution and water consumption per ton steel in iron and steel industry, technology of filter for continuous casting cooling water in converter steelmaking process was studied, and a filter device whose filter element is porous PVC ceramic composite pipe was successfully developed. Sludge which was obtained by the porous PVC ceramic composite pipe filter was detected, and it was found that the porous PVC ceramic composite pipe filter had a good separation function. Water quality was detected before and after filtration, and it was found that turbidity and suspended solids of water significantly reduced after filtration, and water quality has reached the requirements. Through industrial experiments and nearly three years of practical application, the best operating conditions and backwash conditions of the porous PVC ceramic composite pipe filter were obtained.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Relationship between alkali load and degradation of coke
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to research the relationship between alkali load and degradation of coke in Shougang blast furnace, a mathematic model of the circulatory accumulation of alkalis was used to calculate the final accumulation and distribution of alkalis in blast furnace. Then a series of experiments on coke solution had been taken in different concentration alkalis atmosphere. By means of inverse calculation, the degradation degree of coke under different alkali load conditions could be achieved. The result indicated that, the final accumulation of potassium and sodium in Shougang blast furnace were 34.89 and7.44kg/t. However, the coke in blast furnace had been degraded badly, CRI and CSR of which were 53.14% and 61.69%. If the damage of alkalis were expected to be controlled, the potassium load and sodium load would be restricted below 0.48 and 3.11kg/t.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Reduction of high temperature oxidation burning loss of 08Al slab
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to reduce the oxidation burning loss of 08Al slab，the effects of different heating conditions（atmosphere composition and temperature）on the oxidation kinetics of 08Al were investigated by simulating the high temperature oxidation process of 08Al slab. The results showed that the oxidation burning loss greatly decreased with the decrease of p(O2). When the volume fraction of O2 was less than 1%，the burning loss reduced by more than 70%. On the condition of 4% O2，the temperature decreased from 1 250 to 1 200 ℃，and the burning loss of 08Al steel decreased by 12%. Thus，reducing the p(O2) ratio was more effective in reducing the billet oxidation burning loss compared with reducing the temperature.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research of high performance Q460 structural steel with fire resistant and weather resistant
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the low C and Mn elements and the microalloying of Mo, Cu, Cr and Ni elements, the Q460 grade fire- resistant, weather resistant and earthquake resistant structural steel was developed by laboratory smelting and rolling, with the proper process of controlled rolling and controlled cooling. The mechanical properties, fire resistance at high temperature and atmospheric corrosion resistance of the plate were tested and analyzed. The results showed that Q460 steel had excellent toughness and plasticity, low yield strength ratio, good earthquake resistance, fire resistance and weather resistance, and could fully meet the requirements of high- performance structural steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the defects of roll marks in 2 230 cold- rolled galvanized wide gauge automobile sheet, the SIAS strip inspection system and ZEISS scanning electron microscope were used to macroscopically describe the shape of roll marks. The microscopic characteristics of the scanning electron microscope result was analyzed. Finally, the forming process of roll marks was determined. By improving the groove surface quality, reconstructing the groove surface of sink roll, avoiding the cooling tower strip deviation, the problem of the defects of roll marks was solved, which had achieved remarkable application effect.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Reason for failure of hot dip galvanizing on cold rolled DP780 steel and its preventive measures
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：To solve the problem of pretermission of plating for the high- strength dual- phase steel produced by the hot dip galvanizing line, based on the analysis of macro and micro structure, chemistry and the formation mechanism of plating leakage, it was defined that the main cause of the surface plating leakage cold- rolled high- strength DP780 steel product, the failure of galvanization sometimes happens locally on the surface, leading to the plating leakage. Both macroscopic and microscopic characteristics and the composition of defect regions were examined. It is concluded that such defects result from the selective oxidation of Si and Mn in steel during annealing, which can block the thermite reaction of Fe and liquid zinc. Accordingly, the increasing of dew point and the decrease of hydrogen gas pressure in the annealing atmosphere have been realized to successfully prevent such defect.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The energy and environment department of Shougang Jingtang Corporation takes the responsibility of providing energy medium for the main process of iron steel,in which the devices are advanced, large quantity and complex, wide distribution.Therefore, ensuring the equipment longterm stable controlled operation has become a top priority of the equipment system.By absorbing the advanced domestic and foreign equipment management theory, combining with the actual andtaking various measures, forms a set of self owned equipment management system is formed. Meanwhile, taking many measures for equipment management can improve equipment maintenance and management level. It realizes the long term stable operation of the equipment for nearly ten months, and the fault defect rates decrease by more than 50%, which can provide a reliable guarantee for the sustainable development of enterprises.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The technology of chemical water treatment and circulating water treatment of 3×33 MV·A silicon-calcium alloy electric furnace 1×7.5 MW waste heat power plant is expounded. The methods of chemical waste water treatment，reverse osmosis，water vapor chemical supervision and fault treatment are discussed. The boiler used in the power station is a small low-pressure boiler. The main drainage of the boiler water treatment is the filter backwashing water and the mixed bed regenerated wastewater. After being treated by the neutralization pond，the wastewater is produced with the exception of turbidity and salt content. Harmful components，can be directly discharged，the total emissions of 11.32 t/h. The sets of silicon calcium alloy electric furnace waste heat power plant chemical water treatment and circulating water system has been running for one year to lower equipment investment and operation and maintenance costs to protect the cooling needs of boilers and equipment，running well and achieved a high economic income.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Design and optimization of 13t flat ingot geometry by solidification numerical simulation
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A three dimensional finite element model to simulate solidification of large steel ingot with heat, flow and solute transfer coupled calculation was developed. The results such as solid fraction, shrinkage pipes and segregation were verified by experimental and numerical studies. The distribution of porosity and segregation in a 13.1t flat ingot was predicted and the relationship between flakiness ratio and slenderness ratio, and ingot internal defects such as soundness and homogeneity were also revealed. More obvious improvement of porosity and segregation in Q235 steel ingot than that in 70CrMn ingot was observed. It is inferred that the commonly used mould should be designed and optimized under high alloyed steels solidification condition. The accompanied appearance of porosity and segregation should be carefully considered in the numerical model predicting these solidification defects.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 摘要 转炉一次风机的正常运行是保证转炉安全稳定生产的关键因素之一。影响一次风机正常运行的原因较多，喘振现象是致命问题。部分钢厂因为转炉一次风机喘振失控，导致风机振动急剧升高，影响正常生产；甚至发生因喘振而导致的烟气管道吸扁，被迫停产的事故。以二类喘振为例进行了产生原因分析，结合实际提出了相应的解决对策，经实施后取得了良好的效果。

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Causes and countermeasures for the surge of primary dust-fan of rotary furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The normal running of the primary dust-fan is one of the key factors which ensure safety and stable production of BOF. Many factors do exist affecting its running in order, and surge is a fatal one. In some steelmaking plants, losing control on surge of primary dust-fan will cause furious vibration and impact on normal production finally. More seriously, the dust pipeline compressed due to surge and the factory may be forced to shut down eventually. The factors which may cause the surge were analyzed by two kinds as example, and the relevant countermeasures based on practical situation was proposed, and got a good effect after implement.
keywords_en: Keywords: Rotary Furnace, Primary Dust-Fan, Surge, Countermeasure Diagram

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 韶钢气烧石灰竖窑提质增产实践
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Shaoguan Iron and Steel Group Co.， Ltd.， Shaoguan 512123， Guangdong， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Practice in Improving Quality and Increasing Yield for Gas-Burning Lime Shaft-Kiln at SISG
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the situation that the calorific value of blast furnace gas is reduced greatly, satisfactory results of improving product quality, increasing product yield and reducing production costs have been achieved through the equipments modification and technologies improvement for gas-burning lime shaft-kiln in the Calcination Plant at SISG. By increasing the height of kiln roof and improving kiln top structure, the temperature of the kiln roof is significantly reduced, thereby protecting the kiln top facilities and improving the thermal characteristics of the kiln. Gas supply technology and equipments were improved, which increases the pressures of air and blast furnace gas into the kiln and speeds up the blast furnace gas mixed with air and combustion rate. The application of double preheating technology greatly increases the temperature in the kiln. The production conditions of lime kiln are improved by optimizing the size ratio of raw materials and modifying the charging and discharging processes.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 温度对高磷鲕状赤铁矿含碳球团直接还原影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: HE Peng,WANG Hai- feng,GAO Jian- jun
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: State Key Laboratory of Advanced Steel Processes and Products, Central Iron and Steel Research Institute, Beijing 100081, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of temperature on direct reduction of carbon bearing pellets of high phosphorus oolitic hematite
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The mechanism and factors affecting the direct reduction of high phosphorus oolitic hematite were investigated. The results showed the final metallizing ratio of pellets increased obviously with the increase of heating temperature when the reaction temperature was low than 1100℃. But increasing temperature had little effect on the pellet metallization rate when the reaction temperature was over 1100℃. And the higher the metallizing ratio of pellets, the better the magnetic concentrate iron grade. The reduction temperature affected significantly not only the metallizing ratio of pellets, but also the growth of metallic iron crystals. Therefore, it was essential to control a suitable temperature for direct reduction of high phosphorus oolitic hematite pellets containing carbon.

2. MCC Energy Conservation and Environmental Protection Co.,Ltd., Beijing 100088， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Discussion on dust steam catcher purification system for hot stuffy with pressure of molten slag
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The hot stuffy process with pressure of the molten slag is not only the most advanced technology in the area of steel slag processing currently, but also effective technical support to solve the problems of the storage of steel slag and resource utilization and so on. The dust steam catcher purification system was discussed from dust steam catcher,the system air volume calculation and the choice of purification equipment for high temperature,high humidity,paroxysmal dust which was generated during roller broken and cooling process of hot stuffy process with pressure of the molten slag, which can achieve the standard discharge of dust steam emissions under the precondition that the steel slag was processed.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 水冷模铸造技术的研究现状
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: GENG Ming- shan，CAO Jian- ning，LIU Yan
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Technical Research Institute， MCC Capital Engineering and Research Incorporation Limited， Beijing 100176， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research status of water- cooled mould casting technology
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Large ingots are mainly used for the production of supper thickness plate, and with the increase of the ingot mass, the porosity is deep on the upper of the ingot, which reduces the metal yield, and makes the organization density relatively poor and the segregation serious. The large- rectangular ingot quality becomes the bottlenech of the heavy plate mill capacity. Based on a large deal of foreign literatures, combined with the domestic current situation of the water- cooled mould casting technical, the patents of the water- cooled mould casting technology were summarized, and the influences of water- cooled mould casting technical on the solidification speed of ingot, the uniformity of solidified shell of ingot, the solidified structure and loose shrinkage cavity, and the segregation of ingot were elaborated. Industrial tests of ingot casting with water- cooled mould casting technical and rolling were introduced, and the performance of the steel plate was clarified. The intensive water- cooled mould casting technology for producting large rectangular ingot can provide the blanks for the high quality supper thickness plate.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 钢厂与城市共生关系
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Environmental Operations Consulting Department， CISDI Chongqing Environmental Consulting Co.， Ltd.， Chongqing 400013， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Symbiotic relationship between steel mills and cities
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：China’s large and mediumsized steel mills are generally located in cities, and with the rapid developing of cities in recent years, the contradictions between the steel mills and new requirement of urban development are more and more obvious, including the environment, energy, socioeconomic and other aspects. And the survival space of steel mills in cities is squeezed. By analyzing the relationship of urban mills and cities, including social economy, upstream and downstream industries, energy resources and environmental quality, the main contradiction between them was sorted out, which can provide basis for the study of how to transform and upgrading steel mills in order to fit for the rapid development of cities.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 基于AutoCAD的自动化系统原理图快速出图系统
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: University of Science and Technology Beijing， Beijing 100083， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Rapid Plotting System of Automation System Principle Diagram Based on AutoCAD
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
During the engineering stage of automatic system， there is a lot of duplicate work in the process of con- struction drawing design. In this paper， we analysis the reasons for the problem and provide a solution in order to increase the speed of plotting. According to the practical item， a rapid plotting system of automation system princi- ple diagram is developed. By ActiveX Automation technique and VBA language， the system uses the AutoCAD as second development platform and contains three main parts， which are user-interface，template library of drawings and back database. It runs well in practical application and reduces the amount of repetitive work， and therefore sig- nificantly improve the speed of mapping and overall work efficiency.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 闫世宏. 基于AutoCAD的自动化系统原理图快速出图系统[J]. 中国冶金, 2013, 23(8): 20-25. YAN Shi-hong. Rapid Plotting System of Automation System Principle Diagram Based on AutoCAD. China Metallurgy, 2013, 23(8): 20-25.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Characteristics of Inclusions in 20Cr13 Stainless Steel Hot-Rolled Round Bar
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The size, quantity, distribution, morphology and composition of inclusions in cross section and longitudinal section of 20Cr13 stainless steel hot-rolled round bar, which produced with the EAF-VOD-LF-IC process, were synthetically studied by means of scanning electronic microscopy (SEM) and energy dispersive spectroscopy (EDS). The results showed that the inclusions were mainly MnO-Al2O3, MnS and duplex inclusions formed by MnS or MnO-Al2O3 precipitating upon silicate; the number of inclusions as well as the number and the ratio of duplex inclusions increased from surface to center of 20Cr13 stainless steel hot-rolled. The diameter and the aspect ratio of inclusions in cross section were mainly less than 3μm and 3, respectively. In the longitudinal section, the average length of inclusions become longer obviously and the average length and the average aspect ratio of inclusions at center were 9.53μm and 8.22, respectively.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence Factors of Nuclear Power Plant Reactor Pressure Vessel on Irradiation Embrittlement
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The performance degradation of nuclear power plant reactor pressure vessel (RPV) will happen after neutron irradiation in service conditions. Relevant researches show that factors of the material properties and work environment are associated with the irradiation embrittlement. The material properties are the RPV steel properties that associate with the irradiation embrittlement, including the chemical component, microstructure and grain size; and the work environment is the RPV service condition which connects with the embrittlement, containing the neutron fluence, neutron fluence rate, neutron energy spectrum and irradiation temperature.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LI Zhan- jun,LIU Gong- guo,QIN Jie,QI Jian- ling
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: State Key Laboratory of Vanadium and Titanium Resources Comprehensive Utilization， Pangang Group Research Institute Co.， Ltd., Panzhihua 617000, Sichuan， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Causes and countermeasures of bottom rising of the rotary hearth furnace in vanadium titanium magnetite direct reduction process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The problem of bottom rising of the rotary hearth furnace (RHF) in vanadium titanium magnetite direct reduction process was analyzed. On this basis, related laboratory experiments were carried. It shows that the silicate glass, olivine and iron oxides were the main agglomeration matters. The results of experiment show that particle size of the materials of the RHF was the main factor leading to bottom rising and secondary main was the reduction temperature and reaction time. Based on the research results and combining the conditions of the pilot plant measures were carried out to prevent bottom rising, such as optimizing process parameters of raw materials and RHF system. After that the technical indexes of dried pellets were improved, and the bottom rising problem was controlled. Moreover, RHF was running smoothly.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: SHAO Chuan- wei,YAN Wei,REN Yi- bin,SHAN Yi- yin,YANG Ke
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Shenyang Advanced Materials Research and Development Center, Institute of Metal Research, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Shenyang 110016, Liaoning, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Flexure deformation of quenching on 65Mn circular saw blade
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Metal circular saw blade is widely used in the cutting of metal materials and stones, which has a vital position in industries. Quenching is the first step of the production of circular saw blade and has a significant effect on the quality of saw blade. It has been found that the 1200 class 65Mn circular saw blade has a remarkable flexure deformation after quenching and flattening treatment, but this deformation disappears after second quenching and flattening treatment. Based on the microstructure and hardness of the quenched 65Mn saw blade and by use of the MARC simulation software, the heating process of first quenching treatment was studied. It was found that after the first heating process in which the temperature ranges between 715.9℃ and 702.2℃ the saw blade was not fully austenitized. In the second heating process, since the austenitizing rate of martensite exceed the lamellar pearlite, the austenitizing degree and the relevant properties of the saw blade were improved, and thus the flexure deformation disappeared.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHANG Wei-dong， CHEN Hui， ZHANG Mei
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Investigation on a Novel Low-Carbon Ironmaking Technology Using Non-Coking Coal
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The low-carbon ironmaking technology on co-treatment of non-coking coal and iron-ore fines was proposed through investigating the characteristics of carbonization of non-coking coal and iron ore. The results showed that the percent metallization of the iron ore fines was up to 85% at 800℃ of carbonization temperature, and 60% of metallic iron was already reduced by hydrogen. The amount of CO2 release in this low-carbon ironmaking technology has been reduced by 0.67 ton per ton metallic iron, It indicated that the new process was with good benefits of economy and environment.
