http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LIU Yan-qiang,YIN Shi-chao,WANG Lei-chuan,JING Cai-liang,LUO Lei,ZHANG Bing-long
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Steelmaking Department， Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Tangshan 063200, Hebei, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Formation reasons and counter-measures of transverse corner cracks in continuous casting slabs
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the transverse corner cracks in micro-alloyed steel, the formation reasons of transverse corner cracks in continuous casting slab were determined focusing on continuous casting process parameters, and the control measures were proposed. Through optimizing secondary cooling water, stabilizing mould level, enhancing equipment precision accuracy, adjusting the width of secondary cooling nozzle, employing chamfered mould corner, and controlling nitrogen absorption in molten steel, the slab surface quality is increased. And the transverse corner cracks in continuous casting slab were improved with the occurrence of such defects decreasing from 24% to 2%.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: S275JR厚规格热轧卷表面裂纹成因分析与改进
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: JING Cai- liang,LIU Yan- qiang，SONG Jia- you,WANG Sheng- dong，PENG Guo- zhong
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Ironmaking Department， Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Tangshan 063200， Hebei, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of surface crack on thick gauge S275JR steel strip and technological improvement
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A problem occurred that a lot of surface crack defects appeared on the center of strip during the rolling process of thick gauge S275JR hot rolled strip steel in the plant. The macroscopic feature, chemical composition, metallographic structure of the defect were studied and results showed that this kind of surface crack defect was caused by the micro-crack on the steel slab surface. Based on this analysis, the ［S］ content, superheat, mold cooling intensity and mold powder were optimized during S275JR production. Industrial practice showed that the surface crack defects rate was decreased from 12% to 0.93% after the technological improvement.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 优化球团原料的配矿
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: CHEN Xiao-long，LI Jia-xin，YANG Jia-long，CHUN Tie-jun，GUO Qi-fei
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （School of Metallurgical Engineering， Anhui University of Technology， Ma′anshan 243002， Anhui， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Ore blending by optimizing pelletizing raw material
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of pelletizing with blending two different quality of iron ore fines on the properties of pellets was studied in the same pelletizing process and bentonite addition conditions，by using two different iron ore fines（high iron low silicon magnetite and low iron high silicon magnetite）and bentonite as the raw materials，and taking the drop strength of green pellet，compressive stress of green pellet，compressive stress of roasted pellet as the evaluating indexes. The results showed that as the ratio of high silicon low iron ore increased，the drop strength and compressive strength of the green pellet decreased，and the compressive strength of roasted pellets also decreased. Through optimizing the ore blending，with the ratio of high silicon low iron ore up to 40%，the drop strength of green pellet was more than 3 times，the compressive stress of green pellet was more than 20 N，and the compressive strength of roasted pellet was 3 850 N，which can fully meet the requirements of production.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 陈小龙，李家新，杨佳龙，春铁军，郭其飞. 优化球团原料的配矿[J]. 中国冶金, 2016, 26(9): 18-22. CHEN Xiao-long，LI Jia-xin，YANG Jia-long，CHUN Tie-jun，GUO Qi-fei. Ore blending by optimizing pelletizing raw material. China Metallurgy, 2016, 26(9): 18-22.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WANG Qing-guo, LI Jing-she, TANG Hai-yan, WANG Hong-bin, NING Xiao-jun
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research on Cleanliness of 82B Steel Billet Produced by LD-LF-CC Process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The total oxygen content, the number and particle size distribution as well as the chemical composition and type of microinclusions and macroinclusions of 82B steel billet produced by LD-LF-CC process have been analyzed systematically by means of using tracer to show the source of non-metallic inclusions, sampling billet systematically and comprehensive analysis in laboratory. The results showed that the total oxygen content and the number of microinclusions in billet were 28.42×10-6 and 17.78 pieces/mm2 respectively on average， and microinclusions which particle size distribute 0-4μm and 4-10μm accounted for 87.21% and 12.22% respectively. The main types of microinclusions were compound oxide and compound oxide with CaS. There were big differences in macroinclusion content of different billets, and macroinclusions exceeding 300μm took the most part in mass. The formation of macroinclusions related to ladle refractory erosion and slag intrainment in tundish.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 汪庆国，李京社，唐海燕，王宏斌，宁晓钧. LD－LF－CC工艺生产的82B钢铸坯洁净度研究[J]. 中国冶金, 2011, 21(11): 34-39. WANG Qing-guo, LI Jing-she, TANG Hai-yan, WANG Hong-bin, NING Xiao-jun. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Manufacturing Department of Handan Iron and Steel Group Co., Ltd., Hebei Iron and Steel Group, Handan 056015, Hebei, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis and countermeasures of the source of alkali and zinc in blast furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Through the analysis and balance calculation on content of kalium, sodium and zinc of blast furnace raw fuel, it was summarized that the sinter and pellets are the main source; the slag is the important way for alkalis removal and the bag dust and the gravity dust is the main way for zinc removal. The measures to reduce alkalis and zinc enrichment were introduced, such as less using of high alkali and zinc content of raw materials, removing alkali and zinc in waste material, reducing the basicity of slag, reducing the block adsorption，etc. to reduce the harm of alkalis and zinc to the blast furnace.

1.Beijing Metallurgical Equipment Research and Design Institute Co., Ltd., Beijing 100029
2.National Astronomical Observatories, Beijing 100012
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Classification and coding of metallurgical equipment based on ontology
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：With the continuous development of metallurgical information, the reform in many areas is deepening, including material purchasing management, equipment asset management, project construction management. It is necessary for information standardization and scientific management concerning metallurgical equipment and spare parts. The construction for the “unified classification and coding” standard system is imminent. With the help of the theory and method of ontology, the definition of metallurgical equipment in terms of concept and property is given. And the domain ontology of metallurgical equipment is built. Based on this, the more scientific and practical classification and coding of metallurgical equipment are proposed, which meet the demands for sharing and reuse of the metallurgical equipment information.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: HOU Xin-gang1，YAO Xia-yan1，JIANG Li-li1,2，LI Chuan-tong1，CUI Zhi-kai1，PEI Lie-fei1
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
（1. College of Materials Science and Engineering， Lanzhou University of Technology， Lanzhou 730050， Gansu， China
2. College of Metallurgy， Northeastern University， Shenyang 110006， Liaoning， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research status and progress of anti-scaling property of magnetized water
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The technology of magnetic anti-scaling has been applied into industry and agriculture，which has brought obvious economic benefit in these areas. However，because the theory study falls behind the applied study，there is still not a consistent theory that can explain the scale prevention mechanism. It has affected the application and development of this technology. Therefore，in order to study the magnetic anti-scaling mechanism，firstly the research status of the anti-scaling property of the magnetized water were reviewed. Based on the variation of the physicochemical property of the magnetized water，the previous two diametrically opposed views to explain the changing reasons were discussed，which were whether the magnetic treatment can promote the change of the molecular structure of water. And the reasons for the divergence of the views were also analyzed. And then，the effect of magnetic treatment on the microstructure and composition structure of the crystal as well as the factors affecting the magnetic anti-scaling effect were described. At last，the future development trend of the magnetic anti-scaling technology was also proposed.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 超临界水氧化轧钢含油污泥减量无害化处理

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Reduction and harmless treatment for rolling oily sludge by supercritical water oxidation
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The oily sludge of steel rolling contains a large amount of oil, complex organic compound, iron oxide and heavy metals, which are recognized as a hazardous solid waste. Conventional methods have limitations, such as incineration and landfill, which not only occupy a large area, but also cause the secondary pollution of the ecological environment. Based on the advantages of supercritical water oxidation (SCWO) technology for the treatment of organic waste, the test of the degradation of the oily sludge of steel rolling in Baosteel was conducted. Single factor analysis was used to determine the process parameters, the result showed that the reaction temperature was 440 ℃, the reaction pressure was 25 MPa, the time was 330 s, and the O2 excess was 300%, the removal rate of outflow COD was close to 98%, and the remaining solid volume decreased by about 98.5% after the reaction. In addition, the mass fraction of iron oxide in solids reached more than 30%, which can be used to achieve the resource utilization. In short, the reduction and harmless effects were obvious by using the SCWO technology for the treatment of the oily sludge of steel rolling, which achieved the exceptive goal and can provide a certain reference for the same type of oily sludge of steel rolling treatment in China.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application of MTA waste gas analysis in VOD process for decarburization
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to control the carbon content at the end point of VOD decarburization process, taking the decarburization process of stainless steel in a 120 t VOD furnace in a steel plant as the research object, the waste gas was analyzed by the MTA waste gas analysis system to know the change law of CO, CO2 and other components over time during VOD refining. At the same time, on the basis of the material carbon balance calculations, a control model of the carbon content at the end point of VOD refining process based on the waste gas analysis was established, and the carbon change in the molten bath during the refining process was analyzed. By examining the deviation between the actual value and the predicted value, it was verified that the model can predict the overall trend of the carbon content, and the calculation results obtained from the model showed that the precision of carbon mass fraction at the end point of VOD treatment was within ±3×10-4, which inoculated with the measured ones.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to obtain better quantitative analysis for liquid steel，the technology of laser induced breakdown（LIBS） is used to establish the support vector machine model，whose parameters are optimized by the genetic algorithm. The experimental verification is performed on Mn element concentration in the liquid steel，which is comparing the support vector machine model with the traditional method. And the three reference quantities，namely，root mean square error，relative standard error and the correlation coefficient，which are obtained from the experimental results，are 0.612%，9.37% and 0.948，respectively. Results show that the genetic algorithm of support vector machine model can have certain enhancement in the analytical performance.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Structure of alloy melts and a thermodynamic model based on atom- molecule theory in alloy melts
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the research of the structure of molten metal, it has been proved that the short- range order structures is existing in molten metal and atom- molecule clusters have been found in alloy melts containing intermetallic compounds, that is to say, the intermetallic compounds in solid do not disappear in alloy melts. Actually, clusters in alloy melts are exiting in molecules, which constitutes chemical equilibrium with free atoms in melts. On the basis of the structure of molten metal, a atom- molecule thermodynamic model which is suitable for the molten metal has been put forward. Then taking the Ca- Mg alloy melts for example, the modelling and solving method of the thermodynamic model has been introduced and the mole fraction of each component in Ca- Mg alloy melts has been calculated at 1010K. By comparison, the calculated mole fractions are consistent with the reported activities of Ca and Mg in Ca- Mg binary melts, which has proved both metal atoms and intermetallic compound molecules are simultaneously existing in alloy melts and are in the dynamic chemical balance. When they reach the chemical balance, the mole fraction of metal atoms actually equals their activity. Therefore, there is no activity for alloy melts.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of different conveying ways on thermal stress distribution of slab
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：As to the process of the slab conveying，the thermal elastoplastic model was established based on the heat transfer model of the slab. The thermal stress distribution of the slab were studied under the condition of different conveying ways. Results showed that the surface and center of the slab were effected by the tensile stress and compressive stress respectively in the process of roller conveying. The maximum tensile stress was 75 MPa at the place where is about 0.23 m from the edge in the width direction of the slab，and the thermal stress decreased with time. In the process of heat-preserved，the central area and the surrounding of stacking slabs were subjected to the compressive stress and tensile stress，respectively. The thermal stress first increased and then decreased in the top and the center of stacking slabs. In the process of stack cooling，the thermal stress distribution and the change tendency in the top and the center of stacking slabs were similar to that in the process of heat-preserved，but the peak value was up to 94 MPa.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of tundish fluxes on cleanliness of 430 stainless steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to improve the cleanliness of 430 stainless steel，the effect of different melting point tundish fluxes on the cleanliness of 430 steel was analyzed by using the optical microscope，the scanning electron microscope and the electron probe. The results showed that the inclusion composition of 430 ferritic stainless steel produced by two kinds of basic fluxes powder were mainly CaO- SiO2- Al2O3- MgO. The tundish fluxes had little effect on the inclusion formed in the molten steel and can not change the inclusion type. When the tundish flux of low melting point was used in tundish，the inclusion number of 430 slab was smaller obviously than that when the tundish flux of high melting point was used.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Lap welding process model and welding quality control technology for continuous annealing unit
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the welding quality problem of virtual welding and excessive welding in resistance lap welding of continuous annealing unit，the calculation models of the heat required for nugget and the effective heat in welding process were established based on the equipment and process features of lap welding after analyzing the main influencing factors of welding quality. By these two models，the quantitative calculation of the required heat under the premise of the given penetration rate was realized，and the quantitative calculation of the effective heat under the given welding parameters was also realized. Then，the weld quality was described by the penetration rate. The optimal welding parameters of the specified weld penetration rate（the optimal weld quality）were calculated by making the required heat equal to the effective heat. Thus，the setting method for the welding process parameters and mathematical model were established by combining the heat calculation model required for nugget with the effective heat calculation model，further，a set of welding quality control technology was formed. Later it was applied to a production line of continuous annealing unit in one steel mill，which improved the welding quality，avoid the defect of virtual welding and excessive welding，reduced the welding test time and test materials for the new steel production，and created significant benefits.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Design Conception of Steelmaking Slag Utilization Process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：This paper analyzes the benefits of different steelmaking slag utilization ways, the results show that the slag pyrolyzing technology is the best steelmaking slag utilization way, because chemic properties of the slag which treated by pyrolyzing way is steady-going, and the steel is also separated from slag completely. So pyrolyzing way should be used in the slag treating process propriety. Practical experience has proved that is difficult to pick out the steel from slag if the slag is not grinded, so grinding procedure must be designed in the steel slag treating process. And the times of sieve separation and magnetic separation should be proper, as designing the steel slag treating process.

By optimizing and innovating the technology and constantly improving the product quality and usage, the customer requirements for different quality of iron oxide powder are satisfied by constantly, the acid regeneration and first- grade product rate of ferric oxide powder are effectively enhanced, and the environmental impact of by- products from iron and steel enterprises is reduced. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and application analysis of efficient utilization of solid waste in Shougang Jingtang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The rational use of solid waste generated in the iron and steel process to achieve its harmless and efficient use is of great significance to the energy conservation and emission reduction and environmental pollution reduction. In order to determine the application effect of coking solid waste in coal blending, 300 kg semi- industrial coking experiment with coking dust and the mixing proportion of coking dust and biochemical sludge were conducted by Shanxi Coking Company of Tangshan Shougang Jingtang. The results showed that the recycling ratio of coking dust should be below 1.5% and the mixing ratio of coking dust and biochemical sludge should be controlled between 20%- 25%. Based on the previous research and current production situation of Jingtang coking plant, coking dust- ash recycling process device was designed and successfully applied. On the condition of the coal blending and coke quality remaining stable, the problems of coking dust and biochemical sludge were successfully solved, which realized the cyclic utilization of coking solid wastes.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence of coke charging patterns on burden structure and gas flow distribution in melter gasifier
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Charging mode determines the burden voidage which directly affects the distribution of the gas flow. The discrete element model for burden structure and porous medium model for gas flow were established which were based on self-programming and Fluent software. Combined the two models, the changes of burden structure and gas flow distribution under different coke charging patterns in melter gasifier can be simulated meanwhile, gas velocity vectors, streamlines and mass flux were obtained. The results showed that the burden structure information calculated by the discrete element model can be used as the boundary conditions inputting into gas flow model. And the result of gas flow model indicated that gas passage ways was formed at the position of coke charging along the all-coke zone, which can improve the burden permeability. However, the addition amount of coke should be controlled to avoid gas excessive development, which can affect the utilization rate of gas. The inhomogeneous bed gas flow law calculated by the simulation can be used as reference in the coke charing patterns for melter gasifier.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Experimental Study on Removal of NO Based on H2O2/UV System
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A gas exhausting simulation experimental device was designed and manufactured. In this system, UV was used to motivate the generation of active group from H2O2 so as to removal NO from gas by oxidation process. Different removal effects were studied, which were impacted by factors including concentration of H2O2, initial concentration of NO, concentration of O2, temperature of H2O2 solution, concentration of metal ionic catalyst, gas flow, etc. Orthogonal experiments were undertaken to obtain the best technological condition of this system. The analysis of the reaction product shows that the major constituent in the last reaction solution were NO-3、NO-2、Fe3+ and superfluous H2O2. Under the best technological condition, orthogonal experiments show that the removal effect of NO could reach 88.6% which exceeds that of the other technologies. The result of this study shows good application value.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Deformation of Spherical Inclusions in Steel Sheet During Cold Rolling Process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The deformation of hard inclusion in the cold rolling process of DC03 steel sheet has been focused on, and the effects of reduction, inclusion size and position in the strip were investigated. A two-dimensional elastic-plastic finite element model of five-stand tandem rolling was established with ANSYS/LS-DYNA analysis software. The process of continuous rolling was simulated by a small scale restart method. The results show that the simulated results are reliable. The deformation of inclusions increases with reducing of the thickness of strip, enlarging of inclusion’s diameter and decreasing of the distance between the inclusion and the surface of strip. Meanwhile, when the diameter of inclusions are larger than 20μm, it is mostly likely to form the crack due to the crashed of inclusion when the thickness of strip is rolled from 3.0mm to 0.7mm.

1. College of Materials Science and Engineering, Lanzhou University of Technology, Lanzhou 730050, Gansu, China

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis on mechanism and influencing factors of scale removal by magnetized circulating water treatment for anti-scaling
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Scaling is a universal phenomenon for industrial circulating cooling water. In order to study the mechanism of the scale removal by the magnetized circulating water treatment for anti-scaling, the influences of the change in the physical properties of the magnetized water (viscosity, surface tension and the number of hydrogen bonding) and the change in the scaling structure (aragonite and calcite) on the variation of the system energy were summarized by the literature investigation on the study of the magnetized circulating water treatment for anti-scaling. Combining with the factors affecting the effect of the scale removal by the magnetized circulating water treatment for anti-scaling, for the divergence of the magnetic anti-fouling mechanism, the mechanism was discussed on the basis of the relevant experimental results about energy. When the liquid water was in the magnetic field, the number of the hydrogen bonds was increased, which formed more hydrated ions. It resulted in the reduction of the scale formation, the decrease of the system energy and the increase of the activation energy which can promote the transformation of hard deposit to soft dirt. The variation caused by the redistributing of the system energy can explain the common magnetic theory. And the factors affecting the scale removal by the magnetized water treatment were discussed.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to reasonably use fuels and reduce production cost, the effects of coke and coal powders on chemical composition, mineral structure and component, and metallurgical properties of sinter were studied in laboratory. In all tests, the iron ore blends were selected as the iron-contained materials for sintering experiments. When the coke powder was used as the solid fuel in sintering process, the reducibility of sinter at 900℃ was slightly improved while the low temperature reduction degradation index of sinter was worsened. However, with the coal powders as the sintering solid fuel, the mechanical strength and low temperature reduction degradation index of sinter were improved because more interweaving corroded structure formed in sintering process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The harmful elements such as K，Na，Pb，Zn，Cu，As，Sn and their distribution in burden and production of blast furnaces in Lianyuan Iron and Steel Group Co., Ltd were analyzed. The distribution of harmful elements in sinter, pellet, lump ore, coke, pig iron, slag and their carrier such as scaffolding, refractory, leftover pig iron were also studied by instruments such as optic microscope, Xray spectrometer and scanning electronic microscope. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The practice of the process control of low-cost ironmaking in Xinye Iron and Steel Group Co. was summarized. To achieve the goal of low cost of ironmaking, each department of the ironmaking plant made great efforts. On the basis of stable and smooth operation of BF, several key measures have been taken including optimization of ore blending of sintering, strengthening management of ore before charging, increase in the ratio of sinter, lumpy ore and nut coke in every charging batch, and enhancement of the ratio of pulverized coal injection and enriched oxygen. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Gas-solid two-phase fluid mechanics and empirical formulas were applied to obtain the structural design formulas of gas-solid ejectors with pneumatic conveying. The influences of the structures and parameters on the gas-solid ejectors were studied. Results showed that when the ejecting coefficient value was less than the limitation ejection coefficient (set as 7.4), reducing compression pressure can contribute to a slow increase of the ejecting coefficient. At the same ejecting coefficient, the ejection compression pressure reached a maximum when (f3/fp*)y was equal to 14. And with the best characteristic curve section ratio (f3/fp*)y of 14, the maximum pressure drop value Δp/pE was minimum of 0.037 at u=7 and a maximum of 0.065 at u=0. If the injector nozzle distance was less than 21 mm, solid-gas ratio m increased with the S increasing. Otherwise, a chocking phenomenon appeared. When the Lm/dm ratio was 9, m can obtain a higher value.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Oxygen lance nozzle consists of the contraction and expansion two segments, whether the type of line is reasonable or not directly affects the flow of the stand or fall of performance. So the choice of the reasonable design method of nozzle design has important significance on the nozzle design. Based on the analytical method the contraction and expansion periods of a supersonic nozzle are designed, which are calculated using the CFD numerical simulation technology. By analyzing the oxygen lance nozzle jet properties based on the analytical method, it is concluded that the internal pressure is reduced, the speed is increased and the pressure loss is small. At the same time, the paragraphs fluid can stable transition, Mach number of the exit meets the design requirements.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The localized application of dry gas cleaning technology which are applied in Xuangang 150t converter were discussed. Effective innovation process and method were developed to solve three key problems, namely explosion venting, soot formation in evaporative cooler, corrosions of polar and plate in electrostatic precipitator. The effect was remarkable. Explosion venting mechanism was discussed in detail according to different smelting stage. Zero- explosion- venting operation was proposed specifically. Computer simulation technology was used to optimize evaporative cooler and electrostatic precipitator. Goals such as no soot formation in evaporative cooler, no corrosion and deformation on polar and plate in electrostatic precipitator, zero explosion venting were achieved. The localized application of dry gas cleaning technology which was successfully applied in Xuangang Steel provides a powerful reference to domestic steel plants of the populization and promotion of this technology.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Typical morphology of tensile fracture and non- metallic inclusion in 82B wire rod were observed and detected, and surface quality and central structure of corroded metallographic specimen were inspected by means of scanning electric microscope (SEM) and optical microscope. Results show that the broken reason for the black center with white point fracture was the big slag inclusion; the broken reason for the plane shaped fracture was core martensite, central network cementite, border local carburetion and non- metallic inclusions; the broken reason for the cross section of chrysanthemum fracture was the core martensite and shrinkage cavity in central porosity; the broken reason for the split fracture was the carbonic segregation; the broken reason for the pencil- tip shaped fracture was the inversed V- type micro cracks and network cementite.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The application for FC-Mold (Flow Control Mold) technology is researched in Ansteel slab caster, and the fluctuations of liquid steel in different parameters are emphasis researched. The results show that the fluctuation of liquid steel can be decreased 50% by using FC-Mold, and the value is decreased from ± 5mm to ± 2mm. The casting velocity can be increased by using FC-Mold. The effect of FC-Mold is increased with increasing of current. And FC-Mold can restrain the unstable liquid steel from velocity changing. The statistic application results for 610 strands show that the degraded ratio for automobile steel is decreased 6%.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Under the premise of dust emission standards below 10 mg/m3, the 210 t converter dry dust removal system was discussed. The design of the process system mainly included the optimization selection of the evaporative cooler, electrostatic precipitator, axial fan, three- phase intelligent frequency conversion power supply, piping system and dry dust removal process. Finally, the diameter of the evaporative cooler was set as 6 m and the diameter of the electrostatic precipitator was set as 11.6 m. At the same time, the control technology using the combination of IGBT frequency conversion control and intelligent fuzzy power optimization can be put into operation to meet the emission requirements of less than 10 mg/m3.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Optimization of soft reduction location of mediumcarbon microalloyed continuously cast steel slab in Hansteel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In the soft reduction process, the inner quality of slab is strongly affected by the reduction parameters. Based on continuous casting conditions of mediumcarbon microalloyed steel slab, a solidification heat transfer model was built to predict the solidification process and reduction location, which was validated by the nail shooting test. Then, the soft reduction plant trails were carried out and the effect of reduction location on the center segregation was investigated. The results showed that the center solid fraction of the reduction range was 0.20.7 for mediumcarbon microalloyed steel slab, corresponding to 16.4221.62 m from the meniscus and within No.79 segements. Compared with the original reduction location（No.68 segements）, the center segregation and porosity were improved significantly, especially the nonuniform segragtion at slab east and west sides and the V segregation in the cross section.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A mechanical rotating demurring machine was mounted in the run-out roller table of the No.3 extra-thick slab caster. The machine was used for the removal of cutting beards, which were generated during the autogenous cross-cutting of slabs. However, after more than half a year, some shortage appeared in the machine. It was extremely cumbersome to check the number of mounting links between drive shaft and vee-way guide and adjust them, and the drive shaft had problems with insufficient height limiting mechanism. In order to solve the problems of the deburrer, through the research on the scene actual situation and theoretical analysis, a series of deburrer Structure with hammers optimization was made to improve the structure. The design defect of the deburrer with hammers was completely solved. The efficiency of deburring was improved, and the equipment’s maintenance cost was reduced.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The judging function of billet surface slag was defined through analyzing the causes of billet surface slag defects and the effect on the quality of the billet. Corresponding relationships were established between the severity of surface slag and causes of defects. Based on production experience and effects of process parameters on the surface slag defects, the dynamic distribution plans about the reference weights were provided. Taking the actual billet caster production as testing samples, the process parameters were collected in billet production and the judging results of the surface slag were verified on-line. The result shows that the judging results had basically meet actual results and the accurate rate exceeded the target value. The target of predicting and analyzing the quality of billets were reached. Main reasons of surface slag defect were analyzed and the solving measures were put forward.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LI Shun，ZHANG Gongduo，BI Shihui，LI Xiaotang，XIE Guowei

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Study of Flight Parameters in Centrifugal Granulation
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Centrifugal granulation was an environmentfriendly process in treating the slag. The existing researches on centrifugal granulation were concentrated in the shape, size and mass distribution of slag particles. The relations between flight distance of slag, divorced speed of slag and outer speed of cup and rotary speed and rotary cup diameter were studied. The experimental results indicated that flight distance was farther from the cup and that the speeds increased with increasing rotary speed. While rotary speed reached 1000 r/min, divorced speed and flight distance of slag were almost invariant. When rotary cup diameter increased, the flight distance and the speeds increased simultaneously. Flight was reasonably simplified as uniform motion in horizontal direction and motion of free falling body in the vertical direction. The experimental results had certain guiding significance to design of heat recovery equipment.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of Control Measures of Dust in Pyrolytic Steel Slag Process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The steel slag self-slaking process by pyrolytic and processing technology is an advanced technology to achieve “zero discharge” to solve steel slag storage area and environmental pollution and to improve economic benefits. Along with Chinese government’s strong attention to energy saving and emission reduction and the issue of a series of supportive policies, major iron and steel enterprises paid more and more attention to the recovery of steel slag processing and utilization. However, the steel slag processing production line also generates dust pollution in the recycling of resources at the same time, and there are almost no similar study and summary at the present time. The dust source of the steel slag processing production line was analyzed, and it puts forward the corresponding control measures of dust during the resource utilization of steel slag.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Cause and analysis of surface crack on the tube billet 36Mn2V
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The tube billet 36Mn2V is usually used to produce the oil well pipe, which is the important equipment for oil drilling. However, this steel belongs to one of cracking sensitive steel grades, and the surface crack easily occurs. The surface crack defects of rolled product were investigated by metallographic structure and scanning electron microscope analysis. It was found that the obvious decarburized layer, inclusions and oxide dots were observed near the structure of crack. Moreover, many ferrite bands existed at the end of the crack. The results indicated that the quality defect of the casting billet was the main reason to cause the surface crack on the billet 36Mn2V.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to further improve the physical properties of MgO- C bricks, nanoscale carbon black was added into phenolic resin; the effects of adding certain amount of nanometer carbon black on the mechanical properties and thermal shock resistance of MgO- C bricks were studied. The test results reveal that the mechanical properties and thermal shock resistance of MgO- C bricks were increased with the addition of nanometer carbon black. And the best complex mechanical properties of MgO- C bricks were obtained when 5% (percentage of quality in resin) nanometer carbon black was added.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：With the development of high heat input welding technology, higher requirement of heat input weld ability was put forward for the corresponding high strength steel plate. Reasonable alloy design and oxide metallurgy technology are widely used to develop high heat input welding steel plate. Effect of alloy elements and deoxidiazer on the development of high heat input welding steel was summarized, and the development of oxide metallurgy technology in production process in different enterprises was discussed, which provide a basis for the development of the high heat input welding steel plate.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: FENG Guang-hong, ZHANG Hong-liang, ZHANG Pei

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development of Rolling Technology and Properties Controlled for Special Steel in China and Abroad
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
In this paper, new technologies and new techniques in special steel rolling process at home and abroad in the nearly 10 years are analyzed and discussed. This article summarizes and analyzes the development of special steel rolling technology. The rolling technologies of large size steel and high precision special steel are analyzed in rolling equipment aspect. In terms of the rolling craft, the low temperature rolling technology, no heating forming technique and online heat treatment technology are discussed. The system integration technology of quality control and application technology being developed are analyzed in product quality control field The ferrite deformation phase change, phase transition precipitation control, ultra-low temperature processing, nano-catalysts etc are analyzed and discussed in the quality control of technical progress. The trend of properties controlled for special steel is the application of integration techniques.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Power is important consumption energy in steel enterprise, which accounts for around 20% of the gross energy consumption in steel industry. There are many energysaving power generating equipments in integrated iron and steel works. The main factors which affect the electricity generating efficiency of these equipments were analyzed, and the international and domestic advanced technologies were introduced and compared.In addition, the secondary energy of Iron and steel industry and highlyefficient power generating of waste heat and energy were analyzed. The results show that the application of these technologies can bring considerable economic and social benefits to iron and steel enterprises.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Differential analysis of lump coal pyrolysis characteristics in melting gasifier
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the structure evolution and the degradation mechanism of lump coal at high temperatures, the morphology and structure of the tuyere coke from the COREX melting gasifier and the semicoke prepared in laboratory were observed by the scanning electron microscopy and optical microscope. By combining those with the high temperature reactivity properties of the samples，the sources of the different tuyere cokes were obtained. The results indicated that a lot of coarses and modest mosaic structures were contained in the tuyere cokes derived from the Xinglongzhuang coal，whose surface was porous structure. While the Datong coal whose surface was layered had more class fusain structure. Based on that，it was proposed that the effects of the ash on the high temperature strength of the tuyere cokes should be considered and when measuring the reactivity and strength of the tuyere cokes after reaction，the measurement results should be converted by taking the ash content into consideration, and the best corrected calculation standard of coal ash was 13% according to the experimental results.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
By analyzing the drop of the second side voltage， the back corona and the inner sediment dust of the 450 m 2 sinter in TISCO， the efficiency of the dedusting system has been improved effectively through a series of measurements accordingly. The scientific disposal of the tiny dust in the end electrical field is provided， thanks for the study of the dust grain size from the main dedusting system. As the effect， less than 50 mg/m 3 dust emission of the main electrical dust collector in TISCO has been achieved.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The paper analyses the mechanism of the damage of furnace hearth and acknowledges that the mechanical washout of molten slag and iron is the crucial factor for the breakout of modern furnace hearth. Nowadays the overdue corrosion index of carbon bricks is the main cause of hearth break. The elongation of hearth life is based on the improvement of refractory material quality.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Through the thermo- calculation and static analysis, it has been found the main factors which influence the carbon- oxygen equilibrium in BOF. And the controlling technology ofdecreasing the φC·φO product were confirmed by experiments. The results show that the methods include lowering the tapping temperature from 1682℃ to 1676℃, maintaining the BOF bottom thickness within 600~700mm and bottom stirring eithin 800~1000m3/h.The low φC·φO product (0.0023) has been realized on the No.2 BOF of Shougang Jingtang, reaching the domestic leading level. This technology saves Al alloy about 88.5kg per heat and the cost of 16.1million yuan.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Mechanism on nozzle blockage of ultra purified 11%Cr ferritic stainless steels
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Combined with actual production data, the mechanism on nozzle blockage during continuous casting process of ultra purified 11%Cr ferrite stainless steels (11%Cr UP- FSS) was investigated by metallurgical observation and energy spectrum analysis as well as the thermodynamic calculation for titanium and aluminum oxides formation. The result showed that nozzle blockageof 11%Cr UP- FSS was mainly caused by the high Ti- oxides content in molten steel. During the casting process, the compound oxides generated from the reaction between Ti- oxides and Al2O3 in nozzle refractory adhered to the nozzle wall, enriched continuously and adsorbed other inclusions and molten steel, which can make the nozzle wall thicker. Nozzle blockage of 11%Cr UP- FSS can be effectively prevented through controlling the O, Al, Ti contents in steel, using deep deoxidization during smelting process, increasing the soft blowing time and holding time, preventing the secondary oxidation and casting in higher degree of superheat.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the effects of different grinding time on mixed coal pyrolysis and combustion characteristic a, three types of raw coal with the identical size distribution were mixed according to the content of volatiles, which were grinded 2 minutes, 4 minutes, 6 minutes and 8 min respectively. The pyrolysis at nitrogen atmosphere and combustion at air atmosphere of mixed coal were conducted by thermo-gravimetric analysis experiments. Experimental results showed that, the pyrolysis process of Shenhua bituminous coal was the major at low temperature in the mixed coal without the limit of grinding time, while the weightlessness of mixed coal rose as the grinding time increased at high temperature. The ignition temperature of mixed coal increased with the increase of grinding time but the burnout temperature decreased, the derivative thermogravimetry curves of the mixed coal were moved to the low temperature section, and the maximum weight- loss rate increased slightly, whose corresponding temperature decreased.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Industrial experiments of decreasing cost of coking coal blending
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to reduce the cost of coking coal blending under the stable stage of coke quality，the experiment plan on 200kg coke-oven was designed by the Xichang Steel and Vanadium and Pangang Group Research Institute，and the experiments were carried out. The results showed that with introducing gas coal and lean coal of low price in the coal blending process，the coke quality could meet the requirements. On the basis of the results of experiments on 200kg coke-oven，the scheme 3 were chosen to carry out the industrial experiment. The results of industrial tests showed that the coke′s CSR was 61.57% and M40 was more than 90% in the case of a substantial increase in the ratio of gas coal and lean coal，which met the requirement of stamping coke quality in Xichang Steel and Vanadium. And the cost of the coking coal blending in the test period decreased by 39.24 yuan per ton compared with it in the benchmark period. Thus，it had obvious effect on cost reduction.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Study of press of cubic iron oxide during the straightening stage for plates
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Through statistical analysis and comparison experiment, the plate straightening process, the possibility of press of cubic iron oxide under working roller pressure into the steel plate surface in the powerful straightening machine and the defect caused on the plate surfacewere proved. And the morphology and characteristics of defects were summarized; the process and reason of the press of iron oxide were analyzed. It points out that the generation of the cubic ferric oxide, iron oxide under external bending stress cracking and accumulation, and the perpendicular pressure to the plate surface during the straightening process were the three necessary conditions; it also points out several key technology points which affect the press of iron oxide during plate straightening and how to prevent or reduce the defect of press of iron oxide during straightening process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
This paper concentrates in different proportions to the proportion of different lime particles in presintering pilot study to explore the enhanced sintering way of vanadium-titanium magnetite. The results showed that， as pregrain ratio of concentrate increases， the sintering of vanadium-titanium magnetite concentrate speed up; increasing the lime proportion， sinter strength index is improved and the utilization factor increases. It can play the role of enhanced sintering to take pre-grain concentrate at 25% to 50%， 4% lime and other measures in actual production at Panzhihua Iron and Steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 冷轧基料酸洗后表面黑条纹原因分析
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Technology Center， Delong Steel Co., Ltd.， Xingtai 054009， Hebei， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Cause analysis of black stripe on surface of cold rolling base material after pickling
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to solve that the base material for cold rolling had two- way characteristics of the black stripe defects in the direction of rolling after pickling, the optical microscopy, scanning electron microscopy and energy spectrum were used to analyze the morphology and composition of defective parts, and the rolling effect by different heating process were compared. The results showed that the fundamental reason for the mountainous black stripe on the surface of the base material for cold rolling after pickling was the mesh enrichment phase between the matrix and the oxide layers formed by the higher quality fraction of the residual elements Ni, As and Cu in steel, which was hard to remove after pickling. This kind of enrichment phase required longer time under high temperature to form, and adhered to the substrate surface and even entered into the substrate along the grain boundary, so it was difficult to remove by descaling and pickling process. This problem can be effectively solved by adjusting the ore distribution structure and shortening the time of slab in the furnace.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: RH精炼过程增氮行为探讨

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Discussion on nitrogen increasing behavior in RH refining process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to control the quality of nitrogen in the RH refining process, the theoretical equilbrium nitrogen mass fraction is analyzed by thermodynamic calculation considering the influence of liquid steel composition and RH vacuum degree, and the effect of the pressure change of circulation gas ware blowed tube to into the vacuum chamber on the equilbrium nitrogen mass fraction is also analyzed. Through the dynamics analysis, the adding and removing nitrogen process was affected by the mass transfer resistance in the gas phase, the interfacial chemical reaction resistance, and the mass transfer resistance in the liquid phase. Three kinds of nitrogen increasing pathway of RH process are proposed, and the corresponding equilbrium nitrogen mass fraction are calculated. When the nitrogen mass fraction of steel grade is greater than the equilibrium nitrogen mass fraction, two states in RH treatment process, increasing nitrogen and decreasing nitrogen, are coexistence. In the process of the variation of nitrogen concentration in liquid steel, when the rate of removing nitrogen is equal to the rate of adding nitrogen, the concentration of nitrogen in liquid steel reaches the dynamic equilibrium. For the vacuum degree of 5 kPa, the theoretical equilbrium nitrogen mass fraction in RH is 0.010 0%.

Abstract：
In this paper, the effects of nozzle transformation, nozzle leaking and steel sticking of oxygen lance on the service life of oxygen lance have been investigated and the specific causes for the three factors have been analyzed. The results indicates that by optimizing related parameters of the nozzle , establishing seven kinds of operation mode as followed: “low temperature and low silicon”, “medium temperature and medium silicon”, “high temperature and high silicon”, “low temperature and high silicon”, “high temperature and low silicon”, “high ratio of raw iron” and “high ratio of hot metal”, the service life of oxygen lance is increased by 141 furnace, the steel material consumption was reduced by 4Kg / t, the frequency of slag splashing was reduced by 3 Kg / t, oxygen consumption was decreased by1.9m / t,the lime consumption was reduced by 5Kg / t, the dephosphorization rate of converter was increased by 8%,the desulphurization rate of converter was increased by 4%.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The development process of steel converter blowing moved and moved to the new development of the whole steel converter bottom blowing furnace life stability control technology (SEBC) were introduced. 3. Institute for Advanced Materials and Technology, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 利用超高压电子显微镜系统在450、500和550 ℃下对9Cr- ODS铁素体/马氏体钢（F/M钢）进行了电子束辐照，通过观察和分析辐照前后钢中Y- Ti- O纳米氧化物的形貌及成分变化，对比研究不同温度下电子辐照对氧化物稳定性的影响。结果表明，不同温度下，电子辐照后的氧化物尺寸发生了不同程度的减小现象。辐照前后氧化物尺寸减小率分别为8.51%（450 ℃）、19.38%（500 ℃）和25.99%（550 ℃）；氧化物内铬成分变化程度关系为550 ℃＞500 ℃＞450 ℃。通过分析得出，电子辐照条件下，钢中Y- Ti- O弥散氧化物抑制了材料的辐照肿胀。高能电子轰击以及辐照中产生的过饱和点缺陷的扩散会促使氧化物中溶质原子移动，从而造成了氧化物尺寸的减小。温度的增加提高了空位的扩散速率，加速了氧化物尺寸的减小。研究9Cr- ODS钢在电子辐照下的损伤行为有助于探究氧化物辐照损伤机理，为后期控制和减少9Cr- ODS钢辐照损伤现象提供依据。
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of electron irradiation on stability of oxides in 9Cr- ODS steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Electron irradiation（e-irr.）was performed on 9Cr- ODS（oxide dispersion strengthened）ferritic- martensitic steels by using HVEM（high- voltage electron microscope）at 450, 500 and 550 ℃, and the change of Y- Ti- O nano- oxides′ appearance and component were observed and analyzed before and after irradiation. The effect of electron irradiation on the stability of nano- oxides was compared at different temperatures. The results showed that nano- oxides′ size was decreased in different degrees after electron irradiation at different temperatures. The diameter reducing ratio of nano- oxides after irradiation was 8.51%（450 ℃）, 19.38%（500 ℃）and 25.99%（550 ℃）, respectively, and the tendency of radiation- induced change of Cr concentration inside the oxide was also 550 ℃＞500 ℃＞450 ℃. The void swelling was suppressed by high dispersed nano- oxides under electron irradiation. Solute atoms on the nano- oxides left the original position to matrix because of the impact of high energy electronics and diffusion of point defects, which caused the decrease of nano- oxides’size. The diffusion rate of vacancy was enhanced with the increase of temperature, so as to accelerate the decrease of nano- oxides′ size. The irradiation injury behavior of nano- oxides in 9Cr- ODS steels under electron irradiation could be conducive to the exploration of oxides irradiation damage mechanism, and provide the basis for controlling irradiation damage phenomenon in 9Cr- ODS steels.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 王会 ，杨占兵 ，杨苏冰 ，罗骥. 电子辐照对9Cr- ODS钢中氧化物稳定性的影响[J]. 中国冶金, 2018, 28(5): 23-27. WANG Hui,,YANG Zhan- bing,,YANG Su- bing,,LUO Ji. Effect of electron irradiation on stability of oxides in 9Cr- ODS steel. China Metallurgy, 2018, 28(5): 23-27.

The furnace has two channels, the natural gas and the coal gas can be switched with each other, and the technical advantage is obvious; the shot blast machine is equipped with 24 sets of polishing wheel to ensure the descaling efficient before pickling.Abrasive brushing machine is equipped in the pickling section, which can reduce the load of pickling section, decrease the surface roughness of the strip after pickling and improve the quality of product.A small nozzle device is used in the acid tank bottom, which can reduce the energy consumption and improve the pickling effect.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Process optimization on magnetic roasting of lump iron ore in shaft furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Magnetic roasting in shaft furnace is an effective method to dispose refractory red iron ore. A more scientific and efficient shaft furnace magnetic roasting theory is put forward through the experimental research on haft furnace magnetic roasting of weakly magnetic lump iron ore. And based on the existing Anshan- type shaft furnace, shaft furnace magnetic roasting process is optimized via controlling reducing atmosphere efficiently. The results show that the maximum effectiveness of magnetic roasting is obtained under the condition that the content of hydrogen reduction gas increases to 12%±1%, the CO content decreases and the magnetic roasting reduction temperature rises. And by independently setting the reduction gas and heating gas system in the process of magnetic roasting, the flexible adjustment for reducing gas components, flow rate and pressure is achieved. Decreasing the amount of reduction gas to reduce the gas for reduction of ore to 1400- 1600m3/h can lower the production cost of shaft furnace. The independent reduction gas system can increase coke oven gas proportion of reduction gas and keep the H2 content and the magnetic susceptibility to 12%±1% and to 2.33 respectively, which can decrease gas reduction and improve the quality of ore magnetic roasting. At the same time, the export area of gas jet tower will be decreased by 50% in order to keep the stable gas pressure stability and the uniformity of the gas burner. In this way can the ore be reduced fully and evenly.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Denitration mechanism of ammonia desulfurization process for sintering flue gas in Liusteel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to reveal the denitration behavior in the ammonia desulfurization system, the 265 m2 and 360 m2 sintering machines in Liusteel were employed to investigate the denitration rate of the flue gas in the ammonia desulfurization system. And the adsorption liquid was also detected. The denitration reaction products were also analyzed. The results showed that the NOx mainly existed in the form of NO, and the ammonia desulfurization system had the certain ability of denitration, and the average desulfurization and denitration rates were 94.30% and 24.37%, respectively. For the ammonia desulfurization system, the main denitration reaction was the reduction of NOx by (NH4)2SO3 with the formation of N2, and the secondary reaction was the adsorption of NOx by liquid to transform into NO-3. Increasing the transformation of NO into NO2, which could dissolve easily in water, was the key measure to increase the denitration rate, because the NO had the weak polar and was difficult to dissolve in water.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to improve the surface quality of thick strip in hot rolling and reduce the influence of the oxide scale on the product quality, the forming process of oxide scale, the stress in bending process and the composition of ideal oxide scale were analyzed. It was suggested that the ideal oxide scale should be as thin as possible and the ratio of Fe3O4 should be as high as possible. Through the high temperature and rapid rolling, the thin oxide scale can be obtained. When the coiling temperature was quickly reduced to 300- 570 ℃, the eutectoid reaction of FexO occurred on the surface of the strip, which produced enough Fe3O4. Under the guidance of the designed experiment, the thickness of oxide scale the Fe3O4 mass fraction in oxide scale measured in the experiment were less than 10 μm and greater than 70%, respectively, which indicated that the thick strip oxide scale in hot rolling can be effectively controlled and verified the correctness of the process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （School of Electrical Engineering， Zhejiang University， Hangzhou 310013， Zhejiang， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Main ventilation frequency transformation practice of sintering machine in steel plant
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：As main equipment of sintering production, main exhauster need adjust load according to different material thickness, air permeability and leakage rate. The traditional adjust method has problems of big throttling loss, high power consumption, cannot adjust wind volume precisely, and effect sinter yield and quality. Frequency conversion energysaving renovation can solve above problems. In this paper, through analyze speed adjustment method and combined with actual production of a steel mill sintering, determined frequency conversion speed regulating mode and two drag two cutters frequency operation mode, and beneficial exploration for the above problems is given. The solution proposed in this paper can solve the above problems and hidden dangers effectively, and achieve the purpose of output increase, stable quality, energy saving and safe running with the smallest input.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 连退工艺对低合金高强钢HC300LA力学性能的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Advanced High Strength Steel Insitute, Product Research Institute of BX Steel， Benxi 117000， Liaoning， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of continuous annealing process on mechanical properties of high strength low alloy steel HC300LA
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the influence of heat treatment process on the mechanical properties of high strength low alloy steel, HC300LA steel was studied by simulated test and industrial test under continuous annealing condition. Using the continuous annealing simulator to simulate the continuous annealing process, the influences of the annealing temperature on the mechanical properties of the high strength low alloy steel HC300LA were studied and the steel with different strength requirements were obtained by the experiment. The changes of the mechanical properties of high strength low alloy steel HC300LA under different soaking time and rapid cold speed were studied in the actual production process. The results indicated that as the annealing temperature increased, the strength of the high strength low alloy steel decreased and the elongation at break increased. The strength decreased slowly with increasing of soaking time. The strength increased and the elongation at break decreased with the increase of the rapid cold speed.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Metallurgical properties of blast furnace slag with higher Al2O3 and MgO content
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of MgO and Al2O3 content on metallurgical properties of blast furnace slag is investigated under experimental conditions. The result showed that when the basicity and the MgO content of the blast furnace slag were 1.1 and 12 %, respectively, the melt temperature of the blast furnace slag increased with the increase of Al2O3 concent. Besides, when the Al2O3 content exceeded 17.5%, the primary phase was transformed from melilite to spinal. Furthermore, at 1500℃, the increase of Al2O3 content caused the viscosity to be enhanced whereas the sulfur distribution ration to be decreased. On the other hand, in the case that basicity was 1.1 and Al2O3 content was 20 %, the increase of MgO content made a drop followed a rise of melt temperature. Particularly, when the MgO content was higher than 11.8%, melilite instead of spinal as the primary phase was formed. In addition, at 1500℃, as the MgO content increased, viscosity of the blast furnace slag gradually decreased and the sulfur distribution ratio increased.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Several heavy plate mills have been put into production in domestic, the thick slab blanks became the key technology of extra- heavy plate production. Large flat ingot is important raw material for the heavy plate mill, research works on the design of large flat ingot shape have been seldom reported in homeland. According to the analysis of a large number of foreign literatures in abroad， the influence of design parameters of large flat ingot on the quality of ingot was discussed. The manufacture present situation of large flat ingot at home and abroad were introduced, and the large flat ingot shape were evaluated, some suggestions for the design of large flat ingot to produce extra- heavy plate are proposed.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Innovation and Development Based on the Science and Technology Progress: Review on the development of Iron Ore Agglomeration Techniques in Recent Years
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The development and progress of ironmaking technology should rely on high-grade burden as well as advanced equipments and operations. In this paper, systematic analysis and summary were carried out from theory and technology development of iron ore agglomeration as sintering and pelletizing in China and abroad during recent years. Innovations and development were introduced here for promotion of agglomeration techniques which will provide high grade raw material for blast furnace to realize “high-quality, high-productivity, low-consumption and environmental friendly” production against energy and resource crisis and emission problems.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application of nano adsorbent in wastewater treatment of heavy metals and organic matter
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Nanomaterials have large specific surface area and high surface free energy, which determines their good adsorption properties. As an adsorbent used in various kinds of wastewater treatment, nanomaterials has become the research focus. On the basis of reviewing a large amount of domestic and foreign literature, the emerging nanocomposites applied in the wastewater treatment in recent years were reviewed. The preparation methods, adsorptiondesorption characteristics and adsorption mechanism of carbon nanomaterials, nanoTiO2 photocatalytic materials, nanocomposite filters and other materials were emphatically introduced. Compared with the traditional adsorbent materials, it was found that the effect of nanoadsorbent on the treatment of wastewater was obviously better than that of traditional adsorbent materials. However, in the practical applications, it still faced such problems as high production cost and unstable treatment effect. Therefore, carrying out the nanoadsorption materials development and adsorption mechanism study could provide a theoretical basis for efficient and lowcost treatment of various types of wastewater.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of Al2O3 on viscosity of low alumina slags of Jiusteel and thermodynamic analysis
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to further analyze the effect of Al2O3 content on the viscosity of low alumina slags, based on the composition of the blast furnace slags of Jiusteel, the viscosity, liquidus temperature, activity and phase change in cooling crystallization process of the slags with different Al2O3 content were studied by experiments and FactSage thermodynamics software. The results indicated that the viscosity of slags increased with increasing the Al2O3 content in the experimental low aluminum slags. The viscosity was below 0.45 Pa·s above 1 450 ℃, and at the same time, the slags had good fluidity and stability. The activity of Al2O3 increased with the increase of Al2O3 content, on the contrary, the activity of SiO2 decreased, which also reflected that the degree of polymerization of the slags was improved. The cooling process of slags showed that above the liquidus temperature, the viscosity of slags was mainly related to the complexity of the slag structure, and below the liquidus temperature, the viscosity was affected by the double slags structure of liquid phase and the solid phase particle content.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The tensile properties of 780 MPa grade cold- rolled continuous annealed dual phase steel were investigated under different temper rolling reductions. The function relationships between temper rolling reduction and the tensile properties were founded. The results indicate that with the increase of the temper rolling reduction, the yield strength of the steel increases simultaneously, while the ultimate tensile strength remains the same. In addition, the uniform elongation and total elongation of the steel decrease slightly.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effects of welding material on properties of welding joint of double metal clad plate
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Q235B/304 clad plate was welded through shielded metal- arc welding with two welding rods, which were THNi317 and THA062 welding rod, to study the effect of welding material on the Q235B/304 clad plate. The microstructure and the distribution of the main alloying elements of welding joint were analyzed by the optical microscope（OM）and EDS method, and the mechanical properties were analyzed and investigated. The results showed that microstructure of the two welding joints was austenite and a little of δ- ferrite. THNi317 welding material can more effectively control the diffusion of C element and the dilution of Cr and Ni alloy element. THNi317 welding joint had better impact toughness than THA062 welding joint. The strength of extension and hardness of two welding joints both met the requirements of the relevant technical standard.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to research the mechanism of the surface feathering defects of the thin gauge high strength steel produced by the 2 230 continuous annealing line, the SIAS strip inspection system and ZEISS scanning electron microscope are used to analyze the morphological characteristics of the defects, and the effects of the surface roughness, the transmission mode and the rolling force on the feathering defects are systematically analyzed. By optimizing the strip flattening process, matching the running speed of the strip, adjusting the roll roughness and other series of measures, the problem of the surface feathering defect of the thin gauge high strength steel is solved, which has achieved remarkable application effect.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and application of cooling slagging agent
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The metallurgical solid waste comprehensive utilization is the key to achieve zero discharge of solid waste in iron and steel enterprises. Technology which used the process of sintering machine to process all kinds of metallurgical solid waste was introduced and the products were used in converter for the industrial production practice. The results showed that it was viable to process the metallurgical solid waste by the sintering machine in both theory and practice. The produced cooling slagging agent had good results in converter，which can promote the converter slag melting，replace part of the pellet，improve the dephosphorization rate and metal recovery rate，lower the oxygen consumption and have little effect on the mass fraction of sulphur in molten steel. Therefore，the technology had good economic and social benefits and had the value of popularizationin the metallurgical industry.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to solved the problem of dust removal system in Zhanjiang Steel slag processing production line. It proposed the corresponding countermeasures of dust removal，according to the characteristics and the source of dust，the difficulties of dust removal and the technological requirements. Wet dusting was selected for hot stifle area，nozzle atomization dust removal was selected for roller area，hydraulic tipping cover was selected for desulfurization area，bag filter was selected for processing area，and mobile car cover was selected for scrap cutting area. The engineering practice reached the expected effect of dust removal. It provided the engineering experience for the dust removal with resource utilization of steel slag.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WANG Cui1, 2,ZHANG Jian- liang1,ZUO Hai- bin2,JIAO Ke- xin1,ZHANG Fang- ge3，YANG Jun- qiang1

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Thermodynamic behavior of chlorine in blast furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the behavior evolution law of chlorine in the blast furnace (BF), Guofeng No.1 1780m3 BF was selected as a case to systemically analyze the thermodynamic behavior of chlorine under actual smelting conditions by means of calculation method using FactSage 6.4 software. The results indicated that the chlorides in furnace burden reacted with P2O5, SiO2, H2O, CO2 and H2 in BF, and the corresponding different reactions occurred in different areas of BF in the burden descending process. The chlorine in furnace burden was predominantly released in the form of HCl. The released HCl rose along with the gas flow and adhered to the furnace burden and inner walls, where a series of complex physiochemical reactions took place, generating chlorides such as NaCl, KCl, MgCl2 and CaCl2. Along with the decline of furnace burden, these chlorides were released again in the form of HCl, thus forming the circulating enrichment of chlorides in the BF. The unreacted HCl escaped with top gas, which would affect the subsequent dust removal equipments, power generation equipments and gas pipes. Herewith through the thermodynamic analysis of chlorine in BF, its evolution law could be better mastered to provide a sufficient basis for reducing the harm of chlorine to the dry dedusting technology BF.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Mechanical modling and application of strip′s sliding during the acceleration stage of steering roll
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In response to the slipping problems in actual production, combining with the actual conditions, the kinematics model and mechanics model are built for the strip which contacts with the the steering roll in the looper of continuous annealing line during its acceleration stage, and the model to judge whether the strip sliding occurs is established. The mechnical principle of strip’s sliding during acceleration stage is analyzed. It is pointed out that in the process of acceleration, the strip’s sliding is not only caused by the decline of roughness, but also by the fluctuation of the forward and backward tensions in the case of enough friction coefficient. And the influence of the fluctuation of the forward and backward tensions on the friction force, the supporting force and the acceleration of the strip which s with the the steering roll is discussed. Then on this base, the optimization target value of the tension fluctuation is concluded, which is applied in field production to avoid the slipping accident occurred again.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the analysis and improvement of 20t electric furnace system EAF→LF→VD process route at Heavy Machinery Company of Ma’anshan Iron and Steel Group，a new smelting process of 2Cr12Mo1V by hot heel and return method was developed. In the stainless steel smelted by the new method, w［O］≤25×10-6，w［H］≤1.8×10-6，w［S］≤50×10-6，w［P］≤150×10-6，and the equivalent size of individual artifacts defects is less than 4.0mm. It can realize fast and low cost production of stainless steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The “black box” in size of 200mm×40mm×260mm was developed, through the research of the temperature measurement system and the thermal protection. And it was used to measure the temperature of the GCr15 bearing billet. And three-dimensional temperature field of the billet during the heating process was simulated by the finite element simulation software MSC Marc. The optimization of the heating process of small cross-section bearing steel was realized by combining the orthogonal experiment with the finite element simulation. After filed application, the temperature difference of the largest section was decreased to 32.75℃, the homogeneity of temperature distribution was improved, and the performance difference between the head and tail was reduced significantly.
