http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development and application of intelligent management system for blast furnace hearth longevity
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Corresponding to the current situation of hysteretic nature and poor pertinency of blast furnace longevity management, combined with the process design of blast furnace hearth, heat transfer theory and operation of blast furnace process, a set of hearth longevity intelligent management system was developed. In addition to calculation function of carbon brick erosion curve by conventional hearth erosion model, it had another 4 core functions including the monitoring for the iron freeze layer online, the judgment for the hearth air gap, the diagnosis of the iron freeze layer, and the corresponding improvement suggestions. All monitoring, calculation, diagnosis and suggestions were online in the system. Its key purpose was not to calculate the erosion curve, but to prevent the occurrence of hearth erosion, which could give excellent help to blast furnace longevity management, and play an important role in extending life of a blast furnace.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 基于烧结大数据预测小于10 mm烧结矿含量模型
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LIU Yueming1,LIU Xiaojie1,L Qing1,ZHANG Zhenfeng2,#br# LIU Song1,LIU Fulong3

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
In order to provide qualified sinter for the blast furnace, a large data method combining XGBoost algorithm, factor correlation analysis and deep learning algorithm was proposed to predict the sinter content of less than 10 mm based on a large amount of data in each part of the sintering production. Firstly, the data from the sinter plant database need to be collected, integrated and preprocessed. Secondly, the factor analysis was carried out, to select 14 relevant variables suitable for model training and to perform correlation analysis between variables. Finally, the deep neural network algorithm model was established. By testing the model and comparing with the traditional algorithm model, the results showed that the model prediction effect was very good, and the purpose of accurately predicting the content of sinter particle size less than 10 mm was achieved, which had a good guiding significance for the actual production of sintering.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Practice of Decreasing Coke Ratio on 2500m3 Blast Furnace of Masteel Under Poor Conditions of Degraded Raw Material and Fuel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to further reduce the cost of pig iron and improve the economic efficiency of large sized blast furnace, considering the current situation of continuous deterioration of the quality of raw material and fuel of No.2 2500m3 sized blast furnace at Masteel, a series of technical measures, such as recycling the small coke, strengthening management of charging material, improving coal injection quality, optimizing adjustment of upper and lower parts of blast furnace, stabilizing hot metal temperature and improving slag system, applying high blast temperature operation combined with oxygen enrichment and pulverized coal injection, adopting high blast furnace top pressure operation, and strengthening the furnace type management were taken to optimize the manufacturing process. As a result, the coke rate was significantly decreased to 320kg/t. Comparing with 2012, the coke rate decreased by 60~70kg/t under the similar condition of fuel ratio. Meanwhile, the blast furnace utilization coefficient was stabilized at 2.40t/ (m3·d).

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Layout and calculation of laminar cooling equipment in hot rolling mill
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The preliminary design of water-cycling system has been undertaken about laminar cooling in hot rolling mill. The method of calculating high cistern’s volume and pumping station’s water supply capacity of laminar cooling has been put forward. The laminar cooling system has adopted an independent water-cycling system, which ensures the stability of the water quality and water pressure. At the same time, high cistern’s volume and pumping station’s water supply capacity when product the harshest steel have been calculated. Moreover, hydraulic calculation of laminar cooling has also been done, and the header’s outlet flow and capacity of laminar cooling have been deduced. These efforts can not only make the laminar cooling equipment more compact and saving cooling water, but also offer reference to deep design and laminar cooling equipment’s layout.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Cause and control measure of shape defects of high strength steel SFB700 hot rolling strip
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The cause of the formation of the wave shape defects on the edge of SFB700 hot rolling strip with the thickness of 3.0- 6.0 mm was analyzed, which was mainly controlled by the trend of wave shape on the edge finish rolling outlet and concerned with the inhomogeneous edge cooling of the strip after rolling. And the emergence of wave shape defects on the edge was decreased by optimizing the rolling strip shape control strategy, adjusting the water quantity difference on both sides and side spray angle in the cooling area. At the same time, a new temper process was used to eliminate the wave shape defects on the edge. Therefore, the occurrence rate of the wave shape defects on the edge of SFB700 was reduced significantly.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Leaching and recycling analysis of fluorine and chlorine in secondary aluminum dross
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The secondary aluminum dross containing the high content of aluminum and alumina is a renewable resource, but it also contains harmful impurities such as fluoride and chlorides, which can easily cause the environmental pollution due to the improper handling. The leaching process of the secondary aluminum dross containing fluorine and chlorine compound produced in the production process of an aluminum plant was studied, and the effects of different leaching time, liquid- solid ratio, leaching liquid pH and leaching temperature on the leaching rate of fluorine and chlorine were investigated. The obtained best process parameters were that and the leaching time was 8 h, the liquid- solid mass ratio was 6, the leaching liquid pH was 4, the leaching temperature was 60 ℃. The maximum leaching rates of F and Cl elements were 87.67% and 99.02%, respectively. After the separation, the chlorine salts and villiaumite were recycled from the filtrate by evaporation, and the condensate can be reused in the leaching process. When there were no harmful elements precipitated from the residue, it can be used as the raw materials to produce permeable bricks and other building materials. Thus, the harmless treatment and resource utilization of the secondary aluminum dross were achieved.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Corrosion fatigue fracture analysis on the mainshaft of cladding machine
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The main shaft of 40CrNiMo cladding machine was fractured abnormally in use. In order to find how it happened, the fracture of main shaft was deeply investigated by macroscopical observation, scanning electronic microscope, X- ray energy spectrometer and metallography microscope. The result showed that the main shaft fracture was the corrosion fatigue failure. Due to the poor steel of the main shaft , some etch pits were formed on its surface under the environment medium erosion, which would be developed into the micro cracks under the effect of stress concentration. And the micro cracks expanded under circulation working stress, which eventually led to the fatigue fracture of the main shaft. It could be resolved by promoting the quality of steel, reducing the corrosivity of environment and improving the heat treatment process and other measures.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (Technology Department, Dalian Marine Propeller Co., Ltd., Dalian 116021, Liaoning, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research development of stainless steel material for #br# manufacturing marine propeller
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Marine propeller is a kind of device with the help of blades rotating in the water to transform the power of marine main engine into thrust. It is one of the important parts of ships. With the opening of the Arctic routes, the ship owners are attracted much attention by ice ship and thus the stainless steel propeller with high strength is pushed on the stage. The characteristics of stainless steel for manufacturing marine propeller were summarized and the research status at home and aboard were introduced. The issues existing in the research and manufacture of stainless steel materials for propellers at home and abroad were analyzed, the development trend in the future of the stainless steel for manufacturing marine propeller was pointed out.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Structure analysis and control of hydraulic ladle tilting device
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The structure, movement and hydraulic control of the hydraulic ladle tilting device were analyzed and explored in detail against the bad working conditions and operation requirements, and the advantages and disadvantages of the typical hydraulic tilting device in the process of practical use were analyzed in depth. Then, the ladle tilting device and hydraulic control system were designed, which solve the problem of clamping resistance of the tilting device and improve the stability, bearing the capacity and applicable range of the tilting device. By calculating and optimizing the design, the heating problem of the system was solved. Besides, the multistage protection improved the safety performance of tilting control, realized the stability and accurate control of the tilting device, and reduced the use failure of the equipment.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence of nitrogen on structure and mechanical property of SAF2205 duplex stainless steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect on the structure and mechanical property of SAF2205 duplex stainless steel were studied by increasing the nitrogen mass fraction and reducing the nickel mass fraction. The results showed that after increasing the nitrogen mass fraction and reducing the nickel mass fraction, the Austenite phase of trial steel was enlarged when the nitrogen mass fraction and nickel mass fraction were in the suitable range, and the Austenite crystal grains became smaller and homogeneous. With the decrease of the nickel mass fraction, the Austenite crystal grains became thicker and bigger, while the impact absorbing energy and intensity were both improved, and AkV was increased from 199.7 to 232.5 J, Rm and Rp0.2 were increased from 538 to 787 MPa and from 484 to 692 MPa, respectiviely, which indicated that the plastic index of steel had a slight decrease.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research progress of on- line pickling process of duplex stainless steel plate
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In a horizontal continuous spray pickling line, by using the original equipment and H2SO4＋（HNO3＋HF）pickling technology, the duplex stainless steel plate was pickled. After acid pickling, the light gray defects and the roll mark defects were appeared on the surface. To solve these problems, taking S32205 duplex stainless steel plate as the represented brands, a two- step mixed acid （HNO3＋HF） pickling method was discussed, and its test and research in laboratory and industry were carried out, and the technical transformation of the original horizontal spray pickling production line was conducted. For the pickling of S32205 steel plate, the two- step mixing acid （HNO3＋HF） pickling process was applied. And the main process parameters were HNO3 180 g/L＋HF 90 g/L in pre- pickling process, HNO3 265 g/L＋HF 56 g/L in final pickling process, the pickling temperature is 43 ℃and the once qualified rate is over 95%. The light gray defects and the roll mark defects appeared on the surface after the pickling of the duplex stainless steel were solved technically. The steel surface was sliver, and the color and luster were even. The requirements for the product standard concerning surface quality of the duplex stainless steel were met.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research status of banding phenomena in steels
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Banding phenomena is a common interior structural defect in steels which is harmful to the processability and usability of steel. The research status and understandings of the formation mechanism of banded structure in hypoeutectoid steels, the harm to mechanical properties of steels, the way to eliminate banded structure and the method of rating banded structure were systematically formulated. The analysis showed that the residual interdendritic microsegregation was the fundamental reason of banding, and reasonable controls of the alloy composition, dendrite morphology and hot working process were also the important ways to eliminate banded structure. The bigger the difference of the Ar3 transformation temperature between the interdendritic regions and the dendritic regions caused by microsegregation is, the easier banded structure formed. The cooling rate in an austenitic transformation and the austenitic grain size were the main factors to form the banded structure. Both the higher cooling rate and the bigger austenitic grain size can eliminate banded structure. The main effects of primary carbide and secondary carbide on the formation of banded structure in hypereutectoid steel were also formulated. To make the alloy elements distribute equality and reduce the amounts of micrcosegregation were the main ways to alleviate or eliminate the banded structure. There may be a long strip of inclusions in banded structures, however, the effects of the size, morphology, and distribution of inclusions in steel on the formation of banded structure were not clear. How to carry on the quantitative analysis of banded structurein steel was a key problem to be solved. In addition, the influences of heating system of slabs on the banded structure and grain size were needed to study further.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development of a local slope multifunctional reduction furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Development of a local slope multifunctional reduction furnace is introduced. Through the local slope design and the flexible use of the baffles，the construction cost of reduction furnace has been distinctly reduced, the efficiency of energy utilization and production have been improved and the much flexible choice between smelting reduction and direct reduction has been realized. Besides, for this new reduction furnace, coke and sintering process have been avoided, resulting in the short technological process with green environmental protection. This reduction furnace is suitable for many kinds of raw materials and has a distinct advantage of full use of carbon monoxide. The fully continuously automated production can be realized and the scale of production can be adjusted flexibly.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Numerical simulation of airflow distribution in top combustion hot stove checker chamber
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The uniformity of airflow distribution is a key criterion of volume utilization ratio in top combustion hot stove checker chamber，which directly influences the heat storage capacity and hot blast temperature. The momentum and energy equations of a top combustion hot stove were solved by the numerical simulation with the standard k- ε model, and porous medium model，and the influence of checker chamber structure on the airflow distribution was also researched. The results showed that the airflow distribution in the traditional checker chamber with flat roof presented the tendency of higher edge speed and lower center speed，when changing the structure of the checker chamber to the convex top with higher around and lower center，the flow distribution improved significantly.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Simulation on transverse stress distribution of titanium strips in steel strip continuous annealing furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to explore the use of the existing steel strip continuous annealing line for the possible production of cold rolled titanium strips，according to the condition of a domestic strip continuous annealing furnace，a finite element model of the elastic- plastic deformation of titanium strips in the annealing furnace was established based on the ABAQUS simulation platform. The simulation results showed that the furnace roller shape，initial flatness defect, and boundary tension may be the major effect factors for the transverse stress distribution of titanium strips. The transverse stresses of titanium strips became more and more nonuniform on crown roller，single taper roller，and double taper roller. The initial flatness defects，e.g. edge wave and middle wave，caused the transverse stress distribution to be more uneven. The boundary tension played a relative slight effect on the transverse stress distribution of titanium strips. It had the reference value in the study can be used in the design of technological requirements on the furnace roller shape and initial flatness defects of titanium strips.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Policy implementation of low-carbon ironmaking using a new evaluation method of blast furnace production efficiency
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the high grade blast furnace burden, the policy for ironmaking technology with high efficiency, low consumption, high quality, long campaign and environmental protection can meet the requirements of low-carbon ironmaking, energy conservation and cost reduction. And this policy is an inevitable trend of developing ironmaking industry, and can conform to the national long-term goals. But a scientific method is needed to evaluate every aspects reasonably to make it work. A new evaluation method of blast furnace production efficiency is used to implement the policy of low-carbon ironmaking.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Design on rotating mechanism to a 16.5MV·A submerged arc furnace for Si-Ca-Ba alloy
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In the process that the submerged arc furnace (SAF) smelting silicon alloy, the SiO generated Si and SiC. The products coagulate to the harden material with high electrical conductivity, the harden material results in a decline in burden permeability; at the same time, the SiC with high melting point which is failure to decompose sinks down bottom when tapping, gradually the furnace bottom rising. In order to solve this problem, the rotation mechanism is added to the submerged arc furnace (SAF). Then, the harden material in furnace reduces, the burden permeability increases. The related blueprints were also finished via software.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of residual carbon in coal ash on formation of ring accretion of rotary pelletizing kiln
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the mechanism of formation of ring accretion of rotary pelletizing kiln in the production of oxidized pellet by grate- kiln process, the XRD, microscope and SEM image and EDS were first applied in the analysis and detection of the ring. The results showed that the main mineral compositions were hematite and other silicate solids. Then the roasting experiments were performed with coal ash and pellet fines as raw material, the results indicated that the mass fraction of FeO can reach 10%- 20%, and the FeO can react with the SiO2, CaO and Al2O3 in coal ash to form the low- melting- point compounds. In order to verify the effect of FeO on the low- melting- point compounds, the Phase Diagram in FactSage was used to calculate the liquidus isotherms of ternary system SiO2- CaO- Al2O3. The results indicated that the low temperature liquidus isotherms for quaternary system SiO2- CaO- Al2O3- FeO would extend gradually with the increase of FeO mass fraction from 5% to 30% and the liquidus temperature decreased from 1 200 to 1 100 ℃. Finally, it is indicated that the presence of FeO definitely promoted the formation of the low- melting- point compounds. And it is confirmed that during the coal injection process for heating and burning, after mixing the coal ash containing the residual carbon with the pelletizing powder, the low- melting- point aluminosilicate compounds containing ferrous were formed, which caused the formation of ring accretion in rotary kiln.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 范建军，郭宇峰，臧龙，王磊. 煤灰残碳对氧化球团回转窑结圈物形成的影响[J]. 中国冶金, 2017, 27(12): 8-13. FAN Jian- jun，GUO Yu- feng，ZANG Long，WANG Lei. Effect of residual carbon in coal ash on formation of ring accretion of rotary pelletizing kiln. China Metallurgy, 2017, 27(12): 8-13.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development of stainless steel magnetic conductive material used for magnetic matrices
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to improve the wear resistance and corrosion resistance of the magnetic media of the high- intensity separators, and increase its magnetic properties, a series of experiments were carried out including the preparation of the stainless magnetic conductive material used for the magnetic media, the microstructure observation, the mechanical property test, and the corrosion resistance and magnetic property test. Experimental results showed that by smelting the molten steel in the vacuum melting furnace, hot rolling and full annealing, the stainless magnetic conductive medium material can be obtained, whose yield strength was 287 MPa, microhardness was 148HV and corrosion rate was 10-8 A/cm2. Meanwhile, the magnetization field strength was 14 000 Gs and the magnetic remanence intensity was 1 056 Gs under the background field strength of 35 A.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and application on reducing SiO2 content in
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Sintering pot tests were applied to study the low SiO2 sintering and optimization measures, and then industrial test and application were carried out. The results showed that the drum index, yield and grain size of sinter was deteriorated when the SiO2 mass fraction in sinter decreased from 5.60% to 5.00% under the match structure of iron ores in Jingtang. Coarsening coke powder size had obvious effects on improving sinter drum index. Each basic index of sinter were improved by increasing the temperature of blending material, especially for the sinter yield. It was beneficial for reducing the fuel consumption to increase the sintering material thickness. Moreover, in industrial practice, through improving the material thickness by 30 mm, raising temperature by 5- 10 ℃, loosening the fuel particle size（＜3 mm）by 2%, decreasing the use of fluxes containing MgO and optimizing ore- blending, etc, the volume fraction of SFCA was up to above 45%, which prompted the sinter yield or quality to keep stable and to improve after reducing silicon.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: HUANG Shao- shuai,WANG Xue- song,WANG Kun,LI Qun,ZHANG Xue- feng,BAI Xue- jun

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 利用首秦4 300 mm轧机研究轧制线对钢板翘头的影响，通过基于压下量优化轧制线。结果表明，提高轧制线系数，小压下量时提高最低轧制线高度对钢板翘头改善明显；同时，基于来料厚度优化轧制线，在压下量优化后基础上，细化厚度区间，增加额外调整量，根据不同厚度区间的翘曲特点，有针对性地调整轧制线；最终通过两者集成，得出最优方案。通过轧制线程序的开发应用，加强了板坯在轧制过程中的头部翘曲的控制能力，轧制过程钢板头部形状改善明显。
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence and analysis of rolling line height on head warping of heavy plate
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The influence of the rolling line on the head warping of plate is analyzed by the 4 300 mm mill of Shouqin Company. For optimizing the rolling line based on the reduction, it is shown that the head warping improves obviously by raising the minimum rolling line height when improving the coefficient of rolling line and small reduction. At the same time, for optimizing the rolling line based on the material thickness, it is shown that adjusting the rolling line with target by detailed thickness range, additional adjustment quantity and the buckling characteristics of different thickness range after the reduction is improved. Finally, the optimal solution is obtained through the integration of those two methods. Through the development and application of rolling line process, the control ability of the head warping in the rolling process is strengthened, and the shape of the plate head is improved obviously.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 黄少帅，王雪松，王坤，李群，张学峰，白学军. 轧制线高度对宽厚板翘头的影响与分析[J]. 中国冶金, 2018, 28(4): 57-60. HUANG Shao- shuai,WANG Xue- song,WANG Kun,LI Qun,ZHANG Xue- feng,BAI Xue- jun. Influence and analysis of rolling line height on head warping of heavy plate. China Metallurgy, 2018, 28(4): 57-60.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis and solving practice of heat treatment of plate roll printing
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In the roller hearth heat treatment furnace production, the cause and formation of bottom roller nodulation were analyzed, the mechanism of heat-treated plate roller printing was cleared, high-temperature fiber composite to solve practical plate roll printing problem was proposed. It has been concluded that the hardness is less than the hardness of steel plates when the high-temperature fiber surface is not oxidized, not sintered,not nodulated, and under high temperature. The effective solution to the plate surface quality problems was raised, and the abrasion resistance is good, structural strength is high, anxious cold performance is good, and it is able to adapt to roller hearth furnace out of the discharge end of the opening for the production model.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence of soluble Al on the microstructure and mechanical property of batch- annealed IF steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：As an important deoxidzer in steelmaking, the aluminum content has a significant influence on the inclusion number and product property of low carbon aluminum-killed steel. And the influence of acid soluble (free) aluminum content (in the range between 0.0050% and 0.055% ) on the property of final product of batch annealing Ti- IF steel is investigated on a industrial scale. Uniaxial tensile test and optical microstructure observation are conducted on final product. It is found that apart from the little fluctuation of yield strength, the variation of aluminum content within the above range does not have any remarkable influence on the Ti- IF steel property which is different from low carbon Aluminum killed steel. After annealed the grain shows the equiaxed morphology regardless of the acid soluble Aluminum content and the grain sizeis all graded within the range of 9.0- 9.5. The final product shows excellent mechanical proerpty and formability.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 无取向硅钢钢水钛质量分数影响因素分析

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Technology Center, Ma′anshan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Ma′anshan 243000, Anhui, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of influence factors for titanium mass fraction in non- oriented silicon steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The residual Ti element has a detrimental effect on magnetism, so the Ti mass fraction in the steel should be reduced as much as possible. The Ti mass fraction in tundish of non- oriented silicon steel with different grades for a period time was investigated, and the influence factors of Ti mass fraction were analyzed. The result shows that the main influence factors of excessive Ti mass fraction of non- oriented silicon steel are ferrosilicon alloy, desulphurization process by powder blowing and Ti increasing in tundish, whose normal average Ti increment is 0.001 5%, 0.000 3% and 0.000 6%, respectively. The average Ti mass fraction in non- oriented silicon steel in the tundish increases with the improvement of grades. With the improvement of Si mass fraction in non- oriented silicon steel of different grades, the average Ti mass fraction in molten steel at the end of RH also increases. And it increases from 0.000 75% to 0.002 03%, while the Si mass fraction increases from 0.31% to 3.05%.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 张乔英，常正昇，尹国才. 无取向硅钢钢水钛质量分数影响因素分析[J]. 中国冶金, 2018, 28(5): 42-46. ZHANG Qiao- ying,CHANG Zheng- sheng,YIN Guo- cai. Analysis of influence factors for titanium mass fraction in non- oriented silicon steel. China Metallurgy, 2018, 28(5): 42-46.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Formation mechanism and countermeasure of scarfing stripe defect in automobile strip
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The formation mechanism of scarfing stripe defect on the surface of the hot rolled strip was studied. The results showed that the defects were mainly formed in the scarfing treatment process, because the scale on the top and root surface of the scarfing ridge was rolled into the substrate, which caused the existence of scale under the scarfing stripe. Both the instability of ridge and the metal flowing near the surface could lead to the rolled- in scale. The defect was highly heritable and could not be removed during following the hot rolling process, pickling process and cold rolling process. Through modifying the scarfing nozzles, reforming the natural gas system and optimizing the scarfing process parameters, the scarfing stripe defect was eliminated successfully. Therefore, the surface quality of automobile outer panel was improved.

Formation mechanism and countermeasure of scarfing stripe defect in automobile strip. China Metallurgy, 2018, 28(7): 46-49.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LI Jing,WAN Jun,TANG Wei,ZHANG Xiao- feng,REN Zhi- chao,REN Xin- yi
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Cold- rolling Department, Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Tangshan 063000, Hebei, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and application of cold rolling of high strength container plate
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：High strength container plate is a steel used for containers with the yield strength above 700 MPa and the tensile strength above 800 MPa, and it is generally cold- rolled strip. For this kind of high strength steel, the problems of the edge cracking at the tail end, the strip running deviation and strip breaking, and the strip shape abrupt changes have frequently occurred in the tandem cold rolling process. Based on the systematic analysis of the above problems, the measures such as the U- type coiling in the hot rolling line, the tandem automatic tilting control and the automatic compensation function of the head and tail bending roll in hot rolling production line were put forward, which can effectively solve the problems of edge cracking, strip breaking and ill flatness in the rolling process of high strength container plate. And it achieved good practical results.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHANG Jian, LIN Chao, YANG Liu, WANG Mu-qi
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Department of Ironmaking, Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Tangshan 063200, Hebei, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of reasons for abnormal increase of hearth sidewall temperature of Jingtang No.2 blast furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The operation state of the hearth plays a critical role in the long service life of blast furnace. The abnormal temperature rise of the hearth sidewall of Shougang Jingtang No.2 blast furnace burst out from August 2017, which formed a threat to the normal production of blast furnace and operators′safety. The position coordinates of high-temperature points at hearth sidewall indicated that the direct cause of the abnormal temperature rise was the physical scour and chemical erosion resulted from the sharp circumferential flow of hot metal. The root of the abnormal temperature rise was explored further from the hot metal composition, the bottom temperature of blast furnace, tap hole depth and flow rate of hot metal, etc. The results showed that the deteriorating hearth activity was the primary cause. In addition, the high sulphur load and coke ash content, low final slag basicity and damaged cooling staves also made some contribution to the deteriorating hearth activity.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 张建, 林超, 杨柳, 王牧麒. 京唐2号高炉炉缸侧壁温度异常升高原因分析[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(12): 59-63. ZHANG Jian, LIN Chao, YANG Liu, WANG Mu-qi. Analysis of reasons for abnormal increase of hearth sidewall temperature of Jingtang No.2 blast furnace[J]. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(12): 59-63.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 复合助磨剂对钢渣超微粉助磨效果
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WANG Lin1, LONG Hong-ming2, ZHANG Hao2,3
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Grinding effect of compound grinding aid on ultrafine steel slag powder
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Compound grinding aids were prepared with ethylene glycol and triethanolamine as raw material, absolute ethyl alcohol as solvent. The compound grinding aids were minxed with bssf slag, desulfurized slag and hot braised slag respectively, and then grinded by planetary ball mill. The chemical composition and mineral composition of steel slag, the influence of different grinding aids on the particle size distribution of ultrafine steel slag powder, and the action mechanism of composite grinding aids on ultrafine steel slag powder were studied. The results indicated that when ethylene glycol, triethanolamine and absolute ethyl alcohol were used to prepare composite grinding aids according to the volume ratio of 2∶2∶2, and the ratio of steel slag to composite grinding aid was 450 g for 6 mL, the particle size distribution of ultrafine steel slag powder was the best, that is, d90 was 9.14-9.28 μm, d50 was 3.31-4.20 μm, d10 was 0.99-1.04 μm and d90-d10 was 8.11-8.24 μm. And the compound grinding aid had the best grinding effect on desulfurized slag.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 利用冶金含铁粉尘制备超细铁粉的试验
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LI Hua- bin1,FAN Xin- yu2,FAN Rong1,TANG Duo- yue2,ZHANG Hui3,WANG Tian- ming3
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
（1. Technology Center, Panzhihua Bingyang Technology Co., Ltd., Panzhihua 617064, Sichuan, China
2. School of Chemistry and Chemical Engineering, Yangtze Normal University, Chongqing 408000, China
3. New Metallurgy Hi- Tech Group Co., Ltd., China Iron and Steel Research Institute Group, Beijing 100081, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 摘要 针对冶金含铁粉尘杂质含量较高、原始颗粒细小容易污染环境等问题，采取除杂提纯分离- 还原两步法制备超细铁粉。通过湿法反应、磁选、浮选等除杂提纯工序，含铁粉尘中SiO2质量分数降低到0.12%，CaO、MgO质量分数同时得到不同程度的下降。分离杂质后的含铁粉尘还原试验结果表明，在H2气氛、还原温度为750 ℃、保温1 h的条件下，得到的超细铁粉TFe质量分数达到99.27%，微观形貌观测颗粒平均粒径约为1 μm，比表面积为2.495 m2/g。经过压制成型及烧结试验，表明得到的超细铁粉易于压制成型，颗粒烧结反应活性好，压制的成型坯体烧结温度为850～900 ℃，明显优于常规还原铁粉。
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Experiment on preparation of ultrafine iron powder using metallurgical iron- bearing dust
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the problems of metallurgy iron- bearing dust with high impurity content and serious environmental pollution due to the small particles, the ultrafine iron powder was prepared by the purification and separation- reduction method. By wet method reaction, magnetic separation, flotation and other impurity removal and purification processes, the mass fraction of SiO2 in the iron- bearing dust reduced to 0.12%, while the mass fraction of CaO, MgO decreased in different degrees at the same time. The reduction test results of the iron- bearing dust after the separation of impurities showed that under the atmosphere of H2, the TFe mass fraction of the ultrafine iron powder reached 99.27% after the reduction under thermal insulation at 750 ℃ for 1 h. The average size and the specific surface area of the observed microscopic morphology particle were about 1 μm and 2.495 m2/g, respectively. After pressing and sintering tests, it showed that the obtained ultrafine iron powder was easy to be pressed and formed, and the particle presented excellent sintering activity. The sintering temperature of the pressed shaped body was around 850- 900 ℃, which was obviously better than that of the conventional reduced iron powder.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of aging treatment on microstructure and properties #br# of Stellite 6B cobaltbased superalloy
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
 In order to investigate the effect of aging treatment on the microstructure and properties of Stellite 6B cobaltbased superalloy, different aging treatment methods were used to treat the alloy samples. The microstructure, microhardness and carbide precipitation of the samples under different aging treatments were compared and analyzed. The results showed that as the aging treatment time increased, the precipitation of carbides increased, and the carbide chains that strengthen the grain boundaries begin to precipitate on the grain boundaries. When the aging treatment parameter was 980 °C×12 h, the effect was the best. At this time, the microstructure was completely austenitized, and there was no bulk primary carbide on the matrix and the grain boundary. The precipitated M23C6 carbides were uniformly dispersed and their size was controlled at about 1 μm, and the maximum was not more than 3 μm. The crystalline carbides were broken into carbide chains, and the longest was up to 5 μm. The alloy hardness was close to HRC47.18, which can meet the hardness requirements of the extrusion die materials.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
New heat exchanger station was build in the 1750 m3 blast furnace slag pool side in Jinan iron and steel group. Blast furnace washing slag water was raised by slurry pump, then, sented to high-fiber bundles filters. Filtered washing slag water was accessed into the high performence all welded plate heat exchanger, then the heat exchanger water (clean water) was used for heating. The corrosion and block problems in radiator were successful resolved by using plate separated washing slag water from recycled water to ensure the recycled water clean. Short payback period, saving investment, electricity and water, environmental is the feature of this program. It can also improve production efficiency, reduce production costs, social and economic benefits is significant.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: Al2O3、MgO交互作用对复合铁酸钙生成影响机理
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （College of Metallurgy and Energy， North China University of Science and Technology， Tangshan 063009， Hebei， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 摘要 为了探索复合铁酸钙的生成机制以优化烧结工艺，提高烧结矿质量，采用相平衡法研究了准化学平衡条件下Al2O3与MgO在烧结中的行为。结果表明，Al2O3和MgO的共同存在有利于复合铁酸钙（silico-ferrite of calcium and alminum，简称SFCA）的生成，但存在着交互作用，MgO促进赤铁矿分解生成磁铁矿，Al2O3的存在可抑制MgO的作用，减少磁铁矿生成，尤其在Al2O3质量分数较高时，MgO促进磁铁矿生成能力降低，促进SFCA生成作用增强。当MgO质量分数为2%时，添加质量分数2%的Al2O3矿相中磁铁矿质量分数快速降低，SFCA质量分数快速增加；随着Al2O3质量分数升高，SFCA晶面间距减小,晶体结构稳定性增强，有利于SFCA的生成；Al2O3质量分数超过3%后，孔洞结构增多，SFCA质量分数增加变缓，磁铁矿质量分数呈降低趋势，赤铁矿质量分数有升高趋势。
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence mechanism of interactions between Al2O3 and MgO on generation of composite calcium ferrite
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：To clarify the formation mechanism of complex calcium ferrites for the optimization of sintering process and the improvement of sinter quality，the phase equilibrium method was adopted to research the behavior of Al2O3 and MgO in sintering process under the conditions of quasi chemical equilibrium. The results showed that MgO and Al2O3 were conducive to the generation of composite calcium ferrite（SFCA），but there was interaction between MgO and Al2O3. MgO facilitated the decomposition of hematite and the formation of magnetite，the facilitation of MgO was suppressed by Al2O3，especially at high Al2O3 mass fraction. The promotion effect of MgO on the generation of magnetite decreased and the effect on the generation of SFCA enhanced. When the MgO mass fraction was 2%，the magnetite mineral phase content rapidly decreased and the SFCA content increased rapidly after adding 2% Al2O3. With increasing the mass fraction of Al2O3，the SFCA interplanar crystal spacing decreased and the stability of crystal structure increased which was good for the generation of SFCA. When the Al2O3 mass fraction exceeded 3%，the pore structure increased，the SFCA mass fraction increased slowly and the magnetite mass fraction decreased, but the hematite mass fraction tended to increase.

Influence mechanism of interactions between Al2O3 and MgO on generation of composite calcium ferrite. China Metallurgy, 2017, 27(4): 5-10.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Cross domain image translation of steel surface defects
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract： In the surface detection recognition algorithms based on deep learning, a large amount of sample data was often required. For some newlyestablished production lines, it was impossible to collect enough samples in a short period of time. This would result in inefficient detection which will affect efficiency in the early stage of a detecting system. In order to solve this problem, an enhanced generative adversarial network was adopted to perform image translation on image samples in other production lines to obtain the defect samples of new production lines, which was also called as cross domain image conversion. The surface defect samples of hotrolled steel sheets and the nondefective samples of coldrolled steel strips were fusionconverted into coldrolled strip surface defects samples. The experiment conducted cross domain conversion on the surface defects of six different types of hotrolled steel sheets. The results showed that the image conversion results with heavier background texture are better. For some defects with small defect scales, such as pitting, the detection results still have room for improvement. In order to quantitatively determine the detection result, a neural network was introduced to classify the original image and the translated image. The accuracy of classification results reached 96%, indicating that the image crossdomain conversion effect was good and has certain application value.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence of nitrogen and argon switching on nitrogen mass fraction in converter bottom blowing
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the effect of bottom blowing gas on the endpoint nitrogen mass fraction of molten steel, the effect of bottom blowing mode on the endpoint nitrogen mass fraction of 210 t topbottom combined blowing converter at Qiansteel was studied, and the experimental results were analyzed based on the theory of denitrification and nitrogen absorption of molten steel. The application results showed that with the increase of C mass fraction in hot metal and the decrease of the endpoint O mass fraction, the N mass fraction in the end point decreases gradually. Under the same conditions of the molten iron, bymaterial, end point of the converter, bottom blowing flow rate and process operation, the nitrogen increment in molten steel increased gradually with the extension of the node of nitrogenargon switching time. When the switching time was less than 56% of oxygen blowing ratio, the effect of bottom blowing nitrogen and argon switching on the nitrogen mass fraction of molten steel was small. When the switching time was more than 56%, the nitrogen mass fraction of molten steel increased greatly.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence of tungsten content and solid solution temperature on corrosion resistance of 022Cr25Ni7Mo3.5WCuN steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The effect of the tungsten content and solution temperature on the pitting corrosion resistance of super duplex stainless steel 022Cr25Ni7Mo3.5WCuN was studied. The pitting corrosion resistance of super duplex stainless steel 022Cr25Ni7Mo3.5WCuN was tested by chemical immersion weight loss method and electrochemical anodic polarization curve method and ThermoCalc thermodynamic calculation was used for the assistant analysis. The results showed that the effect of solution temperature on the pitting corrosion resistance of super duplex stainless steel 022Cr25Ni7Mo3.5WCuN was remarkable. The corrosion resistance of 022Cr25Ni7Mo3.5WCuN reached the optimum at 1 100 ℃. Under ideal solid solution conditions, tungsten was conducive to the formation of passivation film, and the increase of tungsten content enhanced the corrosion resistance of 022Cr25Ni7Mo3.5WCuN. When the tungsten mass fraction was 1.5%, 022Cr25Ni7Mo3.5WCuN had the best corrosion resistance. If the content of tungsten continues increasing, the equilibrium between austenite and ferrite will be broken and the corrosion resistance will be reduced.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Homogenization heat treatment of GH907 ingot
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to guide the production practice of alloy GH907, the solid solution law of the interdendritic Laves phase and the diffusion law of Nb element in the GH907 ingot is systematically studied. The homogenization diffusion of alloy GH907 508 mm cast ingot at different temperature and time, which was produced by Fushun Special Steel Co., Ltd., was discussed using the optical microscope and the scanning electron microscope. Studies showed that the best diffusion temperature of Laves phases in GH907 cast ingots was 1 160 ℃, and the Laves phase can be completely eliminated when the diffusion time was more than 10 h. The calculated apparent diffusion coefficients of Nb in GH907 cast ingots was D＝0.488 55×10-14 m2/s at 1 160 ℃. The theoretical calculation showed that the residual segregation index of Nb in GH907 cast ingots could reach 0.02 when the heat treatment was at 1 160 ℃ for 56 h.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Intelligent manufacturing and intelligent design of iron and steel manufacturing process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The main content of intelligent manufacturing and intelligent design on iron and steel manufacturing process are analyzed. The intelligent manufacturing of iron and steel manufacturing process includes the intelligent process design, the intelligent process production and operation, the intelligent process management, the intelligent process supply chain, the intelligent process service system. The intelligent design of iron and steel manufacturing process includes the basic scientific research, adopting CAE threedimensional simulation design analysis and computing technology, the technical science research, adopting mechanical engineering threedimensional simulation design technique, the engineering science research, adopting digitization threedimensional simulation plant layout technique. Realizing the intelligent manufacturing of iron and steel manufacturing process, the intelligent design is not only a key link of intelligent manufacturing, but also plays a leading role. Without advanced intelligent design, it is difficult to have advanced intelligent manufacturing, and it is necessary to attach great importance to the intelligent design of iron and steel manufacturing process. The advanced degree of intelligent design determines the advanced level and future of intelligent manufacturing.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application of gap clearance control technology of three hinge points structure segments in Baosteel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The two single-strand slab casters at Luojing Plant were transformed into a 2 300 mm slab caster in Baosteel Zhanjiang. Owing to the inherent three hinge points structure of the segments, the practical online roll gap accuracy usually exceeded ±2 mm, sometimes even reached ±5 mm, which frustrated to meet the production requirement. On the basis of the principle of segment gap control, the accurate feedback value of the roll gap was obtained by roll gap conversion, and the automatic control of the segment roll gap can be achieved. The reasons for the roll gap clearance were analyzed, and the segment gap clearance control technology was put forward. The actual application showed that the technology can control the offline and online roll gap accuracy within ±0.2 and ±0.5 mm respectively, and effectively ensure the equipment function accuracy and state stability,which could create favorable conditions to improve the quality of products, give full play to productivity advantage for 2 300 mm continuous casters,and had a certain significance for the design and reform of segments.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application and influencing factor analysis of incremental model on converter steelmaking
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In accordance with the real situation that the sublance should not be added on middle and small converter, and it was difficult to continuously measure the molten steel component (mass fraction) and temperature and establish the dynamic models, the incremental model was applied in converter steelmaking process to control the end point of molten steel. The molten effect was greatly improved using incremental model and new charging scheme, it was shown that the hit-rate for primary discharging and residual manganese yield were increased by 5.7% and 6.52% in the end-point hot metal of converter, respectively, and the splashing ratio was reduced by 1.24%.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Comprehensive utilization and industrial development direction of vanadium-titanium magnetite
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The processes to comprehensively utilize vanadium-titanium magnetite were discussed，whose key is to recycle the titanium in vanadium-titanium magnetite concentrate and increase the recovery rate of titanium. The industrial processes of comprehensive utilization vanadium-titanium magnetite concentrate are only the blast furnace process and the pre-reduction electric furnace method，and other methods are still under the research due to different kinds of disadvantages. Therefore，through the comparison of all methods，it is thought that the tendency of comprehensive utilization of vanadium-titanium magnetite is the gas-based pre-reduction electric furnace.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Microstructure and Property of 700MPa Grade V/Ti- Alloyed Steel at Lower Cooling Rate
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The microstructures of 700MPa grade V-bearing microalloyed high strength low alloy steel with different cooling rate of 3~5，1.5~2 and 0.3~0.5℃/s respectively after rolling were observed by optical microscopy，scanning electron microscopy and transmission electron microscope．The grain size，phase fraction of pearlite and the interlamellar spacing were obtained by quantitative metallographical examination．The tensile properties were measured and the fractures were analyzed．It showed that the properties of product is best with cooling rate 1.5~2℃/s，because the precipitation particles are much more than that with other cooling modes and the precipitation strengthening effect increased linearly with the precipitation amount．

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Ironmaking Department， Baosteel Engineering and Technology Group Co., Ltd., Shanghai 201900, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis on pulverized coal combustion technology of CIM double- hearth kiln
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The pulverized coal combustion technology of CIM double- hearth kiln is a new type of pulverized coal combustion technology. The core of the technology is to control and distribute the quantity of pulverized coal supplied by the combination mode of a number of metering valves and a flow divider and a "Y" distributor. The metering valve is frequency conversion control, which can realize the regional adjustment of the quantity of pulverized coal，and the "Y" distributor is used to adjust the pulverized coal quantity of the single pipe. The effective switching between the two furnaces can be achieved by the shunt and valve control. The normal production of double- hearth kiln can be achieved by matching the time of pulverized coal with the period of double- hearth kiln.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 包钢炼钢厂转炉工艺优化
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LIU Nan，ZHAO Bao- guo，XIN Guang- sheng
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Steelmaking Plant， Inner Mongolia Baotou Steel Union Co., Ltd.， Baotou 014010, Nei Mongolia， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Process optimization of converter in Baogang steelmaking plant
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A large number of iron bearing dust, continuous casting cutting slag and steel slag were produced in steel making and continuous casting process. These iron compounds were used in the converter to reduce the emission and pollution, which caused the fluctuation of the converter process operation and the increase of the consumption of the iron and steel materials in some furnaces. Through the "leave slag+double slag" process, the general converter process was divided into two stages on the basis of leaving slag. And by controlling the bottom blowing in the blowing process, the splash reduced significantly. After optimizing the existing operation process, the consumptions of the iron and steel materials and slag were substantially reduced, which significantly decreased the production costs of the converter steelmaking.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 刘南，赵保国，辛广胜. 包钢炼钢厂转炉工艺优化[J]. 中国冶金, 2017, 27(9): 38-40. LIU Nan，ZHAO Bao- guo，XIN Guang- sheng. Process optimization of converter in Baogang steelmaking plant. China Metallurgy, 2017, 27(9): 38-40.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: CUI Gui-bin， JU Xin-hua， YAN Chun-lian， ZHAO Yun-tang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Shougang Research Institute of Technology， Beijing 100043， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Electron Back-Scatter Diffraction Study of Microstructure and Texture in DP590 Dual Phase Steel With Different Process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The microstructure and texture in DP590 dual phase steel through different process were studied respectively by means of field emission scanning electron microscope （FESEM） and electron back-scatter diffraction （EBSD）. The results show that the microstructure have a large change from hot rolling and cold rolling to continuous annealing process; block ferrite and a spot of pearlite of hot rolled was transformed into ferrite and a spot of martensite， which grain size reduced from 8 micrometers to 6 micrometers. The texture also have a large change from hot rolling and cold rolling to continuous annealing process; rotated cube texture are weakened gradually， but its extent smaller， and the corresponding（001）<110> grains were reduced gradually; the disadvantageα texture enhanced first and then weakened， which the orientation density of the strongest component（112）<110> reach to biggest at cold rolling stage; and the corresponding（112）<110> grains increased first and then decreased; the advantageγ texture increased gradually， which the orientation density of the strongest component（111）<112> reach to biggest at continuous annealing stage， and（111）<110> and（111）<112> grains also increased gradually， but （111）<112> grains are more than（111）<110> grains.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: The Second Division of Long Products, Chengde Branch Company of Hebei Iron and Steel Group Co., Ltd., Chengde 067102, Hebei, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Leakage explosion analysis and measures of dry dusting system for converter with semi steelmaking
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The causes of leakage and explosion of dry dusting system for converter steelmaking with semi steelmaking in the early, middle, and late phase of smelting and slag splashing were analyzed. The venting mainly occurred in the open blow phase. According to the flue gas composition changes of the venting explosion and normal blowing, due to blowing later and oxidations insufficient leads to the unburned carbon monoxide and oxygen- enriched enter electrostatic precipitator and mix up in venting conditions. According to the remaining slag operation for semi steel steelmaking leads to blowing later, developed oxygen and nitrogen compound blowing technology. Moreover, standard operation consists of first slag charge adding time, second falling lanc, blown pattern and the species and quantity of slag splashing. The venting times decreased month by month, and decreased to less than 2 times since June, 2013.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Reducing costs and improving the level of metallurgical mineral resources development and utilization
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Metallurgical mines in our country faces resources endowment disadvantage has significantly reduced year by year, the national economy, iron ore reserves of iron, manganese resources rigid demand continues to increase, and the challenges of ecological environment deterioration. The purpose is to explore China’s ferrous metallurgical mines efficient and reasonable development and utilization of mineral resources and the effective way to sustainable development of ferrous metallurgical mines in China mineral resources development and utilization level of current situation and existing problems of in- depth analysis. It comes to the conclusion that China’s ferrous metallurgical mines way out is to reduce the cost of exploitation and utilization of mineral resources and comprehensive utilization of resources, from the national support, tax adjustment, technology innovation, management innovation, tailings utilization, expand incentives category in six aspects, such as ferrous metallurgical mine production to reduce costs, improve the comprehensive utilization of ferrous metallurgical mineral resources, China’s ferrous metallurgical mineral core competitiveness can be improved.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Industrial production practice of sintering with addition of Jimblebar blend fines in Shaansteel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the best proportion of Jimblebar blend fines in sinter，Hanzhong Iron and Steel Co.，Ltd. of Shaanxi Steel Group had a longterm cooperation with BHP billiton. The Jimblebar blend fines produced in BHP billiton was used on the 2×265 m2 sintering machines for the industrial production. The plant production results showed that when adding 30% Jimblebar blend fines，the sinter composition and quality can meet the technical requirements of the company through applying the technology of the low fuel rate and deep bed sintering, adjusting the green bed moisture control standard and pressing sinter bed appropriately，provide better conditions for the rational system of ore distribution，effective organization of sintering process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 自主集成300 t钢包加盖技术在京唐的应用实践
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Steelmaking Department， Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co., Ltd.， Tangshan 063200， Hebei， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application of full- course covering on 300 t ladle in Shougang Jingtang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Through the study of the ladle covering process, the technology of the ladle covering with independent intellectual property rights and its operation were formed in Shougang Jingtang Company. After the ladle covering system put into practice, the running rate of the ladle covering was above 99.8% all the way. The ladle and package cover thermal state was good, the temperature of the steel slag was relatively high. Through the practical operation, it was showed that compared with an open operation, with the ladle covering process, the temperature of ladle bottom, wall and slag line can increase by about 200 ℃ on average, the average converter tapping temperature can decrease by 13 ℃, and the temperature drop from the end of the tapping to the start of the refining can reduced by 2.9 ℃. At the same time, the maximum using times of the ladle cover can be 1 800 times or more. In the aspect of saving energy and reducing consumption, the production cost was reduced, good effects were obtained in the improvement of the production, and about 32 million yuan can be saved for one year.

1.Nanjing Iron and Steel United Co., Ltd., Nanjing 210035, Jiangsu, China
2. State Key Laboratory of Advanced Metallurgy, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Cause of the hard phases in the hot-rolled 18CrMnB gear steel bars
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：For the problem of partial abnormal hardness and poor machinability with the hot-rolled bars of 18CrMnB gear steel, the related inclusions and base microstructure were analyzed. The properties of the hard phases were discussed, and the process factors resulting in the defect were investigated. The results show that the bigger and scattered inclusions were ladle flux induced combined oxides and their crushed ones due to rolling operation, respectively. The high melting point oxides led to the appearance of the hard phases in the steel bars. The basic microstructure of the steel, however, was confirmed to be composed of ferrite plus pearlite, which shew different sizes from surface to inward but should not be the cause of the hard phases.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WANG Lin-zhu1,LI Jing-she1,XIONG Jia-ze2,XIA Hui-hua2,YANG Shu-feng1,WU Tuo1
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
（1.School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China
2.Shougang Guiyang Special Steel Co., Ltd., Guiyang 550005, Guizhou, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis on cleaniness, microstructure and properties of the finished hollow steel 95CrMo product from domestic and abroad
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The comparative study on the hollow steel 95CrMo from domestic and abroad was undertaken. The result shows that the sulphur content from domestic hollow steel was low. Although the deoxidizing element contents of aluminum and calcium from domestic hollow steel were higher, the remaining total oxygen was not lower, and the ratio of wAls/wAlt was significantly lower than that from abroad. The content of titanium and residual elements from the scrap were higher from domestic hollow steel. Quantities and sizes of inclusions from domestic hollow steel were large and there were more spherical inclusions which were encapsulated with CaS. While in foreign samples, more Al2O3 inclusions were detected which were small, and there were few titanium inclusions. The difference in microstructures and hardness for the samples from home and abroad was not significant. It can be inferred that the number, size and type of inclusions may be the main factors in effecting the hollow steel fatigue life.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 高炉大沟的校核
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Ironmaking Plant, Dazhou Iron and Steel Group Co.， Ltd.， Dazhou 635002， Sichuan， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Checking of the big ditch of blast furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：After blast furnace smelting V-Ti iron ore or inferior iron ore, separation of slag iron would become more time-consuming. But blast furnace needs high yield because of production needs. High yield results in increase of the hot metal flow velocity and time contraction of slag iron within the big ditch, therefore the big ditch’s size need to be checked for more precise matching of the blast furnace. This can be done by adjusting the slag runner’s height, so that results such as protecting slag quenching equipment, reducing the iron content in slag, and reducing the probability of the “blast” rate at the slag runner’s end can be achieved.
keywords_en: checking of the blast furnace`s big ditch

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 高强焊瓶钢HP345的研制与生产
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
1. Department of Strip Steel, Shougang Technology Research Institute, Beijing 100043, China
2. Technology and Quality Department, Shougang Qian’an Steel and Iron Co., Ltd., Qian’an 064404, Hebei, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development and production of hot rolled strip steel HP345 used for welded gas cylinders
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The HP345 hot rolled strip used for welded gas cylinders was developed successfully by means of V and Ti micro-alloying design and controlled rolling and condoned cooling technology by Shougang Qian’an Iron and Steel Co., Ltd.. The chemical composition, metallurgy quality and mechanical property of HP345 volume-produced were analyzed in detail. The results show that the HP345 steel with low yield ratio and high strength which meets the national standard and the requirements of users can be developed and produced through Vanadium and Titanium micro alloying (wV≤ 0.025%, wTi≤ 0.025%) of low carbon manganese steel with the chemical composition of 0.17%C-0.25%Si-1.40%Mn, and can be rolled with high finish rolling and coiling temperature. A small amount of V and Ti element composite addition has very small effect on the microstructure of HP345 steel. Therefore, it cannot produce obvious fine grain strengthening, but can precipitate a sufficient number of precipitated phase particles in HP345 steel to produce obvious precipitation strengthening effect.
keywords_en: steel plate for welded gas cylinder
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 刘阳春，张云鹤，徐彬. 高强焊瓶钢HP345的研制与生产[J]. 中国冶金, 2015, 25(02): 29-33. LIU Yang-chun,ZHANG Yun-he,XU Bin. Development and production of hot rolled strip steel HP345 used for welded gas cylinders. China Metallurgy, 2015, 25(02): 29-33.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: GU Yan- liang1,GE Hong1,NIU Ting- yu1,CHEN Ting- jun1,ZHANG Qi2
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
（1. Department of Energy, Qinhuangdao Shouqin Metal Material Co., Ltd., Qinhuangdao 066326, Hebei, China
2. State Environmental Protection Key Laboratory of Eco- Industry, Northeastern University, Shenyang 110819, Liaoning, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and practice of cascade utilization of fuel gas resource in Shouqin Company
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the benchmarking about the natural gas consumption in Shouqin Company, it was found that reducing the natural gas baking of the ladle, tundish and torpedo bottle during baking was an important means to reduce the natural gas consumption. Through the theoretical calculation and process experiment, it was proved that the low heat value LDG can replace the natural gas during baking process and can keep the temperature of the energy consumption equipment lining balanced and stable. And the best LDG recovery interval range of converter blowing process was obtained by the recovery experiments, which can increase the level of LDG recovery, meet the demand of the converter gas for baking the ladle, tundish and torpedo ladle, and achieve the goal of stopping using the natural gas. Through the cascade utilization of the fuel gas resource, the level of natural gas consumption was effectively reduced, the LDG utilization ratio was increased, the energy cost was decreased, and the environmental pollution was reduced, which can provide a certain reference for the cascade utilization of the fuel gas resource in the steel enterprises of the same type in China.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 谷延良，葛红，牛汀雨，陈廷军，张琦. 首秦公司燃气资源梯级利用研究与实践[J]. 中国冶金, 2017, 27(12): 66-70. GU Yan- liang,GE Hong,NIU Ting- yu,CHEN Ting- jun,ZHANG Qi. Research and practice of cascade utilization of fuel gas resource in Shouqin Company. China Metallurgy, 2017, 27(12): 66-70.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 智能制造在梅钢炼钢厂的应用实践
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WANG Yong，HU Jian- guang，SUN Yu- jun，ZOU Shi- wen
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Steelmaking Plant, Shanghai Meishan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Nanjing 210039, Jiangsu, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application practice of intelligent manufacturing in Meisteel Steelmaking Plant
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The steelmaking plant of Shanghai Meishan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd. carried out research on different manufacturing processes around the intelligent manufacturing. In the four processes, including the hot metal pretreatment process, converter smelting, secondary refining and continuous casting, combined with the production operation, the modeling, intelligent and automated intelligent manufacturing technology was developed, and the better application of practical results were achieved. In the hot metal pretreatment process, the one- key desulfurization model research was performed, and the aim of one- key desulfurization operation was achieved. Then the intelligent research on the determination of grilled molten iron slag was carried out, and the intelligent determination of the slag removal process was achieved, which replaced the artificial determination of the slag grade. In the converter area, the converter smelting model was studied, and the one- key steelmaking smelting control was achieved, which resulted in the more stable control of the converter end point and the blowing rate of 1% or less. In the refining process, the alloy model was studied, and the application of alloy mode played an important role in reducing the total cost of the alloy and improving the control accuracy of molten steel composition. In the continuous casting process, a comprehensive research on automatic casting steel was conducted, and the no- pouring steel control technology was achieved, which greatly improved the efficiency of labor.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 河钢石钢智能制造的思考
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
（1. School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering，University of Science and Technology Beijing， Beijing 100083, China
2. Shijiazhuang Iron and Steel Co.， HBIS， Shijiazhuang 050031， Hebei， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Consideration about intelligent manufacturing of HBIS Shijiazhuang Iron and Steel Co.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Development characteristic of industrial revolution are reviewed, the construction process of 3.0 and 4.0 are described, and the several problems which should be paid attention to during the informatization construction were emphasized. On the basis of that, the present situation of Shijiazhuang Iron and Steel Co. is analyzed, and the development stages are defined. At the same time, the necessity and feasibility of the development of intelligent manufacturing in Shijiazhuang Iron and Steel Co. are discussed. After describing the intelligent manufacturing, the planning and construction of Shijiazhuang Iron and Steel Co. based on the intelligent manufacturing during the relocation is put forward. Moreover, the concrete suggestions of constructing an intelligent manufacture 3.0 and 4.0 in Shijiazhuang Iron and Steel Co. are proposed. Finally, it is pointed out that the construction of intelligent manufacturing would be a long-term continuous upgrade process.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 张海宁， 李士琦. 河钢石钢智能制造的思考[J]. 中国冶金, 2016, 26(6): 1-5. ZHANG Hai- ning，,LI Shi- qi. Consideration about intelligent manufacturing of HBIS Shijiazhuang Iron and Steel Co.. China Metallurgy, 2016, 26(6): 1-5.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LI Guang-bin1，DAI Shu-hua2，JIA Yu-hua1,WANG Peng-fei1，CAO Hong-bo1，LEI Xue-dong1

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Reducing refining cycle of AOD furnace for 0Cr13C stainless steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：For the method of hot metal pretreatment＋AOD furnace＋LF furnace＋continuous caster that was applied in Xingtai Iron and Steel Limited Corporation during product process of 0Cr13C stainless steel，AOD furnace smelting cycle was longer than continuous caster casting steel time and processing time of dephosphorization station，which resulted in limiting production efficiency of whole production line of stainless steel. Effects of charging cold scrap ratio，silicon percent of high carbon ferrochrome on carbon percent and temperature of hoisting lance and smelting cycle of AOD furnace were investigated. Results indicated that main way to reduce 0Cr13C refining cycle of AOD furnace，was to control carbon content of hoisting lance. Considering cost，when charging silicon content of high carbon ferrochrome was greater than or equal to 3.0%，and amount of scrap was from 3.0 to 3.5 t，AOD furnace refining cycle for 0Cr13C can be shorten near to 77min，temperature and carbon content of hoisting lance was 1682℃ and 0.49%，respectively，and comprehensive indexes，such as furnace life and material consumption，were better.
keywords_en: Silicon percent of high carbon ferrochrome

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Batch annealing production process of Ti-IF steel in Hansteel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A kind of batch annealing production process of Ti-IF steel was discussed. The recrystallization temperature at 75% and 80% cold rolling reduction rate was detected，and an empirical formula of cold rolling reduction and recrystallization temperature was obtained. The cold point temperature of the annealing coil was calculated under different annealing process，which predicted that the best annealing process was holding for 15 h at 740 ℃. The texture composition of the strip coil under different annealing process was detected by XRD，and the influence of the annealing process on the drawability was analyzed. The precipitate particles were observed under transmission electron microscopy. The results showed the precipitate was constituted by TiN，TiS and Ti4C2S2，and there were no TiC and AlN particles that meant the C and N were completely fixed by Ti before heating for the hot-rolling process and the composition and process design met the requirement of IF steel on design.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：With 10 MV·A half open arc furnace as research object, through to the 10 MV·A half open arc furnace used to analysis the problems in production of high carbon ferromanganese, summarizes the lining laying way improving，to improve the original fuel selection，electrode pressure and control, tremie pipe to water, stable transmission load level in 140-145 A, voltage stability using five improvement measures, such as make arc furnace process parameters more suitable for production of high carbon ferromanganese, reduced electrode accidents, and the ore and coke used to select, reduce dolomite with intake, reducing slag iron ratio, reduced the amount of slag, improve obviously the various technical and economic indexes, average daily production reached 66.38 t/d, smelting power consumption reduced to 2 609 kW·h/t, obtain enormous economic benefits.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence of Al2O3 on liquid phase formulation during iron ore sintering process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The thermodynamic analysis of the liquid phase area of CaO-SiO2-FeOx-MgO-Al2O3 system was carried out by FactSage under different Al2O3 content. And the effect of kaolinite Al2O3 and gibbsite Al2O3 on the liquid phase generation properties of CaO-SiO2-FeOx-MgO-Al2O3 system was researched through liquid phase characteristic experiment. It was reported that there were no significant differences between the effect of kaolinite Al2O3 and gibbsite Al2O3 on the characteristic temperature of liquid phase formulation. With the increase of Al2O3 content, the temperature of liquid phase beginning generation rised, the temperature range of liquid phase generation decreased, and the ratio of bonding phase proportion of high melting point raised. The quantity of liquid phase formulation was related to the type and content of Al2O3. When the content of Al2O3 was 1.0%, the mixtures of the gibbsite Al2O3 formulated less liquid phase. Similarly, when the content of Al2O3 was in the range of 2.0%~3.5%, the mixtures of the kaolinite Al2O3 formulated less liquid phase.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of tight axle strength fluctuation of high strength bolt sets for steel structures
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：For the problem of excess tight axle strength standard deviation of ML20MnTiB 10.9S torshear type bolt set used for steel structure, the phosphating and saponification experiment of nuts and the heat treatment experiment of bolts were carried out. The results showed that the lubrication condition of nut and the heat treatment process of bolt influenced the tight axle strength, but they were not the primary cause. After changing the lathe tool, the diameter of bolt tail groove reduced from 13.9 mm to 13.6 mm, and the radius of curvature of bolt tail groove enlarged from 0.17 mm to 0.5 mm. In consequence, the average of tight axle strength reduced from 176 to 167 kN, and the standard deviation of tight axle strength was reduced from 17.4 to 15.5 below.
