http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development of bar and wire rod rolling technology for saving energy and reducing cost
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Under the background of the huge market demand, the guide of the technical research results about bar and wire rod, and the fierce competition owing to the overcapacity, the bar and wire rod rolling technologies developed very quickly towards the direction of saving energy and reducing cost in China. The typical energy- saving low- cost bar and rod rolling technologies included the development technology of the products with low cost and high performance, the energy- conserved technology such as direct rolling without heating for bar and wire rod, the multislit rolling technology, the lower temperature rolling technology , the grooveless rolling technologyand the endless rolling technology. Some suggestions for the future development of bar and wire rod rolling technology was put forward.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Process calculation of high temperature gas spray cooling tower in hot charging blast furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Sensible heat resource efficiency in the iron former process will be significantly improved by the hot charging process of the blast furnace raw materials and fuel. A spray evaporative cooling tower should be installed in front of the dry dust bag collectors to ensure the safety of purification and recovery system of high-temperature BFG. The theoretical calculation method for the full high temperature gas spray cooling tower is derived based on the analysis of the dry spray evaporative cooling theory and combined with the variable loading conditions of hot charging blast furnace operation. Spray water volume, dew point at the gas outlet and moisture content in the cooling tower, droplet evaporation time, the tower body size and other key technical parameters can be accurately and conveniently calculated by this method, which is easy for the computer programming application and has positive significance for the actual promotion.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of coiling in tandem cold rolling process of fine blanked steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The realization of coiling of heavy fine blanked strip steels is the key point for implementing tandem cold rolling technology of fine blanked steels successfully. In order to establish the model of deformation resistance for cold rolled fine blanked steels, cold rolling of fine blanked strip steels was studied in the laboratory through cold four-high reversible mill. Meanwhile, stress-strain curves of fine blanked steels were gained with MMS-200 thermo-mechanical simulator. Contraposing the carrousel coiler configured for 1750mm tandem cold rolling mills, mechanism analysis of the coiling process and mechanics analysis of the state of coiling for fine blanked strip steels were conducted in-depth to provide theoretical support for analysis and calculation on coiling capacity of limit thickness in tandem cold rolling of fine blanked steels. On this basis, the limited thickness of coiler in tandem cold rolling of fine blanked steels with multiple sizes was computed under the condition of different friction, and then the corresponding thickness window of safety coiling was also presented. The present work is significant to the research on production process of fine blanked steels in tandem cold rolling, which can be put into practical production.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：From the perspective of precise design，a multi-objective mathematical model of rod and wire production process of converter-continuous casting-hot rolling was established according to the product outline, aiming at narrowing the gap between the actual productivity and the target productivity, and increasing the average effective operation efficiency. The model was solved by improved hierarchical sequence method, and the capacity was calculate in order to get the reasonable results. Based on the product outline of a newly-built steel plant, the capacity matching of rod and wire production process of converter-hot rolling section in the plant was studied using this model, and the optimized design scheme was given.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The first online fixed transformation technology of the coke pusher outside track of coke oven in Baosteel was introduced, which mainly included the introduction of the transformation process, the analysis of the difficulties of the transformation, and the specific technical measures taken. The transformation of the outside track of the coke pusher was conducted on the condition of the normal production of the coke oven. And the specific technical measures were taken during the construction process, which overcame the difficulties of the process crossing, the complex construction environment and the safety. The construction efficiency was improved, the time limit was greatly shortened, and the effect on the production of coke oven was reduced. At the same time, the relevant suggestions for other similar locomotive rail online transformations were put forward.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Technology for red mud treated in rotary hearth furnace process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：For utilizing red mud produced by alumina smelting process, the direct reduction of red mud in rotary hearth furnace and grindingmagnetic separation to obtain highgrade direct reduction iron were explored. The process parameters of rotary hearth furnace reduction were explored through laboratory experiments, and industrial experiments were conducted on the industrial test line of hearth furnace. Laboratory results showed that metallization of DRI after red mud reduction was about 88.6%, and after magnetic separation, the iron grade was about 82.1%, and the iron recovery was about 88.9%. In industrial experiments, the average metallization rate of the product was about 69.2% after reduction in the hearth furnace. After magnetic separation, DRI products with high grade were obtained, the iron grade and iron recovery of DRI production were about 72.8% and 85.2%, respectively. The technological route of reducing red mud and magnetic separation in the hearth furnace has been preliminarily investigated.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 彭程，范建峰. 转底炉处理赤泥工艺技术[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(3): 53-56. PENG Cheng,FAN Jianfeng. Technology for red mud treated in rotary hearth furnace process. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(3): 53-56.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effects of alloying element on microstructure and property of automobile shock absorber piston
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to make use of the reduction iron powder which were obtained by grinding the steel scrap with the bearing rollers in the production of the automobile shock absorber piston, the graphite, electrolytic copper and carbonyl iron powder were added into the reduction iron powder and made into alloy powder, then it was pressed and sintered. The effects of graphite, Cu and carbonyl iron powder (CIP) on the microstructures and properties of the sample were discussed through the orthogonal tests. The results indicated that Cu had little influence on the hardness and tensile strength, but the graphite mass fraction had a significant impact on them. With the increase of graphite and Cu, the ferrite content decreased and the pearlite increased. The alloy Fe-1.2C-1.8Cu-10CIP obtained met the requirements of JB/T 9138－1999.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at disadvantages of the traditional equipment management, an intelligent equipment management system was put forward. Based on the overview of the theory of the equipment management, the frame of the intelligent equipment management system was described in detail, focusing on the equipment coding, the business process, and the data acquisition process of inspection instrument. At the same time, the implementation effect was provided. This scheme can offer a certain reference value for improving the equipment management level in small and medium-sized enterprises.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Coke oven gas consumption and its utilization ratio for DRI production in shaft furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In consideration of the resource characteristics and utilization situation of COG in China, it is feasible to produce high quality DRI by COG gas- based shaft furnace process in some regions. At present, the process will be towards industrialization, thus requiring further study by scientific research workers. Coke oven gas was applied to MIDREX shaft furnace process, the gas consumption and utilization ratio of COG in MIDREX shaft furnace were discussed through theoretical calculation, in order to provide technological parameter for the implementation of this process. The results showed that the ratio of H2 and CO in reducing gas after COG- reforming was 2.18, and COG consumption per ton of DRI using COG gas- based shaft furnace process was 599.70 m3. The utilization ratio of H2 and CO in shaft furnace was 32.14% and 36.14%, respectively. And the overall utilization ratio of reducing gas was 33.61% when reducing gas consumption was 1 800 m3 per ton DRI.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Cause analysis of fold defect of hot rolled thin strip and measure discussion
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the problem of no rolling coil in pickling and tendem cold rolling process caused by the hot rolled folding defect, based on the related influencing factors of hot rolling process, the causes of the formation of folding defect in the production process of hot thin rolled strip were analyzed, which were the combined compression of the rolling side guide and pinch roll on the different degrees of camber or local shape wave in the strip head and tail. And by optimizing and improving the equipment accuracy, process condition, early warning mechanism and so on, the defect incidence of hot rolled thin strip was effectively controlled, whose amount was decreased from about 55 rolls to 20 rolls per month after the defect research. The qualification rate and early warning recognition rate of hot rolled steel were improved, the effect of the defect on the production process of the downstream process was effectively reduced, and the production rhythm of upstream and downstream processes was promoted.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Factors inducing "landscape painting" defect on strip surface of LCAK steel after pickling process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The “landscape painting” defect was found on the hot rolling strip surface of LCAK steel after the pickling process. The formation mechanism of this defect was revealed with simulating the pickling process, analyzing relevant factors and observing the microstructure. The result shows that the defect was composed of porous and rough residual iron scales adhering to the strip surface. Obvious improvement of surface quality could not be found through prolonging the pickling time. In fact, the film-like iron scale was strongly related to the poor descaling during the reversing rolling process of R2 mill. Proper optimization of relevant hot rolling parameters and rough descaling system was given, and serious landscape-like defect could be avoided successfully.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Characteristics and wetting of dust collected in metallurgy furnace by microporous ceramic tubes
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to research the influence of high temperature molten metals in nonferrous metallurgical flue gas on the filtration performance and life of microporous ceramic tube, the wettability of molten metal bismuth on the microporous ceramic substrate is tested by using the sessile drop method. The structure and chemical component of the contact interface are analyzed by using metallographic microscopy, scanning electron microscopy and EDS. The composition and particle size of the flue gas and dust collected by the microporous ceramic tube of the dust removal system are also analyzed.The results show that the adhesion between the molten metal bismuth and the ceramic substrate is poor, and the bonding force is weak. It is easy to perform back flow cleaning and recover the valuable metal elements. The flue gas and dust collected in the actual production mainly contains Pb, As, Zn, Cu, Fe, Ca and other elements, and the Pb content is the highest. The particle size of flue gas and dust is small. After the stable production, the particle size range is reduced to 1- 30 μm, and the particles that are smaller than PM2.5, account for 8%- 12%.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Theory and practice of life cycle assessment for steel products in China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The basic principle and connotation of LCA (life cycle assessment) were elaborated, the application status, division and research progress of LCA in the domestic and international steel industry were analyzed, and the significance of LCA in iron and steel corporation was discussed, and the related work of Chinese government, industry associations, steel companies, consulting agencies and other aspects in promoting the series of standards for green design product evaluation technical specification series standards was studied. Specific recommendations for the promotion and application of LCA of iron and steel industry were put forward, the development direction for steel enterprises was explored, which had a certain guiding significance for LCA of iron and steel enterprises.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Quality control of 65Mn thin slab casting high-carbon steel in Tangsteel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to solve the center segregation and surface crack of 65Mn high-carbon steel in Tangshan Iron and Steel Company, the causes and mechanisms resulting in defects are analyzed. The surface crack is caused by the corner crack formed by the slab eddy in straightening process, and the internal quality is decided by the strength of continuous casting secondary cooling, the position of soft reduction and the content of S in steel. Through the adjustment of desulphurization process in LF, the optimization of mould powder, the improvement of secondary cooling strength, the center segregation and surface crack of 65Mn are excellent controlled.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Buckling control for strip steel in continuous annealing line
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the problem of strip warp defects widely existing in continuous annealing production，the mechanical model of strip warp was established based on the mechanism that the warp was caused by the inhomogeneity of strip longitudinal elongation in the thickness direction to obtain the relationship of the difference between the upper and lower surface elongation to warping size. And it was pointed out that it was the single-roll drive of temper mill that caused the difference between the upper and lower surface elongating. In order to solve the problems of strip warp during the continuous annealing production，the finite element model（FEM） of continuous annealing and temper rolling process was established. Influences of roller diameter difference，axis eccentricity and friction coefficient on difference of surface extension was simulated. On this basis，the countermeasures aiming to control the strip warp by decreasing the inhomogeneity of the elongation in thickness direction were proposed. After repeatedly optimized and adjusted in continuous annealing line，the countermeasures were applied in the actual production， which can significantly improve the strip warp defects and create remarkable economic efficiency.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Quantitative analysis methods of MA island content in iron and steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：MA island is an important part of some steel structure, whose content has a certain effect on the mechanical property such as ductility and strength. In this experiment, the quantitative method of MA island was analyzed. In the quantitative analysis, the samples were polished and eroded at first, and the MA islands were invaded into white. Then the confocal microscope was used to collect images, and the MA island had obvious contrast with the matrix organization. By using Sisc- Ias8 metallographic analysis software of Zhongkeyi and according to the two value segmentation to quantitate, the quantitative results of MA island were obtained. And finally the application of quantitative methods in the dual phase steel was described. The experiment showed that the quantitative technique of MA island could make up the deficiency of the previous quantitative analysis method, and rapidly and accurately analyze the percentage content of MA island in the steel structure.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Preference and optimization of evaluation methods for wear resistance of activated carbon
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：As the main medium of activated carbon desulphurization, activated carbon is adsorbed and regenerated in the flue gas purification system, which requires high mechanical strength of activated carbon. In order to characterize the wear resistance of activated carbon scientifically and appropriately, the drum method, ball milling method and ball- on- disk method were compared. From the view of engineering application, the drum method is selected as the testing method for the wear resistance of activated carbon for flue gas desulfurization and denitrification. Further, it was proved that by adjusting test parameters, the obtained optimal wear time and the screen mesh size were 60 min and 5.6 mm, respectively.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of internal mechanism of impact toughness of CGHAZ for high heat input welding steels
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Acicular ferrites (AF) are considered to be one of the most effective structures to improve the toughness of the coarse- grain heat affect zones (CGHAZ) for high heat input welding steels. But sometimes, the toughness of the CGHAZ is not satisfactory in some experiments, even if there are a large number of AF structures. In view of this, the factors that hinder or accelerate the propagation of cracks in the CGHAZ are analyzed with reference to the previous studies and the impact experiment of CGHAZ. The analysis results show that the micron inclusions in the CGHAZ are easy to become the crack initiation point, but the interaction of intragranular dislocation and the volume effect produced by the impact can increase the propagation resistance of crack. Meanwhile, the study also found that a small number of nanoscale carbides can enhance the ability to induce AF nucleation in the CGHAZ, and increase the toughness and strength of the CGHAZ. However, when the precipitated particles are too much, the toughness of the CGHAZ is reduced.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co., Ltd. is an important carrier for the relocation of Shougang, the construction of the steel plant is not the transfer of pollution, but in accordance with the concept of circular economy to make the solid waste close to "zero emissions". The difficulties in the disposing and process control point for converter dust, converter slag, residual steel and other solid waste in Shougang Jingtang are mainly discussed. Combined with the characteristics of Jingtang "Full Treatment process", a series of recycling technologies such as the hot slag of decarburization returning dephosphorization furnace and the "semi steel" ladle recycle by casting slag returning dephosphorization are developed. It has realized the recycling of solid waste in steel- making plant.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of ring formation in magnesian fluxed pellets rotary kiln
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to fully control the ringing behavior in magnesian fluxed pellets rotary kiln, two kinds of pellets with basicity of 0.3 and 1.0 were produced in grate- kiln process, respectively. The raw materials properties and production process were analyzed. Also the macrostructure, microstructure and chemical composition of rotary kiln ringing materials were tested. It was shown that the ringing rate in rotary kiln of pellets with the basicity of 0.3 was less than that of pellets with the basicity of 1.0. The ringing materials of pellets with the basicity of 0.3 had compact structure, the main reasons were the high temperature consolidation of powder accumulated and part of the low melting liquid phase. The ringing materials of pellets with the basicity of 1.0 had low strength and layer plate structure, the main reasons were relatively lower calcination temperature, and higher pellet powders rate which were accumulated.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of ash composition and optical texture on coke thermal property
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：According to coal blending scheme of Tanggang, taking the representative coke as the research object, the influence of ash composition and optical texture on coke thermal property was investigated. The results showed that coke ash composition have a large effect on mineral catalytic index. With the increase of the MCI, the reactivity of coke had a trend to rise, but the post-reaction strength decreased. Coke optical texture had a close relation to anisotropy index. With increasing the OTI, the reactivity of coke had a trend to decrease, but the post-reaction strength rised. The coke ash composition and optical organization were reasonably controlled, which is conducive to perfecting the coke reactivity and post-reaction strength in BF.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Boron is an important element in the production of micro-alloyed steel. A new process is put forward that the Si-Mn ferro alloy containing boron is produced by using low grade ludwigite ores based on the complex Si-Mn ferro alloy containing 0.7% boron developed by Russia. The analysis of the application of ludwigite ores on the smelting process of Si-Mn ferro alloy shows that this new process can not only achieve the production of Si-Mn ferro alloy containing boron with low cost，but also increase the yield rate of Mn to optimize the production of Si-Mn ferro alloy. Therefore，the process can provide an effective way for the comprehensive utilization of ludwigite ores in China.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The structure of the blower system, the operating principles and some problems of the No. 8 blast furnace of Shougang Changzhi Iron and Steel Co., Ltd. were introduced. In addition, the reasonable measures for improving the main motors operating, the angle of statics and the blower protecting system were put forward. After commissioning and operating, the results shows that the malfunction of differential protection has been avoided, the action of the actuator was able to be catched accurately and the system protection became visualized. Moreover, the improved blower system was working in a good situation in which the cost has been reduced 10% and the system was getting safer, steadier and with high efficiency.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application of ABB shape meter in cold-strip steel production
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Strip shape is an important quality indicator of precision cold-rolled strip. Its control technology is the key, core and difficult technology in strip rolling process. Aiming at ABB pressure magnetic shape meter which is widely used in the domestic cold-rolled strip steel, the work principle, installation requirements and shape control means were clarified. Furthermore, it analyzes the effects combined with field application in the 1750mm tandem cold rolling production line. The primary and secondary control ability was strong, while the shape control of higher order needs to be verified. In recent years, domestic research on shape control theory and equipments have made considerable progress, and have achieved industrial applications.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application practice of manganese mass fraction control in melting of low manganese steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Through the experimental study, the improvement of the steelmaking technology in controlling the manganese mass fraction in the production of the low manganese steel in Shougang Corporation Qian′an Steel Company was introduced in detail. On the basis of the technicians′ continuous exploration and trial and the analysis and comparison of the experiments and data in the different techniques, the process route and operation methods for stably producing the steel containing manganese with the mass fraction of less than 0.050% were obtained. By choosing the condition of the molten iron and the BOF slagging system, optimizing the time and the slag amount for pouring the primary slag in the converter double slag process, determining the reasonable lance height in the blowing process, applying the slag splashing technology, and avoiding the addition of the manganese alloy of the previous heat, the manganese mass fraction in the liquid steel after tapping was reduced from less than 0.063% to less than 0.040%, and the process ability of Cpk in the production of the steel containing manganese with the mass fraction of less than 0.05% reached 1.31, which met the requirement of the low manganese steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Assimilation behavior experiment of sinter fluxes
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to make better use of all kinds of sinter fluxes, the assimilation behavior of six sinter fluxes was studied by the seat drop method. The results displayed that the assimilation behavior of the high activity quicklime was better than the low activity quicklime.The assimilation behavior of the low MgO quicklime is better. The assimilation behavior of limestone is better, which is mainly due to the formation of highly active CaO at high temperature. The assimilation behavior of dolomite is poor, which is mainly due to the formation of MgO·Fe2O3. The assimilation behavior of quicklime A is better than that of quicklime B，the assimilation behavior of quicklime B，limestone A and limestone B is very close. The assimilation behavior of quicklime B is better than that of quicklime C，the assimilation behavior of dolomite is the worst.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LI Yang1,ZHANG Jian- liang1,YUAN Xiang2,WANG Fei3,WANG Gui- lin1,LIU Zheng- jian1
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
1. School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China
2. Ironmaking Plant, Xiangtan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd. of Hunan Valin, Xiangtan 411101, Hunan, China
3. Ironmaking Group, Institute of Research of Iron and Steel, Shasteel/Jiangsu, Zhangjiagang 215625, Jiangsu, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 摘要 通过对电炉粉尘进行化学成分、物相结构、粒度组成、颗粒形貌等基础物性进行分析，可知电炉粉尘中锌元素主要以铁酸锌(ZnFe2O4)形式存在，相较于ZnO而言ZnFe2O4不易还原，给电炉粉尘中锌的回收造成了困难。采用ZnO和Fe2O3化学纯试剂制备纯ZnFe2O4，通过XRD、DSC和SEM- EDS等方法对ZnFe2O4的碳热还原机理进行分析，探讨了温度和还原剂种类对ZnFe2O4碳热还原的影响。结果表明，ZnFe2O4的碳热还原分为3个阶段,即ZnFe2O4分解段、氧化锌还原段和铁氧化物还原段，第1阶段主要为ZnFe2O4的分解反应，第2阶段主要为ZnO的还原反应，并伴随少量铁氧化物的还原反应，第3阶段主要为铁氧化物还原和碳气化反应；在反应初期，煤粉转化率大于石墨，而在反应后期则相反。
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Basic analysis on recovery and utilization of zinc in EAF dust
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The chemical composition, phase structure, particle size distribution and granule morphology analysis results of EAF dust indicate that zinc in EAF dust mainly exists in the form of zinc ferrite, which is more difficult to be reduced than ZnO and leads to the difficult recovery of the zinc in EAF dust. To study the carbothermal reduction mechanism of zinc ferrite, ZnO and Fe2O3 chemical pure reagents were used to prepare pure zinc ferrite. Through the methods of XRD, DSC and SEM- EDS, the carbon thermal reduction mechanism of zinc ferrite was analyzed, and the effect of temperature and carbon source on the carbothermal reduction process was discussed. Results show that the carbothermal reduction process of zinc ferrite could be divided into three stages: decomposition of zinc ferrite, reduction of zinc oxides and the reduction of a small amount of iron oxides. The first stage was mainly the decomposition reaction of zinc ferrite, and the second stage was the reduction of zinc oxides accompanied by the reduction of some iron oxides. The third stage was the reduction of iron oxides and gasification of carbon. The conversion rate of coal powder was greater than that of graphite at the initial reaction stage, while the trend was opposite in the later stage.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 李洋，张建良，袁骧，王飞，王桂林，刘征建. 电炉粉尘锌元素回收利用基础分析[J]. 中国冶金, 2018, 28(11): 16-24. LI Yang,ZHANG Jian- liang,YUAN Xiang,WANG Fei,WANG Gui- lin,LIU Zheng- jian. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Numerical simulation on jet behaviors of two different oxygen lance nozzles
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The numerical simulation was used to research the four hole oxygen lance of 80t converter. And by comparing the jet behaviors of different oxygen lance and the effects on the molten pool, it concluded that the oxygen lance of OL-M2 had a longer max jet radius (increased by 6.7%), a shallower impacting depth (decreased by 4.5%) but a larger impact area (increased by 3.3%) than the oxygen lance of OL-M1. In order to guarantee the oxygen to be in a good condition, the reasonable operation pressure and oxygen lance position were given. Through the simulation of the mixing time in the molten pool, the average mixing time under the oxygen lance of OL-M2 was shorter by 48 s than that under the same condition of the oxygen lance of OL-M1. Compared with the use of the oxygen lance of OL-M1, the oxygen lance of OL-M2 had a better stirring effect on molten pool, which can promote the mass transfer of dephosphorization reaction at the steelmaking prophase.
keywords_en: impact effect of the molten pool

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Less slag low temperature high efficient dephosphorization process of 180 t BOF in Tianjin Iron Plant
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：For the purpose of the improvement of converter process, trail experiments of less slag low temperature high efficient dephosphorization process of 180 t top bottom combined blowing BOF were conducted. The results showed that the basicity of the initial slag and the end point slag was 1.91 and 3.02 on average, respectively. And the dephosphorization ratio reached 56.25% in the initial period but more than 90% at the end point. At the same time, the consumption of lime and dolomite dropped by over 30% and over 20%, respectively. It was concluded that the basicity of 1.5-2.0 and temperature of 1350-1400℃ in the initial period did good to the hot metal dephosphorization. And the phosphor content of molten steel increased with the increase of the tapping temperature and the end point slag basicity. The slag that was smelting rapidly in the initial period was helpful for removing more phosphorus form the hot mental to the slag. The slag getting dry, which can be caused by the decrease of slag in the later stage of smelting, was the key factor that affected the end point smelting effect.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Property analysis and utilization technology of dust ash in Jiusteel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the analysis and study of the dust removal characteristics in the mining, dressing, firing and smelting processes and the matching desulfurization system in Jiusteel， a new idea of dividing the ironcontaining dust into four categories, namely, high alkali metal, high zinc, stainless steel and low harmful elements, was put forward, and a series of experimental studies were carried out. According to the research results and technical maturity, the recovery technology was recommended. Accordingly, the valuable elements in the dusting ash of Jiusteel can be efficiently recovered and the dust can be changed into valuables. Removing harmful elements from iron dust and then returning to sintering was very beneficial to the smooth operation of ironmaking and reduction of the cost of molten iron, which really achieved zero emission of dust.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Endpoint prediction of BOF steelmaking based on twin support vector regression
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to improve the endpoint hit rate of basic oxygen furnace (BOF) steelmaking, a new prediction model of BOF endpoint is established to achieve the accurate prediction of the carbon content and temperature at the end of the converter. Knearest neighbor weighted based twin support vector regression (KNNWTSVR) is adopted for the model. A KNN weighted matrix is introduced to the objective functions, and the whale optimization algorithm is used to solve the objective functions to improve the performance of the algorithm. Then, based on the datasets of a 260 t BOF, the prediction model for converter steelmaking endpoint is established. The experimental results show that the predicted hit rates of the endpoint carbon content (error ±0.005 %) and temperature (error ±15 ℃) are 94% and 88%, respectively, and the double hit rate achieves 84%. Compared with the other two existing modeling methods, the proposed model obtains the best prediction effect. Therefore, it meets the requirements of the real production of converter steelmaking, and it is also suitable for mathematical modeling in other fields of metallurgy.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Mechanisms on formation of different kinds of surface defects in hot- rolled SPA- H steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The formation mechanism of surface defects, including the independent linear defect, independent tarpaulin defect, the mixture of linear and tarpaulin defect, and the shallow pit defect on the hot rolled SPA- H coil in Shougang Company was studied. The morphologies of defects and microstructures were examined using metallographic microscope, scanning electron microscope and energy dispersive spectrometer. It was concluded that the formation of both linear and tarpaulin defects and their mixture should be closely related to the two factors: Oxide scale that contains both silicon oxide and chromium oxide; The copper enrichment in the oxide scale near the steel matrix. The shallow pit results from the debris of broken tarpaulin which was rolled into the steel during the finish rolling.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of vanadium extraction from stone coal vanadium ore by reducing roasting- oxidiation leaching conditions on vanadium recovery rate
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The investigation was based on a kind of stone coal vanadium ore in Hubei province. The vanadium is mostly found in vanadium mica, then the vanadium wrapped in carbon and free vanadium. In order to investigate the effects of reducing roast on the leaching rate of vanadium in vanadium mica, firstly, experimental conditions of the removing process of free vanadium and vanadium wrapped in carbon were studied via TG- DSC analysis combined acidic leaching by the hydrochloric acid. During the reducing roast process, the effects of the calcination temperature, the dosage of reducing agent and the addition of oxidizing agent were investigated and determined. The results showed that in leaching process, the addition of oxidant KMnO4 had no obvious difference on the leaching rate of vanadium with the nature leaching in air. While in reducing roast process, the leaching rate of vanadium can be increased by the addition of some amount of reductive agent Al.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of continuous reoxidation on inclusions in molten steel during calcium treatment
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of continuous air absorption on inclusions in molten steel during calcium treatment was investigated using the induction furnace. Before reoxidation occurred, the vaporization of calcium significantly influence the composition of inclusions. After reoxidation, the reaction between aluminum, calcium, silicon and oxygen occurred. The evolution of inclusions was CaO- CaS- Al2O3→CaO- (CaS)- Al2O3→ (CaO)- Al2O3→Al2O3→SiO2. The number density of inclusion increased from 10 to 210/mm2, and finally increased to 300/mm2. Based on the measured results of composition of steels, the process was divided to three stages, i.e., the vaporization of calcium, the reoxidation of aluminum and the reoxidation of silicon. The composition of inclusions was predicted accurately via thermodynamic calculation in different stages during the process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Corrosion resistance evaluation of 439 ultra- pure ferritic stainless steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Combined with the SEM, the corrosion behavior of 439 ultra- pure ferritic stainless steel and 430 ferritic stainless steel has been compared by salt spray test, electrochemical test, FeCl3 point corrosion test. The result shows the pitting corrosion resistance of 439 ultra- pure ferritic stainless steel with extremely low carbon and nitrogen gap elements is better than that of 430 ferritic stainless steel. Although the capability of 430 passive film repair is stronger, the rate of pitting corrosion is faster. And 430 stainless steel has severe intergranular corrosion sensitivity, while 439 stainless steel is slightly lighter. Loop salt spray test shows that 430 stainless steel suffers severe corrosion, and 439 ultra- pure ferritic stainless steel has less corrosion. Therefore, on the basis of general 430, reducing the content of interstitial element carbon and nitrogen and adding the stabilizing element Ti can improve the corrosion resistance greatly.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis on high efficiency waste heat recovery method of ferroalloy semi-closed submerged arc furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on ferroalloy submerged arc furnace, semi-closed submerged arc furnace is considered to be reconstructed to closed submerged arc furnace. In this way, the oiler fouling of semi-closed submerged arc furnace and the low flue gas temperature are both avoided, and at the same time, the high calorific value gas is produced in the production process of closed submerged arc furnace, which can solve the low recovery efficiency of semi-closed submerged arc furnace effectively. Finally, taking 2×31 500 kV·A Mn-Si furnaces for example, the reconstruction location, reconstruction components, reconstruction equipment and the operation of process adjustment after transformation of semi-closed submerged arc furnace are analyzed. By comparing the submerged arc furnace waste heat recovery system before and after reconstruction, the effects of heat recovery and investment effectiveness are discussed, which could provide references for the recovery, rational utilization of waste heat and exploitation for industrial production process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research progress on microstructure evolution of lean duplex stainless steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The lean duplex stainless steel is a structural material of high performance and low cost，with the broad application prospects，and it is most expected to be widely used in the fields of nuclear power，petrochemical industry，ship-building，paper-making and desalination of sea water. However，this kind of stainless steel can’t be manufactured yet based on industrial-scale due to their low hot ductility. A review was made on the development history，the evolution of microstructure and properties，the thermal deformation behaviors and the brittle phase precipitation of duplex stainless steel at home and abroad. From the theories of the organization evolution，the importance and feasibility of the improvement of the hot workability of duplex stainless steel was pointed out.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：With the informatization, intelligent and product demand diversification of the global manufacturing industry, combined with China′s industrial restructuring and upgrading in recent years, higher request for the steel terminal product quality has been brought forward, while the steel intelligent manufacturing is the key to solve the above problems. Firstly, the research progress in the steel quality testing and technology optimizing was introduced. Then the key points of steel quality testing, key parameters monitoring and technology optimizing of steel industry were presented. Combined with the key technologies such as the Internet of Things, big data, cloud computing, temperature detection and the elements detection, the discussions focused on how to use the described advanced technologies to promote better implementation of intelligent steel manufacturing.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Thermodynamic analysis of reducing MgO content in slag for blast furnace A in Shougang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：With the trend of large- size of blast furnace, the higher demands for the slag property, especially the mobility and stability in high temperature were put forward in production. The appropriate melting temperature and viscosity were required for the blast furnace smelting. Based on the thermodynamic software FactSage, the effects of the MgO content on the liquidus temperature and viscosity of the slag for blast furnace A of Shougang were analyzed. The results showed that liquidus temperature is about 1 400 ℃ of the slag for blast furnace A, and the slag was fully liquid and had a good mobility. The slag composition was in the liquid phase region at 1 500 ℃. If reducing the MgO content, the slag was still in the liquid phase region. When the MgO mass fraction was in the range of 2.87%- 7.37%, the liquidus temperature increased with the increase of the MgO content. And when increasing the MgO mass fraction of 1%, the slag liquidus temperature increased 3.73 ℃. The slag viscosity reduced with increasing the MgO content. And the slag viscosity reduced 0.014 Pa·s with increasing the MgO mass fraction of 1%. It was considered when the hearth heat condition was good(hot metal temperature above 1 480 ℃), reducing the MgO mass fraction to 6% had little impact on the slag viscosity. But when the hearth heat condition was bad(hot metal temperature is below 1 480 ℃), reducing the reduction of the MgO content was not recommended.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Utilization status of zinc resources containing zinc silicate
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The utilization status of zinc resources containing zinc silicate at home and abroad were summarized from its physical and chemical characters. The two main problems in the traditionally pyrometallurgy process are low reduction efficiency and high energy consumption. In the processes of extracting zinc from the zinc resources containing zinc silicate by strong acid or strong alkaline，a large number of impurities in the zinc resources are also dissolved in the solution，which is great harmful for purifying of solution and zinc extracting. Compared with the strong acid and strong alkaline leaching processes，the impurities in zinc resources are rarely leached by ammonia in the ammonia leaching process. Based on the leaching differences between the zinc oxide and other impurities in the ammonia leaching process，the roasting followed by ammonia leaching zinc was proposed in this paper in order to improve the utilization of zinc in zinc resources. In the process，the zinc silicate mineral was transformed into zinc oxide，and then the zinc oxide was leaching by ammonia. Finally，the main necessary works should be done in this process were proposed and analyzed.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 面向生产全过程的热轧带钢精准控制核心技术
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: SHAO Jian，HE An-rui，SUN Wen-quan，SONG Yong，JING Feng-wei

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Precise control core technology of hot rolling strip in whole production process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Precise control technology of hot rolling strip is the key link of iron and steel intelligent manufacturing，which has important significance for the product customization，high precision of product quality and production process of high efficiency. Precise control technology of hot rolling strip is composed of many single technologies in the whole production process and focuses on the product quality. The practice and results of the precise control technologies of strip rolling were introduced from five aspects，which were including the online precise evaluation and analysis of the product quality，the precise grinding and management of roll，the online upgrading technology of process control，the precise control of slab furnace and the shape control of high quality steel in the whole process. These research and practice can be useful for realizing intelligent manufacturing of iron and steel industry.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and application of high strength steel slab heating techniques
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the practical production, the heating processes were respectively determined on the basis of the characteristic of the typical high strength steels, such as HSLA, DP and high strength IF. The results showed that the performance consistency of HSLA could be improved by limiting the total heating time and time of slabs in high- temperature furnace section. The reason for scales on DP was analyzed by XRD, SEM with SiO2- FeO binary phase diagram, and it was showed that scales on DP can be eliminated by increasing the slab heating temperature to ensure the descaling temperature. The occurrence of strip breaking and piling up could be reduced by raising the inlet temperature in finish rolling and reducing the rolling speed through increasing the heating temperature.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development of Q420qD bridge steel with high toughness
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to meet the requirements of high strength and high toughness of Q420qD bridge steel, the low carbon steel microalloyed with Nb, V and Ti was adopted. The hot metal pretreatment and automatic steelmaking were applied to control the molten steel purity, the cast slab quality was guaranteed by electromagnetic stirring and heavy reduction, the new generation of TMCP technology was used to refine and homogenize the microstructure, then the mechanical property of steel was guaranteed. The mechanical property test and microstructure determination of the developed steel were carried out, and the results showed that the yield strength was about 450- 510 MPa, the tensile strength was about 560- 640 MPa, the elongation was about 21%- 25%, the impact energy was above 200 J at －20 ℃, the yield ratio was below 0.85, and II class crack detection was qualified. In order to provide the fundamental basis for controlling rolling and cooling processes, the dynamic state CCT curve of steel was measured by Gleeble 3500. The analysis of precipitates by transmission electron microscope indicated that the contribution of precipitation strengthening was below 15% of the total strength, the main strengthening mechanisms were solution strengthening, refinement strengthening and phase transformation strengthening by bainite.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Technology Center, Shanxi Taigang Stainless Steel Co.， Ltd.， Taiyuan 030003， Shanxi， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Experiment on increasing bed height for fine iron ore concentrate sintering
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Increasing the sintering bed height not only improve the sinter quality，but also decrease the specific fuel consumption remarkably and had benefit to the reduction of the carbon emission to the circumstance. The companies adopted super high bed sintering technology are mostly sintering with fine ore. And the concentrate rate is no more than 10%，which may make the air permeability worse and lower the produce quality. Based on the raw material conditions in TISCO，the laboratory experiment was carried out to explore the technology of super-thick concentrate sinter bed. With a serial of measurements such as strengthening the pelletize effect，optimizing the fuel grain size，using the combined binder and pre-pelleting of iron ore concentrate，under the same concentrate pre-granulation condition，the sinter bed was improved to the range of 800 and 900 mm. And the mineral structure of sinter was improved，the indexes of product and quality were guaranteed. Meanwhile，the specific fuel consumption was reduced enormously and the anticipated results were achieved.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Kinetic of control of ［Al］s and ［Ti］ in oriented silicon steel during ladle standing process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The magnetic property and cleanliness of oriented silicon steels are significantly influenced by ［Al］s and ［Ti］. The ［Al］s and ［Ti］ are required to be controlled in a very narrow range. Combining the FactSage software and programming， a kinetic model of the slagsteel reaction during the ladle standing process of oriented silicon steels was developed to predict the evolution of steel compositions. The effect of refining slag compositon on steel compositions is investigated. It was found that the slag basicity has a huge influence on the ［Al］s and the lowering the TiO2 in slag can suppress the increase in ［Ti］ in oriented silicon steels.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Refining process optimization of high titanium hot metal for converter
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Due to the blast furnace using titanium ore, the mass fraction of titanium in hot metal is increased obviously, which is largely beyond the normal converter smelting requirement. In order to reduce the adverse effects of high titanium hot metal on the smelting of 120 t converter, such as process splashing, slag redrying, slag adhesion to the furnace mouth etc. The smelting process was optimized through changing the hot metal consumption mode, oxygen supply, lance position control, slag forming and terminal control of converter smelting. And the negative effects mentioned above were successfully eliminated. The results showed that the optimized smelting process not only shortened the time of scrap entering into the furnace and stabilized the process control, but also increased the production rhythm. Reduced the steel consumption per ton by 2.5 kg, and achieved a good practical effect and an economic benefit.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The aim and significance of carrying out management review work of management system for an enterprise are analyzed. According to the management system standard of quality, environment, professional health safety, by means of establishing a management manual for the management system, the requirement for the management review job is proposed. In line with the job requirement of management review in the management manual, the working routine of management review is formulated, and the major measure and method of management review work are proposed, which are innovative and creative. By analyzing the management review results in near three years, the management review work has played a relatively good role, promoting the continuous improvement and effective operation of the management system, meaning that the measure and method can be further promoted and applied.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Experimental study on steelmaking using limestone instead of lime as the slagging material in 100t converter
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The results of the experiments on steelmaking using limestone instead of lime as slagging material in 100t LD of Qinhuangdao Shouqin Metal Materials company were studied. The results showed that it had achieved good metallurgical effect by using limestone for slagging in singer- slag process or double slag forming process in the converter. Under the condition of charging amount of CaO decreased by 28.6%, the dephosphorization rate were 85.69%, which increased by 2.54% compared with that in the lime slagging process, and the P element had an uniform distribution in slag; At the same time the new process can reduce the dosage of slagging material by 15kg per ton steel. Using limestone instead of lime for steelmaing can increase the amount of converter gas recovery.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Deoxidization and inclusions in 410S ferritic stainless steel during smelting process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The total oxygen content in 410S ferritic stainless steel after AOD reduction were calculated by deoxidization thermodynamics. And the total oxygen mass fraction，the type and morphology of the inclusions，and the chemical composition of the slag taken from the smelting process were investigated and identified to study the forming reason of the inclusions. The results showed that the total oxygen mass fraction calculated by deoxidization thermodynamics was in good agreement with that obtained by detection. The total oxygen mass fractions decreased gradually with the increase of silicon mass fraction after AOD reduction process. And the total oxygen mass fraction and the conclusion size both decreased throughout the AOD-LF-CCM process. The type of the inclusions at the final stage of the AOD and LF was mainly CaO-SiO2-MgO-Al2O3 inclusion，and whose mass fractions of each component were different but close to the slag chemical composition of each stage. Additionally，the variation of the inclusion composition was related to the temperature drop.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WANG Sheng, DOU Wei-xue, XU Hai-qiang, CHANG Li-shan, ZHI Xin-long
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: No.1 Steelmaking Division, Jingye Steel Co., Ltd., Pingshan 050400, Hebei, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application effects of single snorkel RH and arched snorkel RH
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The application effect of vacuum refining of ultra-low carbon steel in single snorkel structure RH furnace and arched snorkel structure RH furnace was tested in the field of Jingye Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., the changes of gas flow rate and vacuum degree of two kinds of RH furnaces were recorded. And the mass percentage of w ([C]) and w ([Mn]) in molten steel was detected by multiple sampling, the decarburization effect and mixing time of two kinds of RH furnaces were analyzed and compared. The results were that the vacuum degree of both kinds of RH furnaces could be reduced to less than 100 Pa within 6 min of vacuum treatment, and stabilized at about 50 Pa after 10 min. Within 20 min of vacuum treatment, w ([C]) in steel refined by the former RH furnace could be basically removed to 0.001 0%-0.001 5%, while w ([C]) in steel refined by the latter RH furnace could be removed to about 0.000 5%. And the decarburization rate of the latter was significantly faster than that of the former. The mixing time of the former RH furnace and the latter RH furnace was about 3 and 1 min, respectively. The results showed that the smelting effects of the latter RH furnace were obviously better than that of the former RH furnace, and the arched snorkel was more suitable for the small tonnage RH vacuum refining furnace than single snorkel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Experiments on pressure distribution inside regenerator of #br# reheating furnace for rolling process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
 Regenerative reheating furnaces for the rolling process are widely used in steel plants because of its energysaving and emissionreducing characteristics. However, negative effects including high furnace hearth pressure and high electricity consumption in fans occur due to its forced flue gas extraction and air supply modes. The regenerator is a key component of the regenerative reheating furnace, and it is important to understand the pressure distribution in the regenerator of the furnace. Differing from the previous cold state experiment and numerical simulation, a semiindustrial experimental setup was established to conduct the hot state experiment, with furnace No.1 of Ansteel continuous rolling sector as the prototype. It was concluded that, under the flue gas extraction condition, the pressure inside regenerator will increase with the increase of flue gas velocity. While, under the air supply condition, the pressure inside regenerator will increase with the increase of furnace hearth temperature. For a given length of a regenerator, the pressure loss of the flue gas extraction process was higher than that of the air supply process. Pressure losses of both flue gas extraction and air supply processes will increase with the increment in the length of the regenerator.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 氮含量对无镍奥氏体不锈钢力学性能的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (1. Institute of Structural Steels, Central Iron and Steel Research Institute, Beijing 100081, China； 2. Technology Center, FIYTA (Group) Co., Ltd., Shenzhen 518057, Guangdong, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of nitrogen content on mechanical properties of nickelfree austenitic stainless steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Highnitrogen nickelfree austenitic stainless steel with different nitrogen mass fraction ranging from 0.02% to 1.20% were designed and melted. The effect of N on the strength, ductility and toughness were investigated through mechanical properties test and microstructure examination. The results showed that N can significantly improve the yield and ultimate strength. The dependencies of them on the N mass fraction (0.02%1.20%) were linear, and the corresponding equations were obtained. The toughness was very sensitive to the N content. When the mass fraction of N was in the range 0.39%0.78%, the impact absorption energy was higher, which was maintained at 380 J. However, the toughness decreased if the N content was too high or too low. The influence of N content on ductility was weak. The reduction in area was more than 70% when the N mass fraction was less than 0.78%. The toughness decreased when N mass fraction was above 0.78%. When the N mass fraction exceeded 0.60%, the size of dimples on the tensile fracture surface decreased gradually with increasing the N content. Large areas without dimples were observed on the fracture surface of GN12N specimen.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WANG Zhong1, GU Li-dong2, LIANG Wang3, WANG Guang-wei3, ZHANG Jian-liang3,4, LI Yan-jiang3
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of CaO on combustion and melting properties of Shendong bituminous coal
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the effect of CaO on the combustion and melting properties of Shendong bituminous coal, the changes of the combustion and melting properties of Shendong bituminous coal after adding different CaO content were studied experimentally. And the use of FactSage thermodynamic calculation software was used to study the effect of adding different content of CaO on the melting properties of pulverized coal. The results showed that with the addition of CaO, there was a very obvious catalytic effect on the flammability of the two Shendong bituminous coals. By observing the change of minerals in the coal after adding CaO, it could be found that with the addition of CaO, CaO reacted with the original minerals in the coal ash to form a new phase, which had an effect on the melting properties of coal. And with the addition of CaO, the melting characteristic temperature of coal ash showed a trend of decreasing first and then increasing. When the CaO mass fraction in coal ash was 30%-35%, the complete melting temperature reached the lowest point.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (1. Steelmaking Research Office， CISDI Research and Development Co., Ltd.， Chongqing 401122， China； 2. Steelmaking Business Department， CISDI Engineering Co., Ltd.， Chongqing 401122， China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Smelting processes and cost analysis of 300 series stainless steel cold materials
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
In order to study the changing trend of stainless steel smelting process, the production processes of 300 series stainless steel are summarized. According to the different raw material constitution, there are three type processes widely applied to produce 300 series stainless steel. Based on the analysis of production data, the characteristics of three smelting processes, the adaptability of raw materials and the technical and economic indexes are compared and analyzed, and the cost differences of different processes are calculated. The results show that in the melting process, the intermediate frequency induction furnace process has a cost advantage. Compared with induction furnace, the main function of the electric furnace is that its material adaptability is relatively better, the slag and steel can be melted, and the phosphorous in raw material can be removed to a certain extent. This can provide the reference for the selection and optimization of the 300 series stainless steel smelting process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: XUE Rui1,2, ZHANG Yan-chao1,2, ZHANG Cai-jun1,2, WANG Chong-jun3, LIU Zhi-yuan3
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Mathematical simulation of flow field in 160 mm×160 mm billet continuous casting mold
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A three-dimensional steady-state mathematical model was established for the 160 mm×160 mm billet mold with Fluent software. The surface velocity of the mold and the flow field state of the molten steel in the mold were taken as the main reference targets. The corresponding immersion depth of the nozzle in the under different casting rate conditions was simulated, and the numerical simulation results were verified by water simulation. The results showed that when the casting rate of the billet mold was 1.7-1.9 m/min and the immersion depth was within the range of 80-100 mm, the flow field in the mold was suitable, and there was no slag entrapment caused by the violent fluctuations of the liquid level. The research results can provide theoretical guidance for the development of a reasonable casting process for the billet continuous casting mold.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 京唐1号高炉低燃料比冶炼技术
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Ironmaking Department， Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co., Ltd.， Tangshan 063210， Hebei， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Low fuel smelting technology of No.1 blast furnace in Jingtang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to reduce the fuel consumption of blast furnace, the Rist operating line was calculated and drawn on the basis of the production parameters of No.1 blast furnace in Jingtang. The influence of the blast furnace operation parameters, such as the gas utilization, hotblast temperature, carbon content in iron and metal ratio on the fuel rate was analyzed. According to the influence factors, a series of measures were taken to reduce the No.1 blast furnace fuel ratio in Jingtang, such as strengthening the management of raw materials to improve the quality of raw fuel, which created the conditions for the reduction of fuel consumption. Through optimizing the BF operation, reducing the dome temperature of hot blast stove, reforming the hot air pipeline, the safety of air supply system was improved and the hotblast temperature was improved as high as possible. High gas use ratio was realized by optimizing the charging system. Through the high hotblast temperature, high oxygen ratio, and stable and uniform coal injection, the high coal replacement ratio was realized. Through the production practice, the fuel ratio of No.1 blast furnace in Jingtang was reduced to 490 kg/t.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The importance of the EAF steel development was stressed after the overview of the development process and the evolution of the production distribution in the U.S. steel industry. And the development of the U.S. steel industry since 2000 was analyzed. It was indicated that the U.S. steel industry had now developed stably. Finally, the energy consumption of the U.S. steel industry in around 1998 was reviewed, and the energy consumption statistical system, i.e. MECS, was introduced. It was shown that a big progress of the energy- saving was made by the U.S. steel industry, but there was still a huge potential regarding the energy- saving technologies.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of carbon dioxide emission reduction before ironmaking
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：It is necessary to build the national carbon emission trading market at the background of severe emission reduction condition, and it is important to take arrangements beforehand for ironmaking and steelmaking enterprise. To bring about awareness of the technology of the carbon emission, based on the technical status at home and abroad, ultra low carbon steelmaking and COURSE 50 are introduced as well as other technologies for CO2 emission reduction abroad. At the same time, technologies at home related to raw materials and operation condition are also described. Development of CO2 emission reduction is analyzed. Research suggests that the injection of coke oven gas and biomass, direct reduction by biomass, injection of waste plastic, waste heat recycling of blast furnace slag, vertical tank cooling for waste heat recycling for sintering and carbon capture and storage combined with blast furnace with high oxygen enrichment are worth investigating in the future.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Practice on pass design of bulb flat steel produced by semi- continuous rolling mills
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the fracture surface characteristics of the bulb flat steel, a bend- closed rolling pass system which was suitable for producing bulb flat steel in semi- continuous rolling mills was developed based on the analysis of its rolling deformation rule and the production practice of special- shaped steel for many years, which made the breakthrough to solve the technical problems of roll- pass design on bulb flat steel produced in semi- continuous rolling mills. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effects of Deoxidation Process on Non-Metallic Inclusion in High Aluminum Steels
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Deoxidation and non-metallic inclusion controlling experiments of 3 heats with different deoxidation process at a steel bearing 1.5% Aluminum were done in a MoSi2 furnace with Φ70mm×100mm MgO at 1873K. The test heats get the high deoxidation ratio and the low terminal total oxygen content. The maximum deoxidation ratio is 84.1% and the minimum total oxygen content is 0.0007% in the process of Mn+Nb-Ti-Al-Ca. After the Aluminum were put into the molten steel, the diameter and number of the inclusions become bigger. In the terminal steels, most of the inclusions are compound bearing Al2O3, their outside are coated by CaS or MnS. The diameter of them are 0～3μm.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Solidification behavior of billet bearing steel during continuous casting
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
In order to solve the solidification and heat transfer process during the continuous casting of bearing steel， the influence of different casting speeds on the central solid phase ratio and liquid core length of the continuous casting was studied by using the combination of nail shooting experiment and numerical simulation. The thickness growth law of the was investigated. The verification of the numerical simulation results by the nail shooting experiment shows that the solidification heat transfer model used in the numerical simulation can accurately describe the solidification behavior of the billets. The study shows that the higher the casting speed， the smaller the thickness of the casting billet at the same position， the smaller the central solid ratio and the longer the length of the liquid core， which provides a reliable basis for the installation of the FEMS.
keywords_en: nail shooting experiment； numerical simulation； final electromagnetic stirring； casting speed

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 新标准下热轧带肋钢筋生产工艺的分析
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (Guangdong Shaoguan Supervision and Inspection Institute for Quality and Metrology, Shaoguan 512023, Guangdong, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of production technology of hot rolled #br# ribbed bars under new standard
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Since the implementation of the new standard, in order to explore the best production process of hot rolled ribbed bars, the steel bars produced by major steel enterprises in different processes in Guangdong Province were studied. The analysis showed that using water cooling process, the strength of the steel bar samples was high, the toughness was insufficient, the metallographic structure was unqualified, and some samples were reversely bent and the seismic performance was unqualified, which indicated that the process had seriously failed to meet the new standard. The hot rolling process with the addition of chromium, molybdenum resulted in a large deviation of tensile strength and an unqualified reverse bending performance, which indicated that the process was not easy to control and the product quality was unstable. Using the conventional hot rolling process, the yield strength of the sample was low, only 12 MPa higher than the limit of the standard, which indicated that the strength was not enough. Using the vanadiumnitrogen alloying hot rolling process, the test indexes of the sample were all good. When the mass fraction of vanadium was 0.33%0.36%, and the mass fraction of the nitrogen was 0.022%0.025%, the comprehensive quality of the product was the best.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Behavior evolution of inclusions in 37Mn5 steel produced by BOF-LF-VD-CC
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to explore the behavior evolution process of inclusions in 37Mn5 steel production and reduce the number of non-metallic inclusions in the steel,the steel samples at different positions were taken according to the BOF-LF-VD-CC process adopted by a domestic steel plant to produce 37Mn5 steel pipes,and the change rule of the number,size and composition of inclusions was analyzed. The results show that there are mainly two types of inclusions after LF treatment:MnS and MnS-Al2O3. Most of the inclusions after VD are MnS,Al2O3-CaO-MgO,Al2O3-CaO-MgO-CaS. Compared with LF treatment,the number density of inclusions decreased by 21.54% and the average size decreased by 57.05%.The shape of inclusions changes from irregular to spherical after VD,which indicates that VD has good refining effect. Increasing the number of inclusions in tundish may result from secondary oxidation. Mold flux with reasonable composition should be selected to improve the quality of molten steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Design and production practice of multi-section billet caster
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the production practice of multi-section billet caster, from the point of view of process and equipment design and production practice, the following ideas are put forward. The total length of the secondary cooling zone is 7 685 mm and divided into four zones, and the fourth zone is refined into the fourth zone + the extension zone of the fourth zone to adapt to the production of multi-section and multi-steel with higher casting speed. The distribution ratio of the secondary cooling zone is 0.33-0.39-0.19-0.09 (the extension zone of the fourth zone is closed) and 0.35-0.39-0.12-0.14 (the extension zone of the fourth zone is opened) and the water ratio ranges from 0.3 to 1.2 L/kg. The unique quick change assembly of complete wanter and mist nozzle for secondary cooling can save section change time up to 2.5 h. The best installation position of final electromagnetic stirring of each sectional production is 9.2 m from the meniscus. The full leaf spring hydraulic vibration and continuous straightening technology are adopted. The multi-section billet caster designed according to the above ideas can achieve high casting speed, good quality billet, high operation rate of continuous caster, and provide practical experience for the transformation or design of the same type of continuous caster.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Calculation and analysis on temperature drop during pre-desulfurization of hot metal/semi-steel containing vanadium and titanium
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to analyze the influence factors of the temperature drop during the pre-desulfurization of hot metal/semi-steel containing vanadium and titanium, a temperature prediction model of the pre-desulfurization was established based on the theories of material balance and heat balance. The temperature of hot metal/semi-steel after desulfurization was well controlled by adjusting the desulfurizer injection amount, flow rate of carrier gas and injection time, according to the temperature before pre-desulfurization. The industrial test showed that the qualified rate of the temperature prediction model reached 85% when the accuracy was ±5 ℃. Based on this model, the influence of desulfurizer, carrier gas, furnace lining, slag and other factors on the temperature drop was discussed. It was found that magnesium content of desulfurizer was the main reason that the temperature drop of hot metal pre-desulfurization was larger than that of semi-steel. And the effective methods to reduce the temperature drop of hot metal pre-desulfurization process containing vanadium and titanium were given.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development and application of intelligent automatic judgment #br# system for hot rolled strip surface quality
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The surface defects affecting the quality of hotrolled strips are various in appearance and complicated in mechanism, which involve many technological links such as the metallurgical composition control, slab quality and hot rolling. In order to solve the problems of nonstandard implementation, inconsistent quality criteria, missed detection and wrong judgment, and customer demand during the surface judgment, from the research of hotrolled surface atlas formulation, the key technology of defect detection of the surface inspection instrument, the design of surface defect grade system and the design of surface automatic judgment product grade system, how to realize the intelligent automatic judgment of surface quality was discussed. At the same time, the intelligent automatic judgment process was realized in the related system, and the accuracy rate of most defect judgment reached 90%.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Cause analysis and control measures on hot- dip galvanizing slag brought in cold- milling of Hansteel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In galvanization production, the hot- dip galvanizing slag was unavoidable, which not only increased the consumption of zinc, but also affected the quality of products. Through analyzing the growth mechanism and formation causes, the measures and suggestions to reduce zinc slag were proposed combined with the practic in Handan Steel. As follows, in zinc bath, the aluminum content of zinc liquid was controlled in the range of 0.2% to 0.3%, the zinc liquid temperature ranged from 460 to 466℃. The strip temperature maintained at 440 to 480℃, and the production line speed was controlled in 70 to 100m/min. By reasonably optimizing the galvanization technology, the amount of zinc slag, the consume of the material and the production cost were reduced, which can provide a practical guiding significance for effectively improving the product quality and a strong operability.
