http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Experience of blow- in and production practice of Qingdao Special Steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Qingdao Special Steel Co., Ltd. was founded in 2013.In order to realize industrial upgrading and sustainable development,Qingdao Special Steel Co., Ltd. is a new type of environmental protection iron and steel enterprise that was set up by relocation during the 12th Five- Year Plan period.Two blast furnaces of 1 800 m3 were constructed in the first phase of Qingdao Special Steel environmental protection demolition project. The two blast furnaces were put into operation in November 2015 and October 2016, respectively. Some problems and successful experiences in furnace opening and the subsequent production practice were summaried, and the reasonable operation, furnace type maintenance and low cost economical ironmaking were also discussed. Since put into production, the hot metal cost of two furnaces, technical and economic indicators have reached the advanced level of the same industry.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 首秦资源类固废综合回收利用实践
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Qinhuangdao Shouqin Metal Materials Co., Ltd., Qinhuangdao 066326， Hebei， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Practice on comprehensive recycling of solid waste resources in Shouqin Company
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The exploration and practice of solid waste recovery and utilization of domestic resources under the background of promoting the green sustainable development of iron and steel enterprises were mainly discussed. In addition to a small part of the solid waste that can be eaten directly, Shouqin Company has processed and eaten through the factory’s self- built processing lines, which has achieved the recovery and utilization of most solid waste and improved the self- absorption rate. It has also made positive contributions to the environment while creating results for the company. The solid wastes used as metallurgical material accounted for 72% since 2013, which was 2.3% higher than that of 2012. About 0.6 million tons water slag powder was produced by superfine grinding process. Steel slag was dry grinded and further processing, then the steel bean and steel slag powder to be produced were return to steelmaking and sintering process respectively. The solid wastes, which could not be recycled directly such as the sintering electrostatic precipitator dust, BF bag dust, OG sludge and oxide scale, were made into bricks with the addition of fuel and bentonite. The bricks were crushed to a certain size and then used as coolant in steelmaking process, meanwhile, the residual powder was recycled as sintering additive, in the later period, the process was changed to glass gel cold solid pellets, and the processing cost was reduced by 20 yuan per ton of ore.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to optimize the process and reduce the energy consumption，the measurement and control technology of electro-thermal furnace with AC arc is needed to be improved. A new method for the application of the constant component of phase voltage in Russia is reported.The calculation principle and measurement technology of the constant component of phase voltage and its application in the electric corundum，calcium carbide，phosphorus and LF ladle refining furnace were described. It is hoped that this method can be applied in electro-thermal furnaces like the submerged arc furnace for ferroalloy production and the LF ladle refining furnace to improve the level of measurement and control of the electro-thermal furnaces in China.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Technology Centre， Ma′anshan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd.， Ma′anshan 243000， Anhui， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence of hot dip process on aluminum silicon coating for hot forming steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：With the rapid development of automobile lightweight，hot forming steel is developing more and more quick. Ordinary coating can not meet the requirements of the hot forming process. Hot dip aluminum silicon steel plate with excellent heat corrosion resistance，high temperature oxidation resistance and appearance of the decorative performance has been widely applied. At present，there is little research on the Al-Si coatings in China，and the aluminized silicon hot stamping forming steel used in the domestic automobile manufacturing plant mainly relies on imports. The CAG-III hot dip galvanizing simulation test machine is used for hot dip aluminum silicon experiments under different hot dip coating technique，and by the scanning electron microscope，the surface and cross section morphology are observed and the energy spectrum is analyzed. The experiment results show that Al-Si coating cross section organization is mainly composed of aluminum solid solution，Al-Fe-Si ternary alloy and Fe-Al binary alloy. The optimal process is that the dipping temperature is 690 ℃ and the dipping time is 5 s.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 横向温度分布对无取向电工钢热轧板形的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effects of transverse temperature distribution on strip shape of #br# nonorientation electrical steel in hot rolling process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The strip crown and wedge of electrical steel are difficult to meet the increasingly highquality requirements of steel shape. In order to reveal the effects of the transverse temperature distribution on electrical steel shape, a threedimensional elasticplastic finite element (FE) model was established, in which the material model of strip steel was constructed according to its thermoplasticity constitutive model. The influence of three typical transverse temperature distributions (parabolic, edge drop and slant) in the doublephase region and the singlephase region on strip shape were investigated respectively by finite element simulation calculations. The results showed that the transverse temperature differences in the singlephase region would cause large strip crown and edge drop. While, the temperature differences in the doublephase region might lead to the reduction of crown, even concave shape and edge upward. And a bit of slant temperature could result in a large wedge. The temperature should be controlled strictly in electrical steel hot rolling process in order to reduce the harmful effects of temperature differences on strip shape.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
At present, we have been using conventional continuous rolling mill to produce high strength steel. With the increasing requirements of automotive lightweight and safety standards, and the company′s future product positioning, the production ratio and strength of ultrahigh strength steel plate are gradually increasing. Many problems in the production of high strength steel by continuous rolling mill are also prominent, which seriously affects the normal operation of the line. For this reason, the company proposed to add a special highstrength steel unit to alleviate the pressure of continuous rolling mill. By analyzing the technical characteristics of Xhigh, Zhigh and S6, which are the mainstream 18roll stand in the world, and investigating the practical application at home and abroad, the most suitable model is finally selected.
keywords_en: multiroll mill； high strength steel； selection； rolling force； side support

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Technical feature and application of 80 t ESR furnace with low-frequency, gas protection and constant melting rate
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to meet the needs of the high-end forgings in the field such as the energy (power plants, nuclear power), the bearing, mould, and the aerospace in China, enhance the market competitiveness of the domestic high-end forgings, and achieve the further breakthroughs in the high purity, high quality ingot manufacturing field in CITIC Heavy Industries Co., Ltd., a new 80 t ESR furnace with the low-frequency, the single electrode, the gas protection, the coaxial high current loop, and the constant rate control system was developed based on many years of the study, investigations and expounding of the advanced ESR equipment at home and abroad.This ESR furnace applied many innovative techniques, such as the low-frequency power supply, the single-electrode, the all coaxial, the inert gas protection under the slight positive pressure, the high-precision weighing, the smart computerized control system, the coaxial arrangements of the high current loop, the double furnace heads, and the balance of power network, and can achieve the computer automatic control in the remelting process. Thus, it was characterized by the unique design, the high technical contents, the energy saving,the safety and reliability, and so on. The quality detection and analysis of the ESR ingot showed that the segregation was not obvious, chemical composition was high purity, and the quality reached a higher level.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Thermo-mechanical behavior of 1 650 slab during soft reduction and optimization of soft reduction process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to control the slab internal cracking during the production of 1 650 peritectic steel slab in Meisteel， a 3D mathematical model of the solidification of the 1 560 mm×230 mm section peritectic steel slab was established according to the practical production of 1 650 continuous casting machine in Meisteel，which revealed the distribution laws of the slab temperature in mold and second cooling zones and the evolution behaviors of stress and strain during soft reduction. The results showed that the cooling intensity and the slab temperature gradient along the direction of casting speed and vertical direction in mold and the bender segment were large. The slab surface deformation and the stress of the center and the 1/4 position of slab wide face were similar，and the maximum plastic strain occurred on the solidification front near to the inner arc of the slab during soft reduction. Moreover，the largest stress occurred on the shell corner. The peritectic steel slabs in Meisteel were easily suffered to the internal cracks due to the current inadequacy soft reduction process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Present status and future prospect of high permeability grain- oriented silicon steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The present production status including nitriding process development of high magnetic induction grain- oriented silicon steel (Hi- B) in China are summarized, and the relevant technologies and the corresponding patent reserves in some major electrical steel producers are analyzed. With the change of market demand, the proportion of high permeability oriented silicon steel is getting higher. The patent layout of production enterprises has also turned to the development of Hi- B steel. The development of environmentally- friendly products has become a new focus. Although Hi- B production using the thin slab casting and direct rolling and the twin- roll strip casting processes has made great progress, there are still considerable distances for commercial applications. The future development of high permeability oriented silicon steel is discussed.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Numerical simulation of directional solidification process of aluminum alloy casting
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the change rule of directional solidification microstructure of aluminum alloy, the directional solidification process of AlSiCu aluminum alloy was simulated with the finite element simulation software ProCAST. The effects of different pouring temperature and pulling rate on the temperature gradient, solidliquid interface front, the width of the mushy zone, dendritic growth rate and secondary dendritic arm spacing during directional solidification of castings were simulated and analyzed. The results showed that the higher the pouring temperature, the greater the temperature gradient, and the smaller the concave at the front of the solidliquid interface, the narrower the width of the mushy zone. Which was more favorable for sequential solidification. With the increase of pulling rate, the dendritic growth rate first increased and then decreased. When the pulling rate was 200 μm/s and the maximum dendritic growth rate was 0.093 mm/s, the solidification structure of the casting was the best. When the pulling rate was greater than 300 μm/s or less than 200 μm/s, the dendritic growth rate would be slow, the dendritic growth would not be stable, and the secondary dendritic arm would be coarse. The better process parameters obtained by simulation were verified by testing, which could be used to prepare castings with better mechanical properties.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Ineralogy characteristics and sulfur behavior of KR desulfuration slag
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：To improve the level of resource utilization of KR desulfuration slag, X- ray finorence,X- ray diffraction,SEM and EDS were used to study mineralogy characteristics of KR desulfuration slag of a certain steel mills, and FactSage was used to study the existing state and precipitation law of sulfur in experimental slag. Results show that if using CaO desulfurizer, main phases the corresponding KR desulfuration slag were calcium aluminum silicate,calcium silicon and spinel. The micro appearance of calcium aluminum silicate was continuously outspread with irregular shape, and the surface was smooth and flat without pores and cracks; the shape of calcium silicon was irregular, and surface of it was rough with pores and cracks; the size of spinel was various, and the main shape was irregular polygon, while a small number was in irregular shape. When temperature was over 1220℃，sulfur in experimental slag precipited in form of SO2, CaS existed out at 1220℃，CaSO4 out at 1160℃;at about 1120℃，the precipitating amounts of CaS and CaSO4 remain unchanged with the decrease of temperature, and the amount of CaSO4 in the experimental slag larger than that of CaS.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Denitrogenation process for 430 ferritic stainless steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The nitrogen in 430 ferritic stainless steel can worsen the intergranular corrosion, the low temperature impact toughness, the notch sensitivity and the welding properties. In this paper, the effect of parameters (including initial carbon content, temperature, argon- oxygen ratio and smelting time) on the content of nitrogen at end point in smelting process for 430 ferritic stainless steel was studied. The results showed that the higher the initial carbon content and higher argon- oxygen ratio, the better the denitrogenation effect. After argon blowing for 20min, the denitrogenation effect was the best, and the denitrogenation rate could be up to about 60 %. If the smelting time was further prolonged, the increase of nitrogen content in liquid steel could be observed.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis and optimization of blast furnace gas dry dedusting and alkali spraying tower system
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The dry dedusting alkali spraying tower system of blast furnace gas in No.3 new BF raised the problem of low flue gas condensate pH value, while the same type of system has been worked in No.2 BF of Qian′an Steel Company successfully. According to this phenomenon, the operation characteristics, such as alkali concentration, external drainage system, parameters of nozzles and alkali pumps, the gas residence time in alkali spraying tower and atomization effects of alkali nozzles, were analyzed contrastively. The results showed that the poor capability of the drainage system and the low atomization efficiency of the alkali nozzles were the main reasons for the low pH value of the blast furnace gas condensate. After improving the external drainage system and the alkali nozzles, the gas condensate pH value of No.3 blast furnace was between 6 and 7, which could not only prevent the production accidents caused by the corrosion of the blast furnace gas condensate, but also reduce the system operation cost.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Experiment on direct reduction of zinc ash pellets containing carbon
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Zinc ash is a byproduct of hot galvanizing or zinc electrolysis process. Its main component is zinc oxide. It is also the main raw material for the production of zinc oxide by the direct method. The zinc oxide production process by the traditional direct method is backward, the equipment is poor, the energy consumption is high, and the resource recovery rate is low. In order to improve the green level of the zinc oxide production by the direct method, the new direct reduction process of zinc ash pellet containing carbon was developed. The effects of different process parameters on the direct reduction of zinc ash pellets containing carbon were researched. The optimum reaction parameters were obtained as the following: the reduction temperature was 1 200 ℃, the reaction time was 60 min, the coal adding amount was 20% and the CaO adding amount was 4%. Under the above reaction conditions, the reduction rate of zinc oxide in zinc ash can reach 95.5%. It is significantly improved the recovery rate of zinc.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The slag, dust, sludge and other byproducts have been treated as resource in the plant areas of two major iron and steel enterprises in South Korea, widely used as raw materials of construction, reused as raw materials in iron or steel making process, or turned into high valueadded products. In recent years, the resource utilization rate of byproducts has reached more than 98%. At the same time, through cooperating with other industries, implementing innovative practice, effectively utilizing cow manure, limestone sludge, endoflife vehicles and other solid waste in city, the iron and steel industry is striving to achieve coexistence and harmonious development with the location area.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Relationship Between Stirring Power and Mixing Time of Hot Metal by Mechanical Stirring Method and Magnesium Injection Method
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The stirring power of hot metal by mechanical stirring method and magnesium injection method were calculated with empirical formula and plume model．The relationship between mixing time and stirring power of hot metal was determined according to the calculated results and compared with that of liquid in water model．The results show that mechanical stirring method stirring power is several times of the injection method stirring power．The mechanical stirring method mixing time is shorter than that of injection method at the same level of stirring power．The desulfurization rate of hot metal by mechanical stirring method is 18.61% higher than that by injection method．Meanwhile，it brings some negative effects which the temperature drop of hot metal caused by mechanical stirring method are 15℃ higher than that caused by injection method for strong mixing，and the refractory erosion rate of mechanical stirring method is 3 times of that of injection method．

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of Hot Treatment Process on Microstructure and Property of 12% Cr Ferritic Stainless Steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of different annealing methods and annealing processes on microstructure and mechanical property, corrosion resistance, for mabtlity of 12%Cr ferritic stainless steel was investigated in laboratory. The results show that ferrite will transit to austenite at high temperature and the austenite will transit to martensite by rapid cooling in 12%Cr ferritic stainless steel, so the annealing temperature has significant effect on the microstructure of material. Using the phase transition mechanism in hot annealing will refine the grain and increase the strength and hardness of the final product, while keep the corrosion resistance of the product unchanged. The product adopted this technology cab ne utilized in high-strength situations and has broken the tradition that only batch furnace annealing can be used after 12% Cr ferritic stainless steel hot rolling. Different annealing method and annealing process will be adopted according the application of final product.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：To study the application of efficiency alloy baking in converter steelmaking，the efficient alloy baking device was applied in the production of converter steelmaking. Results showed that compared to the traditional alloy baking method，the high alloy baking device can heat 15 t ferroalloy to 400600 ℃ within 24 hours，which can effectively remove the water of crystallization in ferroalloy. When the actual temperature of ferroalloy reached 450 ℃，the hydrogen mass fraction in steel can be reduced to below 0.000 150%，the tapping temperature can reduce by 20.31 ℃，the converter endpoint carbon mass fraction can increase by 0.027%，and the consumption of deoxidizer can reduce by 20%. Therefore，it can decrease the production cost，while meeting the production of clean steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：This paper expounded the DCS in application of 3×33 MV·A silicon calcium furnace、three waste heat boilers of 1×7.5 MW waste heat power generation system，6.5 MW turbine，7.5 MW generator and power plant electrical system，mainly introduced the realization of technology reliability，automatic monitoring technology of thermal and screen configuration，sequence of data collection，automatic regulation and control system and other related technical problems. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Numerical simulation of bending resilience of high strength and toughness steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
 In order to study the influence of thickness and deformation on the rebound angle of highstrength and toughness steel after bending, the test was carried out by threepoint bending tester, and the internal elastic energy of the material in the finite element analysis was extracted by using the finite element software to simulate the test process. The elastic energy ratio change analysis analyzes the main factors affecting the rebound angle. The result shows under the same deformation degree, the bigger the relative bending radius R/t of the material is, the bigger the springback angle is, and the springback angle is proportional to the elastic energy. In the material of the same thickness, the springback angle with relative bending deformation increases first and then decreases, when the strain is relatively small, although a large proportion of the elastic energy, but can lead to smaller amount of material elastic bending resilience is smaller, the rebound angle decreases.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research progress of transition metal sulfides as cathode #br# materials for magnesium ion batteries
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
As a model of high voltage and high energy rechargeable batteries, magnesiumion batteries have become the focus of scientific research and market in the field of energy storage. Developing cathode active materials with good reversible cycle and good compatibility with electrolyte is the key to improve the comprehensive performance of magnesium ion batteries. It has been found that transition metal sulfides (TMDCs) are more conducive to the intercalation and extraction of magnesium ions between molecular layers, and exhibit better magnesium storage capacity. On the basis of introducing the working principle and key materials of magnesium ion batteries, the application of several twodimensional layered transition metal sulfides, including MoS2 and TiS2 with a layered structure, Chevrel phase with bulk stacking structure and other transition metal sulfides in cathode materials of magnesium ion batteries in recent years were reviewed and summarized. The existing problems, future research emphasis and development trends were expounded, which hope to be able to provide some reference for future research on improving the comprehensive performance of magnesium ion batteries.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The relation between heat treatment process and properties of P91 was studied using orthogonal experiment. And the result was verified by heat treatment and production experiment. The heat treatment process was optimized at last.The results showed that the factors which influenced properties of P91 were in sequence as follows: tempering temperature, tempering time, normalizing temperature and normalizing time. By introducing customers′ requirement for the mechanical properties of P91 as the measurement index and verified by experiment, it′s been proved that the P91 steel will get better mechanical properties as well as thin and homogenous tempered lath martensite through （1 050±10） ℃ normalizing process and tempering process at （770±10） ℃ for （210±10） min. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Design features and practice operation of hot stove revamping for No.1 blast furnace in Ningsteel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The No.1 blast furnace in Ningsteel was equipped with three internal combustion hot stoves, and a series of revamping work had been carried out since 2009. However, the partition wall bubbles appeared in No.3 hot stove since 2012 and the blast temperature of blast furnace could only be 1 050 ℃. According to the problems of the hot stoves for the No.1 blast furnace, a new top- combustion hot stove was built and composed a new hot stove group in which there were 3 internal- combustion hot stoves and 1 top- combustion hot stove. The operation results showed that the maximum blast temperature increased by 80 ℃ and the fuel ratio reduced by 20 kg/t, which ensured the safety, stability and economic production of No.1 blast furnace and provided the guarantee for fault handling or overhaul of a single hot stove as well.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Practice of Desulphurization of Coke Oven Gas and Preparation of Sulfuric Acid in TISCO Coke Plant
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The application of removing H2S and HCN from coke oven gas by monoethanolamine method is in TISCO coke plant. This engineering project comes from the requirement of TISCO, based on the traditional wet desulphurization method. This paper presents an improving method of desulphurization and decyanation of COG by MEA. It is simple and reliable, the used of cheap reagent and high removal efficiency of hydrogen. Compared with the traditional acid production processes, the technology of WSA sulphuric acid producing process is simple and good corrosion resistance. Compared with the traditional sulphur production process, MEA-WSA acid production processes in gas desulphurization is made use of the sour gas with the preparation of sulphuric acid. It is a model of circular economic, and environmental-friendly. The process is short, simple style and good economic effects.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The laboratory simulated batch furnace process was used to anneal the atmospheric corrosion resistant cold rolled steel Q310NQL2, and the mechanical properties, hardness and microstructure of the annealed steel strip were analyzed. The results showed that the steel strength had two "platform zones" and one "sudden change zone" with the increase of temperature. The crystallization temperature of the atmospheric corrosion resistant cold rolled steel Q310NQL2 was finally determined to be 650 ℃. The annealing cold/hot temperature of atmospheric corrosion resistant cold rolled steel Q310NQL2 by batch annealing facility during industrial production was set to 660/680 ℃. The steel completed the crystallization process when the insulation time was set to 12 h. The obtained results showed that the mechanical properties and grain size levels of steel met the standard requirements.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The present situation and development trend of high speed wire equipment technology were analyzed. The high speed rolling technology and equipment technology for the traditional centralized transmission and frontend independent transmission wire were compared and analyzed. The transmission type, pass design, speed drop and microtension, the control cooling model and the mode of the unit were researched. The independent high speed wire rod production equipment technology based on double modules was put forward. A new generation high speed wire rod equipment technology with the independent dual module as the main technical characteristics was innovatively developed, which simplified the structure of equipment, improved the flexibility of high speed wire production and reduced the production energy consumption and investment costs.

Abstract：
Based on the comparative analysis of the evaluation methods of quality management system at home and abroad, combined with the current situation and demand of the quality management system in iron and steel product manufacturing enterprises, and taking the production process as the breakthrough point, a quantitative evaluation model for the effectiveness of the quality management system was developed. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
To explore and formulate the proper systematic structure and production organization of the ironmakingsteelmaking section in steel manufactory process, the interface mode, procedure equipment and operation process of ironmakingsteelmaking section were introduced. System analysis of the dynamic operation of ironmakingsteelmaking section was conducted according to the theories of discrete event dynamic system, and the simulation model and strategy based on the entity flow chart and events scheduling were put forward. A modeling and simulation pilot of the dynamic operation process of ironmakingsteelmaking section in a steel plant was carried out, the results showed that hot metal ladles should be transported in the way of "1 ladle each time" so that the average utilization rate of 3 locomotives was relatively as high as 60%, the average hot metal temperature arriving at KR station would be increased to 1 423 ℃ and the fluctuation would be minimized to 22 ℃.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The hightemperature flame was used by the edge scarfer to remove the slab surface defects and produce the highquality steel, which was widely used by many companies. There were some differences between the burner flame with different energy media, which had a great influence on the cleaning effect of defects on the slab surface and the steel quality. According to the scarfing medium parameters of some enterprises, a numerical model for the burner flame was established based on the computational fluid dynamics (CFD). The corresponding temperature field and velocity field were calculated, and the difference of flame characteristics among different energy media was studied. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (School of Mechanical Engineering and Automation, Northeastern University, Shenyang 110819, Liaoning, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis on bending springback law of tailor #br# rolled blank in longitudinal bending
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
 In order to promote the application of Tailor Rolled Blank (TRB) in the structural parts for auto beams, the bending springback characteristics of TRB in the longitudinal bending process were studied by taking Uchannel as a research object. Firstly, the numerical simulations on the longitudinal bending process of TRB Uchannel were performed. The bending springback trend of TRB was analyzed, and the stress distribution of TRB was discussed. The bending springback law of TRB was revealed, and the influencing factors of TRB equivalent stress were discussed. Moreover, the springback simulation results were verified by the corresponding experiments. The research findings showed that a nonuniform stress distribution was the fundamental reason why there was an uneven bending springback distribution in the direction of the bending axis during the longitudinal bending process of TRB Uchannel. Annealing can diminish the stress difference of TRB before and after unloading, thus restricting the TRB bending springback. All of the blank size, the blank thickness and the thickness transition zone (TTZ) length of TRB will greatly affect the equivalent stress of TRB, and then change the bending springback value and distribution. Besides, the bending springback of different zones with varying thicknesses in a TRB part interact was mutually restrained, which made the TRB springback tend consistent, resulting in the TRB bending springback lay between the springback of the thinner and thicker plates.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of Nb content on austenite recrystallization in low carbon steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
 In order to clarify the effect of Nb content on austenite recrystallization, low carbon steel was studied and discussed by means of thermal simulation test machine and metallographic analysis. The results showed that the critical strain of dynamic recrystallization increased with the increase of strain rate and decreased with the increase of deformation temperature.The effect of inhibiting dynamic recrystallization was more obvious, when Nb mass fraction was increased to 0.05%. In addition, reducing the deformation and the interval time, and increasing the content of Nb will also reduce the static recrystallization volume fraction and hinder the occurrence of static recrystallization.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Process control for sliver defects in cold rolled steel sheets
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the severe mold entrapment due to the mold splashing and the lack of the basis of the tundish superheat control, the effects of the flow pattern in the mold and the superheat on the surface quality were investigated. It can be concluded that the alumina and mold powder primarily accounted for the slivers defect in this mill and the location of these inclusions were trapped in the first 5 mm of the solidified shell in the upper part of the mold based on the literature review and numerous SEM analysis of steel sheets. Decreasing the gas flow rates and increasing the SEN depth can promote the double roll flow (DRF). Therefore, based on the water model and the industrial experiment, the critical gas flow rates were put forward to control the DRF and the mold splashing was eliminated after applying the results in the real casters. Furthermore, increasing the superheat in tundish can retard the solidification front and decrease the hook depth, thus improve the surface quality of slabs. The tundish superheat in the casting practice was set to 25 to 40 ℃taking into the consideration of steel cleanliness. The degradation ratio decreased from 1.1% to 0.6% after applying these countermeasures.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 邓小旋 季晨曦，王胜东，关顺宽，李林平. 冷轧薄板线状缺陷的工艺控制[J]. 中国冶金, 2017, 27(4): 55-60. DENG Xiao-xuan,JI Chen-xi,WANG Sheng-dong,GUAN Shun-kuan,LI Lin-ping. Process control for sliver defects in cold rolled steel sheets. China Metallurgy, 2017, 27(4): 55-60.

Then based on the simulation results，metal flow，plastic strain and temperature were analyzed，and according to the deformation feature and the size of each pattern rolled piece，the cause of the defect was found. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application of direct heating of blast furnace waste water
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A direct heat transfer with blast furnace waste for heating water was introduced, which has been running for nearly 5 months in a iron and steel factory in China. The operation results showed that the new single channel heat exchanger without contact point could avoid corrosion and block problems caused by impurity in blast furnace waste water. The temperature of slag flushing water through the heat exchanger can be reduced to less than 55 ℃ which meets the requirement of flush slag process. The heating water temperature can be increased from 50℃ to 67.7℃ which meets the heating requirements. The economic and environmental benefits of the system are significant.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Rapid determination of pellet volume by discharge liquid and titration method
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A new method for the rapid determination of the pellet volume by discharge liquid and titration is introduced. The method is based on the principle of volumetric drainage and titration control precision. It is proved to be accurate and feasible after a large number of experiments. The equipment, reagents, procedures are simple, the data is intuitionistic and easy to check, the precision is high, and the time consuming is short. The single measurement can be completed in only 30 minutes. After application, the measurement time of the pellet relative free swelling index can be shortened by more than 3 h, which makes up for the shortage of the method for measuring the volume of pellets recommended in GB/T 13240—1991 The method for determination of iron pellet relative free swelling index.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 高碳铬铁合金固相显微结构及破碎性能
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (Jiuquan Iron and Steel Group Co., Ltd., Jiayuguan 735100, Gansu, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Solid phase microstructure and crushing properties of high carbon ferrochrome alloy
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the variation of the solid phase microstructure and breaking properties of high carbon ferrochromium alloy in teeming process with silicon iron powder and aluminum addition, the high carbon ferrochromium produced by a ferroalloy corporation was remelted in a 0.2 t multifunctional pilotscale steelmaking furnace. Aluminum and ferrosilicon powder were added respectively during teeming process. And the solid phase microstructure of the conventional high carbon ferrochromium and high carbon ferrochrome with addition of aluminum and ferrosilicon powder was analyzed. The sample was broken by jaw crusher. The results showed that the microstructure of high carbon ferrochromium was mainly composed of (Cr,Fe)7C3 solid phase and (Cr,Fe)7Si solid phase, and some TiN, MnS and Al2O3 inclusions were precipitated. The Al2O3 inclusions were not found in the conventional high carbon ferrochromium. While, the Al2O3 inclusions and TiN were precipitated in the high carbon ferrochromium with adding ferrosilicon powder and aluminum. After adding aluminum in the high carbon ferrochromium, the structure was dense, and its porosity was small, while there were a large number of cracks and holes in the conventional high carbon ferrochromium, whose microstructure was loose. And the properties of the high carbon ferrochromium with ferrosilicon powder were between the above two. After broken by the jaw crusher, the powder rate of the conventional high carbon ferrochromium, the high carbon ferrochromium with ferrosilicon powder and aluminum, was 13.2%, 11.7% and 9.5%, respectively.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 朱青德，魏国立，蔡丽勇，张有余. 高碳铬铁合金固相显微结构及破碎性能[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(3): 67-72. ZHU Qingde,WEI Guoli,CAI Liyong,ZHANG Youyu. Solid phase microstructure and crushing properties of high carbon ferrochrome alloy. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(3): 67-72.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WANG Chang，YU Yang，LI Yan，WANG Lin，#br# GAO Xiaoli，ZHANG Liangliang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
(1. Strip Technology Department, Research Institute of Technology, Shougang Group Corporation, Beijing 100043, China;
2.Beijing Key Laboratory of Green Recyclable Process for Iron and Steel Production Technology, Beijing 100043, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Formation mechanism of pitting defect on surface of #br# high strength galvanized sheet
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
In view of the pitting defect on the surface of high strength galvanized sheet, the root cause of this defect from the perspective of the whole process analysis was discussed. Using the scanning electron microscope analysis, it was found that the thickness of the zinc layer on the galvanized sheet was not uniform, the surface roughness was different to a great extent and there were many surface cracks on the surface of the galvanized sheet. Tracking analysis found that the surface cracks were mainly generated in the cold rolling process. Combining with the microstructural characteristics of hot rolled plate, the mechanism of pitting defect was that the surface cracking resistance of the sheet during the rolling process was low, resulting in the formation of 10 μm depth surface cracks on the surface of cold rolled sheet. According to the simulation analysis of CCT curve, it was found that controlling the surface microstructure of the hotrolled steel sheet could significantly inhibit the occurrence of pitting defects on the surface of high strength galvanized sheet.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 王畅，于洋，李研，王林，高小丽，张亮亮. 高强镀锌板表面发麻缺陷产生机理[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(6): 21-25. WANG Chang，YU Yang，LI Yan，WANG Lin，. Formation mechanism of pitting defect on surface of #br# high strength galvanized sheet[J]. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(6): 21-25.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: Nb-H13钢中一次碳化物的析出机理和控制
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: CAO Xiao-jun1, LI Ming-lin1, HUANG Yu2, CHENG Guo-guang2,DAI Wei-xing2, XIE You3
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Precipitation mechanism and improvement of primary carbide in Nb-H13 steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to obtain the appropriate Nb content in the Nb microalloyed H13 steel, the primary carbide in H13 steel was taken as the research object, and the H13 steels melted in the laboratory with different Nb mass fraction addition were analyzed to study the precipitation mechanism of the primary carbide. The results showed that when the Nb mass fraction in H13 steel is lower than 0.03%, the primary carbide in the H13 steel was mainly the V-rich phase. When the Nb mass fraction in H13 steel reached 0.05%, the primary carbides were mainly the V-rich phase and the Nb-rich phase. Therefore, the Nb mass fraction in the Nb microalloyed H13 steel should be lower than 0.03%. The Nb mass fraction had a significant effect on the precipitation sequence of the primary carbide in the FCC phase. As the Nb mass fraction increased, the precipitation sequence of carbide in FCC phase changes from V-rich phase to Nb-rich phase, and the thermal stability of the Nb-rich phase was much higher than that of the V-rich phase. The theoretical calculation results were basically consistent with the experimental observations, and the industrial test results also demonstrated the results of this study.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application of pass- weld technology of online double- stand temper mill
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：During the second cold rolling process of DCR, the strip is very easy to break. The reasons for the in the of broken belt in crescent region during the welding process of the double stand temper mills in Shougang Jingtang were analyzed, And one was that a local shape wave was too large, which resulted in some form of stress concentration; another was that the tension of the online DCR leveling process was large and the local stress was concentrated, which led to the yield instability of the strip and the snap of strip steel. The levelness and verticality of the roll system were adjusted, and the temporary control measures for the calibration of the strip without strip and the abnormal rolling force deviation were made. At the same time, the procedure of automatically reducing the rolling force and tension was developed, which reduced the tension before and after the temper mill by 20%, and the breaking rate of the unit decreased from 2 times to 0 times month.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: L Ziqiang1,2,3,CAI Jiuju1,2,SUN Wenqiang1,2,WANG Lianyong1,2,#br# MA Guangyu4,MAO Hujun3
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: "Effective water" and its analysis method in water #br# system of iron and steel enterprises
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Open indirect cooling water is the main form of the water system in iron and steel enterprises. It is necessary to study the relationship between water volume and water quality in the process of water supply and consumption for understanding the law of open indirect cooling water system. The concept of "effective water" was put forward by combining water volume and water quality indexes in the process of water use. Mathematical model and related analysis methods were established. A case study of the water supply and consumption in a steel enterprise showed that the change of water quality in both water supply and consumption would lead to the change of water replenishment efficiency of the system, and then the fresh water consumption and wastewater discharge of the system would be changed. Compared with the water quantity index, the concept of "effective water" and its analysis method can more scientifically evaluate the water use characteristics of the open cooling water system.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: YAN Wu- zhuang,XIE Gui- long,ZHOU Jing- wei,FAN Xiang

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Feasibility analysis of applying low temperature oxidation technology to sintering flue gas denitration
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Nitrogen oxides（NOx）in sintering flue gas is one of the main pollutants endangering human health and the environment. In view of the fact that most sintering plants of steel industry were currently not equipped with denitration facilities, it is urgent to remove NOx from sintering flue gas. However, It is not appropriate to widely use the denitration technologies in coal- fired power plants such as Selective Catalytic Reduction（SCR）and Selective Non- Catalytic Reduction （SNCR）for the removal of NOx from sintering flue gas, which have the characteristics of low temperature, high sulfur dioxide concentration and low NOx concentration. Several oxidation absorption methods using chloric acid, sodium chlorite, mineral chameleon, hydrogen peroxide and ozone respectively were introduced. The oxygen absorption denitration technology principles and technical characteristics of these methods were expounded. The feasibility analysis using these methods for denitration from sintering flue gas were also performed. It was concluded that oxidation absorption methods using hydrogen peroxide, ozone or yellow phosphorus were applicable.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of temperature rise and erosion state on sidewall of No.4 BF in Liusteel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to further clarify the causes of the temperature increase of sidewall of the No.4 BF and the erosion state of the hearth, based on the investigations and analyses of No.4 blast furnace hearth structural design, the quality of raw material and production parameters, combined with the change rule of sidewall temperature and the calculation of residual thickness of the carbon bricks, the causes of the temperature rise and the erosion state of the sidewall in the hearth were analyzed. The results showed that the cooling capacity of the hearth of the No.4 blast furnace and the monitoring of the side wall temperature in the hearth still needed to be strengthened. Besides the erosion of the sidewall carbon bricks, the fluctuations in the quality of the original fuel and the increase of smelting intensity were also the important reasons for the temperature rise of the sidewall in the hearth. The most serious part of the hearth erosion was 1.9 m below the central line of the taphole, which presented the typical "elephant foot" erosion.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Reformation practice of the capped iron ladle
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The application practice of the capped iron ladle at Shougang Jingtang company is introduced. The capped iron ladle can reduce the molten iron temperature loss by 17.4℃ on average during the transportation and the expected goal is achieved. The capped iron ladle can realize the hot ladle running throughout the transport. Since the capped iron ladle provides a better insulation protection for the empty ladle heat, the refractory erosion caused by the temperature drop can be reduced, thus the average life of the iron ladle has been greatly improved. Clearly it has an obvious effect on the refractory life improvement.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 高比例精矿粉对烧结的影响分析及强化措施探讨
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Shanxi Taigang Stainless Steel Co.， Ltd.， Taiyuan 030003， Shanxi， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Anylysis of the Effects of High Proportion Iron Concentrate on Sinter Quality and Discussion of Strengthening Measures
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The proportion of self-produced iron concentrate has reached over 85% with the commission of Lvliang iron mine at TISCO. Lvliang self-produced iron concentrate has good feature with ultra fined size, nearly 96% of the material was less than 0.045mm. It is difficult to produce high qualified sinter for 4350m3 BF with the sintering bed height of 730mm. The sinter quality would get deteriorated because of the worsening permeability of sintering blends, and there would be limited adjustment scope for proportioning since the decreasing use of imported iron ore. The sinter pot experiments were performed at the technology center in order to acquire sintering performances of Lvliang iron concentrate and provide technical support for future production. The results indicate that the technical indices deteriorated with the increase of proportion of iron concentrate. When iron concentrate accounted for 70%, sintering process became very slow. The sintering process even stopped with 100% iron concentrate. Finally, the analysis was carried and the main parameters affecting sinter process were found such as strengthening granulation, optimizing grain size and enhancing basicity.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 炼钢造渣物料高温热焓值的试验测定
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Metallurgical Technology Research Department of Central Iron and Steel Research Institute， Beijing 100081， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Experimental determination of the high temperature enthalpies value for slag forming materials in steelmaking
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the influence of heat change for slag forming materials on the BOF bath temperature during steelmaking, the enthalpies value of slag forming materials was tested. The results show that there was different heat absorption degree in steelmaking temperature. The endothermic temperature range of lime, light-burned dolomite and magnetic pellet was between 350 and 500℃, which brought the temperature drop of bath being respectively 4.8, 6.6 and 5.6℃ per ton of materials. The endothermic temperature range of limestone is 726℃ and the temperature drop of bath was 7.9℃ per ton of materials. The endothermic temperature range of sintered ore, steel scrap and slag was between 1 300 and 1 400 ℃ and the temperature drop of bath was respectively 5.6, 1.4 and 1.1℃ per ton of materials. According to the above test results, the hot metal chemical composition and the addition amount of slag forming materials, the prediction model of molten steel temperature at the BOF endpoint was taken, which provides evidence for accurate control of the BOF endpoint temperature and optimization of the process parameters of BOF.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 吴伟. 炼钢造渣物料高温热焓值的试验测定[J]. 中国冶金, 2014, 24(11): 46-49. WU Wei. Experimental determination of the high temperature enthalpies value for slag forming materials in steelmaking. China Metallurgy, 2014, 24(11): 46-49.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: CHEN Qingan,ZHANG Jianyu,WANG Yanhui,LI Hezong,CHEN Yayu

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Numerical simulation on process of eliminating temperature #br# difference between head and tail in billet direct rolling process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
There is an unavoidable problem in the billet direct rolling process, that is the temperature difference between head and tail of billet. When the temperature difference between head and tail is too large, it will adversely affect the homogeneity of structure and properties in the length direction of the product. In view of the billet temperature characteristics of "head low and tail high" during the direct rolling process, a variable flow cooling strategy of "head weak and tail strong" before finish rolling or a variable power induction heating strategy of "head strong and tail weak" before rough rolling was put forward. The two processes described above were simulated by finite element method, and the key process parameters were optimized according to the calculation results, which provided a reference for practical application. The simulation results showed that for variable flow cooling mode, in order to eliminate the temperature difference between head and tail of linear distribution in the length direction, the required flow density was basically parabolic with the workpiece length; for variable power induction heating mode, the required heating power was basically linearly related to billet length.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 陈庆安，张建宇，王艳辉，李河宗，陈亚宇. 方坯直轧工艺中头尾温差消除过程数值模拟[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(9): 23-28. CHEN Qingan,ZHANG Jianyu,WANG Yanhui,LI Hezong,CHEN Yayu. Numerical simulation on process of eliminating temperature #br# difference between head and tail in billet direct rolling process[J]. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(9): 23-28.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: GAO Chuhan，GE Sinan，LI Wanming，WU Shaopeng，ZANG Ximin
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (School of Materials and Metallurgy， University of Science and Technology Liaoning， Anshan 114051， Liaoning， China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research status of carbide segregation in highspeed steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Highspeed steel is widely used in machining tools for largescale equipment manufacturing because of its high hardness, good red hardness and good wear resistance. However, it is easy to cause problems such as segregation of carbides in the large cross section during highspeed steel production process, affecting the mechanical properties and service life of the material. Through the comparison and analysis of the methods of mould casting, continuous casting, electroslag remelting and powder metallurgy, explores the factors affecting the segregation of carbides and the methods of improving the segregation of carbides are explored. The results show that the carbide segregation can be improved by adding inoculants, microalloying elements, mechanical agitation, and electromagnetic stirring. In addition, through comparative analysis, it is found that the use of electroslag remelting to produce highspeed steel can costeffectively control the carbide segregation, and electroslag remelting has become the main method for producing highspeed steel.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 高楚寒，葛思楠，李万明，吴少鹏，臧喜民. 高速钢碳化物偏析的研究现状[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(5): 1-5. GAO Chuhan，GE Sinan，LI Wanming，WU Shaopeng，ZANG Ximin. Research status of carbide segregation in highspeed steel[J]. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(5): 1-5.
