http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Technical Center, Jiuquan Iron and SteelGroup Co.,Ltd.， Jiayuguan 735100， Gansu, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Austenite isothermal transformation kinetics of high grade pipeline steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Austenite isothermal transformation kinetics of the high grade pipeline steel such as X80, X100, X120 was investigated by thermal dilatometer. The TTT curves of the high grade pipeline steel were drawn and discussed combined with the kinetics of bainite. The results indicated that the microstructures of these three high grade pipeline steels were mainly granular bainite with a modicum of uniform and flat tabular bainiteafter isothermal transformation. And the phase transformation energy of X120, X100, X80 pipeline steels were 115.971kJ/mol， 104.388kJ/mol and 84.596kJ/mol， respectively.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 兰炭与烟煤混合燃烧特性及机制分析
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHANG Hua1,ZHANG Jian- liang2,XU Run- sheng2,WANG Guang- wei2,XU Tao2,TANG Qing- li2
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
1. Technology Center, Taiyuan Iron and SteelGroupCo., Ltd., Taiyuan 030003, Shanxi, China
2. School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Combustion characteristics and mechanism analysis of blended coal of semi coke and bituminous coal
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Experimental study showed that combustibility of coal M was better than that of semi coke XJ, and combustion speed of semi coke XJ became slower at the last combustion stage at high temperature. With the increase of percent of bituminous coal, the combustion of blending coal was better. Bituminous coal M played an important role in the improvement of ignitability of blending coal. The comprehensive combustion characteristic index of blending coal was significantly increased, when the percentage of bituminous coal M was above 20%. There was obvious difference in the composition, microstructure and chemical structure between semi coke XJ and bituminous coal M, which was the essence reason why the combustibility of bituminous coal M was better than semi coke XJ.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 转炉炉气CO分析在炼钢过程中的应用
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LIANG San- qing，LIU Xiao- gang，CHEN Shuai，LIU Qiong
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Technology Center, Shanxi Xintai Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Jinzhong 032000, Shanxi, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application of converter gas CO analysis in steelmaking process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：By optimizing the gas detector used for the converter gas recovery, the obtained data is delivered to the operation room in the form of the real time polyline graph. The overflow slag, splash and slag getting dry can be determined based on the CO variation in gas, and some adjustments can be made in time. Several typical CO curve graphs were enumerated in detail, and the cause, process and influence of the formation of the curves were expounded respectively. At the same time, the adjustments and solutions were proposed. Thus, it could effectively ensure the smooth operation of the converter steelmaking and benefit the cost reduction.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 基于CSC方法的钢铁行业节能减排技术潜力分析
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHANG Wei,WANG Yu- jie,LIU Shuai,ZHANG Qi
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: State Environment Protection Key Laboratory of Eco- Industry, Northeastern University, Shenyang 110819, Liaoning, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of energy conservation and emission reduction potential in iron and steel industry based on CSC method
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the energy saving and emission reduction potential of China′s iron and steel industry, taking 35 advanced energy- saving and emission reduction technologies in the steel industry as the research object, the CSC (Conservation Supply Curve) model was established to analyze the factors affecting the iron and steel industry′s energy- saving and emission reduction benefits, cost- effectiveness, and the energy- saving and emission reduction potential of the iron and steel production process. The results showed that all of the 35 technologies can achieve the energy saving of 3.01 GJ/t and the CO2 emission reduction of 398.22 kg/t. Comparing the results with the promoted technologies during the 13th five- year- plan, it was found that about 50% of the promoted technologies were not cost- effective in the current situation. Based on the CSC model, the energy saving and emission reduction potential of the iron and steel production process were analyzed. The energy saving and emission reduction of each process were obtained, and the development trend and application prospect of each technology in the future were studied.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 含钛微合金钢低温冲击韧性波动的原因与改进
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WU Jun- ping1，JIN Xing1，LONG Mu- jun2，CHEN Deng- fu2，LIU Tao2，DUAN Hua- mei2
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
（1. Plate Business Unit, Nanjing Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Nanjing 210035, Jiangsu, China
2. College of Materials Science and Engineering, Chongqing University, Chongqing 400030, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Cause analysis and improvement of undulation of low temperature impact property for Ti microalloyed steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the problem of the undulation of low temperature impact toughness in the production of Ti microalloyed plate, the corresponding experimental studies were carried out. The main influence factors of the undulation of low temperature impact toughness were analyzed from the aspects of the chemical component, fracture morphology of the impact specimen, microstructure and inclusions. The results showed that the content of harmful elements, internal structure, size and distribution of inclusions etc. were the major causes of the big undulation of low temperature impact toughness. Therefore, the composition was optimized by appropriately reducing the C mass fraction and strictly controlling the mass fraction of harmful elements P, N, H etc., the parameters of the heating process were carefully controlled to refine the microstructure, and the cooling rate was accelerated after rolling to effectively weak the banded structure and so on, which can obvious improve the low temperature impact toughness and product qualification rate.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 高炉富氧率对鼓风机送风特性的影响分析
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WU Li- yun,LIANG Gao- lin,LING Chen,LIU Ai- jun,MA Qing- song,GAO Jian- bo
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Energy and Environment Department, Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Tangshan 063200, Hebei, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence of blast furnace oxygen enrichment rate on air supply characteristics of blower
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The characteristic relationship between the air volume of 5 500 m3 blast furnace and the air volume of AV100- 17 fan was analyzed. After the arrangement and screening of the operation data of the blast furnace side and blower side for many years, a large number of reliable operational data were sorted out by considering various special conditions. According to the statistical analysis of the operation data, the variations of the air volume, air pressure, oxygen content, oxygen enrichment rate for blast furnace with the air volume, air pressure and release volume for the blower were obtained. Combined with the change of the performance curve and the actual performance curve of the fan, it was pointed out that the increase of the oxygen ratio in the blast furnace had a negative effect on the drift and the increase of the dispersion. Aiming at the analysis result, this paper gives a solution and method to solve the problem from the aspects of improving the precision operation and energy saving transformation were put forward.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 马钢2250HSM层流冷却控制系统升级改造
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （No.4 Rolling Plant，Masteel, Ma′anshan 243000， Anhui, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Upgrade and improvement of 2250 HSM laminar cooling control system in Masteel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The coiling temperature of hot rolling strip is an important factor affecting the mechanical property and shape quality, and the accuracy of the coiling temperature control has an effect on the new steel grade development and the quality of strip. With the 2250 HSM laminar cooling control system in Masteel as the studied object, the control system was improved by applying a new control model, optimizing the model parameters and improving the control function, aiming at the problems of the old laminar cooling system such as low hit rate of the coiling temperature and the abnormal temperature control caused by the ascending and descending speed during the strip threading and tail throwing. The practice results showed the control accuracy of the cooling control system were significantly improved after the optimization, and a good control result was obtained.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 一种炉前除尘风机变频节能新工艺的探索
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Ironmaking Plant， Chongqing Iron and Steel Co.， Ltd.， Chongqing 401220， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: A new frequency conversion energy saving technology of blast furnace dust fan
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：There were 3（the rated power was 2 400 kW）variable frequency motor in the Chongqing Iron and Steel Co.，Ltd. The energy consumption was 40 million degrees every year. While ensure the on-site production of environmental protection, great energy consumption was caused. Through following up the production process in front of furnace，analyzing the energy consumption of the dusting motor，and adjusting the fan frequency many times based on the actual production process，a new frequency conversion technology of the dusting fan in front of furnace was established. It cannot only ensure meeting the standard of environmental protection，but also greatly reduce the cost of power，which can provide a strong guarantee for the energy conservation and environment protection of the blast furnace production.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 大数据过程质量控制系统在钢铁生产中的应用
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Chengde Branch， HBIS Group， Chengde 067102， Hebei， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application of big data process quality control system in iron and steel production
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to achieve the goal of a stable, efficient and orderly production, thus finally to ensure the quality control of highlevel steel products in the production process, Chengsteel branch of HBIS Group has combined the information and industrialized achievements by the automatic process quality control and information system. The system can achieve the targets of production control, anomaly warning, process traceability, defect diagnosis and quality control. Since the system was put into operation, it obtained excellent effects and could provide the scientific guidance and support for the whole production process, and realize the online steel grade determination, which revolutionized the traditional way to judge the product quality. Therefore, the system could promote the comprehensive development of the product quality, fulfill the concept of green development, and totally change the model of product development. All in all, the system had the ability to develop the higherlevel product and could provide the strong data support and technical support to compete with large international companies.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 高温时效对铁素体不锈钢组织和性能的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: CHEN An- zhong,REN Juan- hong,WANG Jun- wei,LI Yu- feng
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Iron and Steel Research Institute， Hongxing Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., JISCO, Jiayuguan 735100， Gansu， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of high temperature aging on microstructure and properties of ferritic stainless steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of aging time on the microstructure and properties of ultra pure ferritic stainless steel at 900 ℃ was discussed by using metallographic, SEM and EDS. The results showed that 439 high temperature aging had little effect on the Ti(C,N) precipitation and the TiN phase precipitated at grain boundary was less, which caused serious grain coarsening and lower ductility. For 441 high temperature aging, Fe2Nb (Laves) phase was precipitated along the grain boundary. And the precipitation quantity was large, the grain size was small. The network Fe2Nb(Laves) distribution had a significant impact on the ductility. For 444 high temperature aging, Fe3(Nb,Mo)3C was precipitated in grain boundary and crystal. The little amount of precipitation caused the weaker second phase pinning effect and some grains grew abnormally. As a result of the precipitation Fe3(Nb,Mo)3C without mesh distribution, the ductility was higher than that of 441.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 烧结不稳定对余热发电的影响及其解决方案
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHOU Ting- ting,SUN Shu- jian,ZHAO Chen,ZHANG Xiao- dong
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Nanjing BONA Energy Environment SCT and TECH Co., Ltd., Nanjing 211505, Jiangsu, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence of instable sintering process on waste heat power generation and its solution
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Waste heat power generation is one of the main means of sintering waste heat utilization. The profits of waste heat power generation can be used to reduce the energy consumption per ton of steel which respond positively to the national policy that requires energy-saving and reducing emission. However, the sintering waste heat itself is instable, which seriously affects the stability, safety and operating life of power unit. The impacts of the instability of sintering waste heat power generation on power unit have been analyzed and summarized. The normal solutions in the markets are introduced, and the advantages and disadvantages of each solution are analyzed. It also focuses on the analysis of the merits and faults for the dynamic adjusting supplementary combustion technology, which indicates the system can effectively solve the instability of sintering waste heat power generation.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 周婷婷，孙恕坚，赵臣，张晓东. 烧结不稳定对余热发电的影响及其解决方案[J]. 中国冶金, 2016, 26(03): 53-56. ZHOU Ting- ting,SUN Shu- jian,ZHAO Chen,ZHANG Xiao- dong. Influence of instable sintering process on waste heat power generation and its solution. China Metallurgy, 2016, 26(03): 53-56.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 南钢3号高炉取消中心加焦实践
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: XIONG Fei- wu,WU Ze- yong,HE Ying
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: No.1 Iron- Making Plant， Nanjing Iron and Steel Group Co., Nanjing 210035， Jiangsu， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Nanjing Iron and Steel No.3 blast furnace cancel center coke practice
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Nanjing steel No.3 BF cancel center plus coke smelting process to evaluate and summarize the practice, especially for loading and air system for continuous research and exploration, by raising the temperature of the furnace core and stable within a reasonable range, so that the hearth has been remain active in working condition. By stable and reasonable operating furnace premise and gradually reducing the amount of coke center plus significantly improved gas flow distribution, improved the gas utilization, fuel ratio is greatly reduced and achieved good economic benefits. Our canceled central focus experience as the theoretical foundation successfully extended to the other blast furnace.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 熊飞武，吴泽勇，何英. 南钢3号高炉取消中心加焦实践[J]. 中国冶金, 2016, 26(03): 34-38. XIONG Fei- wu,WU Ze- yong,HE Ying. Nanjing Iron and Steel No.3 blast furnace cancel center coke practice. China Metallurgy, 2016, 26(03): 34-38.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: Nb(C,N)溶解对高铌奥氏体晶粒长大行为的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （1. Department of Mechanical Engineering, Chengde Petroleum College, Chengde 067000, Hebei, China; 2. Key Laboratory of Applied Chemistry of Hebei Province, School of Environment and Chemical Engineering, Yanshan University, Qinhuangdao 066004, Hebei, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of Nb(C,N) dissolution on growth behavior of high Nb austenite grains
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract： In order to investigate the effect of Nb content of highNb steels on the growth of austenite grain growth during heating process. Means of chemical dissolution, filtration and separation and inductively coupled plasma spectrum were taken to examine the content of dissolved Nb in two highNblowTi microallying steels at different temperatures. And a comparative study of the austenite grain growth behavior was carried out. Results showed that the mass fraction of dissolved Nb in lowNb steel was higher than that in the highNb steel at lower heating temperatures. With heating temperature increasing, the content of dissolved Nb in highNb steel quickly increased. However, even if heating temperature gets to 1 300 ℃, the Nb can not be completely dissolved. A small amount of Nb existed in (Ti,Nb)(N,C) precipitate. The temperature of the austenite grain quick growth was related to the temperature at which the content of dissolved Nb quickly increased. As the mass fraction of Nb in steels increased from 0.082% to 0.120%, the critical temperature of the austenite grain quick growth arised from 1 050 to 1 150 ℃. For the highNb steels, the austenite grain size was smaller than 100 μm when heating temperature was in the range from 1 150 to 1 250 ℃.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 正火工艺对非调质钢48MnV组织性能的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Development department of Shijiazhuang Iron and Steel Co.， Ltd.， Shijiazhuang 050031， Hebei， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of normalizing technology on the structure and properties of non-quenched-tempered steel 48MnV
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Due to the characteristics and the instability of production process, it is common that the forgings of non-quenched and tempered steel have bad strength and plasticity; these can be effectively changed by normalizing, which will change the strength and plasticity matching of non-quenched-tempered steel and its morphology, and expand its scope of application. It has been found that after normalizing between 850℃ to 1150℃, the increase in normalizing temperature leads to the increase of the strength and decrease of the ductility and impact toughness, and the microstructure grain size increases also. When the normalizing temperature was above 1050℃, steel microstructure coarsened obviously. Optimal normalizing temperature is 950℃ when the microstructure was refined and the strength and plasticity were both well.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 高琦，郝彦英，戴观文. 正火工艺对非调质钢48MnV组织性能的影响[J]. 中国冶金, 2014, 24(12): 44-46. GAO Qi，HAO Yan-ying，DAI Guan-wen. Effect of normalizing technology on the structure and properties of non-quenched-tempered steel 48MnV. China Metallurgy, 2014, 24(12): 44-46.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 35CrMnSiA大规格连铸圆坯加热工艺的改进
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LIU Chao-qun,WANG Bao,MA Bing-tao,WEN Xiao-de,LIU Bing
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Special Steel Division, Laiwu Iron and Steel Group Co., Ltd., Laiwu 271105, Shandong, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Improvement for the heating process of large size continuous casting round billets 35CrMnSiA
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In the rolling process of the cold charged 35CrMnSiA large round billet in Laigang special steel division, the billets cracked just like the birds nest, which seriously affected the production efficiency and product quality .In order to solve the defect, survey was did in the rolling mill, the reason was analyzed, the theory was discussed and the heating process was adjusted, and finally the heating process of the large round billets was optimized . the speed of billet reheating was reduced, the residence time of the slab in the preheating zone was extended; through calculating, the heating time of 500mm, 650mm cold billet was determined to be more than 7.5 and 9h respectively, and the nest cracking defects of cold rolling equipment was eliminated.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 成本改善在炼钢生产中的实践
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Steelingmaking Plant, Baoshan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Shanghai 200941， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Production practice of steelmaking with low cost
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the current market situation and the production characteristics of the Baosteel Steel Making Plant, the cost control methods since 2016, such as promoting the innovation of the cost management, the transformation of the energy management method, the less- slag steelmaking process, and the direct tapping process, increasing the number of casting and strengthening the cost benchmarking, are summarized. Through the promotion of these measures, the fine cost management level is improved, all aspects of consumption have made remarkable progress and low cost of large- scale production has been realized. And meanwhile, it has provided references for the same plant to achieve good results in the tough market situation.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 铁矿烧结烟气氧化- 氨法协同脱硫脱硝
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Technological Center, Guangxi Liuzhou Iron and Steel Group Co., Ltd., Liuzhou 545002, Guangxi, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Simultaneously desulfurization and denitration of iron ore sintering flue gas based on pre- oxidized and ammonia process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Iron ore sintering is the main source emission of SO2 and NOx. And the simultaneous desulfurization and denitrification technology of iron ore flue gas was studied by using pre- oxidized and ammonia process. The results showed that the pre- oxidation of the flues gas and the increase of the initial content of SO2-3 and the pH value of the absorption liquid and the ratio of liquid to gas were conducive to improving the desulfurization and denitration rates. Increasing the temperature or content of SO2 and NOx of flue gas was adverse to the desulfurization and denitration rates. The final denitration products were N2 and NO-3 after the pre- oxidized and ammonia process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 熔融还原炼铁技术发展情况和未来的思考
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
（1. Management of Financial Department, Baosteel Group, Shanghai 200122, China
2. Iron Making Institute, Central Research Institute, Baosteel Group, Shanghai 201900, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development of smelting reduction iron making technology and future thinking
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Due to the changes in the global iron and steel smelting resources and the improvement of environmental protection, non blast furnace ironmaking technology has attracted more and more attention. In recent years, new process and new technology are emerging in the field of non blast furnace ironmaking. Combined with the new frontier technology, several smelting reduction technologies (COREX, FINEX and HIsmelt) with industrialization prospect have been emphatically introduced. And in the combination with the practice of production operation, exploration and innovation of the COREX-3000 in Baosteel Group, the insufficiency and the flaw of the smelting reduction ironmaking technology existing in the present have been objectively pointed out. And based on the practice of Baosteel, the special attention that should be paid to the future development of smelting reduction ironmaking technology has been proposed.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 徐少兵，许海法. 熔融还原炼铁技术发展情况和未来的思考[J]. 中国冶金, 2016, 26(10): 33-39. XU Shao-bing，XU Hai-fa. Development of smelting reduction iron making technology and future thinking. China Metallurgy, 2016, 26(10): 33-39.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 辐射管辊底式热处理炉数学模型的研究与应用
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Thermal Engineering and Environmental Protection Research Center， CISDI Research and Development Co.， Ltd.， Chongqing 401122， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Study and application of mathematical model for radiant tube rollerhearth heat treatment furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Using imaginary surface method，a twodimensional mathematical model for slabs heating process in radiant tube rollerhearth treatment furnace was established and the model control system of rollerhearth heat treatment furnace was developed. The model included the slab temperature tracking and calculation of furnace temperature setting. The model of slab temperature tracking can calculate the slab temperature in the furnace，which can provide the basis for the slab preservation in heat treatment. The furnace temperature setting model can calculate the setting range of furnace temperature for different steel grade，different thickness and different aim temperature of heat treatment，which can guide producing. This model was successfully applied in a radiant tube rollerhearth heat treatment furnace in a certain iron and steel company，and it was checked by buried thermocouple test. Results showed that the accuracy of the model was within ±5 ℃ and the control effect was good.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 双传感器表面检测系统在镀锌线上的应用

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application of dual sensor surface detection system in hot dip galvanized line
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The function, composition and application status in cold rolled 2 230 hot dip galvanized line in Shougang Jingtang of the dual sensor surface detection system were summarized. The technological superiority, use characteristics and application value of the dual sensor surface detection system were described in detail. According to the surface statement and quality requirement of the product, the material group and classification of the galvanized products were optimized, which greatly improved the detection ability and the classification levels. The characteristics and differences of several typical surface defects were analyzed by the line scan field cameras and matrix scan field cameras, which increased the cognition and detection ability of the important defects such as warping, hole, inclusion, zinc slag, small dent, scratch and so on. As a result, the accuracy of the judgment of the surface quality of galvanized steel strip was greatly improved, and at the same time, it played an important role in improving the process and technology of hot dip galvanized line.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 热处理及NbVN微合金化对船板钢组织性能的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Naval Representative Office， Nuclear Power Research and Design Institute， Chengdu 610213， Sichuan， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of heat treatment process and NbVN microalloying on mechanical property and microstructure of grade ship plate steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to obtain a 390 MPa grade ship plate steel with good strengthen and toughness matching, the NbVN composite microalloying and different heat treatment process（normalizing＋tempering or quenching＋tempering）were applied, and the room temperature tensile properties, impact properties at －40 ℃, microstructure and precipitated phase of the laboratory steel plate were analyzed. The results showed that the addition of V and Nb can effectively refine the grain size, and the increase of N mass fraction can make the fine grain effect more obvious, which can result in the increase of the strength and toughness, especially the impact toughness. Compared with the hot rolling state, the normalizing＋tempering and quenching＋tempering states could significantly improve the mechanical properties of steel, especially the low temperature toughness, which benefited from a large member of the dispersed precipitations of the microalloyed carbonitrides during tempering and the obvious refinement of the effective grain size in steel during the normalizing/quenching＋tempering process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Technology of high-speed electroplating Sn with methane sulfonic acid solution
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：High-speed electroplating Sn with methane sulfonic acid solution is a kind of highly efficient environment protection tin plating process，and this technology is mature and has been widely used in the United States and other developed countries. In recent years，a lot of researches have been conducted in this field in our country and the production lines of high-speed electroplating Sn at Shougang，Meishan Steel and so on have been established. The necessary information of the production lines of the high-speed electroplating Sn with methane sulfonic acid solution in China and abroad and the application in the relevant enterprises were introduced. And the good application prospect of the dissolve tin technology with ion exchange membrane electrolysis method and the reflow technology with electromagnetic radiation heating were proposed.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Cold rolling skin pass mill has a significant influence on the shape of strip production. Focusing on the edge wave defect of the strip from cold rolling skin pass mill, contrastive analysis between different backup roll profiles is completed by FEM simulation, based on which the two stand backup roll profile convexity is optimized through experiments to improve the shape control ability of skin pass mill. Verified by productive experiment, after optimizing the two stand backup roll profile convexity, the edge wave height is improved by 22.14%, meanwhile the steep degree of edge wave is improved by 41.67%. Therefore, obvious application result and economic benefits are obtained.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Rolling Steel Department, Qinhuangdao Shouqin Metal Materials Co., Ltd, Qinhuangdao 066326, Hebei, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Difficulty and countermeasure analysis of identification and judgment for surface roughness of medium plate
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The problems of identification and judgment for the surface roughness of the ship plate were analyzed, and combined with many years of experience, a series of work was carried out to improve the accuracy of identification and judgment for the surface roughness. Through comparing nearly a thousand pieces of plate before and after shot blasting, the color and scratch of the steel plate surface were identified. And on the condition of ensuring the effective identification, it can promote the transition of the inspection standard from the product standard to the customer standard. According to the differences of the defect depths, the use locations, and the distribution areas, combing the different quality requirements of the different customers, the accurate identification of steel plate were obtained, which can ensure the accuracy and effectiveness of the identification and judgment of the steel plate, reduce the economic losses, and enhance the competitiveness of the product market.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHAO Di,YAN Bo,LIU Dan,CHENG Ye,LI Ga-zi,KANG Wen-ju
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Refining Cast Rolling Factory Workshop, Nanyang Hanye Special Steel Co., Ltd., Nanyang 474500, Henan, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Technological measures for improving qualified rate of Q345B steel plate flaw detection
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to solve the problem of the disqualification of the flaw detection for the low alloy Q345B plate produced by the 250 mm×1 650 mm section continuous caster in Nanyang Hanye Special Steel Co., the unqualified steel was sampled and detected by the electron microscope. It can be concluded that the main reasons for the disqualification of the flaw detection was the center segregation of manganese, the manganese sulfide inclusions and the aluminium oxide inclusions. Through optimizing the component to reduce the manganese mass fraction in the steel, improving the purity in the molten steel, reducing the sulfur mass fraction in the molten steel, optimizing the second cooling system and strictly controlling the opening degree of the caster, the center segregation of the slab was improved, and the quality qualification rate of the steel plate flaw detection after rolling was increased.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 轴承滚动体研磨钢泥夹杂物的去除

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Inclusion removal from bearing roller scrap
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：During grinding the bearing roller, Al2O3 and SiC abrasive inclusions were produced, and these inclusions must be removed because of its bad influence on recycling of steel scrap. The effects of different schemes on removing the impurity from steel scrap were compared, the choice of handling methods before magnetic separation and the magnetic intensity during magnetic separation process were studied. The results show that the method of magnetic separation is the best. Wet milling processing is done for the steel scrap before magnetic separation and smaller magnetic intensity is chosen during magnetic separation process which is beneficial to inclusion removal. The main reason why the Al2O3 and SiC abrasive inclusions can not be completely separated from steel scrap is that there are many holes on the surface of big grain steel scrap, so the fine grain inclusions are embedded in these holes and hard to be separated from steel scrap.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: CSP产线340 MPa级高强度无间隙原子钢开发
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Iron and Steel Research Institute， JISCO Hongxing Co.， Ltd.， Jiayuguan 735100， Gansu， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 摘要 采用LF-RH双精炼工艺，在CSP流程上进行了340 MPa级冷轧IF高强钢的开发。试验材料达到成分设计要求，罩式炉退火后微观组织为细小等轴铁素体组织，晶粒度在10级左右，力学性能达到340 MPa级高强度无间隙原子钢要求。EBSD结果表明，试验材料退火织构由较强的γ织构（<111>∥ND）和一定强度的α织构（<110>//RD）组成，α取向中较高的{112}<110>和{001}<110>织构是导致试验材料r均值偏低和Δr小于0的主要原因。
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development of 340 MPa high strength IF steel in CSP process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Using the RH-LF duplex refining process，the 340 MPa cold rolled high strength IF steel was developed in CSP process. The material got the designed chemical composition. The test resulted showed that the microstructure was equiaxed ferrite after batch annealing，the grain size of test material was ASTM 10 and the mechanical properties met the specification requirements of the 340 MPa cold rolled high strength IF steel. The EBSD results showed the annealing texture were dominated by near γ texture (<111>∥ND) and some α textures (<110>//RD). And the higher density texture of {112}<110> and {001}<110> in the α textures of the test material caused that the test material had lower plastic strain ratio r and the Δr was below zero.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 赵小龙，王瑾，罗晓阳. CSP产线340 MPa级高强度无间隙原子钢开发[J]. 中国冶金, 2016, 26(12): 40-43. ZHAO Xiao-long，WANG Jin，LUO Xiao-yang. Development of 340 MPa high strength IF steel in CSP process. China Metallurgy, 2016, 26(12): 40-43.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (Hot Strip Rolling Mill Plant， Guangxi Liuzhou Iron and Steel Group Co., Ltd., Liuzhou 545002, Guangxi, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Cause analysis and control practice of ridge #br# buckle of cold rolling substrate
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
 In view of the batch ridge buckle defect appearing in the downstream process for the cold rolling substrate produced by the 1 450 and 2 032 mm hotrolling line, combined with the characteristics of equipment control of two hot rolling production lines, the causes and mechanism of the defects were analyzed from the change of shape control and rolling process specification control. And the results showed that the instability of crown control of hot rolling strip was an important reason for the ridge buckle. By optimizing the control model of HVC profile and adjusting the production process management system, the control principle of "uniform deformation and uniform crown" for the rolling process was realized, the crosssection quality of the strip and crown control was ensured, the occurrence rate of ridge buckle of cold rolled products was reduced by 95.12% compared with the same period of the last cycle, and the product quality was obviously improved.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 赵忠云, 张金旺, 黄斌. 冷轧基板起筋成因分析及控制实践[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(9): 73-77. ZHAO Zhongyun，ZHANG Jinwang，HUANG Bin. Cause analysis and control practice of ridge #br# buckle of cold rolling substrate[J]. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(9): 73-77.

(Ansteel (Shanghai) Environmental Engineering Technology Co., Ltd., Ansteel Engineering
Technology Co., Ltd., Shanghai 201210, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application of SDS+SCR process in desulfurization #br# and denitration of coke oven flue gas
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Large quantities of SO2 and NOx in coke oven flue gas are the main pollutants forming the acid rain and haze. In order to implement the basic national policy of environmental protection production, it has become an urgent task for major enterprises to desulfurize, denitrify and dedust from the coke oven flue gas. The application of the process of SDS dry desulfurization and SCR denitrification and dedusting at medium and low temperature in practical engineering was investigated, the process had high efficiency, few byproducts and strong impact resistance. It was a kind of advanced coke oven flue gas purification technologies in the world. SDS+SCR process was used to treat the flue gas of No.8 coke oven in the coking plant of Angang Steel Company Limited. The results showed that when the average concentrations of SO2, NOx and dust in the coke oven flue gas at the entrance of the equipment were 83.84, 439.67 and 18.43 mg/m3, respectively, the concentrations of the three pollutants in the outlet flue gas were lower than 30, 150 and 5 mg/m3， meeting the emission requirements of GB 16171—2012. The study can provide a reference scheme and experience for the pollution control of the coking industry.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 管线钢边部发纹的形成与控制
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: HAN Cheng- liang,BAI Xue- jun,ZHANG Xue- feng,WANG Suo- tao
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Manufacture Department, Qinhuangdao Shouqin Metal Material Co., Ltd., Qinhuangdao 066326, Hebei, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Formation and control of hairline cracks in pipeline steel edge
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Hairline cracks of edge in pipeline steel was one of the common surface defects. The cause and control methods of hairline cracks of pipeline steel were studied by series of experiments. The result showed that the hairline cracks of pipeline steel was caused by the cracking at the feeble locations on the sides of casting billet during the rolling process. And the plate deformation of upper and lower surface was inhomogeneous during the rolling process. The extension of lower surface was less than the upper surface. Thus, leading to the hairline cracks of lower surface were further away from the plate edge than the upper surface, and the hairline cracks of lower surface could not be removed normally. Improving the uniformity of casting billet heating could alleviate the uneven rolling deformation, but could not completely solve the problem of hairline cracks of lower surface of pipeline steel. In the end, the extension of the lower surface was increased while the rolling speed of lower roller was greater than the upper roller during the process of widening stage of roughing mill. The hairline cracks of the upper surface was 15 mm away from the plate edge and that of the lower surface was 25 mm. The hairline cracks of upper and lower surface could be normally cut. The production efficiency and output proportion of pipeline steel was increased.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 钢带热浸镀工艺参数的动态精准控制方法
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Department of Strip, CISDI Engineering Co., Ltd., Chongqing 401122, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Dynamic precision control method for hot dipping process parameters of strip
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A unique method of dynamic and precise control of continuous hot dip galvanizing process parameters is summarized. Controlling of the height of the condensing line between 1 to 6 m, the optimum between 2 to 4 m, is the temperature control principle of the zinc pot. For the condensing line below 1 m, it should increase the zinc pot temperature,while for the condensing line above 6 m, it should decrease the zinc pot temperature. The method of correcting the temperature delay error and measuring error of the steel strip is to correct the reading of the optical pyrometer by the principle of heat balance. Based on the temperature of the zinc pot, the temperature control method for the steel entering the zinc pot is the control of the temperature difference between the zinc pot and the steel strip with different thicknesses. The thicker the steel strip is, the higher the temperature difference needs. This method conforms to the principle of hot- dip galvanizing production process, which is beneficial to ensure the production of good products and reduce energy consumption.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The process route and technical scheme of an on-line screening and charging system for converter lime powder developed by WISDRI Engineering and Research Incorporation Limited were introduced. The system, with a vibration and screening device under the lime bin, could realize the on-line separation of the lime block and powder production on the premise of ensuring the converter production rhythm, which can prevent the lime powder from being sucked into primary de-dusting system by converter off-gas. Practice proved that it had remarkable effects on promoting the lime utilization ratio, stabilizing the converter steelmaking operation and guaranteeing the primary de-dusting practice. Therefore, this technology had referenced value for newly-built or reconstruction steelmaking program.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the problem of the large roll consumption and the roll spalling and roll crapping of about a domestic 1 420 cold continuous rolling mill，and even the problem of roll spalling and roll crapping，a general method for the design of cold roll profile was established. Then combined with the equipment and technology feature of cold rolling mill，a set of roll shape curve parameters optimization the model was designed for optimizing the roll shape curve parameters in set up for cold continuous rolling mill. And a new type of the new back- up roll profile and middle roll profile were designed，which can reduce the roller pressure distribution of the uneven degree simultaneously and adjust the effect of bending roll force. It was applied to in the production practice of the 1 420 cold rolling mill，which reduced the roll consumption and the incidence rate of crapped roll，improved the product quality，enhanced the brand competitiveness，and brought benefits to the enterprise.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence of reduction distribution on slab deformation during liquid core reduction process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to improve the slab center segregation and porosity，the parameters of liquid core reduction process were optimized. Based on the finite element theory，the software Marc was used to compute the three-dimensional thermal-mechanical coupling model of thin slab during the liquid core reduction process，and the temperature of the slab cross section in the mold exit was considered as the initial conditions. The effects of different reduction distribution on nodes’stresses and strains in slab were analyzed. The result showed that the slab surface stress would be decreased by adopting evenly reduction distribution with constent overall reduction and the bigger reduction can be more helpful for improving the central quality.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Experiment on reducing consumption of KR desulfurizer
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Due to the reduction of KR desulfurization agent consumption can effectively reduce the cost of desulfurization, aiming at the limitation of the existing KR desulfurization device, studied a method of reducing KR desulfurization agent consumption. By improving the conveying mode of desulfurizer, the desulfurizer can be fully contacted with the liquid iron surface, and the utilization rate of the desulfurizer can be improved. The KR desulfurization device of 180 t converter was improved in accordance with these measures, and carried out a 7 months test. The test results showed that after the improvement of KR desulfurization device, the agent consumption of desulfurizer was decreased by about 20%, and the temperature drop of iron melt was reduced, so that the cost of iron melt desulphurization was reduced by about 1.35 yuan/t, and the energy consumption of steelmaking was reduced.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The present status of titanium- containing materials from ten steel enterprises in China were investigated. The conditions of the titanium- containing materials from different blast furnaces were introduced, and the properties of the materials were analyzed as well as their comprehensive properties. The results show that the titanium- containing pellet and titanium- containing lump were the main furnace protection materials, and the chemical compositions of titanium- containing materials were quite different. Train and vehicle were the main conveyances. Through the evaluation of the performance and economic indicators of titanium- containing materials, the preferential order of different titanium- containing materials was titanium- containing core wire, titanium- containing pellet, titanium- containing lump, titanium- containing sinter, and titanium- containing unfired pellets. The addition methods of titanium- containing materials were divided into upper addition and lower loading. It was concluded that the use of titanium- containing pellet with the upper addition and taphole clay containing titanium with the lower addition could achieve a better effect.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 多喷管二段式新型引射器数值模拟
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Numerical simulation of twostage diffuser ejector with multinozzle
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to further solve the problem of exhaust gas suction in ladle bakering during baking process, the structure of twostage diffuser ejector with multinozzle was put forward. The new ejector was simulated by Fluent software, and the effects of different nozzle numbers and nozzle′s amount and those of the structure of twostage diffuser on smoke suction were analyzed. The simulation results showed that with the increase of the nozzle number′s amount, the lower pressure zone produced by the working fluid in the receiving chamber became more obvious. And the increasing of the nozzle′s amount number made the blending effect better and more uniform between the working fluid and the exhaust gas, and the velocity distribution range decreased. There was a velocity dead zone or reflux zone at the exit of the singlestage diffuser, but none in the twostage diffuser structure and the effects of diffusion became more obvious. The overall ejection effects of the ejector have been greatly improved. The ejection coefficient of the twostage diffuser ejector with fournozzle was as high as 1.42 when the relative pressure of working fluid was 0.3 MPa and the relative pressure that of the exhaust gas was 200 Pa.

4. Limin Company, Masteel Group, Ma′anshan 243000, Anhui, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and practice of comprehensive utilization of Fe- containing dust in MasteelL
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The iron and steel industry produces large quantities of solid waste. In general, producing 1 t of steel generates about 600 kg of solid waste, and the proportion of dust and mud accounts for about 5%- 8% of the steel output. For a long time, the treatment and comprehensive utilization of solid waste have been paid great attention in Masteel, and the reduction, harmless and resource utilization of solid waste is taken as the important goal of internal production management. The research work and comprehensive utilization practice of Fe- containing dust in Masteel in recent years are introduced. On the basis of the classification of Fe- containing dust, the resource utilization system for the transfer and return sintering of the converter BOF OG sludge pipe, the comprehensive utilization system for the low zinc Fe- containing dust strong mixing pile building, and the system for the treatment of zinc- bearing dust by the rotary hearth furnace and the rotary kiln are built in Masteel. The produced all kinds of Fe- containing dust are synthetically utilized. Each year, about 178 thousand tons of CO2 emissions and 300 thousand tons of new water consumption can be reduced. At the same time, a large number of valuable elements such as iron, zinc, calcium and magnesium have been recovered. While significant social benefits have been achieved, rich economic returns have been obtained.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Xianyang Vocational and Technical College, Xianyang 712000, Shaanxi, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of annealing time on properties of Zr- 4 alloy tube
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of annealing time on the properties of Zr- 4 alloy tube was studied by means of high- temperature tensile test, uniform corrosion test, metallographic observation and second phase particle statistics. The results showed that by the annealing time from 3.5 to 5.5 h, mechanical property(tensile strength, yield strength and elongation) of Zr- 4 tube showed a similar trend. The grain size of the inner and outer layer of Zr- 4 tube were all of grade 11 without abnormal grain growth, and the size range of the second phase particle gradually increased.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: SHANG Guo- pu,XIANG Chun- tao,DUAN Xiao- tong,QIAN Shi- chong
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （General Layout Business Division, Beijing Shougang International Engineering Technology Co., Ltd.， Beijing 100043， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and application of general layout pattern of "one ladle mode" on ironmaking/steelmaking interface
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The goals of modern steel enterprises are to make the material flow and energy flow short and effective and realize the maximum economic and environmental benefit. And the ironmaking/steelmaking interface technologies have a qualitative leap. Especially, the general layout pattern of the "one ladle mode" on the ironmaking/steelmaking interface directly affects the production process, the land occupation of the project, the project investment, the manufacturing management, the operating costs and the fixed number of post. The development history of the general layout pattern of the "one ladle mode" was introduced based on the typical cases of the current general layout pattern of the ironmaking/steelmaking interface in domestic, and the characteristics were comprehensively analysed and compared. Mastering the future develop trend of the general layout pattern of the "one ladle mode" can provide references for the general layout pattern of the "one ladle mode" on the ironmaking/steelmaking interface.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of calcium treatment on inclusions in 430 stainless steel slabs
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The relationships between the calcium mass fraction and the aluminum mass fraction in liquid inclusion region in steel after calcium treatment for 430 ferritic stainless steel was analyzed by the thermodynamic calculation. The inclusion types and number in 430 stainless steel without and with calcium treatment were compared, and the modification mechanism of inclusions was analyzed．The results showed that when calcium silicon line was added during LF, the ideal calcium treatment effect can be obtained. The Al2O3 and CaOSiO2Al2O3MgO inclusion can be modified into inclusions which were liquid at steelmaking temperature after calcium treatment. The inclusion size was less than 15 μm, and the inclusion number was decreased obviously compared with the number without calcium treatment. The CaO and Al2O3 reacted with each other and finally formed liquid calcium aluminates.

2. Ministry of Science and Technology, Shandong Molong Petroleum Machinery Co., Ltd., Weifang 262700, Shandong, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Production overview and main characteristics of HIsmelt process in Shandong Molong
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Shandong Molong HIsmelt ironmaking process utilizes non- coking coal powder to reduce ferrous raw materials in a smelting furnace vessel to produce high- purity iron for the high- end manufacturing industries (such as nuclear power). And it is a revolutionary new technology in the field of ferrous metallurgy. Firstly, the overview of Shandong Molong HIsmelt factory and the reaction mechanism of the smelting reduction vessel were introduced. Secondly, the main production indexes of Shandong Molong HIsmelt process were analyzed and the results showed that the main production indexes of Shandong Molong HIsmelt were obviously superior to that of the Rio Tinto HIsmelt factory. And of the produced high- purity molten iron had low phosphorus content, almost did not contain Si and Mn elements and the contents of other five harmful elements were very low, which met the requirement of the high- end manufacturing industries for iron raw material. Finally, the characteristics of Shandong Molong HIsmelt production process were summarized, the adjustment of the smelting status in the furnace through the synergetic action of the three major operating systems (adjusting the injection coal capacity, adjusting the quantity of iron- containing materials injection and adjusting the rich oxygen amount in hot wind) was analyzed and the influence of hot metal temperature and coal consumption was discussed.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LIU Yan- qiang,LUO Lei,ZHANG Peng,WANG Hao,YUAN Tian- xiang,ZHANG Bing- long
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Steelmaking Department, Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Tangshan 063200, Hebei, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development of green recycling system of hot slag and molten steel at Shougang Jingtang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to achieve less slag of "Full- Tri- De" smelting process and reduce the material consumption of supplementary materials, the new technology of directly recycling the hot desulfurization slag, the hot decarburization slag and the residual slag and steel after casting was developed in Shougang Jingtang. The recyclability of hot steel and slag of "Full- Tri- De" smelting process was analyzed, and the application effects were verified by the commercial test. The results showed that the desulfurization agent consumption, the temperature drop of hot metal and the temperature drop of hot metal can be reduced by 30%- 40%, 10- 15 ℃ and 30%- 40%, respectively, through recycling of 5 t desulfurization slag. At the same time, the iron loss and the environmental pollution can be reduced. And the average consumption of 3.2 t lime was saved through recycling hot steel slag 20 t per ladle. If the silicon mass fraction in molten iron was lower than 0.15%, lime could not be added to dephosphorization furnace. The consumption of 2.4 kg/t iron and steel raw material was correspondingly cut. Meanwhile, light- burned dolomite and fluorite as burden materials were eliminated in dephosphorization furnace, Thus, it can realize the zero consumption of supplementary materials in dephosphorization furnace. According to the residual in ladle after casting, through controlling the blast furnace tapping and putting the hot refining slag produced in the RH/LF/CAS process and the residual slag and steel in ladle after casting into the semisteel ladle, which was used in the smelting in decarburization furnace, the time of recycling casting residual slag and steel can reach 6- 8 times and may achieve the direct recovery of liquid casting.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: 5Fracture analysis in cooling process of 50 steel slab
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The abnormal microstructure and mechanical property at different temperature of 50 steel slab have been analysed. The result showed that rapid and inhomogenous cooling will cause sharp-edged and protuberant ferrite structure, which can weaken the grain boundaries and induce stronger structural stress and thermal stress. The brittle zones at high temperature and low temperature are existed at 700 and 300 ℃, respectively, in which the fracture can be seen probably with moving the slabs. By applying suitable stack cooling and improving the proportion of hot delivery and hot charging of continuous casting slab, the risks of fracture can be reduced effectively.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Technical practice and research on optimal composition of refining slag of aluminium deoxidation bearing steel GCr15
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Thermodynamic calculations on the effect of MgO on the melting point of refining slag, and the effect of refining slag on the equilibrium steel compositions and desulfurizing capacity were carried out by using FactSage to optimize the refining slag of aluminium deoxidation bearing steel GCr15. The optimal compositions of slag were obtained through the calculation. Commercial tests of the optimized result were carried out in the "100t EAFLFVDCC" bearing steel GCr15 production in a domestic factory. The results showed that the compositions of the optimal slag were CaO of 50%- 55%, Al2O3 of 25%- 33%, SiO2 of 6%- 10%, MgO of 5%- 7% and R of 5- 7. After the commercial tests, the main inclusion types in billet were Al2O3, MgO- Al2O3, MnS, calcium- aluminate, metasilicate and TiN. The number density of oxide inclusions was below 3/mm2. The average equivalent diameter was below 4 μm.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Silicon steel is an important soft magnetic alloy in military industry and electronic power industry. Because of complex production technology and strict manufacturing technology, the quality of silicon steel has become a symbol of the development level of a country′s iron and steel industry.This article summarizes the further theoretical research of silicon steel, the research and improvement of oriented silicon steel inhibitors, and the development of new varieties from the two aspects of non- oriented silicon steel and oriented silicon steel, and summarizes the application status of silicon steel advanced production technology at major domestic and foreign manufacturers. On this basis, the problems existing in the research and production of silicon steel were pointed out, and the future research direction was forecasted.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Numerical simulation of flow field and temperature field of 1 850 mm×230 mm slab in continuous casting mold
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the effect of continuous casting process parameters on the mold, the flow field and temperature field of 1 850 mm×230 mm slab in continuous casting mold in Liansteel were systematically-simulated. The comprehensive effects of different argon blowing rate (0-7 L/min), nozzle immersion depth (110-150 mm) and casting speed (0.9-1.2 m/min) on the metallurgical behavior of molten steel in the mold were studied. It was concluded that as the argon blowing rate increased, the velocity and temperature of the free liquid surface of the mold showed a general trend of descending. As the nozzle immersion depth increased, the velocity of the free liquid surface of the mold decreased before increasing. As the casting speed increased, the velocity of the free liquid surface of the mold also increased. The nozzle immersion depth and casting speed had little effect on the temperature field. When the argon blowing rate was 5 L/min, the nozzle immersion depth was 130 mm and the casting speed was 0.9 m/min, the free liquid surface of the mold had smaller velocity and turbulent kinetic energy. At the same time, the liquid surface had better temperature uniformity. The numerical simulation study provided a theoretical basis for the reasonable selection of the relevant technical parameters of the mold.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the historical converter production data of Hanbao Iron and Steel Co., Ltd. of Handan steel group, the converter endpoint temperature prediction model was established by combining the wavelet analysis with the grey model, and a new idea was proposed based on the current temperature prediction method. After the data "nose" was removed by the wavelet transform tool in MATLAB, it was divided into trend data and fluctuation data, and the gray model was used to predict the converter endpoint temperature with 24 furnaces as the samples to be measured. The results showed that the predicted temperature error accounted for 95.83% in the interval [-10,10], which can meet the production requirements, thereby verifying the validity of the model.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 钛微合金化HRB400E钢筋组织性能及强化机理
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: YANG Xiao-wei, ZHOU Yun, CHEN Huan-de, ZHANG Yu
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Wire/Rod Group, Institute of Research of Iron and Steel, Shasteel/Jiangsu, Zhangjiagang 215625, Jiangsu, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Microstructure and strengthening mechanisms of Ti microalloyed HRB400E rebar
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Continues cooling phase transformation behavior and strengthening mechanisms of the Ti-containing steel were systematically studied by thermal simulation testing machine, high-resolution transmission electron microscope and metallographic microscope. The result showed that the microstructure was mainly composed of ferrite and pearlite at the low cooling rate (0.5-1 ℃/s). When the cooling rate was gradually increased (1-5 ℃/s), the bainite structure appeared and the ratio of bainite increased. And the microstructure mainly consisted of bainite at the high cooling rate (5-10 ℃/s). The strengthening mechanisms of the Ti-containing steel were precipitation strengthening and fine-grain strengthening. TiN mainly precipitated as fine particles dispersing and its size was 10-20 nm. The optimized cooling rate was (1.5±0.5) ℃/s for the 20 mm HRB400E steel industry trial production, the yield strength was above 430 MPa, the elongation after fracture was above 20%, the maximum gross elongation was above 15%, and the ratio of tensile strength and yield strength was above 1.4.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WANG Xin-dong1, HAO Liang-yuan2, HU Qi-chen2, WANG Xiao-ai2

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Progress in blast furnace ironmaking technology of HBIS Group
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The ironmaking technology supports the development of the whole process flow of HBIS Group. Based on the basic idea of "Taking the blast furnaces as the center to ensure the long-term stable and smooth operation of blast furnaces", HBIS Group was committed to improving the utilization coefficient of blast furnace, increasing the coal ratio and reducing the fuel ratio of blast furnace. The gas utilization was improved by optimizing the burden distribution system. The reasonable adjustment of burden structure was taken to deal with the environmental protection production limit. The air supply parameters were explored to adapt to the change in raw fuel conditions. At the same time, the blast furnace longevity control technology had been explored, the new environmental protection technology had been developed, and the intelligent control level had been improved. Important breakthroughs had also been made in the smelting of vanadium-titanium ore, high-volume pellet smelting, flux pellets, and alkaline pellet production. Through the series of measures, the economic and technical indexes of various types of blast furnaces in HBIS Group had been continuously improved with remarkable results.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Production practice of high carbon and low phosphorus steel by high phosphorus hot metal in 120 t converter
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the problem of the low carbon and phosphorus converter end point to exceed the standard during producing high carbon and low phosphorus steel with the high phosphorus hot metal in Laisteel, by controlling the dephosphorization slag basicity at about 1.5, implementing the double slag and slag- remaining process, increasing the early strength of bottom blowing to improve the dynamic conditions, using the fluorine- free slag melting agent and increasing the slide gate slag to optimize the effect of slag stopping effect, the high efficiency production of low phosphorus steel by the phosphorus hot metal was achieved. The end point phosphorus can be stably controlled under 0.010%, dephosphorization rate increased from 89.80% to 94.67%, the end point carbon mass fraction can be controlled more than 0.15%, the oxidation of the molten steel was reduced, the slag depth in ladle decreased by 40 mm, the time for the formation of white slag was reduced, the demand of the cleanliness of high carbon low phosphorus steel was met, and the good economic benefits were achieved.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The electric control technology of the tension leveler, which was an important process equipment in the production of cold rolling sheet, was introduced. Based on the detailed analysis of the elongation and tension control modes of the tension leveler, the feedforward control was adopted to solve the instability and the hysteresis of the tension when increasing or reducing the unit speed in the tension control mode. Moreover, the problem of the large overshoot tension when shifting the elongation pattern to the tension pattern was solved by setting the definite value for the tension. The application results showed that the system ran stably and had high control reaction and accuracy.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Design of iron ore concentrate- drying system for a 5 million t/a travelling machine
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The design process of an iron ore concentrate- drying system for a travelling machine of pellet production line with the capacity of 5 million ton annually was introduced. According to the characteristic of material and the requirement of production, the heat carrier was confirmed as hot flue gas, cylinder drier was chosen as the drying equipment and the drying method was concurrent drying. The capacity for dealing with iron ore, the amount of water evaporation and the heat required were obtained by material balance and heat balance calculation, which got the further conclusion that the size of cylinder drier was 5 m×24 m，the power required was 859 kW and the hydraulic motor was fit as driving equipment. The heating capacity of blast stove was 1.33×108 kJ/h. Bag dust collector and induced draft fan were used as dust removal equipment, whose passing volume of air was 200 000 m3/h, and the ventilator total pressure was 3 000 Pa.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: XUE Rui1,2, ZHANG Yan-chao1,2, ZHANG Cai-jun1,2, WANG Chong-jun3, LIU Zhi-yuan3
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Numerical simulation of influence of bottom blowing gas supply mode on converter mixing effect
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：By means of numerical simulation, taking a 300 t converter in a steel mill in the north as the prototype, a three-dimensional model of the bottom blowing converter was established. The effect of argon blowing at the converter bottom on the mixing effects of converter under the non-uniform gas supply system was studied, and the design scheme was optimized. The results showed that with the increase of bottom blowing argon flow rate, the average velocity and the average turbulent kinetic energy in the molten pool increased, and the proportion of the weak flow zone decreased, but the proportion of dead zone decreases less. When the argon flow rate of a single plug brick was 440 m3/h, the average velocity of the flow distribution ratio of 1∶1, 2∶1, 3∶1 and 4∶1 was 0.189, 0.204, 0.167 and 0.168 m/s, respectively. And the dead zone ratio was 17.5%, 11.60%, 23.53% and 20.23%, respectively. The mixing effect of converter was the best when the flow distribution ratio was 2∶1, followed by 1∶1 and 4∶1, and the worst was when the distribution ratio was 3∶1.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Evaluation model of layout of steelmaking workshop based on factors analysis
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The layout of a steelmaking workshop(LSW) has direct influences on logistics operation, scheduling, production efficiency and production cost. Through analyzing the developing characteristics of the steelmaking workshop, the evaluation model of LSW was proposed. There were four factors considered in the model, which were route of mass flow, interference of cranes, area of workshop and cost of construction. A solution of the model was also given, and the model was applied in the two different layouts of the steelmaking workshop. The two layouts were analyzed and evaluated, and the merits and defects were also compared. It′s obvious that the model can give some suggestions to the layout of a building/rebuilding steel workshop.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application of carbonaceous material deoxygenation technique in BOF slag
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The technological characteristics of topblown converter caused by the some unfavorable factors, such as the higher mass fraction of FeO in converter final slag. In order to solve the problem, the idea of using the carbonaceous material as the slag deoxidation agent was proposed by studying the principle of the carbon deoxidization, which can reduce ferric oxide in the slag by the carbonaceous material. In the industrial test, 1.22.2 kg/t carbonaceous material was added in per ton steel, which was uniformly added on the slag surface during the BOF tapping with the residual steel varying from 1/2 to 1/4. The results showed the carbonaceous material had good use effect in the slag deoxidation, and can substitute for aluminum with the ratio of 2∶1, which can obtain obvious economic benefit and reduce the production cost.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development of ferroalloy gas processing technology
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Ferroalloy is an important part of the steel industry. Driven by the steel industry in recent years, the ferroalloy industry has also achieved certain development. The production of ferroalloy produces a large amount of gas, and its main components include greenhouse gases such as smoke, CO and CH4, which not only destroy the ecological environment, but also threaten human health. Ferroalloy gas has the characteristics of high temperature, large gas volume, high smoke and dust concentration, and small particle size, so its purification is difficult and complicated. With the increasing attention to environmental protection, the recovery and purification of ferroalloy gas have become the focus and difficulty of the development of ferroalloy industry. The development course of ferroalloy gas purification technology is introduced, several typical processes of wet purification and dry purification of ferroalloy gas are introduced, and the development trend of purification technology is also introduced.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 宋灵灵, 易红宏, 唐晓龙, 赵顺征, 解锡舟. 铁合金煤气处理技术进展[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(4): 1-5. SONG Ling-ling, YI Hong-hong, TANG Xiao-long, ZHAO Shun-zheng, XIE Xi-zhou. Development of ferroalloy gas processing technology[J]. China Metallurgy, 2020, 30(4): 1-5.
