http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: YANG Zhan-bing1, YANG Su-bing1,2, LI Lian-qi1
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
1. School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China;
2. Graduate School of Engineering, Hokkaido University, Hokkaido 060-8628, Sapporo, Japan
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of radiation temperature on second defects and swelling in SUS316L stainless steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The high voltage electron microscope was employed to perform electron beam irradiations on SUS316L austenitic stainless steel with a dose of 3.6 dpa at 350, 400, 450 and 500 ℃. The effect of the electron beam radiation on the swelling rate of material at different temperatures was discussed by observing and analyzing the number density of void, the dislocation loop and the swelling rate in the sample after irradiation. The result showed that the second defects such as dislocation loops and voids, occur in the samples at different temperatures. The radiation swelling was caused by voids. And the swelling increased with the increase of temperature in the region of 350-450 ℃, and reached the maximum at 450 ℃. Above 450 ℃, the swelling rate decreased. Under different temperatures, the two kinds of secondary defects had different sink strength to the point defects, and the swelling rate was related to the proportion of dislocation loops and voids in the microstructure. The experimental study on the relationship between the irradiation swelling rate and secondary defects provided the basis for further understanding the mechanism of radiation swelling and seeking the method of restraining irradiation swelling.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: HC340LA钢冲压“桔皮”缺陷成因及措施
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WANG Li-hui, LI Jian-xin, SUN Li, AN Hui-long, MA Cheng, DONG Yi-kang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Central Iron and Steel Research Institute, Hesteel Group, Shijiazhuang 050023, Hebei, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Causes and improvement measures of stamping orange peel defects of HC340LA steels
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The microstructure and mechanical properties of the 340 MPa-grade cold-rolled high strength low alloy (HSLA) steels with and without orange peel defects were analyzed. The results show that the yield point elongation of the stress-strain curve of the defective steel plate reaches 3.73%. The yield extension is too large, which leads to the orange peel defect on the surface of the stamped front windshield beam connecting plate. In the laboratory, the technique of the pre-stretching of the steel sheets is used to simulate the skin pass and stretching straight process for the industrial production of the steel sheets. With the increasing the pre-deformation amount, the length of the yield platform of the sample decreases, and when the pre-tension amount exceeds 1.8%, the yielding platform of the sample disappears. Further analysis of the microstructure reveals that the high annealing temperature leads to the coarse grain size and the abnormal grain orientation, which is the root cause of the "orange peel" defect of the stamped steel plate. In the annealing process, the reasonable control of leveling and tension straightening can eliminate or shorten the length of the yield platform of the test steel and avoid the occurrence of orange peel defects on the stamping parts.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 王立辉, 李建新, 孙力, 安会龙, 马成, 董伊康. HC340LA钢冲压“桔皮”缺陷成因及措施[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(3): 64-68. WANG Li-hui, LI Jian-xin, SUN Li, AN Hui-long, MA Cheng, DONG Yi-kang. Causes and improvement measures of stamping orange peel defects of HC340LA steels[J]. China Metallurgy, 2020, 30(3): 64-68.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Discussion on sulphide capacity and sulphur distribution ratio of slag for ultra- low carbon weak deoxidized steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The calculation models of the sulphide capacity were sketched firstly，which mainly includes the optical basicity model，KTH model，etc. At the same time，the FactSage software was proposed to calculate the slag sulphide capacity and compared with the former two methods. The results indicated that these three models can predict the sulphide capacity of the RH top slag reasonably. Then，the sulphur distribution ratio between the ultra- low carbon steel and slag was calculated by the FactSage software，and the calculation result was similar to the measurement result. Thus，the FactSage can be used to predict the sulphide capacity of the RH top slag for ultra- low carbon weak deoxidized steel and the slag- steel sulphur distribution，as well as guide the production practice. Finally，for the production of ultra- low carbon weak deoxidized steel，the ［S］ mass fraction can be controlled within normal lower range by increasing the w(CaO)/w(Al2O3) and decreasing the mass fraction of (FeO+MnO) and SiO2 in RH slag.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Cause and Solution of Wood Grain Defects on Tinplate
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The cause for wood grain defect on tinplate strip during power frequency resistance reflow is applied are discussed, and a new technique for eliminating the defect is presented. Variable frequency resistance reflow can eliminate wood grain defect by adjusting reflow power supply frequency from 50Hz to 200Hz. In different process conditions, the minimum power supply frequency for eliminating the defect varies. The application of variable frequency resistance reflow in 400m/min electrotinplate production line is introduced in detail. Comparing with the currently used combination reflow of power frequency resistance reflow and high frequency induction reflow, the new technique increases not only power supply efficiency, but also scratch resistance of tinplate. It is especially suitable for high speed electrotinplate production line.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The inclusions in first slab of low carbon aluminium killed steel produced by 220t BOF—220t LF—CC and the comparative analysis with the inclusions of normal slab were studied by means of Oxygen and Nitrogen Analyzer and electroanalysis. The results are as follows: w(T［O］)，w(［N］) and large-inclusions were generally decreasing with increasing of length; the inclusions were mainly TiN, SiO2, Al2O3-SiO2 and Al2O3-MgO-CaO complex inclusions; a small amount of MgO inclusions were also found. The reasons for the increasing were mainly reoxidation and entanglement of tundish covering flux and mold powder. Ladle filler sand and tundish lining can also make the inclusions increasing. The recommendation was that the length of slit should be more than 4.0m.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （School of Metallurgical Engineering， Xi′an University of Architecture and Technology， Xi′an 710055， Shaanxi， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Discussion on process of smelting metal manganese by submerged arc furnace and rocking furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In submerged arc furnace，coke was used to reduce manganese iron ore in process，reaction temperature was strictly controlled under 1500℃，slag basicity ω(CaO)/ω(SiO2) was 0.16，mass fraction of SiO2 was 18%，mass fraction of MnO in manganese rich slag was not less than 70%. Meanwhile，byproduct carbon ferromanganese was produced. Hot rich-manganese slag was poured into rocking furnace to refine and product harmonic slag which basicity will be increased to 2.0. This condition was beneficial to remove P and S，and decreased activity of SiO2. Finally，industrial silicon was added to reduce Mn of harmonic slag and get metal manganese，in which mass fraction of Mn was not less than 99% in rocking furnace. It can have a remarkable energy saving effect.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 凌钢2300m3高炉长期非计划休风快速恢复炉况
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （The Second Ironmaking Plant, Lingyuan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Chaoyang 122504， Liaoning， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Rapid recovery practice of long term unplanned blowing-down of 2300m3 BF in Lingsteel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The experiences in handling long term blow-down of 2300m3 BF in Ling Steel were summarized，including holding temperature after blow-down；adding appropriate clean coke at the beginning of reblowing and more coal to make the blast temperature enough；reducing the basicity of slag to improve the slag liquidity；moderately adjusting the ore batch and burden distribution matrix to ensure the reasonable distribution of the two gas flow；hierarchically plugging the tuyere and reasonably arranging the blast furnace casthouse operation etc. Finally, it took only 24h to make the furnace condition normal after reblowing.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 首钢京唐1号高炉操作炉型管理实践
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Ironmaking Department， Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Tangshan 063200, Hebei, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Management practice of operation profile of No.1 blast furnace in Shougang Jingtang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the adjustments and changes of operation profile of No.1 blast furnace in Shougang Jingtang in recent six years, the furnace types were designed for comparison. Through exploration of raw material and fuel management, charging system, sending wind system, heating system, cooling system, tapping system and other system of the blast furnace operation, the characteristics of reasonable blast furnace operation profile were analyzed and summarized to determine reasonable operating management plans for the blast furnace, which can enable the gas stability, make the gas form reasonable, maintain the normal operation of the furnace, ensure the long-term smooth stable of blast furnace and achieve the targets of blast furnace optimization.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: T8/5时间对X80管线钢热影响区组织和韧性的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Center Research Institute， Baosteel Group， Shanghai 201900， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of T8/5 time on microstructure and toughness in heat affected zone of X80 pipeline steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of T8/5 time on the coarse-grained microstructure and properties in heat affected zone of X80 pipeline steel was investigated by Gleeble 3500 thermal simulator with four T8/5 time ranged from 21 to 40 s. The Charpy V-Notch impact toughness on a coarse grained region was measured，and the microstructure and the fracture morphology after the impact toughness measurement was analyzed. The results showed that the coarse-grained heat affected zone with T8/5 of 21 s exhibits excellent and steady low temperature Charpy V-Notch impact toughness. The low temperature impact toughness decreases as the T8/5 time increases from 21 to 40 s，and the fracture mechanisms is transformed from ductile fracture to brittle rupture. The impact fracture model changes from a partly ductile fracture to a totally brittle fracture as well at －20 ℃. Prolonging the T8/5 time can promote the formation of long strip M/A constituents in the coarse-grained heat affected zone and the space between the bainitic laths.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 镁二次电池正极材料的研究进展
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LI Zhuo,NING Zhe,LIU Kun,WANG Yi-yong,HAN Lu,LU Jin-lin
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （School of Materials and Metallurgy， University of Science and Technology Liaoning， Anshan 114051， Liaoning， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research progress of cathode materials for rechargeable magnesium battery
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Rechargeable magnesium batteries （RMBs） using pure Mg or Mg alloy as the anode and some materials allowed Mg2+ to insert/extract as the cathode，have the characteristic of high energy density, environmentally friendly，low cost and safety of handling，and have good application prospects in the new clean energy sources, portable power sources and heavy load energy devices. However，so far there is no suitable cathode materials for RMBs because of the high charge density，strong polarization effect and very slow insertion/extraction speed of Mg ion，which is one of the primary factors for the slow application and development of RMBs. Recently，the reports about the cathode materials of RMBs increase significantly. The research and development of the cathode materials are a hot topic in RMBs field. Based on many reports，the structures of the cathode materials of RMBs were reviewed and classified from the perspective of the microstructure（the arrangement of atoms）characteristics，included layered structure，spinel structure，olivine structure，massive accumulation structure，etc. The status and issues of the cathode materials of RMBs were analyzed and discussed. The future development trend was prospected for providing some references for the relevant research about RMBs.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 基于超快冷的控轧控冷装备技术的发展
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WANG Guo-dong，WANG Zhao-dong,LIU Zhen-yu,WANG Bing-xing,YUAN Guo,TIAN Yong
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: State Key Laboratory of Rolling and Automation, Northeastern University, Shenyang 110819, Liaoning， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development of TMCP technology based on ultra-fast cooling
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Thermo-mechanical controlled processing (TMCP) is an important and effective rolling technology for development of steel product and improvement of mechanical properties, which consists of controlled hot rolling and controlled cooling. We elucidate here the advanced technology mechanism and development of the ultra-fast cooling (UFC) for plate and strip production, and emphasis on the technique characterization of the UFC equipment through domestic independent research and development. The thermo-mechanical controlled processing combined with ultrafast cooling is referred as New Generation (NG)-TMCP. The superior mechanical properties can be obtained by "temperature-deformation" coupling control technology during the rolling and cooling processing, which is a consequence of grain refinement strengthening, precipitation strengthening and phase transformation strengthening. The resultant theory and technology can achieve resource conservation, energy saving and emission reduction for green steel products in the manufacturing process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 神经网络在铁矿实验室安全状态评判中的应用
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Comprehensive Technical Service Center, Beilun Entry-Exit Inspection and Quarantine Bureau, Ningbo 315800, Zhejiang, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application of neural network in evaluation for safety status of iron ore laboratory
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Neural network is a kind of artificial intelligence. It is also one of important methods of big data application now. In order to evaluate iron ore laboratory safety, the mathematical model is established by use of neural network. Beginning with the safety recognition, the historical database for status of laboratory safety is established to be used as the neural network training samples. The situation of safety examination in the laboratory quality managing system is imported as the question and calculated by the model. Then the recognization of status of iron ore laboratory safety is obtained, which can achieve the same goal when using the traditional methods.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 高压水除鳞系统管路预充水方式的选择
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: National Enterprise Technology Center, Chongqing Pump Industry Co., Ltd., Chongqing 400033， China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Selection of pipe prefilling mode for high pressure water descaling system
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：For highpressure water descaling system in hotrolling strip line, in the operation of intermittent descaling, prefilling water to the pipe after the descaling valve is able to effectively prevent the loss of water in the pipelines resulting in forming the hollow pipe gathering air, eliminate the pipeline impact and vibration during descaling and prevent the damage to the pipeline equipment. There are two modes of water prefilling, high pressure and low pressure. The nonenergysaving descaling pump and accumulator mixed water supplying descaling system and the descaling pump direct water supplying descaling system should choose the highpressure prefilling mode, and then the increase of system energy is little and the system is safety and reliability. For the energysaving descaling pump and accumulator mixed water supplying descaling system, the lowpressure prefilling mode should be chosen, and the system energy consumption is lower, but the system safety is relatively poor.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development of bellless top and application characteristics of Qinye′s top equipment
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The bellless top is widely used in ironmaking blast furnace because of its superiority. It has been monopolized by the PW bellless top equipment in the world for half a century. To break the foreign patent monopoly and blockade of the technology and equipment of the bellless top, professor YAN Yunjin of the University of Science and Technology Beijing started to study the bellless top equipment since 1975, and completed our first set of experimental research and design of industrial furnace top equipment. And then he developed the "water cooling water sealed type" bellless top, which reached the international advanced level. At the same time, the "Sangshi" bellless top, developed by the group of professor SENG Quansong was also applied in small and medium blast furnaces in China. The breakthrough of the domestic bellless top equipment used in large blast furnace was the new equipment BFT（BCQS）developed by Qinye metallurgical research and development, which was used in the large blast furnace in Pohang, Vietnam and the static and Baosteel Zhansteel. It was indicated that the bellless top with our own intellectual property rights went to the world.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (Department of Engineering and Technology, Baosteel Engineering and Technology Group Co., Ltd., Shanghai 201900， China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Trial of soft reduction on bloom with convex roller
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Through the analysis of the existing research status of soft reduction and hard reduction and the situation of onsite production, the soft reduction with convex roller was proposed and then carried out on a bloom continuous casting machine. The trial results showed that center segregation could be reduced effectively by using the convex roller instead of the flat roller, the internal cracks were not formed and the shrinkage and loosening of macrostructure were not observed. Trial showed that the reduction force and torque could be reduced by 30% during soft reduction with the convex roller by replacing the flat roller, which could be the guideline for soft reduction revamping on bloom continuous casting machine with insufficient reduction capacity.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: GE Yao1,2, LI Meng1,2, WEI Han1,2, BI Chuan-guang3, LU Kai-cheng3, YU Yao-wei1,2
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Electromotive force method for measuring liquid level in a container
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Developments of blast furnace on a huge scale, longevity, and high efficiency, are the main trend of ironmaking. However, the hearth is the key section affecting the longevity of the blast furnace. In order to stably monitor of the internal conditions of the hearth in a long operation, metallurgical researchers have tried many different methods, such as thermocouple temperature measurement, cooling wall water temperature monitoring method, ultrasonic nondestructive testing technology, etc. But the above methods have various disadvantages. According to structural characteristics of blast furnace hearth, an experimental device and its EMF (electromotive force) measurement system were designed in a laboratory scale. The relationship of EMF signal and the liquid level, temperature, sensing material, and other parameters was obtained in laboratory experiments. Furthermore, the relationship between EMF signal and liquid level was validated by an on-site torpedo tank experiment in a steel plant. Among the six signal wires, molybdenum and silver coating with copper were both suitable for the signal wire.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Prediction of Chinese steel scrap resources quantity in 2020-2030
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The diagram of ferrous flow for a steel product life cycle and the calculation method of home scrap, new scrap and old scrap resources quantity were introduced, and the average service life of Chinese steel product in each period and the actual recovery rate of all kinds of scrap were discussed. On this basis, by means of the diagram of ferrous flow, the quantity of steel scrap resources was predicted in the case of slowly declining production of crude steel and then the future supply and demand situation of scrap resources was analyzed. Prediction and analysis results showed after 2025, the quantity of old scrap resources in China would soar, which can cause the oversupply of scrap resources. Therefore, Chinese steel scrap may have to export to overseas in about 2030. Finally, some policy suggestions on supporting the development of the scrap recycling industry, encouraging using more scrap in the iron and steel industry and outputting part of the iron and steel production capacity to the developing countries were put forward.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Innovation of "0123" safety management mode in new state
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Under the new historical conditions，it is necessary to innovate "0123" safety management mode based on the "0123" safety management mode of Anshan iron and steel corporation. And a new "0123" safety management mode is put forward. For the new management mode，no production safety accident is set as an expected goal，work safety standardization is served as the core，top responsibility system and one post bearing two duties are set as safeguard measure，improvement of whole staff safety quality，risk prevention and control overall process and performance assessment for total factors are served as essential measure. The core connotation of the new "0123" safety management mode is revealed by contrasting. Combining the practical work，the main content of the new "0123" management mode for work safety are expounded.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Causes analysis of oxide scale spallation of cold- rolled enamel steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The iron oxide densely adhered on the outer layer of the water heater tank used in damp environment can protect the steel substrate, and the discontinuous spallation of the outer oxide scale can easily cause the local corrosion and reduce the service life of the whole tank. The outer oxide scale of the water heater tank were analyzed. And the results showed that the inheritance of coarse on the surface of hot- rolled enamel steel plate resulted in the coarse on the cold- rolled enamel steel substrate surface. And when the local surface coarse burned at high temperature in moist atmosphere environment, in the oxide structure, the relatively loose FeO layer was thicker. And in the process of cooling, the crack growth on the stress caused the oxide scale spallation.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：With the increase of transportation pressure and the requirement for transportation efficiency of long-distance pipeline，X80 steel is gradually used on a large scale in the long-distance gas pipeline. As the chemical component is the steel "gene"，analyzing the evolution of chemical composition and determining the appropriate target value are important to solve manufacturing，welding and other problems. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Improvement on central segregation of pipeline steel X65MS
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to improve the central line segregation of pipeline steel X65MS, the causes, form and harm of central segregation of slab are analyzed and focus on how chemical composition, superheat and dynamic soft reduction effected central segregation of X65MS acid pipeline steel in actual production. The results show that the central segregation can be improved greatly by dynamic soft reduction, and can be improved further by reducing the phosphorus mass fraction in the steel, reducing the superheat of the molten steel and ensuring the accuracy of the casting machine.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of common faults of ladle covering#br#  equipment based on fault tree method
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Since the ladle capping equipment of Steelmaking Department of Shougang Jingtang was put into operation in 2015, mechanical and hydraulic faults have occurred from time to time, seriously restricting production. In order to realize the fast and smooth operation of ladle capping equipment, combined with the unique layout structure of ladle capping equipment, aiming at the problems existing in the operation of the equipment, the factors affecting the ladle capping equipment was quantitatively analyzed by using fault tree method, and the minimum cutset importance of each fault was calculated. It was obtained that the fault which had a greater impact on the ladle capping equipment was the deformation of the guide wheel bracket, bolting of the gear connection and production splashing. The actual case proved that the fault tree method had achieved good results in the maintenance of ladle capping equipment compared with the simple point inspection maintenance system in the past. It provided more scientific maintenance guidance for the daily maintenance of ladle capping equipment.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Microstructural control and process optimization of #br# 600 MPa grade low alloy high strength steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
 In order to develop and stabilize the technological parameters of 600 MPa low alloy high strength steel, continuous annealing experiments were carried out on the experimental steel by means of continuous annealing simulator. The effects of soaking temperature and overaging temperature on the microstructures and mechanical properties of the experimental steel were studied by means of scanning electron microscopy and tensile test machine. The results showed that with the increase of soaking temperature, the yield strength and tensile strength of the experimental steel decreased gradually, and the elongation increased gradually. With the increase of overaging temperature, the yield strength increased gradually, the tensile strength decreased gradually, and the elongation increased first and then decreased. The optimum mechanical properties were obtained when the steel was soaked at 820 ℃ and overaging at 390 ℃. The tensile strength was 627 MPa, the yield strength was 493 MPa and the total elongation was over 20%. In addition, a large number of nanoscale precipitates were observed by transmission electron microscopy (TEM), which contributed greatly to the strength improvement of the experimental steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: SUS436L超纯铁素体不锈钢夹杂物的形成机理
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WANG Jian-ze，XU Bin，PAN Ji-xiang，LI Hong-liang，LI Yu-feng
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Hongxing Iron and Steel Co.， Ltd.， Jiuquan Iron and Steel Group Corporation， Jiayuguan 735100， Gansu， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Formation mechanism of inclusions in SUS436L ultra-pure ferritic stainless steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The inclusions in the Ti-stabilized SUS436L ultra-pure ferritic stainless steel（FSS）plates were researched by means of the metallographic electron microscopy，the scanning electron microscope and the energy spectrum plane scanning. The formation mechanism of inclusions was analyzed based on the thermomechanical analysis. The results showed that the inclusions in the SUS436L stainless steel included pure TiN particles，composite inclusions of TiN contained MgO·Al2O3 spinel and the composite oxides of Al2O3-CaO-TiO2. When the mass fraction of N was 0.007 0% and the molten steel temperature was in the range of 1 600-1 650 ℃，the equilibrium Ti mass fraction was in the range of 0.23%-0.38%. And MgO·Al2O3 spinel was generated when the mass fraction of Mg was more than 0.000 8%，while MgO was generated when the content of Mg was more than 0.004 4% at the temperature of 1 600 ℃ and the Al mass fraction of 0.02%. On this condition，the low melting point 12CaO·7Al2O3 and 3CaO·Al2O3 were generated when the Ca mass fraction was 0.000 14%-0.000 36% and more than 0.000 36%，respectively，after the calcium treatment. These two kinds of inclusions could form the low melting point A12O3-CaO-TiO2 composite oxides after the Ti alloying process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 热连轧工作辊热平衡的优化研究与应用
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
（1. Institute of Metallurgical Processes, Shougang Research Institute of Technology， Beijing 100041， China
2. Hot-rolling Department, Shougang Qian′an Iron and Steel Co., Ltd.,　Qian′an 064404, Hebei, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and application of optimization of thermal balance of work roll in hot strip mill
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The thermal expansion of the work roll has great effect on the roll gap and strip shape. The correction forecast of the thermal expansion of the work roll is one of the difficulties to control the strip target profile during hot rolling. Aiming at the problems of the non-convergence of the thermal expansion and the work roll temperature in hot strip mill, the shape analysis and testing system, which was independent developed and in accordance with the real production line, was used to simulate and study the thermal crown two-level model. And an effective optimization method was proposed and implemented in this hot strip mill for improving the thermal balance stability. This optimization method could resolve the problem of the non-convergence of the thermal balance of this hot strip line, and eliminate the deviation between the work roll temperature values obtained by calculation and measurement, which could greatly improve both the model calculation precision and the strip crown control precision.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 摘要 针对热镀锌钢板表面亮点缺陷，采用金相显微镜、扫描电镜对其微观形貌及微区元素进行了研究分析。结果表明，亮点处存在明显的凹坑，常见的有圆形、椭圆形、长条形3种微观形貌，缺陷区域有铁元素富集现象，且抑制层已有部分破碎，较薄的抑制层促使脆性Fe- Zn相的产生，降低了缺陷区域锌层的附着性。结合现场具体情况，对来料因素、退火炉区域、锌锅区域、光整区域等进行了排查分析，发现亮点缺陷与锌渣在带钢表面的黏附与脱落有关，调整气刀工艺参数可使缺陷有所改善。
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis and control for bright spot defect on surface of hot galvanized steel sheet
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：By using the optical microscope and scanning electron microscope, the microelements and micromorphology of the surface bright spot of hot galvanized steel sheet were analyzed. The results showed that there were pits on the surface bright spot, which had three micromorphologies of the round, oval and elongated, and Fe element enrichment at the defect. Parts of the inhibition layer were broken, and the thinner inhibition layer promoted the generation of brittle Fe- Zn phase and decreased the adhesion of the zinc layer in the defect region. Combined with the specific circumstances, the material factors, annealing furnace, zinc pot area, and finishing area were investigated. The results showed that the spot defects were related to the adhesion and detachment of cadmia on the steel strip surface, and adjusting the technological parameters of the gas knife can improve the defect.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 李伟刚 赵云龙 王滕 周忠臣 钱鑫. 热镀锌钢板表面亮点缺陷成因分析与控制[J]. 中国冶金, 2018, 28(10): 46-50. LI Wei- gang，ZHAO Yun- long，WANG Teng，ZHOU Zhong- chen，QIAN Xin. Analysis and control for bright spot defect on surface of hot galvanized steel sheet. China Metallurgy, 2018, 28(10): 46-50.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and development of key process and equipmenttechnology of wire rod reducing and sizing mill
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The situation of high speed wire rod production and reducing and sizing technology at present is analyzed. The important issues related to the reducing and sizing process and equipment of wire rod are researched, including the roll pass design, micro- tension control, cooling control model, gear ratio and its changing technology, modal analysis etc. The SRSCD wire reducing and sizing mill and the water cooling temperature model system are developed. The wire rod can be rolled at 750 ℃ and the reduction can reach 40%- 45%, the precision of the wire rod can be up to ±0.1 mm. The high precision rolling verification of sizing mill was carried out on a stainless wire rod production line and the product precision reached the development target. The developed SRSCD mill can provide a good choice for the upgrading the production technology of the wire rod mill.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 基于MIND方法的钢铁企业能源系统集成优化
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHANG Qi,LI Yu,SHEN Yin-hua,XING Jin,CHANG Wei
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （SEPA Key Laboratory on Eco-Industry, Northeastern University, Shenyang 110819, Liaoning, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Integration and optimization of energy system based on MIND method in iron and steel enterprises
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The production system of iron and steel enterprise is complex, in which iron and carbonaceous material flow and energy flow intertwine forming a huge material and energy flow network, and energy systems involve many complex parameters facing greater difficulties to energy conservation. MIND method is an enterprise-oriented energy system modeling and optimization method, which is an energy-saving method from the point of view of the whole system. Based on the iron and steel enterprises material and energy flow data, the energy system optimization model was established through MIND method by CPLEX to solve the problem. The results were analyzed and showed that: ① the established energy system optimization model was suitable for the actual practice, and the error was less than 1.5%; ② the manufacturing optimization cases were obtained to reduce the energy consumption by improving the level of energy conversion, the main production capacity and the amount of materials of contained iron.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LI Peng,BI Xue- gong，ZHOU Jin- dong,PENG Wei
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Key Laboratory for Ferrous Metallurgy and Resources Utilization of Ministry of Education, Wuhan University of Science and Technology, Wuhan 430081, Hubei, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Concept and practice of low- cost and high- efficiency blast furnace expert system development
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In the present time, the steel industry of China is facing difficult problems, to maintain the stability and security of blast furnace operation while maintain or even decrease coke rate and fuel rate of ironmaking with a higher consumption of low- price iron ores. Devoting great efforts to the development and application of blast furnace expert systems could help the iron and steel enterprises in solving these difficulties. The concept of development of blast furnace expert systems that suitable to the national conditions of China and have lower cost and higher efficiency was proposed, relying on the domestic power, taking precise supervision and prediction of blast furnace heat and smooth running situation, the most concern of enterprises, as the kernel function and running with advisory mode, primarily applying the fuzzy inference technique to build mathematical models, having reasonable self- learning functions, and realizing long- term regular execution by means of integration with networking techniques such as MES and so on. This concept has been successfully applied to the intelligent expert system of Shaogang 3200 m3 No. 8 BF for the last more than 2 years. This expert system has been working regularly and played an important role in stabilizing furnace heat, reducing furnace irregularities, increasing plant availability, decreasing fuel rate, enlarging PCI rate and improving pig iron production.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 真空自耗冶炼过程数值仿真研究进展
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: QU Jing-long1,2, YANG Shu-feng3, CHEN Zheng-yang1,2,4, DU Jin-hui1,2, BI Zhong-nan2,4, KONG Hao-hao3
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research progress in numerical simulation of vacuum arc remelting process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：To study the vacuum arc remelting process by means of computer simulation technology has gradually grown into a new trend. This method not only helps to ascertain the influences and mechanism of various technological parameters on the vacuum arc remelting process, but also can effectively predict the stability of the remelting process as well as the metallurgical quality of the ingot. Hence, the development history and the scientific research findings of the numerical simulation of the vacuum arc remelting process in the past 30 years were briefly introduced. Meanwhile, the research progress and the application status of the vacuum arc remelting model, the metal molten pool model and the microstructure model were reviewed in detail by taking the smelting process simulation, the macroscale simulation and the micro-scale simulation as the breakthrough point. Finally, a new development direction was proposed for the further development and application of numerical simulation of the vacuum arc remelting process in China.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 曲敬龙, 杨树峰, 陈正阳, 杜金辉, 毕中南, 孔豪豪. 真空自耗冶炼过程数值仿真研究进展[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(1): 1-9. QU Jing-long, YANG Shu-feng, CHEN Zheng-yang, DU Jin-hui, BI Zhong-nan, KONG Hao-hao. Research progress in numerical simulation of vacuum arc remelting process[J]. China Metallurgy, 2020, 30(1): 1-9.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Heterogeneous nucleation grain refinement methods for magnesium alloy
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The methods of heterogeneous nucleation refinement widely used for grain refinement of magnesium alloy and the grain refinement mechanism were summarized. The edge- to- edge matching （E2EM） model and the first- principle calculation method can determine the potential heterogeneous nucleation core of magnesium alloy, which are effective methods to study the refinement of heterogeneous nucleation grains in recent years. The addition of solute elements and intermediate alloys to magnesium alloys has become a widely used refinement technique in industrial production. To better understand the microscopic mechanism of the grain refinement, the first- principle calculation based on the density functional theory （DFT） can not only accurately provide the information of the binding of atoms on the interface but also quantitatively predict the heterogeneous nucleation in the alloys during solidification and the interfacial energy and the adhesion work of the interface of the nucleus and the primary phase. It can also provide a theoretical basis for the development of the grain refining agent and play a more and more important role in the grain refinement of magnesium alloy.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 刘瑞，徐瑞. 镁合金晶粒异质形核的细化方法[J]. 中国冶金, 2017, 27(8): 6-10. LIU Rui,XU Rui. Heterogeneous nucleation grain refinement methods for magnesium alloy. China Metallurgy, 2017, 27(8): 6-10.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of low top gas temperature of small BF
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Top gas temperature of No.9 BF in Shagang，whose volume is 520m3，was 130℃ in average and 102℃ in minimum in 2014. Reasonable range of top gas temperature of BF to apply bag filter dedusting is between 120℃ and 250℃. Thus，top gas temperature of No.9 BF is a little low. According to analysis，blast temperature and fuel rate have obvious influences on top gas temperature under current operating conditions. Thermal load has large effect on top gas temperature，improving central gas flow and suppressing peripheral gas flow properly were helpful for decreasing thermal load and increasing top gas temperature. The charging matrix of No.9 BF leads to size segregation，and it was not good for developing central gas flow. Increasing coke particles larger than 40mm，decreasing coke CRI and increasing nut coke rate were useful for developing central gas flow and increasing top gas temperature.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Improvement of gas automatic emission ignition on No.5 and No.6 coke oven in Baotou Steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the current status of No.5 and No.6 Baotou steel coke oven which was put into operation in 90’s of the last century，the transformation is to be done in automatic ignition for raw gas system under the non-stop state of coke oven based on the existing conditions of the coal gas export system of coke oven and retaining the original equipment as far as possible. The original design of the diffusing tower is modified，and the ignition，ignition valve，bleeding valve，fire burning value and fire trench valve are automatic controlled by the collector pressure as the condition. It can ensure the realization of automatic ignition in coke oven gas derived fault，which can avoid the air pollution caused by the direct emission of waste gas.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: MgO对烧结矿CaO-Fe2O3系初期液相生成的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijng 100083, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of MgO on formation of CaOFe2O3 based initial liquid phase in iron ore sinter
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the effect of MgO on the formation of CaOFe2O3based initial melt and the reaction mechanism during the sintering process, the variations of liquid phase formation in samples with different MgO content were investigated by DSC during the heating process. In addition, the effect of MgO on the mineral composition before forming the liquid phase was studied by XRD. The results showed that the increase of MgO content decreased the formation of the initial liquid phase. However, the formation temperature of the liquid phase did not change significantly. There were two mechanisms for MgO addition to inhibiting the formation of the initial liquid phase. One was the reaction of MgO with Fe2O3 to produce magnetite solid solution. The other one was decomposition of CaFe2O4 caused by the addition of MgO. These two mechanisms relatively increased the CaO content and promoted the formation of Ca2Fe2O5 and magnetite solid solution, which were both highmelting temperature minerals, and led to the decrease of the liquid phase. The study of the effect of MgO on the formation of the initial liquid phase was expected to provide a theoretical basis for appropriately adding Mgbearing flux during iron ore sintering process.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 杨楠，郭兴敏. MgO对烧结矿CaO-Fe2O3系初期液相生成的影响[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(5): 22-27. YANG Nan,GUO Xingmin. Effect of MgO on formation of CaOFe2O3 based initial liquid phase in iron ore sinter[J]. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(5): 22-27.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: SUN Min- min,NING Xiao- jun,ZHANG Jian- liang,LI Ke- jiang，WANG Guang- wei,WANG Hai- yang

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research status and progress of energy saving and emission reduction technology for ironmaking
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：With the advancement of science and technology, modern blast furnace technology has been fully developed. However, from the perspective of resources, energy and environment, blast furnace ironmaking system is still facing severe pressure. Sintering, coking, blast furnace energy consumption and pollution are not optimistic. The important methods of energy saving and emission reduction involved iron raw material, fuel and blast furnace system in domestic and foreign ironmaking system are introduced, such as sinter flue gas desulfurization, CDQ technology, TRT power generation technology, oxygen blast furnace- gas self recycling technology and comprehensive utilization of slag high quality materials. Their main role in energy saving and emission reduction of ironmaking system are also given. Through this research, the development direction of energy saving and emission reduction in BF are proposed.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 磁处理对循环冷却水硬度的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHANG En- yu,YAO Xia- yan,LU Xing- wu,CHENG Liang,CUI Hai- rui
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Key Laboratory of New Process for Non- ferrous Metal Smelting and Rare Metal High Utilization Efficiency in Gansu Province, Northwest Research Institute of Mining and Metallurgy, Baiyin 730900, Gansu, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of magnetic treatment on hardness of circulating cooling water
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Orthogonal tests were carried out on four factors, including magnetic field strength, concentration of aqueous solution, flow velocity and water temperature, and the influence of magnetic treatment conditions on the hardness of circulating cooling water was investigated. The test results showed that according to their influence degree, the optimum treatment conditions were the ion concentration of 900 mg/L, the flow rate of 0.8 m/s, the magnetic field strength of 0.5 T and the temperature of 30 ℃ in sequence. Under this condition, the hardness value reached 2 390 mg/L. Then when the the other treatment conditions were optimum, XRD and SEM were used to analyze the fouling samples with the ion concentration of 900 mg/L and the ion concentration of 300 mg/L. It is found that the greater the ion concentration, the more proportion of aragonite and vaterite structure of calcium carbonate. Correspondingly, the proportion of calcium carbonate in calcite structure was decreasing, and its surface morphology was relatively loose and easy to rinse.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 不同质量分数MgO对球团质量的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: SUN Jian-ning1,2, LIU Xiao-jie1,2, YAN Zhao-zhao1,2, LU Jian-guang3, Lü Qing1,2
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of different mass fractions of MgO on quality of pellet
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Through the ore powder used in the existing production of a pellet plant, the pellets with different MgO mass fraction were obtained by ore blending. A series of experimental schemes and testing methods were used to find out the MgO mass fraction of pellets under the optimal compressive strength and the metallurgical properties. And the law of the compressive strength and metallurgical properties of the pellets with different MgO mass fraction was also studied. The test results showed that the compressive strength of pellets produced with the MgO mass fraction of 0.5% was the strongest, which decreased with the increase of MgO mass fraction. When the mass fraction of MgO was 0.5%, the degree of reduction was the highest, Reaching 75.59%. And with the increase of MgO mass fraction, the reduction degree of pellets decreased. When the MgO mass fraction was 1%, the low-temperature reduction pulverization rate was the largest. With the increase of MgO mass fraction, the low-temperature reduction pulverization rate of pellets increased first and then decreased. When the MgO mass fraction was 1%, the softening start temperature was the highest, the droplet temperature range was the narrowest, and the droplets were the best. With the increase of MgO mass fraction, the softening start temperature of the pellets rose first and then decreased, and the droplet temperature range was first narrowed and then widened.

2. Manufacturing Department， Baosteel Zhanjiang Iron and Steel Co.， Ltd., Zhanjiang 524072， Guangdong, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Modern design of inspection and analysis facility in long process iron and steel enterprises
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The inspection and analysis system is very important for the incoming material inspection, the intermediate product detection and the factory product quality determination in iron and steel enterprises. The setup principle, composition and developing trend of the inspection and analysis system for iron and steel enterprises are emphasized. Centralization, intellectualization and informatization are the features of the inspection and analysis system for modern iron and steel enterprises. The construction and design concept of the raw material sampling system, the raw material analysis center, the metallurgical analysis center and the rolling inspection center are discussed in detail. With the development of intelligent manufacturing, the automatic intelligent detection system, the information process and the laboratory management automation have become an inevitable trend in the design of the inspection and analysis system for iron and steel enterprises.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 加快钢包周转六西格玛方法实践
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Steelmaking Department， Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co.， Ltd.， Tangshan 063200， Hebei， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Practice of accelerating ladle turnaround based on six sigma method
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Shougang Jingtang steel plant` committed to create the efficient low-cost clean steel production platform. The three basic ideas，namely，high efficiency，low cost and clean steel were not independent and disconnected， but interdependence and common development. Based on the actual conditions of the steel plant in Jingtang，the ladle turnaround time was improved by using the six sigma method. The study showed that by compressing the production rhythm，and at the same time not sampling and measuring the temperature of some steel grades in the period of the convertor tapping to refining，the speed of logistics was improved，and the ladle turnaround cycle was shortened by 11.7 min. And the time difference between the converter tapping and cast start reduced from 80 to 75 min. In the current，the shift production was 30 furnaces，the ladle turnaround time was 201.4 min，and the appropriate ladle turnaround volume was 13. Through the optimization of RH alloying process，and the strict control of the ladle turnaround volume（no more than 13），the time difference between the converter tapping and cast start reduced from 75 to 70 min.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 马强，李勤，黄财德，袁天祥. 加快钢包周转六西格玛方法实践[J]. 中国冶金, 2017, 27(7): 39-44. MA Qiang，LI Qin，HUANG Cai-de，YUAN Tian-xiang. Practice of accelerating ladle turnaround based on six sigma method. China Metallurgy, 2017, 27(7): 39-44.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Structure analysis and control of hydraulic slag-raking machine
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to against the bad working condition and the work requirements, the tipping, the slag skimming and the hydraulic control of the hydraulic slag-raking machine were analyzed and inquired. And based on the analysis of the advantages and disadvantages of the hydraulic slag-raking machine in the actual use, the hydraulic slag-raking machine structure and control system were designed, which solved the synchronization problem of tipping of the slag-raking machine, improved the stability, the bearing capacity and the applicable scope of the slag-raking machine, reduced the accidents caused by the soot pollution, thermal deformation and impact load of the slag-raking machine, and achieved the precise control of the slag-raking machine.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:

2.College of Mathematics, Lanzhou City University, Lanzhou 730070, Gansu， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Design of automatic batching control system for ore furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：For the ore furnace batching system, the technological process is complex and the requirement for reliability and performanceprice ratio was very critical. By using the Modbus communication and industrial Ethernet technology, the overall architecture of network control layer, which was composed of the upper monitoring layer, the hypogyny control layer and the field device layer, was constructed, and the stable, efficient and economical distributed control system, which taking S71200 PLC as the core, was designed. Through the reasonable hardware, software and interface design, the contradiction between production efficiency and accuracy of ingredients was effectively solved, which achieved the weighing, batching automation. Since the system came into service, it had the characteristics of the stable performance, reliable work, and high performanceprice ratio, which can satisfy the actual production needs and achieve the desired design goals.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Process practice of super duplex stainless steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The production process of super duplex stainless steel S32760 is 20 t EAFAODLF30 cm mold casting. As the feature of the S32760 composition design is high Cr, low P, low S and ultra- low carbon, the peroxidative degree of steel is serious in the later period of smelting. In order to improve the purity of molten steel and reduce the oxygen mass fraction in steel, the Al- Si- Ca composite deoxidation was adopted, which effectively controlled the gas and inclusions in steel and improved the purity of molten steel. The sulfur and oxygen mass fraction in the finished steel were stably controlled less than 0.002% and 0.004%, respectively.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 300 t RH炉化学升温工艺对IF钢洁净度的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: No.4 Steelmaking and Rolling General Plant, Ma′anshan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Ma′anshan 243011, Anhui, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of chemical heating process of 300 t RH furnace on IF steel cleanliness
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the influence of RH furnace chemical heating process on the cleanliness of IF steel. For the different stages of RH for chemical heating up, a systematic analysis of the three indexes, including the total oxygen of slab, number density distribution of inclusions and inclusions size was made to have a quantitative evaluation of the impact of RH chemical heating node and temperature on steel cleanliness. The results showed that when the RH was chemical heating up, the cleanliness of the steel was worse, and the total oxygen of the billet was increased by 0.000 8%- 0.001 3%. Under the condition of different heating points at the same temperature, in the case of RH temperature of 32- 36 ℃, the cluster inclusion size of 20 μm for scheme 4, was less than that of 30 μm for scheme 5. Therefore, adopting the heating process of "pre- decarbonization and terminal decarbonization", the inclusion size was less than that of "terminal decarburizing" heating process. In the production practice, if the molten steel entered the RH with low temperature, and the RH heating operation was unavoidable, the "pre- decarbonization and terminal decarbonization" heating process should be adopted to reduce the influence of RH heating operation on the cleanliness of molten steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Optimization design of equipment reform of pickling process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Pickling is an important process in the production of cold- rolled strip steel, which can remove the scale of hot rolled plate effectively. With the development of the pickling process and equipment technology, new technologies and design programs are appeared, and the domestic pickling unit is close to saturation. Thus, the renovation project will become the mainstream. According to the corrosion of the aqueduct body, the PP materials is used to make the tank. Based on experiences of the renovation projects of several pickling lines projects in Baosteel, aiming at the acid mist and the leaking acid of wringer roll′s window, the separate water seal is applied combining with the optimization of tank material, and the one- piece side sliding door is used for the wringer roll′s window, which can well solve the problem of the acid mist and the leaking acid and have certain reference significance for the renovation projects in the future.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Melting- separation for red mud pre- reduced pellets
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to realize the comprehensive utilization of red mud resources with high added value, the high temperature simulation experiment was carried out to study the reduction roasting and melting process of red mud pellets containing carbon. Carbon- bearing pellets of red mud were reduced and roasted at 1 200 ℃. Combined with the phase diagram analysis, a certain proportion of CaO and Al2O3 were added to the pulverized roasting pellets for the tempering and melting- separation. The results showed that the metallization rate of metalized pellets were more than 91.3% after the reduction of 12 min at 1 200 ℃, the reduction effect was good. After adding the appropriate amount of CaO and Al2O3, the pellets were melted at 1 450 ℃, which can achieve the effective separation of slag and iron. The metal iron yield can reach more than 90%, and the quality of the molten iron met the requirements of steelmaking. The w(TFe) in molten slag can be less than 0.5%. The main phase of the slag was 12CaO·7Al2O3, CaTiO3 and 2CaO·Al2O3·SiO2. According to the test results of melting point, the melting performance satisfied the desulfurization conditions of molten steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of influence factors of porosity of sintered bonding phase in iron ore
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract： In order to clarify the influence factors of the pore characteristics of the sintered bonded phase, the porosity of the sintered bonded phase was measured by mineral phase microscopy, and the main factors affecting the porosity of the bonded phase were studied by visual microsintering method, and then the influence law of the porosity on the strength of the bonded phase itself was explored. The results showed that the porosities of ironbearing minerals from large to small were magnetite ＞ limonite ＞ hematite. When the ratio of fixed CaO was 15%, the porosity first increased and then decreased with the increase of SiO2 content, and decreased as the Al2O3 content increased. And the strength of the bonding phase decreased with increasing the porosity.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of switching time on temperature distribution #br# in regenerator of reheating furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Regenerative reheating furnaces employing hightemperature air combustion technology are widely applied in the iron and steel industry. Regenerator is the key component of a regenerative reheating furnace, with the switching time as its crucial operational parameter. To discuss the effect of the switching time on the temperature distribution in the regenerator, an experimental regenerator apparatus was established with reheating furnace No.1 of Ansteel continuous rolling sector as the prototype. The experimental apparatus was filled with 10 layers of honeycomb ceramic regenerative units. The effects of the switching time on the temperature profile in the regenerator and the temperature gradient along the regenerator were investigated. Results showed a periodic temperature change of the regenerator. With increasing the switching time, the average temperature of the regenerator first decreased and then increased, while the average temperature gradient along the regenerator first increased and then decreased. The best switching time of the experimental furnace was 70 s, with the corresponding thermal recovery efficiency, temperature efficiency and overall heat transfer coefficient were 81.6%, 91.4 and 18.3 W/(m2·℃), respectively.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The shortcomings of the automation cooling system (SMS- ACC) after rolling for the 3 500 mm heavy plate in Hansteel was analyzed. Then the program was redeveloped on the basis of the analysis. It is added a control system of temperature uniformity for the cooling system after rolling including a series of functions such as the head and tail shade function, edge shade function, and roller micro accelerating function. The application of the system in the production can increase the plate vertical and horizontal temperature uniformity, and effectively improve the plate shape and property uniformity.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of incoming section on cold rolling strip tension stress and delivery section
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to reduce the cold rolled strip transverse thickness difference，tight-edge process is usually applied. It is easy to cause the edge crack or strip breakage due to great tension stress state in the strip edge. A simple description method of incoming cross-section shape was put forward. The influence of two key parameters of the incoming section，which were taken as the input parameters，on outlet strip′s tension and section shape was analyzed by the strip shape simulation software. Simulation results showed that the decrease of the hot rolled strip crown C15 and C40 and the improvement of the strip edge-drop，can not only be good for reducing the strip transverse thickness difference，but also improve the strip edge residual tensile stress，which can decrease the edge stress of cold rolled strip and be advantageous to avoid the occurrence of the strip edge crack and broken in the first pass.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the characteristics of metallurgical equipment，the double line grease lubrication system, oil gas lubrication system and intelligent lubrication commonly used in the project were specifically introduced and analyzed. Based on the investigation of the application of the lubrication system in several large steel plants and the designing experience about the lubrication system，the system were compared not only from the theory but also the aspect of engineering，including designing，price and operating effect，which provided the theoretical basis and reference for the selection of the system when building the large steel plant in the future.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the characteristic of data and requirement of process control system for tandem cold rolling, data structure was designed on the basis of the joint application of Oracle 10g and Microsoft Visual Studio 2010. To achieve the data- caching and data reliability, a new data buffer mechanism for database was put forward, the method of accessing Oracle database through OO4O was established, and meanwhile, the method of creating shared memory through template class was also achieved. After that, actual data gathering functions by event, timer and message were provided, and then database manipulation was realized through Oracle database triggers. Ultimately, the database of control system for tandem cold rolling process was developed, and it was put into practical production. The application results showed that owing to the database system which is applicable for industrial production, the real- time for online database could be effectively guaranteed, the programming could also be greatly simplified, and then the efficiency of process control system could be improved.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Development of self- adaption function for control system for tandem cold rolling process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the characteristic and requirement of models setup and calculation for tandem cold rolling, calculation models of self- adaption coefficients for rolling force, forward slip, torque and gap were established in succession, and meanwhile, feedback calculation models of friction coefficients and deformation resistance during the tandem cold rolling process were put forward, which improved and optimized the models on rolling parameters in tandem cold rolling process. After that, to realize the acquisition and processing of actual data, three data collection methods were designed which were based on event, timer and message, respectively. Ultimately, the self- adaption function for the control of tandem cold rolling process was developed, and it was put into practical production. The application results showed that owing to the self- adaption function which is applicable for industrial production, the fast pacing of models setup and calculation online could be effectively guaranteed, the computational accuracy of original models could also be greatly increased, and then the operation efficiency and stability of process control system could be improved.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The working principle of ladle slide plate was described. From the view of practical application, the performance requirements of steelmaking process for ladle slide and the various factors affecting the use of ladle skateboard were analyzed. The damage mechanism of skateboards brick was described, and the improvement and optimization can be conducted from the raw materials and material property of the skateboard brick and the actual operation. And the relevant technical operating essentials were put forward. The results showed that the skateboard brick had been raised from 3 heats to 4 heats, which could lay a theoretical foundation for the further stabilization and improvement of skateboard life in the future.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Soft- melting property of dust briquettes based on OxyCup shaft furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to make the OxyCup shaft furnace process effectively treat iron dust in steel companies, by changing the reduction atmosphere, the addition way of silica and load, the soft- melting property of dust briquettes in OxyCup shaft furnace was studied. Results showed that when the value of φ(CO2)/(φ(CO)＋φ(CO2)) was 0, the maximum pressure gradient of dust briquettes was about 587 Pa, with the softening temperature of 900- 1 030 ℃, and the dropping temperature was 1 191- 1 203 ℃. At the same time, there was no obvious cohesive zone. With the increase of CO2 volume percentage, the softening temperature of the dust briquettes decreased, the dropping temperature rapidly increased. When the value of φ(CO2)/(φ(CO)＋φ(CO2)) was 1, the softening temperature of the dust briquettes was 971- 977 ℃, and the dropping temperature was 985- 1 192 ℃, and there was a thick cohesive zone. Compared with the dust- silica briquettes, the maximum pressure gradient was lower, and the temperature range of cohesive zone was narrower by mixing or layering silica. Under different loading conditions, the change rule of pressure gradient was similar, the maximum pressure gradient was small, and the loading had little influence on the soft- melting property of dust briquettes.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the lateral roll mark defect after roll changing on 6- H CVC temper mill, the sample plate of lateral roll mark was tested and analyzed by the 3D surface profiler. The differences in the representation parameters of the defect area and the normal area were obtained. The distribution of the contact pressure between the rolls was studied, and then the generation mechanism of lateral roll mark was found out. On this basis, the control measures for the optimization of CVC roll profile and roll gap closing speed were put forward. The measures were used in the industrial production, and the lateral roll printing defect was eliminated.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis on key points of cost decreasing and efficiency increasing of electric arc furnace steelmaking in China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The output of the electric arc furnace steelmaking was discussed, as well as the equipment and the main consumption index. Some characteristics were summarized, including that the electric arc furnace steelmaking ratio of China was lower than the world average level, the electric arc furnace has made much progress in becoming largesized, and the decreasing tendency about the unit scrap consumption of electric arc furnace was reversed. And, the key points of cost decreasing and efficiency increasing of the electric arc furnace steelmaking were put forward on multidimension, namely electricity price reform, optimization of the furnace burden structure, furnace type selection, energysaving process, greenization and intellectualization, management innovation, standardization system construction and so on. Meanwhile, the viewpoint that the electric arc furnace steelmaking was facing development opportunities was put forward, and increasing investment in technology R&D and application continuously and working together to realize the sustainable development of the electric furnace steelmaking were proposed.
