http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The feasibility of the thermodynamics and kinetics of SiC deoxygenation was theoretically analyzed. Combined with the existing production conditions, No.80 SiC was used in the deoxidation alloying process instead of No.50 SiC in steel mills, and at the same time, the structure and quantity of other alloys were adjusted, the industrial tests were carried out. The production practice showed that compared with the previous deoxidation alloying process, after the adjustment the alloy elements yield, casting qualified rate and internal control rate were increased, the steel mechanical properties were improved, and the production cost of two specifications of HRB400E steel can reduce 1.75 yuan per ton and 0.62 yuan per ton, respectively.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 卷取温度对连退低碳钢带性能的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LI Jianying,YAO Yongchuang,SUN Lu,MA Degang,LIU Chunyu
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (Business Division of High Strength Automotive Strip， Tangshan Iron and Steel Group Co., Ltd., Tangshan 063016, Hebei, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of coiling temperature on properties of low carbon steel produced by continuous annealing line
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the influence of the coiling temperature in the hot rolling process on the micro performance of the continuous product, the effect of coiling temperature on the microstructure and mechanical properties of continuously annealed lowcarbon steel was investigated by means of the unidirectional tensile test, OM and XRD methods. The results showed that as the coiling temperature increased from 670 to 750 ℃, the plastic strain ratio and relative cone cup value increased to 2.10 and 0.25, respectively, and the stamping properties of the researched material were comparable to that treated by the batch type annealing process. According to analysis, carbon was fully diffused to form more ferrite matrix under high temperature coiling conditions, which improved the purity of ferrite matrix and the formation of stronger {111} recrystallization texture during continuous annealing.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 氨合成塔外壳用特厚电渣板的研制开发
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LI Yangbing1,LI Jie2,LONG Jie1,YUAN Jincheng1,WU Yanyang1,LIU Fufang3
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and development of extra thick electroslag #br# plate for ammonia converter shell
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Aiming at the problems of the large increase of weight and thickness of shell steel for ammonia synthesis tower, as well as the increasingly stringent technical requirements, the extrathick electroslag plate for the shell of large ammonia synthesis tower was successfully developed in Wugang based on the safe, stable and efficient design of innovative components for the key chemical equipment operation and combined with the equipment level of current production line by creatively adopting electroslag production process. The results showed that the steel was pure, whose composition was homogeneous and structure was compact and fine, and had low carbon equivalent, excellent tensile properties at room temperature, high temperature and good impact properties at low temperature. The internal and external quality of steel was excellent. The thickness of the steel plate was 177 mm, the weight of the finished product was 37.9 t. The thickness and weight of steel plate were the only one in China. The technical requirement was close to the limit level of this kind of steel at the present stage. The steel plate was used for the design and manufacture of the large ammonia converter in a domestic chemical project instead of the imported steel plate.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 宝钢湛江钢铁炼钢区域金属平衡管理分析
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (Manufacture Management Department, Baoshan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Shanghai 200941, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of metal balance management in steelmaking area of Baosteel Zhanjiang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Through combing the metal balance logistics in steelmaking area of Baosteel Zhanjiang Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., the relationship of metal logistics was rationalized. According to the principle of mass conservation, the metal balance profit and loss statement of the steelmaking area is established to achieve the metal balance management in the steelmaking area and analyze the metal profit and loss. The metal balance profit and loss statement reflects the utilization degree of metal resources, metal flow direction and metal loss in the production process. It plays a guiding role in drawing up production plan, improving process technology and operation, and estimating production cost. Through the metal balance report forms, the weakness in production management can be discovered in time, thereby further optimizing the process, clarifying the direction and extent of improvement, effectively improving the recovery and utilization of metal resources in the factory, and maximizing the benefits of the company.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 陈晓波，张振宇. 宝钢湛江钢铁炼钢区域金属平衡管理分析[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(2): 72-77. CHEN Xiaobo,ZHANG Zhenyu. Analysis of metal balance management in steelmaking area of Baosteel Zhanjiang. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(2): 72-77.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: TiO2对含钛高炉初渣物相转变与黏度的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (1. Institute of Ironmaking and Steelmaking Technology, Research Institute of Technology, Shougang Group Corporation, Beijing 100043, China;2. Beijing Key Laboratory of Green Recyclable Process for Iron and Steel Production Technology, Beijing 100043, China;3. School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 摘要 为了研究含钛高炉初渣的形成过程和各种物相成分相互作用、迁移重组的过程，明晰TiO2对高炉初渣形成的影响规律，利用FactSage热力学软件及旋转柱体式黏度仪研究了TiO2质量分数对高炉初渣熔化温度、物相转变行为以及初渣黏度的影响。结果表明，随着初渣中TiO2质量分数的增加，含钛高炉初渣熔化温度升高，TiO2质量分数从4%增加到16%，其熔化温度从1 360升高到1 410 ℃，增加了50 ℃；含钛高炉初渣中TiO2质量分数对初渣中各种物相组成的转变和比例都有较大的影响，随着TiO2质量分数的增加，初渣固液相共存的温度区间变大，使高炉软融带变宽；TiO2对含钛高炉初渣黏度的影响相对较为复杂，当TiO2质量分数为4%～8%时，含钛高炉初渣黏度温度曲线呈现出“碱性渣”的形态；当TiO2质量分数为16%时，含钛高炉初渣黏度温度曲线呈现出“酸性渣”的形态。
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of TiO2 on phase transition and viscosity of Tibearing primary slag in blast furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Effect of TiO2 on the formation of blast furnace slag was clarified in order to study the formation process of the primary slag containing titanium in blast furnace, the interaction, migration and recombination of various phase components of Tibearing primary slag in blast furnace. FactSage thermodynamics software and rotating cylinder viscometer were applied to study the effect of TiO2 mass fraction on melting temperature, phase transition and viscosity of the primary slag in blast furnace. The results showed that with the increase of TiO2 mass fraction in primary slag (from 4% to 16%), the melting temperature increased from 1 360 to 1 410 ℃, increased by 50 ℃. The mass fraction of TiO2 in the Tibearing primary slag in blast furnace had a great influence on the transformation and proportion of all kinds of phase compositions in the primary slag. The temperature range of the solidliquid phase coexistence of the primary slag became larger with the increase of TiO2 mass fraction, which would widen the soft zone of blast furnace. The effect of TiO2 mass fraction on the primary slag viscosity was complex. When TiO2 mass fraction was in the range of 4%8%, the viscositytemperature curve presented as "alkaline slag". When TiO2 mass fraction was 16%, the viscositytemperature curve of the primary slag appeared as "acidic slag".
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 张亚鹏，赵志星，刘征建，潘文. TiO2对含钛高炉初渣物相转变与黏度的影响[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(4): 6-11. ZHANG Yapeng，ZHAO Zhixing，LIU Zhengjian，PAN Wen. Effect of TiO2 on phase transition and viscosity of Tibearing primary slag in blast furnace. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(4): 6-11.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
(School of Electromechanical and Automotive Engineering, Changzhou Vocational Institute of
Engineering, Changzhou 213164, Jiangsu, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Microstructure and properties of liquid phase diffusion welding #br# joint of nickelbased high temperature alloy
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The nickelbased high temperature alloy GH4413 has excellent endurance strength and creep resistance at high temperature, and it is widely used in aviation engines and many industrial turbines. Liquid phase diffusion welding was applied on GH4413 alloy and BNi2 was used as filler material. The microstructure, composition distribution and microhardness of the welding joints were researched under different welding parameters when the welding temperature was 1 030 and 1 080 ℃, and heat preservation time was 30 and 60 min, respectively. The results of scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and energy spectrum analysis showed when the welding temperature was 1 080 ℃ and the heat preservation time was 60 min, the microstructure of brazing seam formed the solid solution with good performance. And as increasing the welding temperature and heat preservation time, the width of brazing seam increased and the diffusion depth of elements of solder to the base metal increased gradually, and intermetallic compounds were formed near the seam section of the parent metal.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 含铌钢中铌的应变诱导析出行为
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Test Center of Research Institute of Technology， Shougang Group Corporation, Beijing 100043, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Straininduced precipitation behavior of Nb in steel containing Nb
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract： The behavior of the straininduced precipitation of Nb in steel containing Nb was studied by means of thermal simulation tester, physicalchemical phase analysis and transmission electron microscopy(TEM), and the relationship between the straininduced precipitation and the total precipitation was discussed. The results showed that when the other conditions were unchanged, the content of the precipitated phase decreased with the increase of the deformation temperature, and increased with the relaxation time. In addition, the straininduced precipitation was not the total amount of precipitation. In order to accurately calculate and analyze the straininduced precipitation, it was necessary to deduct the precipitation caused by the temperature change from the total amount of precipitation, so that the straininduced precipitation law was more realistic.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 复吹转炉顶吹枪位与非均衡底吹搅拌的水模拟
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (Metallurgical Technology Institute， Central Iron and Steel Research Institute， Beijing 100081， China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Water simulation of combined blowing converter for#br# top lance level and non equilibrium bottom blowing stirring
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
In order to optimize the metallurgical effect of 120 t combined blowing converter, the effects of bottom blowing intensity, top lance level, bottom blowing arrangement mode and flow distribution ratio on the mass transfer between slag and molten steel and the mixing time of bath were studied by water model experiments. The results showed that the mass transfer coefficient at low top lance level was larger than that at high top lance level with the same bottom blowing parameters, and the mass transfer coefficient increased first and then decreased with increasing the flow distribution ratio. Under the same condition of top lance level, the mass transfer effect of interval arrangement mode was better than that of continuous arrangement mode. As flow distribution ratio increased, the trends of mixing time of high and low lance level were approximately opposite. At high top lance level, the mixing time of continuous arrangement mode was generally less than that of interval arrangement mode, and at low top lance level, the mixing time of continuous arrangement mode was generally greater than that of interval arrangement mode. Compared with the traditional bottom blowing mode, the reasonable matching of top lance level, bottom blowing arrangement mode and flow distribution ratio made the mass transfer coefficient increased by 30%125% and the mixing time decreased by 8.6%51.5%.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 蔡俊，曾加庆，梁强. 复吹转炉顶吹枪位与非均衡底吹搅拌的水模拟[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(10): 26-35. CAI Jun,ZENG Jiaqing,LIANG Qiang. Water simulation of combined blowing converter for#br# top lance level and non equilibrium bottom blowing stirring[J]. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(10): 26-35.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 钢包包衬侵蚀对内衬温度和钢水温降的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHANG Qi-dong1, ZHONG Kai2, SHAO Jun-ning3
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of ladle lining erosion on lining temperature and temperature drop of molten steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the influence of ladle lining erosion on the liquid steel temperature drop, a heat transfer calculation model considering the lining erosion was established by using ANSYS finite element software and ParaMesh mesh migration technology. The effect of lining erosion on the lining and molten steel temperature were studied and analyzed. The results showed that the ladle lining erosion had a great influence on the ladle lining temperature. In the next two repair cycles, the temperature difference between the slag line and the wall of the ladle lining internal (the junction of working layer and permanent layer) caused by the ladle lining erosion was about 14-114 K. The ladle lining erosion led to the increase of the outer surface temperature of the cladding, and the increase of the outer heat dissipation of the cladding. At the same time, the lining was eroded and thinned, and the heat storage was reduced. Thus, the ladle lining erosion had a little influence on the liquid steel temperature drop, the maximum temperature drop was no more than 1 K. In the actual production, the influence of the ladle lining erosion on the liquid steel temperature drop can be properly ignored.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 准晶强化钢的研究进展
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: SHI Peng- cheng,ZHU Yuan- zhi,LI Chun,LI Jia- tong
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （School of Mechanical and Material Engineering, North China University of Technology, Beijing 100144, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research development of quasi- crystal strengthened steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The quasi- crystal is a rotational symmetric solid with a structure between the crystalline and amorphous state. Due to its special structure, the strength, hardness and brittleness of quasi- crystal are very high at room temperature, and its stick- ability, friction coefficient, density and thermal conductivity are low. For the quasi- crystal steel, numerous quasi- crystal precipitates are formed, resulting in the tensile strength as high as 3 000 MPa. Based on the discovery of quasi- crystal and the quasi- crystal in steel, the influencing factors on the phase transition of quasi- crystal steel are discussed, the properties and preparation of quasi- crystal strengthened steel and the properties of the quasi- crystal in steel are summarized. Finally, the present situation and existing problems of quasi- crystal steel and quasi- crystal are analyzed, and the potential applications and future research direction of quasi- crystal steel are prospected.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 铁素体轧制工艺热轧板显微组织研究与分析
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WANG Jian- gong，WANG Xiao- dong，ZHOU Xun，XIA Yin- feng，LI Rui，LI Dong- ning
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Hot- rolling Department, Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Tangshan 063200, Hebei, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and analysis of microstructure of hot rolled plate after ferrite rolling process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to find out the distribution law of the microstructure structure of the hot- rolled plate under the ferritic rolling process and the differences of the microstructure structure under the ferritic rolling process and the conventional rolling process for Ti- IF steel, based on the rolling technology of ferrite in hot semi- continuous rolling line, the control of the microstructure and precipitation of hot rolled plate in Ti- IF ferritic rolling process were researched and analyzed by TEM, and the differences of the microstructure and precipitation, including the grain size, of the hot rolled plate in the ferrite rolling process and the conventional rolling process were also analyzed. It was known that the fine and even recrystallized grains could be obtained by applying the ferrite rolling process, which was 6- 10 μm smaller than the austenite grain size, and the uniformity of the microstructure was ideal. The size of the precipitation under the ferrite rolling process was 30- 50 nm larger than that under the austenite rolling process, while the size of TiN precipitates under the two rolling process was similar.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 热解制备芦竹半焦基础性能分析
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (1. School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China;2. School of Chemical Engineering, The University of Queensland, St Lucia, QLD 4072, Australia)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of basic characteristics of Arundo donax char prepared by pyrolysis
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
In order to study the basic characteristics of Arundo donax chars obtained by lowtemperature pyrolysis. The Arundo donax char was prepared by using a mediumtemperature tube furnace at the pyrolysis temperatures of 350, 450, 550 and 650 ℃. The weight loss rate, chemical composition, microscopic morphology, combustion reactivity and gasification reactivity of the biochar were studied. The study found that the volatilization of the biochar was greatly reduced, but the fixed carbon content was greatly increased. The biochar achieved a more developed pore structure and the combustion and gasification reactivity changed with the pyrolysis temperature and time. The pyrolysis violent reaction zone was in the range of 350450 ℃, during which a large amount of volatile matter escaped. When the pyrolysis temperature was greater than 450 ℃, the weight loss rate, microscopic morphology, combustion reactivity and reactivity changed little.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 王朋，张建良，王广伟，李燕江. 热解制备芦竹半焦基础性能分析[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(2): 12-16. WANG Peng,ZHANG Jianliang,WANG Guangwei,LI Yanjiang. Analysis of basic characteristics of Arundo donax char prepared by pyrolysis. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(2): 12-16.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 巴西某高硅铁矿粉对烧结黏结相流动性及劣质矿物的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: SU Li-xin, WU Sheng-li, ZHAI Xiao-bo, MA Xu-dong
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of high-silica iron ore from Brazil on fluidity and inferior minerals of sintered binding phase
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The proper amount of silica in the raw material of the sinter production contributes to the formation of the sintered binding phase, but the high silica content increases the liquid phase viscosity and adversely affects the mineral composition of the sintered binding phase. The influence of high-silica iron ore from Brazil on the sintered binding phase is still unclear. Therefore, the micro-sintering method was used to investigate the liquid phase fluidity of the mixed ore in different proportions of the high-silica ore powder. Based on the principle of "K-value method", the semi-quantitative analysis of its minerals was carried out to obtain the content of minerals such as fayalite, calcium fayalite and calcium silicate. The results showed that with the increase of the ratio of the high-silica iron ore powder in the mixed ore, the liquid phase fluidity of the binding phase decreased, and the mineral contents such as fayalite and calcium silicate also increased significantly. Based on this, the method of improving the reactivity of the mixed ore was used to improve the liquid phase fluidity of the sintered binding phase and reduce the content of fayalite and calcium silicate.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 板坯连铸工艺参数对取向硅钢铸坯中心等轴晶率的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: CHANG Zheng-sheng, ZHANG Qiao-ying, YANG Ke-zhi, CHENG Suo-ping, YIN Guo-cai
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Technology Center, Maanshan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Ma′anshan 243000, Anhui, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effects of continuous casting process parameters on central equiaxed crystal ratio of oriented silicon steel slab
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of the superheat of the steel in tundish, electromagnetic stirring current, secondary cooling intensity, casting speed and sectional dimension on the central equiaxed crystal ratio were investigated through the macro examination of oriented silicon steel slab. The results showed that under the test conditions, when the superheat of the steel in tundish was controlled within the range of 14-18 ℃, the change of the central equiaxed crystal ratio caused by the difference of the superheat was small, and the variation range was only 0%-3%. The influence of the electromagnetic stirring current and the sectional dimension of the slab on the central equiaxed crystal ratio was obvious. With the increase of the stirring current, the central equiaxed crystal ratio increased, and it decreased when the sectional dimension of the slab increased. The influence of the secondary cooling intensity and casting speed on the central equiaxed crystal ratio was relatively small. With the increase of the secondary cooling intensity, the central equiaxed crystal ratio decreased, and it increased when the casting speed increased.

CHANG Zheng-sheng, ZHANG Qiao-ying, YANG Ke-zhi, CHENG Suo-ping, YIN Guo-cai. Effects of continuous casting process parameters on central equiaxed crystal ratio of oriented silicon steel slab[J]. http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: U75V重轨钢生产过程中非金属夹杂物的行为演变
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: CHU Yanping,CHEN Zhiyong,LIU Nan,YANG Wen,WANG Jujin,ZHANG Lifeng
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
(1. School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083,
 China;2. Steelmaking Plant, Inner Mongolia Baotou Steel Union Co., Ltd., Baotou 014010, Nei Mongol, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Behavior evolution of nonmetallic inclusions during #br# production of U75V heavy rail steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
In order to study the behavior evolution of nonmetallic inclusions in heavy rail steel, further control the inclusions of steel and improve product quality. The evolution of chemical composition, quantity, size, etc. of nonmetallic inclusions was investigated from an example U75V heavy rail steel based on sampling during the production process of the LFVDCC route, combined with oxygen and nitrogen analysis, molten steel composition analysis, nonmetallic inclusion analysis and thermodynamic calculation. The results show that the oxygen and nitrogen content in the production of U75V heavy rail steel process continues to decrease, and the final TO and ［N］ mass fraction are about 0.001 0% and 0.004 0% respectively. MnOSiO2Al2O3 type of inclusions are the main inclusions at LF start, which originated from deoxidation product. After the slagging, the MnOSiO2Al2O3 inclusions are converted into CaOSiO2Al2O3 type, and the Ca and Als brought by the alloying materials such as BaCaSi and FeSi are the main reasons for the result. When leaving the LF station，the inclusions are CaOSiO2Al2O3MgO with CaO and MgO content increased. CaOAl2O3MgO inclusions disappeared during VD refining, and CaOSiO2Al2O3 was mainly found in samples from VD vacuum broken to bloom. The proportion of inclusions of magnesiumaluminum spinel in the rail increases, and which is CaOSiO2Al2O3MgO type of inclusions. The thermodynamic calculation results show that the spinel inclusions in the rail are formed during cooling process, and the calculated value is consistent with the actual value.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 基于石灰窑回收CO2用于炼钢的关键技术分析
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (Steelmaking Department, Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Tangshan 063200, Hebei, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 摘要  针对CO2在首钢京唐300 t转炉的成功试验，分析了从石灰窑回收CO2用于炼钢的关键技术，重点讨论了从石灰窑回收CO2的工艺路线选择、石灰窑烟气CO2提浓技术、石灰窑烟气的预处理技术、提纯技术、存储输送技术、转炉顶吹O2CO2混合喷吹技术和底吹CO2技术等。并通过试验验证了CO2用于转炉冶炼，不仅可以提高炼钢冶金效果，而且可以增加转炉煤气回收量。认为该工艺的开发可形成石灰窑与炼钢之间的碳素流循环，有利于节能减排，降低碳排放。
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis on key technologies of CO2 recovery from lime kiln for steelmaking
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract： In view of the successful test of CO2 recovery from the lime kiln in Shougang Jingtang 300 t converter, the key technology of CO2 recovery from the lime kiln for steelmaking was discussed. The process route selection of CO2 recovery from lime kiln, CO2 enrichment technology of lime kiln flue gas, pretreatment technology of lime kiln flue gas, purification technology, storage and transportation technology, top blowing O2CO2 from converter mixed injection technology and bottom blown CO2 technology were emphatically discussed. It was verified by experiment that the application of CO2 in converter smelting can not only improve the metallurgical effect of steelmaking, but also increase the recovery of converter gas. It was considered that the development of this technology can form the carbon flow cycle between the lime kiln and steelmaking, which was conducive to energy saving and carbon emission reduction.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 吉立鹏，张丙龙，曾卫民. 基于石灰窑回收CO2用于炼钢的关键技术分析[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(3): 49-52. JI Lipeng,ZHANG Binglong,ZENG Weimin. Analysis on key technologies of CO2 recovery from lime kiln for steelmaking. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(3): 49-52.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHANG Yuexing,AN Yongchao，LIU Shaoming，JIANG Tengfei，ZHU Liang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (Steelmaking Department， Beijing Shougang Co., Ltd.， Qian′an 064404， Hebei， China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Process and practice of 210 t ladle capping in Qiansteel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Remarkable results have been achieved since the whole covering technology and process of 210 t ladle were put into operation in No.2 steelmaking plant of Qiansteel. The average tapping temperature has been reduced by 10 ℃ and the utilization rate of turnover ladle has been kept above 85% for a long time. The online baking of ladle has been canceled, the gas consumption has been reduced, the cleanliness of ladle has been effectively guaranteed and the life of ladle lining has been increased. Practice showed that the whole ladle capping process was an advanced technology of energy saving, environmental protection and consumption reduction. Remarkable economic benefits have been obtained for the No.2 steelmaking of Qiansteel. However, in a period of time, the operation stability of the process was poor. Through the induction and analysis of the field production data, the factors affecting the addition and uncovering of the ladle were found out, and the control measures were formulated. At the same time, the working principle and main equipment must be mastered in order to improve the operation stability.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of formation mechanism and affecting factors of #br# landscape painting defects in pickling plate
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Pickling plate SPHC from the pickling plant of Shougang Company recently arose landscape painting defects(Mshape defect)in June 2018, which were distributed in different hot rolling unit. The raw materials were provided by two hot rolling lines, and the chromatic aberration in the pickling plate surface was obvious, which affected using. In order to research the causes and influencing factors of the defects, the microstructure of the defects, as well as the chemical component of iron oxide scale was simultaneously tested to analyze the mechanism of the formation of landscape painting defect. Besides, the effect of the chemical component, heating schedule, furnace atmosphere and other factors were also systematically studied according to production trails. Results showed that the higher the charging temperature was and the longer the time slabs stayed in the furnace, the heavier the landscape painting was. However, the slight adjustment of roughing rolling speed had no obvious effect on the landscape painting defects. Therefore, a series of measures were token such as controlling the inside oxidizing atmosphere of the furnace, improving the heating schedule and optimizing the rolling schedule, the landscape painting defect on the surface of lowcarbon pickling plate was finally controlled.

Analysis of formation mechanism and affecting factors of #br# landscape painting defects in pickling plate[J]. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(7): 44-49.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHANG Zhao- ning,KONG Ning,ZHANG Jie,LI Hong- bo
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （School of Mechanical Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of Fe- Si alloy scale structure on pickling
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Through the methods such as SEM, Raman spectroscopy and electrochemical pickling simulation, the oxide scale structure and pickling mechanism of Fe- Si alloy had been explored. The results showed that an innermost layer of Fe2SiO4 formed at the scale- alloy interface can improve the oxidation resistance of Fe- Si alloy and made the oxide thickness less than DC- 03. The oxide of Fe- Si alloy existed throughout the original cracks on the scale- alloy interface, and the HCl solution was penetrated to the scale- alloy interface through the original cracks, which caused that the Fe- Si alloy pickling process skipped the incubation period and went directly to the acceleration period and stable period, resulting in the pickling time of Fe- Si alloy shorter than that of DC- 03. Ultrasonic assisted and pickling temperature increasing improved the surface quality of Fe- Si alloy after pickling and reduced the "red scale" residue.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 硅铁合金离心粒化工艺
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LI Xue- qin，PAN Fei- fei，HE Wen- chao，QIU Jie，L Xue- wei
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （School of Materials Science and Engineering, Chongqing University, Chongqing 400044, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Centrifugal granulation process for ferrosilicon alloy
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A method of centrifugal granulation for ferrosilicon alloy with the multi- nozzle rotary cup was proposed. In order to study the feasibility of this process, different nozzle diameter and rotating speed were used to carry out the granulation experiments on ferrosilicon alloy and then the particles after the experiment were analyzed. The main conclusions indicated that through this process, the alloy product with good sphericity and uniform particle size can be obtained, and particles smaller than 1 mm can be avoided. Under this experimental condition, the average particle size of about 10 mm was obtained with the nozzle diameter of 12 mm and the rotating speed of 100- 200 r/min, which was the best granulation result. The oxygen absorption rate and the oxidation rate of the ferrosilicon alloy with the particle size of 10- 13 mm were 0.5% and 0.14%, respectively, which met the industrial requirements.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: X70M管线钢终冷温度偏差大原因分析及工艺改进
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (Heavy Plate, Baosteel Zhanjiang Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Zhanjiang 524000, Guangdong, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Cause analysis and process improvement of significant finishing temperature deviation of X70M pipeline steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The ribbon iron oxide phenomenon of X70M pipeline steel on cooling bed, which produced by 4 200 mm heavy plate mill of Zhanjiang Iron and Steel Co., Ltd. not only affected the surface quality, but also caused the final cooling temperature fluctuation of the heavy plate. The effect of descaling in the width direction of the heavy plate was validated by the descaling test through indepth analysis from mechanical and technological aspects. Combined with the effect of ribbon iron oxide on the finishing cooling temperature uniformity of steel plate after Mulpic rapid cooling, the descaling process system of finishing rolling was improved. On the basis of ensuring the final rolling temperature of the steel plate, the scale removal could be improved through the rational layout and new addition of descaling passes. The nearer the descaling pass was to the final pass of final rolling, the more significant the descaling effect was. A feasible scheme for the installation and maintenance of the descaling nozzle was proposed. Field application showed that the descaling of X70M pipeline steel could be improved by means of the above strategy.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHOU Dan1,2,LIANG Fengrui3,WANG Tianqi3,XIU Guotao1,2,YANG Yang1,2
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Finite element simulation and process optimizing of induction #br# heating for high strength bulb flat steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Based on the parameters of actual production conditions, the induction heating process of high strength bulb flat steel was simulated by using the finite element analysis software ABAQUS. The simulation results were basically consistent with the measured results. The influence of coil current density on temperature distribution of bulb flat steel section was investigated, and the optimization scheme of induction heating process parameters for bulb flat steel was put forward. The recommended parameters of the simulation results were that the preheating current density was 7.0×106 A/m3, and the heating current density was 8.5×106 A/m3. Microstructure and mechanical properties of the high strength bulb flat steel before and after optimizing the technological parameters were compared. The results showed that the high strength bulb flat steel produced by the optimized induction heating had better crosssection uniformity.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Cause and disposal of camber after longitudinal shear #br# of high strength beam steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
In a domestic commercial vehicle manufacturing plant, the problem of the camber greater than the standard requirement of 7 mm often occurs in the strips of high strength beam steel after longitudinal shearing. Through the investigation of hotrolling line, straightening units and shearing process, it was confirmed that the camber mainly comes from the straightening unit. Through the utilization of straightening roughing straightening machine and precision straightening, it was confirmed that the camber of the straightening unit is mainly caused by the poor adjustment of the precision straightening. Finally, through the adjustment of the insertion amount of the precision straightening roller, the inclination of the inlet and outlet, the inclination of the transmission side and the operation side of the finer straightener, the camber defects were eliminated.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Numerical simulation and practice of flow field in 100 t bottom blown argon ladle
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to investigate the current situation of its flow field, the numerical simulation and practice study of the flow behavior of molten steel in a 100 t ladle with a double plugs bottom- blown argon refining process, which the total flow rate was 200(scheme 1)and 300 L/min(scheme 2)were carried out. The results showed that each argon blowing stream would form two circulating streams in the ladle, which were located between the argon streams and the ladle wall, and in the two argon streams. Scheme 2 shortens the mixing time by 36 s compared to Scheme 1 and the average diameter of the slag eyes increases by 0.055 m. The refractory material corrosion of Scheme 2 increased. The numerical simulation was verified its correctness by practice and the effective guidance for on- site production was provided.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The iso-activity lines of CaO and Al2O3 in CaO-SiO2-Al2O3-5%MgO quaternary system were calculated by FactSage thermodynamics software. And the effects of bacisity of refining slag, ratio of w(CaO)/w(Al2O3), and MI index on the adsorptioncapacity of Al2O3 inclusions were mainly discussed through the figures of iso-activity line. The results showed that the main compositions of refining slag suitable for the production of gear steel (8620H) in Hangzhou Steel were that the contents of CaO, Al2O3,, SiO2 and MgO were in the range of 50%~55%, 25%~30%, 10%~12% and 5%~8%, respectively. Applying this refining slag in industrial tests, the total oxygen content decreased from 0.001 5% to 0.001 0%. Besides, the average size of inclusions in billets also significantly decreased from 2.1 to 1.5 μm, and the large inclusion content decreased from 31.9mg/10kg to 26.4mg/10kg. Thus, the industrial tests received good results.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 摘要 通过ANSYS Fluent软件对结晶器浇铸1200mm×244mm断面铸坯在不同浸入深度下流场、温度场进行数值模拟计算。结果表明，针对结晶器1200mm×244mm断面下，当浸入深度为110mm时，自由液面的最大速度为0.166m/s，波高为2.4mm；当浸入深度增加至130mm后，自由液面速度有所降低，为0.127m/s，但当浸入深度在130～170mm变化时，自由液面速度波动不明显。液面波动随着浸入深度的增加而略有降低，浸入深度分别为130、150、170mm时，液面波高分别为1.98、1.89、1.49mm，整体变化不大。不同浸入深度在结晶器内上旋流钢液大部分温度为1516～1518℃，下旋流钢液温度基本为1514～1516℃，比较均匀，影响不大。

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The flow and temperature field of molten steel in mold with different nozzle submerged depth during casting the slab with the section of 1200mm×244mm was simulated by commercial software ANSYS Fluent. The results showed that when the submerged depth was 110mm，the maximum free liquid surface speed was 0.166 m/s，and the wave height was 2.4 mm. When the submerged depth increased to 130 mm，the free surface speed decreased to 0.127 m/s. But when the submerged depth varied from 130 to 170 mm，the fluctuation of free surface velocity was not obvious. With the increase of the submerged depth，the level fluctuation lower slightly. When the submerged depth was 130，150 and 170 mm，respectively，the corresponding surface wave height was 1.98，1.89，1.49 mm，respectively，whose fluction was not obvious. The temperatures of up swirl liquid steel and down liquid steel were in the range of 1 516~1 518 ℃ and 1 514~1 516 ℃，respectively，and were both homogeneous.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 氧化钙在铜渣还原过程中的作用
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (College of Zijin Mining, Fuzhou University, Fuzhou 350116, Fujian, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of calcium oxide on reduction of copper slag
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Copper slag is a solid waste generated during the pyrometallurgical process. The iron mass fraction is about 40%. The amount of copper slag discharged in China is as high as 14 million tons per year. Therefore, it is of great significance to study the iron extraction from copper slag for comprehensive utilization of resources. Combined with the phase distribution of copper slag, the promotion and inhibition mechanisms of calcium oxide in the reduction process of copper slag were introduced. The promotion effects were that calcium oxide can significantly reduce the initial reaction temperature of copper slag reduction system and destroy the structure of iron olivine in copper slag, promote the release of ferrous oxide in the slag phase, reduce the nucleation barrier of iron grains, and accelerate the nucleation of iron grains. The inhibition effect was that calcium oxide and silicon oxide formed high melting point calcium silicate salt, which increased the solid phase ratio of the copper slag phase and hindered the aggregation and growth of iron grains.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 张琳，刘先阳，库建刚. 氧化钙在铜渣还原过程中的作用[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(9): 9-14. ZHANG Lin,LIU Xianyang,KU Jiangang. Effect of calcium oxide on reduction of copper slag[J]. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(9): 9-14.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of waterenergy nexus in iron and steel production
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The nexus between water and energy in iron and steel enterprise was studied from the view of energy consumption of water usage in iron and steel production. And then the concept of water energy intensity was put forward to evaluate the energysaving level of water resources utilization in the production process of enterprises, and the waterenergy nexus model of iron and steel enterprise was established. Taking a large iron and steel enterprise in China as an example, the relationship between water and energy was calculated and analyzed. The total waterenergy quantity of the enterprise was 55 709 kW·h/h, the energy of the reused water consumption accounted for 82% of the total water energy of the whole steel enterprise, the energy of hydration water accounted for 16%, and the drainage water energy only accounted for 1%. Hot rolling process accounted for the largest proportion of all processes, followed by ironmaking and steelmaking, and cold rolling, sintering and coking processes were the lowest. The waterenergy intensity per ton of steel was 0.208 kW·h/m3, and the waterenergy intensity of the ironmaking process was the highest, followed by hot rolling and steelmaking, and the sintering, cold rolling and coking processes were the lowest. Finally, the direction and measures for energy saving were obtained from the perspective of water resources utilization in iron and steel production.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 仝永娟,蔡九菊,张琦,王连勇,胡绍伟，熊博文. 钢铁生产的水能关系分析[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(11): 87-92. TONG Yongjuan1,2，CAI Jiuju1，ZHANG Qi1，WANG Lianyong1，. Analysis of waterenergy nexus in iron and steel production[J]. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(11): 87-92.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 北营公司提高鱼雷罐运转效率的生产实践
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (Manufacture Department， Beiying Company， Benxi Steel Group, Benxi 117000， Liaoning， China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Production practice of improving operational efficiency of torpedo ladle in Beiying
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract： Improving the operational efficiency of torpedo ladle between ironmaking and steelmaking has obvious economic and social benefits. It is not only beneficial to reduce the quantity of torpedo ladle and investment, but also beneficial to reduce the temperature drop of hot metal and consume more scrap. Based on the investigation of the restricted link to improve the operational efficiency of torpedo ladle in Beiying Company, combined with the site production status, a dynamic tracking system of torpedo ladle was established by optimizing the weighing mode. And the iron and steel production management was also strengthened. The operational efficiency of torpedo ladle raised from 2.0 times/(car·day) to 2.8 times/(car·day) through the formulation of a daily maintenance and regularrepairing system, which was in the leading domestic level.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 王传琳，任瑞忠，王建平. 北营公司提高鱼雷罐运转效率的生产实践[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(3): 32-35. WANG Chuanlin，REN Ruizhong，WANG Jianping. Production practice of improving operational efficiency of torpedo ladle in Beiying . China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(3): 32-35.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 一种X煤在首钢的应用实践
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: GUO Deying,LIU Yang,MA Chao,ZHANG Xiaoming,LI Dongtao
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
(Iron and Steel Technology Department, Research Institute of Technology,
Shougang Group Corporation, Beijing 100043, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Application practice of coal X in cokemaking of Shougang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
In view of the current situation that the resources of high quality coking coal are becoming less and less, and the quality index of coke is demanded higher and higher in blast furnace production, the systematic coking tests on lowash and highsulfur coal (noted as coal X) were carried out. It was found that the sulfur content did not increase with the reasonable addition of 5%8% coal X in coking production. The coke ash content decreased significantly, and the coke strength remained stable. The investigation was successfully used in the coke making process in Shougang and all the quality standards were reached. It not only extended the scope of coking coal utilization, but also provided support for the coke ash content reduction in resources usage.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 郭德英，刘洋，马超，张小明，李东涛. 一种X煤在首钢的应用实践[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(6): 1-5. GUO Deying,LIU Yang,MA Chao,ZHANG Xiaoming,LI Dongtao. Application practice of coal X in cokemaking of Shougang[J]. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(6): 1-5.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 热处理对高强大梁钢冲击吸收功的影响分析
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: CAI Ning,WANG Wenchang,CUI Guibin,QI Qige,LU Xianbao,WANG Zeyang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (Testing and Analysis Center, Research Institute of Technology, Shougang Group Corporation, Beijing 100043, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis on effect of heat treatment on impact energy #br# of highstrength beam steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
In order to study the effect of heat treatment on the impact energy of highstrength beam steels, SEM, TEM and EBSD were used to analyze the impact properties of 700L steels with different heat treatment. Results indicated that heat treatment process had a significant effect on the impact properties of 700L steels. When annealed below 400 ℃, the impact properties of the steel were improved. When annealed above 550 ℃, the microstructure of the steel changed slightly and there were considerable amounts of cementites precipitated along the grain boundary, leading to the deterioration of the impact properties. After aircooling treatment at different austenitizing temperatures, the steel treated at 850 ℃ had the best impact properties, which consisted of fine equiaxed ferrite and M/A islands. Texture results indicated that the original steel obsessed strong texture of {001}〈110〉, which might be unfavorable to the impact properties. After mild temperature annealing treatment, the strength of {001}〈110〉 texture weakened, while after austenitizing treatment, the texture disappeared.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 蔡宁，王文昌，崔桂彬，其其格，鹿宪宝，王泽阳. 热处理对高强大梁钢冲击吸收功的影响分析[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(6): 38-42. CAI Ning,WANG Wenchang,CUI Guibin,QI Qige,LU Xianbao,WANG Zeyang. Analysis on effect of heat treatment on impact energy #br# of highstrength beam steel[J]. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(6): 38-42.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 蓄热式加热炉烟气反吹系统的设计与应用
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
(College of Metallurgy and Energy, North China University of Science and
Technology, Tangshan 063210, Hebei， China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Design and application of flue gas backflushing system #br# for regenerative heating furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
When the regenerative heating furnace is reversing combustion, the gas remaining in the pipe between the gas reversing valve and the burner is directly discharged into the atmosphere. In order to reduce the energy consumption of the regenerative heating furnace and reduce pollution emissions, the reversing process of the regenerative heating furnace was explored. A regenerative furnace flue gas backflushing system was designed for a 160 t/h regenerative heating furnace in a steel factory in Tangshan. Through scientific timing control and safety interlocking, it was reasonably linked with the original regenerative heating furnace control program to realize the safe and reliable operation of the whole system. The application of the regenerative furnace flue gas backflushing system reduced the unit energy consumption of the furnace from 0.882 to 0.823 GJ/t, and the CO emission reduction rate reached 94.9%. At the same time, it provided a data basis for combustion control and maintenance.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: GCr15SiMn轴承钢中碳元素偏析与疏松的相关性
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (State Key Laboratory of Advanced Metallurgy， University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Correlation between carbon segregation and #br# porosity in GCr15SiMn bearing steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Some solidification defects such as macrosegregation and porosity will occur during the solidification of GCr15SiMn steel ingots. In order to develop a more reasonable die casting process, the GCr15SiMn ingot of 1 kg was smelted in vacuum induction furnace. And the similarity between laboratory and industrial production was studied from the perspective of the die casting process and the macrostructure of ingot. The correlation between the carbon segregation and porosity of GCr15SiMn ingot was studied by OPA and SEM. The results showed that the segregation of carbon was the most serious and related to porosity. The relationship between segregation degree (S) of carbon and compactness degree (P) can be expressed as SC=0.92P－0.89. The basic law embodied in this formula was applicable to industrial ingots. According to the statistical results of SEM and OPA, the corresponding relationship between the equivalent diameter of the porosity and the quantitative characterization value (compactness degree P) was established. The result showed that the segregation degree of carbon increased with the increase of the equivalent diameter of porosity. The Scheil model was used to analyze and discuss in principle, and it was found that the segregation degree of carbon was positively correlated with the shrinkage of molten steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 多元合金化大断面球墨铸铁组织和性能的分析
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (College of Mechanical and Electrical Engineering, Jiaozuo University, Jiaozuo 454003, Henan, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis on microstructure and properties of multialloyed heavy section ductile cast iron
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract： In order to enhance the comprehensive mechanical properties of heavy section ductile iron, small amounts of alloying elements Cu, Sb, Sn and Mo were added in the production of heavy section ductile iron, and the microstructure and mechanical properties of the CuSbSnMo multicomponent composite microalloyed heavy section ductile iron was investigated by means of optical microscopy(OM), scanning electron microscopy(SEM) and testing of mechanical properties. The results showed that the multicomponent composite microalloyed heavy section ductile iron had a better comprehensive performance. The microstructure of heavy section ductile iron was optimized after adding Cu, Sb, Sn and Mo, the microstructure of ductile iron was composed of pearlite, nodular graphite and a small amount of ferrite, and the graphite ball was fine and round, uniformly distributed in the whole section. Meanwhile, the composite addition of alloying elements resulted in a tensile strength (Rm) of 800 MPa or more, a hardness (HB) of about 280, and an elongation rate (A) of above 5% or more. The analysis results of fracture section suggested that the fracture behavior of the multicomponent composite microalloyed heavy section ductile iron was dominated by cleavage fracture along with a small amount of plastic deformation.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 李蒙. 多元合金化大断面球墨铸铁组织和性能的分析[J]. 中国冶金, 2019, 29(4): 47-53. LI Meng. Analysis on microstructure and properties of multialloyed heavy section ductile cast iron. China Metallurgy, 2019, 29(4): 47-53.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 转炉顶吹过程多相流数值模拟
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Numerical simulation of multiphase flow in converter top blowing process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
 In order to study the phenomen occurring in converter during steelmaking process，a three dimensional mathematical model of an 150 t six hole oxygen converter was set up using the commercial software Fluent 16.0. The top blowing process was considered in the current calculation. The effects of the different ambient temperatures on the velocity of the oxygen jet, slag distribution, surface velocity liquid steel, and distribution of wall shear stress were investigated. The results show that, with the increase of temperature, the velocity of the oxygen jet increases and the time of blowing open slag layer cuts down. Meanwhile, the biggest velocity at the surface of the liquid steel is greater than 10 m/s, and the level fluctuation of the liquid steel increases. With the increase of temperature, the wall shear stress rises up and the wall shear stress near the interface of the gas phaseslag phasesteel liquid phase is the largest.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 赵冲，陈威，张立峰. 转炉顶吹过程多相流数值模拟[J]. 中国冶金, 2018, 28(11S): 1-7. ZHAO Chong，CHEN Wei，ZHANG Lifeng. Numerical simulation of multiphase flow in converter top blowing process[J]. China Metallurgy, 2018, 28(11S): 1-7.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 镀铝板用耐高温型无铬钝化结合机理及性能
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: WANG Teng, CHAI Li-tao, LI Wei-gang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Technology Center, Maanshan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Ma′anshan 243000, Anhui, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Bonding mechanism and technological properties of high temperature resistant chromium-free passivation coating for aluminized sheet
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The traditional organic chromium-free passivation product has a serious yellowing change at 400 ℃. On the premise of maintaining excellent high-temperature resistance, it also has excellent corrosion resistance and processing performance. A chromium-free passivation product using inorganic and a small amount of organic was designed for aluminum plating. The methods of electrochemical workstation, X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy, X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy and infrared spectroscopy were used. The film forming mechanism of the chromium-free passivation on the surface of the hot-dipped aluminum sheet was studied, and the interfacial bonding mechanism between the skin film and the aluminum-silicon coating was analyzed by combining the film forming kinetics analysis. The effects of film weight and curing temperature on the technological properties of the aluminized sheet were studied. It was concluded that the control range of film weight with excellent comprehensive properties was 0.8-1.2 g/m, and the corresponding PMT temperature was above 80 ℃. The chromium-free passivated hot-dip aluminized sheet had excellent high-temperature resistance, corrosion resistance and stamping performance. The surface chromatic aberration Δ was less 3 after baking at 400 ℃ for 2 h and the neutral salt spray test for 72 h did not show rust.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 含铬转炉渣黏度和表面张力的计算模型
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHANG Kang-hui, WANG Yue, ZOU Chang-dong, LIU Fei
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Steelmaking and Casting Group, Institute of Research of Iron and Steel, Shasteel/Jiangsu, Zhangjiagang 215625, Jiangsu, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Calculation model of viscosity and surface tension for chromium-containing converter slag
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the ion and molecule coexistence theory of slag and combining the viscosity and surface tension of chromium-containing converter slag measured by predecessors, the calculation model of viscosity and surface tension about temperature and structural units had been established to predict the viscosity and surface tension of chromium-containing converter slag. The calculated values of the model agreed well with the measured values in the literature, indicating the model could help to predict the viscosity and surface tension of chromium-containing converter slag. The results showed that the viscosity and surface tension of slag increased with the increase of CrO content, while decreased with the increase of FeO content. CrO had the greatest influence on the surface tension. The viscosity of slag increased with the increase of basicity. With basicity increasing, the viscosity of slag increased, and the basicity had the greatest influence on viscosity, while the surface tension first increased and then decreased, and reached a maximum value with basicity of 1.8.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 平整机升速过程带钢与张力辊打滑分析
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LI Yang-long, WANG Yong-qiang, WEN Jie, YU Meng, LI Gong-yin
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Department of Metallurgical Process, Research Institute of Technology, Shougang Group Corporation, Beijing 100043, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis on slipping between strip and bridle roll of skin pass mill during speed-up process
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The strip slipping occurred frequently in the speed-up process of the skin pass mill in a factory, which seriously affected the surface quality of the strip. Based on the analysis of production process data, a method for judging the position and time of slipping between strip and bridle roll was proposed. Furthermore, a mathematical model of the movement between the strip and the bridle roll of the skin pass mill was established, and the main factors affecting the strip slipping in the speed-up process were analyzed. It was found that a small friction coefficient of bridle roll, a large speed and acceleration of the leveler and a large tension difference of the bridle roll assembly will increase the slipping risk between strip and bridle. The measures to solve the strip slipping problem were also put forward. The incidence rate of the strip slipping in the speed-up process was reduced from 3.33% to 0.17% after optimization, which played a positive role in the stable production of the skin pass mill.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 李洋龙, 王永强, 文杰, 于孟, 李宫胤. 平整机升速过程带钢与张力辊打滑分析[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(1): 63-67. LI Yang-long, WANG Yong-qiang, WEN Jie, YU Meng, LI Gong-yin. Analysis on slipping between strip and bridle roll of skin pass mill during speed-up process[J]. China Metallurgy, 2020, 30(1): 63-67.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 极薄板高速轧制热划伤缺陷控制技术
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: QI Hai-feng, ZHANG Xiao-feng, TANG Wei, REN Xin-yi, NING Yuan-yuan, CHANG Shu-lin
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Cold-rolling Department, Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Tangshan 063210, Hebei, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Control technology of hot scratch defect in extremely thin plate high speed rolling
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The hot scratch of No.4 rack is the metal accumulation caused by the ploughing ditch. It belongs to the mechanical scratch in hot state caused by the scratch of roll and strip steel. The strategy to solve scratches is to reduce the rolling speed and reduction rate of No.4 stand, increase the temperature and concentration of emulsion, and reduce the heat of deformation in the metal zone. A rolling strategy based on the principle of reducing hot scratch was proposed. The reduction rate of No.4 stand was reduced from 34.1% to 29.8%, the reduction rate of No.5 stand was increased from 14.0% to 29.3%, and the rolling speed of No.4 stand was reduced from 1 615 to 1 272 m/min under the premise of keeping the exit speed of No.5 stand unchanged. Thus, the temperature of the rolling zone was reduced. At the same time, the lubrication principle with the concentration change of emulsifier as the core was put forward. By increasing the temperature of emulsion to 55-60 ℃ and the concentration of S3 to 5.5%-7.0%, the requirement of oil film thickness and stable lubrication in the rolling area and the requirement of forced cooling of rolls and strips outside the rolling area were taken into account. After taking the above measures, the incidence of hot scratch defect of the ultra-thin plate was reduced from 12% to 1%, the surface quality of the strip could meet the needs of high-end users.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 齐海峰, 张晓峰, 唐伟, 任新意, 宁媛媛, 常树林. 极薄板高速轧制热划伤缺陷控制技术[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(1): 79-83. QI Hai-feng, ZHANG Xiao-feng, TANG Wei, REN Xin-yi, NING Yuan-yuan, CHANG Shu-lin. Control technology of hot scratch defect in extremely thin plate high speed rolling[J]. China Metallurgy, 2020, 30(1): 79-83.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 蒙古焦煤煤质分析与配煤试验
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: HE Jia1, SHI Yong-lin1, QU Xiu-zhen2
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
1. Technology Centre,Shanxi Taigang Stainless Steel Co.,Ltd., Taiyuan 030003, Shanxi, China;
2. Coking Plant,Shanxi Taigang Stainless Steel Co.,Ltd., Taiyuan 030003, Shanxi, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Quality analysis and coal blending test of Mongolian charred coal
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：To expand the coking coal resources, TISCO carried out new resource development for Mongolian charred coal, mainly studying the coal quality characteristics, coking performance of Mongolian charred coal and its adaptability to the existing coal blending system. The results indicated Mongolian charred coal belonged to low-sulfur single coal seam coal with high G value and Y value, and low metamorphism degree, which was transitional coal between fat coal and charred coal. The coking performance of single coal was better, but the thermal strength of coke was slightly worse. When Mongolian charred coal was stored in the open air, the caking index decreased slightly, and the open storage time should not exceed 15 days. There was still a certain difference between Mongolian charred coal and domestic high quality charred coal, so the blending of Mongolian charred coal should be optimized according to the resource situation.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 贺佳, 史永林, 屈秀珍. 蒙古焦煤煤质分析与配煤试验[J]. 中国冶金, 2020, 30(2): 79-83. HE Jia, SHI Yong-lin, QU Xiu-zhen. Quality analysis and coal blending test of Mongolian charred coal[J]. China Metallurgy, 2020, 30(2): 79-83.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 轧后ACC提高超厚14Cr1MoR钢低温冲击韧性的生产实践
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LI Yang-bing1, ZHAO Guo-chang2, LONG Jie1, YUAN Jin-cheng1, WU Yan-yang1, LIU Fu-fang3
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Production practice of improving impact toughness of 14Cr1MoR steel plate by ACC after rolling
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the technical requirements of 14Cr1MoR steel plate, the feasibility of improving the low-temperature impact toughness of 14Cr1MoR steel plate with large thickness by using ACC after rolling was analyzed. The effects of finishing rolling temperature, ACC water content and reddish temperature on the low temperature impact toughness of 14Cr1MoR steel plate were studied, and a complete and mature set of matching rolling processes was formed, the problem of low-temperature impact toughness of 14Cr1MoR steel plate was successfully solved. The practice has proved that it is feasible to improve the low-temperature impact toughness of 14Cr1MoR steel sheet by ACC after rolling. Meanwhile, the economic and social benefits brought by this process are remarkable, which is conducive to leading the development of 14Cr1MoR steel towards high quality.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 基于数据驱动的高炉煤气复合预测模型
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
(1. State Key Laboratory of Hybrid Process Industry Automation Systems and Equipment Technology,
Automation Research and Design Institute of Metallurgical Industry, Beijing 100072, China;2. State Environmental
Protection Key Laboratory of EcoIndustry, Northeastern University, Shenyang 110819, Liaoning, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Composite prediction model of blast furnace #br# gas based on data driven
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The scientific and accurate prediction of the blast furnace gas system in iron and steel company can provide a basis for the reasonable dispatching of the coal gas, which was very important for the enterprise to improve the energy efficiency, reduced the gas discharge and the environmental pollution. The equipment conditions of blast furnace gas system in iron and steel works were complex, and the fluctuation of gas quantity was frequent, so it was difficult to predict accurately. In terms of these issues, a datadriven compound prediction model of blast furnace gas was built on the basis of wavelet analysis, BP neural network and least squares support vector machines. The model taked the production plan and maintenance schedule of the blast furnace gas system into account, sets up training data sets for the production and consumption users of blast furnace gas system under different working conditions and uses multi group model parameters to predict the production, consumption and buffering capacity of blast furnace gas. Tested by the actual data of a large iron and steel enterprise, the model combined with the actual production equipment condition and the accurate prediction of gas can accurately predict the gas. The results showed that the average absolute percentage error of the model was less than 4.95%, which had a good prediction effect on the variable working gas system.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: UCM冷连轧机边降控制工作辊辊形优化
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: SHEN Xinyu1,HU Ke1,LI Hongzhou1,WANG Xiaochen2,HE Hainan2,GE Yinhui2
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Work roll contour optimization for edge drop control #br# based on UCM cold rolling mills
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
UCM cold continuous rolling mills below 1 700 mm without the function of work roll shifting are widely used in China. So it can only rely on the contour design of the work roll edge to control the edge drop of silicon steel strip. A design method of work roll end profile for UCM cold tandem mill was proposed, which could not only greatly improve the edge drop control ability, but also effectively reduce the risk of breaking through the edge contour design with protective effect. The work roll curve is good for grinding to avoid the influence of the surface quality of the roll on the surface of the strip. The profile control characteristics of the work roll and intermediate roll bending were fully utilized, and the efficient and practical combination of roll bending profile control method was used to quickly and accurately control quadratic and quartic wave plate shape defects generated in the rolling process. The edge drop of silicon steel was well controlled while the flatness problem was solved. The technology has important research value and promotion prospects.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In according with the idea of energy conservation and environment protection, amount reduction and strength enhancement are the developing trend of iron and steel industry. However，it’s extremely difficult for shape leveling of high strength steel, and the contradiction between the multiple shape defects and the lack of correcting method is prominent. Based on the 1000MPa (yield strength)high strength steel production practice, the correcting methods of shape defects are researched, and the control countermeasures, including temperature controlling, multiprocess cooperation, reasonable joint of various leveling processes, leveling speed controlling, re-leveling and so on are put forward, which can effectively implemented the shape defect leveling of 1000MPa high strength steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Decarburization dynamics analysis of gas- solid reaction of Fe- C alloy ribbon
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The solid phase decarburization reaction kinetics of Fe- C alloy ribbon was studied. The Fe- C alloy ribbon was decarburized in the tube furnace taking Ar- H2- H2O as the decarburizing atmosphere. The Fe- C alloy ribbon was put in heating field, and heated to 1020, 1080 and 1140℃, then insulated for 0，10, 30, 50, 60, 70, 80and 90minutes to decarburize, respectively. The results showed that the diffusion of carbon to the reaction interface was the restricted link for the decarburization reaction. And with the increase of the decarburization temperature and holding time, the content of decarburization was improved, and the decarburization rate was also improved due to the increase of the reaction temperature. The results illustrated that the solid phase decarburization reaction can be approximate to first- order reaction and the apparent activation energy of decarburization reaction was 144.9kJ/mol.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of inclusions on impact toughness of H-shaped steel for marine engineering
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the phenomenon of single low value in impact test of 400 MPa grade hot rolled H-shaped steel at -40 ℃, the effects of inclusion species, morphology and size on the low-temperature impact toughness were studied. The microstructures, inclusion distribution, types and sizes of the three samples in the same group were observed by optical microscopy and scanning electron microscopy. The results show that the inclusions have a certain effect on the impact toughness of H-shaped steel, and the inclusions clustered near the notch reduce the impact toughness. Therefore, reducing the number of inclusions and changing the size of inclusions is one of the ways to improve the impact toughness. In industrial production, measures such as reducing the oxygen content in the molten steel, modifying the inclusions, increasing the blowing time and protecting the casting can effectively reduce the inclusions in the steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 受热不均匀对低碳钢SAE1010板材组织及成形性能的影响
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: LIU Po1, LIU Zheng1, ZHANG Yao-cheng2, XU Feng2, XIONG Yi-feng2,3
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of uneven heating on microstructure and forming property of SAE1010 low carbon steel plate
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to investigate the effect of uneven heating during annealing on the sheet microstructure and forming property, cold rolling and continuous annealing were applied on the hot-rolled SAE1010 low carbon steel plate. The microstructure of the edge and center of hot-rolled, cold-rolled and annealed steel plate was investigated. The tensile and bending tests were carried out on the edge and central samples of the annealed plate. The results showed that a small amount of island-shaped pearlite in the hot-rolled specimens was distributed at the ferrite grain boundary and the grain size of the edge area was smaller than that of the central area. And partial lamellar cementite in the pearlite was degraded to be spherical. The microstructure of the cold-rolled sheet was characterized by the grain breakage along the rolling direction. There were many larger grains and granular cementite clusters in the edge area of the annealed steel, and the microstructure of the central area was relatively tiny and uniform. The elongation of the core material of the annealed sheet was higher than that of the edge, while the strength was smaller than that of the edge. After 180° bending, the core steel plate did not crack and the edges appeared cracks. The annealing temperature uniformity had an important influence on the microstructure and property of SAE1010 low carbon steel sheet.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of heat transfer law of blast #br# furnace lining temperature sensor
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Abstract： It prone to arise The inverted Vtype cohesive zone is easy to appear in the furnace bosh during the smelting process of blast furnace, and there is a complex flow process of solidliquid two phases. In view of this harsh environment, an online detective temperature sensor based on the onedimensional heat conduction of metal rod is proposed. Temperature probes are embedded in different positions of the sensor, and the mathematical model of the heat conduction process is established. Based on the numerical simulation, the temperature distribution at different positions of the sensor is analyzed, which is validated by the temperature control experiment. The corresponding relation of the hot end temperature and the temperature at the lower temperature zone is obtained, which can realize the purpose of calculating the temperature of the high temperature zone by the low temperature region and overcome the difficulty that the temperature at the high temperature can not be measured directly. Experimental and numerical simulation are in good agreement, the online detective sensor can provide a new method for intelligent and automatic detection of blast furnace.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The generation and physicochemical properties of the dust from the dry de- dusting system （DDS dust） were discussed, and the practice of the process flow and practical application of dry de- dusting dust recovery from converter were introduced. The practices showed the XG slag- forming compounds, made mainly from DDS dust and from some manganese ore and quartz sand and special adhesives, can be used as converter slagging agent during the steelmaking. At the same time, the iron- carbon composite pellets, whose primary raw materials was also DDS dust, added some coking dust and special adhesives in manufacturing, was a fine auxiliary material for making steel. Both XC slag- forming compounds and iron- carbon composite pellets, mainly made from DDS dust, can bring plenty of economic and social and environmental benefits.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis on grindability and combustion performance of biomass fuel for mixed injection of blast furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to explore the feasibility of biomass fuel for blast furnace injection and alleviate the problems of energy and environment, the dried biomass fuel (peanut shell)was mixed with the pulverized coal injection into blast furnace at different rates and crushed, and the physical and chemical properties of the crushed materials were tested and the combustion process was analyzed. And the feasibility of biomass fuel for blast furnace injection without the traditional carbonization process was studied. The results showed that the proper addition of peanut shell was beneficial to improve the grindability index of the mixed materials, and reduce the ash content and sulfur content of coal powder, which is beneficial to the smelting process control. Moreover, the activation energy of the mixed material in the volatilization analysis combustion stage and the fixed carbon combustion stage was significantly reduced, so as to promote the fuel combustion. When 20% peanut shell was added, the combustion temperature of the fixed carbon in the mixed material was reduced by about 40 ℃ compared with anthracite.
