http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis of failure mechanism of coke dry quenching boiler tube
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Coke dry quenching boiler tube and the corrosion products were systematically studied, and the failure cause of the boiler tube was proposed, which was the oxygen/sulphur corrosion and scour by hightemperature powder dust. For the tube with long service time, the oxygen and sulphur corrosion severely occurred in the wearresistant layer and slightly occurred in the interface layer, and only the oxygen corrosion occurred slightly in the metal base. However, the oxygen and sulphur corrosion severely occurred in the wearresistant layer, the interface layer and the crack in the tube with short service time. Besides, there were also some defects such as pearlite spheroidization and full decarburization layer in the internal surface in the tube with short service time. It was inferred that the boiler tube was overheated, which would aggravate the corrosion of oxygen and sulphur. Furthermore, the boiler tube suffered the scour by hightemperature powder dust, which was another significant cause of tube failure. Reducing the dust amount in the circulating gas, especially coarse particles, would effectively weaken the scour by dust and to control the temperature of the tube surface, which was the key to increase the service life of the tube.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Due to the free- heating direct rolling process of continuous casting billet without the heating furnace, the energy and cost were saved and the emission was reduced compared with the conventional continuous casting- rolling process. The characteristics and key technologies of the free- heating direct rolling process were introduced, and the application of the narrow window control in the direct rolling process was analyzed. According to the improvement of the need for the product quality, the big data- driven direct rolling narrow window control technology was expected to emerge. With this technology, the lagging of the temperature and composition control system in the steel smelting- continuous casting- direct rolling process can be solved, which could be a revolutionary change to China’s steel industry.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The change tendency of the carbon segregation of high carbon steel 82B was compared and analyzed under the different terminal electromagnetic stirring and superheat. The results showed that the intensity of electromagnetic stirring was not simply and positively correlated with the carbon segregation, but changed with the different casting temperature range. Meanwhile, under the same end electromagnetic stirring parameters, the degree of superheat of molten steel had great influence on the carbon segregation of high carbon steel billets. Under the premise of fully considering the castability of steel, the low superheat could be beneficial to get good cast structure and reduce the carbon segregation.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research progress of graphene composites used for gas sensors
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Since its discovery, graphene has been used more and more extensively for its excellent two- dimensional planar structure and good conductivity, thermal conductivity, and honeycomb network structure, which provides a series of innovative ideas for various aspects of scientific research. Graphene has been its excellent two- dimensional planar structure and good electrical conductivity, thermal conductivity, and structural cellular network structure. The innovative ideas of graphene in the gas sensor, as well as the current development overview and future prospects, are summarized. The unique honeycomb network structure of graphene has the good adsorption capacity for gas, desorption ability under simple conditions and the good electrical conductivity causes the electron exchange resulting in the variation of graphene resistance when the gas to be tested contacts the surface of graphene. Thus, a graphene- based gas sensor can use the small change to measure the concentration of the tested gas. It is the graphene- based gas s sensor that can use this small change to measure the concentration of the gas under test. The current research shows that in order to improve the gas sensing properties of graphene, other metal ions or metal oxides with organic polymers are doped on the surface of graphene.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of asymmetric rolling on microstructure #br# and properties of AZ31B magnesium alloy
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The effect of asymmetric rolling on the grain refinement of AZ31B magnesium alloy was investigated. The changes of macromorphology and grain size at different temperatures and reduction rates were analyzed and compared with that of symmetrical rolled alloy. The experimental results indicated that the overall grain size of the asymmetrical rolled alloy was finer than that of symmetrical rolled alloy. The grains was the finest and uniformity when the asymmetric rolling was at the temperature of 350 ℃ and the reduction rate of 60%, and the average grain sizes of the upper surface, the center layer and the lower surface were 2.35, 2.84 and 2.22 μm, respectively. The dynamic recrystallization of the structure occurs in the range of 300350 ℃. With the increase of rolling temperature, the grain boundary migrated and diffused sufficiently, and the grain grew, which led to the deterioration of the comprehensive properties of magnesium alloys. The tensile strength and elongation of asymmetrically rolled sheets were better than that of symmetrically rolled sheets. When the reduction rate was 30% at the rolling temperature of 400 ℃, the comprehensive mechanical properties were excellent, and the tensile strength was 365.36 MPa and the elongation at break was 34.9%.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：A low-cost cementing material, steel slag-blast furnace slag-zeolite binder(SBZ), was prepared based on the synergistic action of activation and different waste slag. The basis material ratio was determined by response surface optimization test, which was the steel slag of 38.14%, granulated blast-furnace slag of 38.14%, zeolite of 10%, modified gypsum of 10%, and composite activator of 3.72%. On this basis, the polysilicon waste with the dosage of 8% was used, and the specific surface area of the binder was 420 m2/kg, the 28 d flexural strength reached 6.3 MPa, and the compressive strength reached 42.2 MPa. The SBZ cementitious materials can effectively cure heavy metal lead (Pb2+) and chromium (Cr6+). Compared with ordinary Portland cement, it had higher immobilization efficiency, lower cost and good application prospects. The hydrated calcium silicate, hydrated calcium aluminate, ettringite and zeolite materials in the system had an important contribution to the solidification of heavy metals.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The most large-scale travelling grate machine pelletizing plant with working area of 624 m2 and annual output of 5.0 million was built up at Baogang. The airflow system was optimized. Multiple novel equipment was designed and developed independently like large drying kiln, reciprocal feeder, rotary supporting pelletizing disc and steady flow feed hopper, etc. What′s more, some large-scale equipment from home and abroad, such as vertical intensive mixer and high-pressure grinding roller was integrated and applied. Energy conservation and environment protection was fully considered during the design process, which brought about lower energy consumption, dust emission and noise pollution. The precipitator dust was totally reused and few solid waste was discharged. Since being put into operation in December 2015, the equipment has been running smoothly with favourable production index. The iron grade of pellet can be above 65%, the compressive strength can be no less than 3 100 kN, and the process energy consumption can be 17.05 kg/t, which has reached the international advanced level and realized good social and economic benefits．

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to reduce the energy consumption of the DRI process, the two-section series DRI process which based on the laboratory findings was researched. In the first section shaft furnace，the direct reduction iron was produced by using the raw gas preheating the carbon-containing pellet which was made up of the iron ore concentrate and inorganic binder and reduced by the coke，semi-coke or anthracite. The hot metal was first separated out from the melting direct reduced iron with electric furnace，and then the desulphurization process and the production of water slag were conducted. In the second section shaft furnace，the flue gas after purifying from the first shaft furnace was used to produce the direct reduced iron, and the raw materials were mainly pellets.The results showed that the estimation energy consumption of the tandem process was about 394.8 kg/t，and comparing with the hot metal， the comparable energy consumption was 487.8 kg/t which was 41.2 kg/t lower than the blast furnace process. The pollutant and CO2 emissions of the process were close to the natural gas process, and lower than BF process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence of coiling temperature on properties of hot-rolled high strength steel used for mixing tank
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of different coiling temperatures on the microstructure and properties of C-Si-Mn-Al hot-rolled high strength steel used for mixing tank were studied in the laboratory. And the structure and mechanical properties of the tested steels at different coiling temperatures were analyzed and studied by several techniques such as laser scanning confocal microscope (LSCM), scanning electron microscope (SEM), and electron backscatter diffraction (EBSD). The experimental results showed that ferrite and pearlite were obtained by coiling at 580 and 550 ℃. Ferrite and bainite were obtained at 400 ℃. Ferrite, bainite and martensite were obtained at 300 ℃. And Ferrite and martensite were obtained at 150 ℃. As the coiling temperature decreased, the tensile strength and hardness of the tested steel gradually increased, and the elongation gradually decreased. The tensile strength of the tested steel coiled at 300 ℃ was 1 029 MPa and the Vickers hardness was 342.6. The tensile strength coiled at the 150 ℃ was as high as 1 265 MPa, the Vickers hardness reached 360.7, and the yield ratio reached the lowest, only 0.58.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and application of low silicon and low magnesium sintering technology in Shougang Jingtang
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to further improve the level of the concentrate charging in the large- sized 5 500 m3 blast furnace, based on the natural magnesium sintering without dolomite, combined with the relevant sintering cup test, the microstructure was studied in Shougang Jingtang Ironmaking Department. According to the production practice, the measures, such as optimizing the ore mix constitution and adjusting the process control parameters, were applied to produce the low- silicon and magnesium sinter with gradually reducing the mass fraction of SiO2 and MgO in the sinter. Through the application of the low- silicon low- magnesium sintering technology, the level of concentrate charging was guaranteed on the basis of the steady strength and granularity of the sinter in the Shougang Jingtang Ironmaking Department, and it had a good effect, which created a good raw material condition for improving the overall furnace grade, reducing the slag ratio and the injected coal in Jingtang 5 500 m3 special large blast furnace.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Removal method of oxide scale on high strength hot rolled strip
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The addition of Si element in the hot rolled slab is beneficial to the improvement of the strength of the hot- rolled products, the reduction of manufacturing costs and the improvement of the plasticity and toughness of the products. But, in the production process of high strength hot rolled steel strip, there will be a typical red rust surface defect with the increase of Si element. The results show that the 2FeO·SiO2 compound produced by Si element and Fe element is the main reason for the defect of red rust scale. The conventional hot strip rolling descaling system (system pressure at about 22 MPa) is difficult to completely remove the red rust and using the ultra high pressure descaling system (system pressure at about 40 MPa) is the most effective way to removing this oxide scale. The applications of the ultra high pressure descaling system for removing the oxide scale on the hot rolled strips′ surface in the new hot strip rolling line and the transformation hot strip rolling line are mainly introduced.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (1. State Key Laboratory of Advanced Metallurgy, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China; 2. Yinshan Section Steel Co., Ltd., Laiwu Iron and Steel Group, Laiwu 271104, Shandong, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Optimized scheme of sequence casting based on "furnacecaster matching" principle
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：To ensure the continuous casting of No.2 continuous casting machine with a short casting period, the molten steel was required to be supplied by different converters at the same time in a steelmaking plant, resulting in the indefinite relationship between the converter and the caster, as well as the difficulty of production. The process operation cycle and production operation mode of steelmakingcontinuous casting process in this plant was analyzed to explore the rational relationship between furnace and caster on the basis of continuous casting. Results showed that under "one converter matching one caster" production mode, the maximum continuous casting heats of No.2 continuous casting machine was only 6 heats. While under "certain converter matching certain caster" production mode, if the molten steel was supplied suitably by No.3 converter, the maximum continuous casting heats of No.2 continuous casting machine could be increased to 19 heats. Based on this result, the optimization of the "flexibility" of the continuous caster and the rational distribution of molten steel supply, No.2 continuous casting machine could meet the requirements of the actual production. Moreover, the matching degree of "convertercaster" was used to evaluate the relationship. The calculation results showed that the optimized furnacemachine correspondence was significantly improved.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.author_cn: ZHANG Xin- jie，ZHANG Huan- huan，CUI Li- min
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Hebei Engineering Research Center for Special Alloy Regeneration, AVIC Shangda High Temperature Alloy Material Co., Ltd., Xingtai 054800, Hebei, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Discussion of austenitic stainless steel inclusion control technology
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The inclusions in austenitic stainless steel impact on the corrosion resistant performance of the steel, as well as the plasticity, toughness and fatigue resistance. The technology of EAF+LF+AOD adopted by the AVIC Shangda High Temperature Alloy Material Co., Ltd. for controlling the austenitic stainless steel inclusion is introduced. The main source and production mechanism of inclusions are analyzed, and the control of the inclusion of smelting process is systematically planned in the process design. By strengthening the raw material control, optimizing AOD deoxidizing system, applying the calcium treatment and weak mixing process in LF refining to modify the inclusion, and adopting the technology of argon protecting pouring in the casting pouring, the decrease and steady control of the content of inclusions in steel are finally realized, which can meet the quality requirements of nuclear power station, pressure vessel and other high- end stainless steel tube billets.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 三安连铸中间包快换的工艺实践
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Department of Energy Production Management， Fujian San′an Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Quanzhou 362411， Fujian, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Practice of tundish quick change process in Sanan Steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The awareness, preparation, fast changing conditions, time and operation points of the tundish quick change in the steel plant of Fujian Sanan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd. were described. The practice showed that the rational utilization of the tundish quick change process could improve the operating rate, the yield of molten steel and reduce the shutdown accident caused by the process, equipment and human factors. The number of start and stop was reduced and the effect of the operation of cast starting and teeming stop on the quality of the slab was decreased. At the same time, the equipment cycle management and state management level could be improved, the maintenance cost could be reduced, the utilization rate of the equipment maintenance personnel working hours could be increased, and the maintenance rate could be increased from 75.9% before the quick change to 99.24%.
keywords_en: Key words: Key words: tundish quick change

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Study on effect of pulsed magnetic field period on solidification structure based on multifractal method
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the effect of pulsed magnetic field on solidification structure, the pulsed magnetic field was applied to the solidification process of titanium treated low carbon steel by a spontaneously developed noncontact pulsed magnetic field generating device, and the influence of pulsed magnetic field under different periods on the solidification structure was studied using a metallographic microscope and multifractal software designed by the laboratory. The results showed that the solidification structure of this steel had fractal characteristics. With the extension of the pulsed magnetic field cycle, Δα and Δf(α) appeared to decrease first and then increase, and the texture was most uniform when the pulsed magnetic field period was 0.5 s. Therefore, it can be concluded that there is an optimal value for the effect of the pulsed magnetic field period on the solidification structure.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Corrosion behavior of hot- molten- aluminum- dipped Q235 steel under simulated sea water environment
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The corrosion behaviors of the raw Q235 and hot- molten- aluminum- dipped (HMAD) Q235 steels were investigated in mass fraction of 3.5% sodium chloride solution. The surface morphologies of the samples before and after corrosion were detected using scanning electron microscopy (SEM). The corrosion rates of the raw Q235 and HMAD Q235 steels were studied by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy and a weight- loss method. The results showed that the corrosion rate of the raw Q235 among the three samples was the fastest with a value of about 0.11 mm/a (mm/year). The corrosion rates of HMAD Q235 steels with aluminum- dipping once and twice were 0.04 and 0.03 mm/a, respectively. The corrosion resistance of the raw Q235 steel was significantly enhanced after HMAD treatment, which indicated that HMAD was an effective way to improve the seawater corrosion resistance of Q235 steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of mass fraction of Si on transformation rule #br# and process of producing DP600 in CSP
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
 Based on the component of CSiMnCrMo hotrolled dualphase steel of 600 MPa grade, two test steels with different mass fraction of Si (0.55% and 1.17%) were designed. The CCT curves of the two test steels were measured by Gleeble3500 thermalmechanical simulator. The effect of mass fraction of Si on the phase transformation evolution of the test steels during the continuous cooling process was analyzed, and the effect of mass fraction of Si on the production process of mediumtemperature coiling hotrolled dualphase steel in short process was studied. The results showed that compared with w(Si)=1.17%, w(Si)=0.55% reduced the ferrite transformation temperature by about 4050 ℃, significantly shortened the incubation period of ferrite transformation and increased the volume fraction of ferrite. In the actual production of CSP line, the finishing temperature of the lowSi test steel can be controlled in 820830 ℃. The low finishing temperature increased the ferrite phase transformation time by about 2.2 s and the amount of ferrite transformation. Moreover, the occurrence of nonmartensite microstructure can be avoided in the subsequent phase transformation process. Therefore, the lowSi test steel was suitable for the production of mediumtemperature coiling hotrolled dual steel on the compact thin slab production line.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Production status analysis of wire rod for high strength bridge cable
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In the past five years, the tensile strength of zinc- coated wire for bridge cable has been greatly improved from 1 770, 1 860, 1 960 MPa to the current level of 2 000 MPa and above. Torsion indicators have a disruptive change from the previous several turns to the current ten or twenty turns. The reason is that on the one hand, the drawing and zinc- coated process are optimized. On the other hand, the quality of the wire rod for zinc- coated has been improved, which is the main aspect. The production status of wire rod for zinc- coated steel wire of high strength bridge cable at home and abroad was discussed. From the aspects of composition design, process route, wire rod toughened treatment and microstructure characteristics, the characteristics and development trends of different domestic and international production processes were discussed, which provided theoretical support for the production of wire rod for zinc- coated steel wire of high strength bridge cable in China.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Cause and control measures of plate surface cracks for plastic mould steel SM50
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract： Aiming at the crack defect on the plate surface of plastic mold steel SM50 in Tangshan steel, the causes of crack were analyzed in depth by means of production process investigation, energy spectrum analysis and metallographic analysis. The result showed that the surface crack defect of SM50 steel plate was not caused by the original cracks of the casting slab, but the hotpacked crack caused by the extremely uneven grain size of the cast slab due to the hotfilling of the continuous casting billet in the twophase region. Through improving the existing production process, the improvement measures of slow cooling and warm loading of casting billet into the furnace were proposed. After the new process was implemented, the proportion of cracks in the hotpacked crack of SM50 steel decreased from 4.24% to less than 0.30%, and the surface crack rate of steel plate decreased significantly.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Physical simulation on optimization of flow control devices in fourstrand tundish
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Optimization of flow control devices for fourstrand tundish in a steel plant was investigated by physical simulation. The optimization experiment was divided into the optimization of baffles type and the optimization of baffles structure. The experimental results showed that the flow state of the fluid in the prototype scheme was very poor, and the excessive diameter of the diversion orifice could easily lead to shortcircuit flow, and the proportion of dead zone was as high as 34.16%. The proportion of dead zone in the optimized scheme Y3 was decreased by 33.14%. The average residence time of the fluid was extended from 761.2 to 900.7 s, and the stagnation time was extended from 32.2 to 76.7 s. The optimization effect was remarkable. It showed that the optimum scheme could significantly improve the utilization ratio of ladle volume and the flow state of molten steel, which was conducive to the improvement of metallurgical quality.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Current status and development trend of gun barrel steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The steel for the gun barrel determines the performance of the bodyworn weapon and affects the operational sustainability and maneuverability of the artillery. By summarizing and analyzing the steel alloy composition system, manufacturing process and main material performance indexes of gun barrels at home and abroad. Point out the current major brands and performance levels of gun steel at home and abroad and the problem of insufficient high temperature performance. By investigating the latest research results of artillery steel at home and abroad and the overall technical requirements of bodybuilding weapons, the research status and development trend of steel for gun barrels are summarized and forecasted. For the development of largecaliber artillery guns high strength steel in order to reduce the wall thickness and weight. For the medium and small caliber fastfire guns, the ablation performance of the gun steel is developed to improve the service life.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: (1. Institute of Metallurgical Technology of Meikuang (Suzhou), Shanghai 201821, China;2. School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering, University of Science and Technology Beijing, Beijing 100083, China)
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Influence of different SiO2 mass fraction of fine powder on sinter index
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to compare the influence of different concentrate powder on the sintering performance and the sinter quality, the hightemperature performance test of concentrate powder and a series of sinter pot tests were performed. The experiment results showed that there were significant differences between the different iron ore concentrate in microstructure and hightemperature property. Without changing the same flux structure, with the increase of the silica mass fraction in concentrate powders, the liquid phase fluidity index decreased, and the amount of the bonded phase decreased, which was not conducive to the formation of binder minerals in the mixture. When sintered with different iron ore concentrate, the microstructure of sinter had a significant difference. Increasing the SiO2 mass fraction in the iron ore concentrate resulted in the decrease of the production of calcium ferrite, the gradual increase of silicate and the increase of voids in sinter. Compared with the sintering of the low silica mass fraction in iron ore concentrate, when using the high silica of iron ore concentrate to sinter, the solid fuel consumption increased, the drum strength decreased and the particle size less than 10 mm increased significantly with the sintering of the high silica mass fraction in iron ore concentrate.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Balance and control of potassium and sodium in No.6 blast furnace of Baotou Steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
According to the serious circulation and enrichment of alkali metals in Baotou Steel, which influenced the smooth operation of BF and the quality of pig iron, the equilibrium distribution of alkali metals in No.6 BF of Baotou Steel was calculated by measuring the alkali metals content in the raw fuel and output of No.6 BF, and combining with the actual production data of BF during sampling period. The results showed that the alkali load in No.6 BF of Baotou Steel was 4.888 kg/t, of which 69.29% alkali metals were brought in by the sinter. Among the expenditure items, most of the alkali metals were taken away by slag, accounting for 83.41% of the total expenditure. In order to reduce the damage caused by alkali metal to BF production, the measures to reduce the harm of alkali metals in combination with the actual situation of No.6 blast furnace of Baotou Steel were put forward.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Numerical Study on Flow Character in Bottom Zone of Top Combustion Regenerative Hot Air Stove
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Top combustion regenerative hot air stove has a wide application prospect because of the following advantages: large heat storage area, high strength structure, high thermal efficiency, high hot air temperature, low maintenance costs and long life. Now, most researches about hot air stove focus on the structure optimization, flow structure improvement and further increasing hot air temperature. In this study, a thee-dimension mathematical model was built to simulate the flow field in bottom zone of hot air stove, understand the flow theory as the fluid pass the support pillar. Furthermore, several different structure dam-boards were designed, and the influence of the different structure to the flow field was analyzed. The results of this study enrich the top combustion regenerative hot blast stove theory, and provide the theoretical reference for the top combustion hot blast stove structure optimization, increasing the hot air temperature, saving energy and protecting environments.

Analysis of Microwave Effects on Sulfur Dioxide in Sintering

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：In this paper, absorbent adsorption mechanism modified by microwave was discussed from the thermal effects and nonthermal effects of microwave. In the nonthermal effects, the Morse oscillator model and Raman spectra was applied to discuss the changes of elements Morse potential in the highfrequency electromagnetic fields. In the thermal effect, the absorption characteristics of the microwave is discussed mainly through testing the contact angle modified before and after the microwave. The results show that the Morse potential energy of the absorbent modified by microwave has reduced from 9 913.13 cm1 (original sample) to 5 6831 cm-1, and the contact angle from 5744° (original sample) to 4934°.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Numerical Analysis on Air-gap Distribution in Billet Mould
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Based on the inherited stress of shell, the two-dimensional thermo-mechanical coupled model of billet in mould is established. The model is calculated with multiple load step way by the finite element analysis software ANSYS. The sizes and distributions of air-gap are analyzed with three different tapers. The result indicates that the air-gap firstly appears at the corner and 60~72mm below the meniscus. Subsequently, the air-gap extends to the centre of strand surface. Contact between copper wall and copper wall only appears on the surface center at mould exit. The gap grows faster in the mould upper area within 300mm. The gap growth gets slow when the distance from the meniscus increases. The gap distribution along mould height is consistent with the parabola curve. The gap growth will be retarded and the gap width and extension will be reduced when the mould taper increases.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 刘增勋， 张海辉， 刘建敏， 安振亮. 方坯结晶器内气隙分布的数值分析[J]. 中国冶金, 2012, 22(5): 13-17. LIU Zeng-xun， ZHANG Hai-hui， LIU Jian-min， AN Zhen-liang. Numerical Analysis on Air-gap Distribution in Billet Mould. China Metallurgy, 2012, 22(5): 13-17.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Manufacturer of seamless pipes must take into account the construction and welding process in oil field, as well as the service security of line pipe applied in severe H2S environment. So pipe is inspected by not only HIC and SSC test in API 5L specification but also SOHIC test in NACE TM0103—2003 which is the first time for this test being applied in testing of seamless pipe. This article studies the experimental theory and the key processes of the test, concludes the several key processes which affect the experiment result, and takes more severe control measures both in material design and manufacturing to protect the safety of the pipes.
keywords_en: Manufacturing of line pipe of large diameter

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
1.State Key Laboratory of Advanced Metallurgy, University of Science and Technology Beijing， Beijing 100083， China
2. School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering，University of Science and Technology Beijing， Beijing 100083, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research Status of High Manganese TWIP Steel for Automotive Industry
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The plastic mechanism of high manganese TWIP steel is closely related to its stacking fault energy (SFE). Results on determination of TWIP steel stacking fault energy from experiment and thermodynamic calculation are different, and the SFE range in which TWIP effect occurs is also not consistent among various studies. It is liable to observe the porosity and segregation defects in as cast TWIP steel because of the large margin between liquidus and solidus. The reduction of area for as cast TWIP steel is below 40%, which possibly leads to dendrites cracks during bending and straightening process in conventional continuous casting. Horizontal continuous casting and twin roll strip casting show distinctive advantages in TWIP steel casting. The temperature range for TWIP steel hot rolling is very narrow which is resulted from the low solidus and weak hot ductility. Annealing temperature and time after cold rolling are still in laboratory research stage. The strengthening mechanism for Fe-Mn-Si-Al TWIP steel is mainly due to the dynamic Hall-Petch effect by deformation twins, while for Fe-Mn-C(-Al) TWIP steel, dynamic strain aging should be the primary factor. Al alloying in TWIP steel is helpful to improve the delayed fracture resistance of TWIP steel, attributed to the α-Al2O3 layer under specimen surface which can prevent hydrogen diffusion.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_cn: 摘要 利用现有烧结工艺、原料和加工设备，提出一种全新烧结工艺——酸、碱混合烧结工艺。本工艺在碱性烧结料强化制粒的同时，与酸性球团在入烧结机前进行混合，最后在烧结机上实现酸性球团与碱性料混合烧结(料层厚度为1000mm)。研究结果表明，采用新工艺后，料层透气性改善明显，1000mm料层的负压为985kPa，优于600mm普通料层的1209kPa；另外，加入5~8mm的球团明显比加入大于8mm球团透气性好。当酸性料用量为40%，配碳量（质量分数）为3.8%，烧结负压为1200kPa时，烧结矿各项产、质量指标最好。
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Experiment on hybrid sintering of acid and basic materials with extra-deep bed
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：By using the existing sinter technique, material and processing equipment, a new sintering technolgy is put forward in this project. It can achieve hybrid sintering on the sintering machine with an exthra-deep bed (1000mm) to enhance pelletization effect of basic materials,which is mixed with acid pellet before distributing on the sintering machine. Results show that after adopting the new technique, the material layer permeability improved significantly. The negative pressure of 1000mm material layer was only 985kPa which was better than 1209kPa of 600mm material layer was. Moreover, the permeability of adding 5—8mm pellets was significantly higher than adding >8mm pellets.When the amount of acid pellets was 40%, with wC=3.8%, 1200kPa vacuum sintering, the quality of the sinterwas the best.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Numerical simulation of combustion zone in foreside of tuyeres of oxygen blast furnace
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The mathematical model of combustion zone in foreside of tuyeres of oxygen blast furnace was established on the basis of material balance and energy balance according to the gas film mass transfer control theory. The concentration field and temperature field of gas components in the combustion zone were simulated at different air blast rate and oxygen humidity. The simulation results show that the gas temperature and concentration distribution of the combustion zone can be adjusted by the air blast rate, and the oxygen blast furnace cohesive zone shape and gas flow rate can also be regulated. The increasement of oxygen humidity can reduce the theoretical flame temperature in front of the tuyere and increase the H2 content of the reduction gas.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the structure and property requirements of C350 cold-formed structural steel hollow sections, the grade of Ti-microalloying composition design process was determined, combined with the FTSR process. It had been establishing the rational TMCP process by determining the composition of the continuous cooling transformation curve, and achieving effective control of Si content by optimizing BOF→LF→FTSC process. It shows that the final product obtained the optimum structure, surface quality and cold-formed performance by undertaking physico-chemical properties test. This is a beneficial attempt for further promotion of ti-microalloyed steel production process.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The development and practice of production of low-carbon aluminium killed steel using LD-RH-CC technology in Laiwu Steelmaking Plant was introduced．By developing low sulphur smelting technology in the whole process, constructing RH general circulation model, developing new slag modifier and developing the technology of full protection casting, the purity of molten steel was improved and the LD-RH-CC process was better controlled. The final sulfur content after RH refining furnace was controlled in 0.006%, the continuous casting machine furnace number reached 10 and above, nitrogen and oxygen content in steel were controlled in 0.02%, and promoted steadily the development of RH refining furnace process in smelting low-carbon aluminium killed steel.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Key technologies of cleanliness and homogeneity control for high-speed heavy rail steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：High quality of heavy-haul rail steel is necessary for high-speed railway. Therefore, improving the cleanliness and homogeneity of high-speed heavy rail steel are the key technologies for improving the product quality. Technologies such as using the oxidizing technology of non-Aluminum, vacuum degassing (VD), protecting cast in all process and the tundish metallurgical technology, strict casting speed and molten steel temperature control, M-EMS, dynamic secondary cooling and dynamic soft reduction control technologies were used in Baotou Steel. The practice shows that in the high-speed heavy rail steel, w T ［O］≤0.0020%，w［N］≤0.0050%，w［H］≤0.00015%，w［Al］≤0.0040%, non-metallic inclusions category A ≤2.0 level, while B ,C and D ≤1.0 level. The average rate of center looseness index≤1.0 is 83.1%, the average rate of center shrinkage cavity index≤0.5 is 94.3%, and the highest index of carbon central segregation is 1.07.The quality of the production can meet the requirements of “rail standards for the 200km/h speed railway line for passenger transportation”.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The high temperature oxidation resistance at 800,900,1000℃ of 310S stainless steel were investigated by gaining weight method. The high temperature oxidation kinetics curves were drawn. The films morphology, micro-structure and phase structure were analyzed by SEM, XRD and EDS. The results indicated that the weight gain curves were approximately in accordance with parabola law at 800,900,1000℃, which revealed that the steel had an excellent high-temperature oxidation resistance. The oxidation scale was consist of the dense MnCr2O4, Cr2O3 and inside SiO2, which was the main reason for the well high- temperature oxidation resistance.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of galvanizing- based quenching and partitioning process on microstructure and properties of steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Q/P heat treatment process which based on the hot dip galvanizing technological features was tested, and the effects of austenitizing temperature and partitioning time on microstructure and mechanical properties were studied. The results indicate that, with increasing austenitizing temperature from 800℃ to 900℃, the ferrite volume decreases, the martensite and retained austenite volume increase, the yield and tensile strength both increase while elongation decreases. The product of strength and elongation is the highest when austenitizing temperature is 900℃. By partitioning for 10,30,60s at 460℃, as the partitioning time increases, the martensite is tempered and the austenitic transformed into bainite continuously, resulting in reduction of retained austenite volume after Q/P treatment, which causes the decrease of tensile strength, elongation, and strength elongation product.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the problem of the rapid detection for raw material mixing uniformity under the pellet process, the coefficient of variation (CV) was proposed to assess the degree of uniformity of the components. And then, the material mixing effect of the concentrate powder and the bentonite under the condition of different ratio were measured in the experiment, the feasibility of the three rapid detection methods were analysed, which are the quality index CV, the humidity index CV and the element content index CV. What’s more, the pellet raw material of field sampling was tested, which verify the validity of the aforementioned rapid detection method, the standard to judge pellet raw material mixing uniformity was proposed. The obtained results can provide guidance for future research on pellet raw material mixing uniformity of online detection technology.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The sliver defect on black plate surface is studied in this paper by SEM. It is found that the main parameters induce the defect are slag entrapment and iron oxide scale residual. After the production process are analyzed, we can make a conclusion that: control the aluminum drop below 0.0050%, the mold level fluctuation below ±2.5mm, the slab charge temperature above 200℃，an optimized casting heats, increase insert depth of straightening descaling bend- roll can sharply decrease the defect incidence.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Through the study of the reaction mechanism of manganese element in the process of converter smelting，the influence of various factors on the quality of the manganese in the end of the converter and its change law were analyzed, and the smelting process was formed, in which end point temperature was in a range of 1635 to 1655℃,the end point carbon mass fraction was in a range of 0.06% to 0.08%, and less slag smelting was applied. Finally，the manganese quality fraction of converter end point was increased by 0.032% compared with the same period last year，and the cost per ton of steel was cut down more than 1.5 yuan.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The ring cooler adopts the 580m2 ring cooling blasting type in Jingtang sintering plant，which was used to cool the sinter. The sinter cooling is an important part of sinter process. Whether the ring cooler is stable will cause a huge impact to the sintering yielding. By analyzing the cause of No.2 ring cooler deviation fault and the impact，the swing frame is measured and adjusted repeatedly. By using the effective treatment，the question of ring cooler deviation is solved，the impact that is caused by the deviation is absolutely curbed.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Through the study on control technology of nitrogen content during the process of 300 t BOF→LF→RH→CC in Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Company，the influence factors and control measures of nitrogen content in molten steel were discussed. Combined with the production practice，process optimization measures including strengthening BOF operation，slagging by submerged arcin the LF，ensuring vacuum degree of RH and protecting casting in continuous casting were proposed. Especially，the nitrogen absorption during LF refining was controlled and the denitrification function of RH refining was performed. Thus，the nitrogen absorption was less than 0.001 0% after the development of LF refining. The nitrogen content can be 0.003 0% after RH refining，and the average nitrogen absorption can be 0.000 14% during the continuous casting process，and the average nitrogen content in the finished product of pipeline steel in Beijing Shougang Jingtang was 0.003 1%，which reached the level of advanced enterprises.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Carbon Steel Strip Plant of Hongxing Iron and Steel Co.， Ltd.， JISCO， Jiayuguan 735100， Gansu， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of P and Ti on texture of containing phosphorus high strength IF steel
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of the alloying elements of P and Ti on the recrystallization texture characteristics of TiIF steel and containing P high strength TiIF steel were researched by EBSD. The results showed that the P element was beneficial to the increase of {111}〈112〉 texture on the γ orientation line，but also increase the strength of the component which is not conducive to the r value，and the promoting effect of P element on the development of {111} texture depends on the mass fraction of excess Ti in steel，the high Ti mass fraction will promote the precipitation of FeTiP particles，which can hinder the growth of {111} oriented recrystallization grains，and weaken the intensity of {111} surface texture. The results can provide a guide to the adjustment of the alloying elements in the material. To ensure that the produced containing P high strength IF steel has certain intensity and good drawing property，the Ti mass fraction in IF steel should be reduced，and the Nb should be added to reduce the effect of the decrease of Ti on the fixation of the interstitial atom.

2. School of Metallurgical and Ecological Engineering， University of Science and Technology Beijing， Beijing 100083， China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Effect of alkali metals on thermal properties of coke
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Through simulating the actual situation where coke was simultaneously affected by K and Na vapours in blast furnace, the evolution of coke structure and thermal properties（CRI，CSR）after alkalization with different proportions of K and Na vapours were revealed. Results showed that the coke structure was broken when the proportion of alkali vapours reached 3%，and the coke fine formation rate increased with the increase of K vapour，which indicated that K vapour caused a great damage to coke structure. The CRI of coke reached the highest and the CSR reached the lowest when mass ratio of K/Na was 3/7. It was observed with SEM and energy dispersive spectrometer that K and Na existed in both mineral matters and carbon matrix; nepheline, generated when coke reacted with alkaline (K，Na) vapours, was determined by XRD. The content of K and Na in nepheline is dependent on the ratio of alkaline (K，Na).

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 薄带钢热连轧活套起套控制研究及优化
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: Patent Examination Cooperation Center of the Patent Office, SIPO, Guangdong, Guangzhou 510530, Guangdong, China
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and optimization of raising-up control of looper of thin strip hot rolling line
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The control level of the looper of the finishing mill group has directly influence on the rolling capability of thin products. Besides, it′s the premise to ensure the stability of the width and thickness quality control. Whether the raising-up of looper is stable has directly influence on the security of the crossing process in hot strip mill. The premise of stable raising-up of looper is to keep the initial metal flow rate difference between stands in a certain scope. However, affected by many factors, it′s difficult to control the stability of the raise-up of looper when rolling the thin gauge products. According to the production status of some hot mill plant, by analyzing the control process of raising-up of looper, four-point control requirements were put forward from the raising-up angle and tension control. The control technology of raising-up torque in the thin gauge products rolling process was optimized. At the same time, the tension setting calculation model was optimized by the introduction of the stability maintenance tension coefficient, and in this way, the overshoot of strip head tension was decreased. In practice, the optimized raising-up control of looper had achieved good results and the stability of crossing process of the thin gauge products were improved.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 李芳. 薄带钢热连轧活套起套控制研究及优化[J]. 中国冶金, 2017, 27(7): 62-67. LI Fang. Research and optimization of raising-up control of looper of thin strip hot rolling line. China Metallurgy, 2017, 27(7): 62-67.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 米巴赫焊机设备功能精度的维护措施
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （Cold- rolling Department, Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Tangshan 063000, Hebei, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Maintenance measures of functional precision of Miebach welder equipment
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：Miebach laser welder is one of the key equipment to realize the continuous production of cold rolling lines, has more advanced advantage than any other welding methods, and can dramatically improve the reliability of the seam quality during rolling and reduce the seam breakage rate. The laser welding quality mainly depends on the control precision of the main parameters functions, including the welding speed, the laser output power, the focus distance, the welding head pressure, the gaps of the operating side(OS) and the driving side(DS), the second cut amount, and the pre/post heating. The Miebach welder in the No.2 PL- TCM line of Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co., Ltd. is investigated. Combined with the effective use of the QCDS weld inspection system, series of maintenance actions to ensure the welding quality by improving the function accuracy of laser welder are summarized, the key points and the technical regulations during the welder maintenance are confirmed, and the good performance is obtained. The study could supply important tips for other similar lines to quickly diagnose the bad welding quality due to the lack of the equipment function and accuracy.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 常规热连轧粗轧工作辊磨损分析与应用
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn: （2 250 Hot Strip Mill， Hunan Valin Lianyuan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., Loudi 417000, Hunan, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Analysis and application of work roll wear of rough mill in hot strip mills
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The 2 250 hot- rolled strip mill of Liansteel is a conventional hot- rolling production line designed and manufactured in China with only one roughing mill. The roughing work roll is more worn than the other hot- rolled strip mills with two roughing mills. In order to reduce the roll consumption and the frequency of roll change, the rolling weights of roughing work roll was increased, but it was found that there is an increase of roughing work roll accident and obvious center wave in the upstream stands of finishing mill after operating for some time. Through the data processing and analysis of rolling weights, roll wear and roll consumption of roughing work roll, the mathematical relationship between the three factors was explored. By regulating the rolling weights of roughing work roll, the roll accident reduced by 58.28% and the problem of the center wave appeared in the upstream stands of finishing mill obviously reduced. The contradiction between the roll consumption, product quality and roll safety was successfully solved.

http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_cn: 首钢国际提升内部审核有效性的研究与实践
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.org_cn:
（1. Quality and Technology Department， Beijing Shougang International Engineering Technology Co., Ltd., Beijing 100043, China
2. Beijing Metallurgy Three- dimensional Simulation Design Engineering Technology Research Center, Beijing 100043, China）
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.title_en: Research and practice of promoting effectiveness of internal audit among Shougang International Engineering Technology Co., Ltd.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.abstract_en: Abstract：The aim and significance of carrying out internal audit work of management system among an enterprise were analyzed. According to the standard of quality, environment and professional health safety management system, by means of establishing a management system management manual, the internal audit job requirement was proposed by the company. In line with the job requirement of management manual internal audit, the working routine of internal audit was formulated, the major measure and method of internal audit work were proposed, its measure and method were innovative and creative. By means of analyzing internal audit result in near three years, the internal audit work played a relatively good role, promoted the continuous improvement and effective operation of management system. Thus, these measures and method can be further promoted and applied.
http://www.zgyj.ac.cn/CN/abstract/abstra.citation: 颉建新 ，王璇 ，刘然 . 首钢国际提升内部审核有效性的研究与实践[J]. 中国冶金, 2018, 28(5): 86-91. XIE Jian- xin,,WANG Xuan,,LIU Ran,. Research and practice of promoting effectiveness of internal audit among Shougang International Engineering Technology Co., Ltd.. China Metallurgy, 2018, 28(5): 86-91.
